ngu byas gyur kyang// mi khom rigs las thar mi srid// mi dge rnam smin rang snang la// gzhan gyi yul du bros sa med// rang snang log pa sdug bsngal yin// nyon mongs las kyi sdug bsngal rnams// rab ni myur

ba tshe 'dir 'byung// 'bring ni bar skabs phyi ma la// tha ma lan grangs gzhan la smin// smin par nges dang ma nges pa// rgyu rkyen tshogs dang ma tshogs byed// dge sdig sman dug lta bu la// gnyis kyis gcig
bcom zad par byed// gcig gis gcig mnan smin mi nus// gcig zad gcig 'phel chen por 'gyur// snga phyi'i 'dus la snga phyi dang// che chung 'bras bu de dang mtshungs// mi dge 'khrul pa'i bya ba la// zhe

sdang las skyed sbyor dngos tshang// mchod bya'i zhing du gyur rnams dang// de mthun pa la chen por brjod// 'dod la skyes shing gang rung tshang// snying rje can la 'bring du 'byung// snyoms las cha re tshang ba

yin// phrag dog can rnams chung ba ste// rang 'dod med pa'i sdig pa rnams// rnam smin 'bras bu phra ba yin// rang bzhin kun gyi snang ba ru// gang byas las kyi 'bras bu de// che ba khrom gyi mi bzhin du// kun

gyis snang zhing yongs su grags// 'bring po grong mi tha ma yang// dgon pa'i mi bzhin snang bar 'gyur// mi mngon mi dmigs ma mchis so// sdug bsngal las skyes sdug bsngal bdag/ sdug bsngal chu bo'i rgyun
bzhin gnas// spros dang bral ba'i chos nyid de// rang gi sems su ma rig pas// med bzhin du ni gzung 'dzin gyi// bdag dang gzhan du 'khrul pa yis// rtog pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa// sems nyid gcig gi
ri mo ste// tshon rtsi ri mo sna tshogs kyang// mkhan po gcig gis bris pa bzhin// sna tshogs sems kyi rang snang yin// rang las logs na byed mkhan med// med bzhin bdag 'dzin ma rtogs pas// rgyu ni ma

rig gnyis 'dzin la// rang rkyen dug lnga'i lam chud nas// der zhen der gzung de yi gzugs// sems la snang zhing 'gro lnga skyes// gang skyes kun gzhi snam bu la// rang rkyen rtog pa'i bzo 'chos byas// de dang
de yi snang ba la/ khams gsum sems can nyon mongs khams// gzhan dbang dbang po sgo lnga la// 'dod srid rags pas 'dod khams pa// rang gzhan 'od kyi gzugs brnyan la// nyon mongs phra
ba gzugs khams yin// gzugs med 'du shes yid yul na// rang med gzhan snang yul rnams la// nyon mongs bag la nyal ba ni// gzugs med pa yi sems can khams/ khams gsum pa ni sems tsam

ste// sems kyi rtog pa rnying pa la// a 'thas 'gag pa 'chi ba zhes// rtog pa gsar bu byung ba la// zhen pa 'phel ba skye bar rtags// skye shi gnyis ka ci la rgyud// mtshams sbyor bar ma do de la// skye ba snga phyi rang
gzhan gyi// gnyis snang med pa'i gzung 'dzin can// bag la nyal ba'i sems can khams// rkyen gyis bsgyur na skye 'gag 'byung// sems nyid skye ba med pa la// skye med chos de sna tshogs ston// sprin med
mkha' la sprin byung 'dra// sems can gcig gi rtog pa la// snang srid thams cad skye 'gag byed// gzhan du gyur pa ma yin par// sems kyis ri mo bris pa yin// ma rig 'khrul pa'i sems nyid de// rang gis
rang la bzos byas pas// rang gzugs dbyibs dang kha dog sogs// khams gsum sems can spyi btsan la// thun mong ltar na ci 'dra ba// yul du snang ba'i rnam shes ni// go 'byed nam mkha'i klong dkyil

du// dang po srid pa sems kyi rtsal// snod kyi 'jig rten mas kyis chags// rang bzhin mi g.yos rtog pa g.yos// rlung rngams sa ya drug 'bum la// rgya ni tshad med rdo rje 'dra// chu rngams 'bum phrag bcu gcig

dang// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// de stengs gser gyi dkyil 'khor rngams// sum 'bum nyi khri chig stong dang// rgya ru sa ya 'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang// sum stong phyed dang lnga brgya'o// khor yug sum 'gyur lnga

yis brgyan// rnam shes rin chen sprin las su// phyi nang char rgyun snod bcud gnyis// rin chen lnga las lhun po ni// tshangs pa'i gnas ni man chad nas// dmyal khams bcu drug yan chad la// 'og tu chu nang

brgyad khri nub// steng du brgyad khri yang chags so// de yi phyi rim gser ri bdun// gnya' shing lhun po'i phyed nas su// rim bzhin 'phang du phyed phyed bri// de rnams 'phang dang zheng du mnyam// de bar rol mtsho

bdun dang bcas// rol mtsho nang ma brgyad khri zhing// phyi ma rnams ni phyed phyed bri// khor yug sum 'bum sum khri'o// gling bzhi shar gyi lus 'phags so// shel las grub pa zla gam gzugs// dpag tshad stong

dang lnga bcu ste// 'dzam gling gser la sogs kha'i dbyibs// dpag tshad nyis stong phyed dang bzhi// ba lang spyod ni rA ga las// zlum po stong phrag phyed dang brgyad// in dra ni la sgra mi snyan// gru bzhi dpag tshad
stong phrag ni// bco lnga gnyis 'gyur mtha' skor ni// 'phang du dpag tshad stong stong ngo// gling bzhi bar gyi gling g.yog brgyad// lus dang lus 'phags shar gyi g.yog/ lho yi rnga yab rnga yab

gling// nub kyi g.yog ldan lam mchog 'gro// byang gi sgra dang sgra mi snyan// kun la lcags ri nag pos bskor// 'og dang gling bar rgya mtshos bskor// dngas ma rin chen rnam lnga las// snyigs ma sa yi gling
rnams grub// kha dog dkar ser dmar ljang la// nam mkha' baiDUr mdangs can 'od// mthor sdud smin byed skyed pa yis// rlung dang 'byung ba'i rang rtsal las// yan lag gnyis su gsal ba yi// ri rab lhun

po'i phyed sked la// drod bsil 'od ldan nyi zla gnyis// dpag tshad lnga bcu rtsa gcig go/ sa bcud rin chen rtsi shing ni// me tog 'bras bu dri ro'i bdag/ mkha' la sprin phung skar tshogs dang// khu rlangs 'ja'

tshon char gyis brgyan// 'byung ba stobs kyis zad 'phel gyis// dkar nag rgyu rkyen ring thung dang// che chung lo zla zhag za dang// dus gzugs tshig smras skad cig rdul// yi ge gcig ni rin che dang// mang po
mtha' phyogs bye brag bstan// rnam shes srid pa'i rtse mo nas// bcud kyi sems can chags lugs ni// dang po 'od gsal gzugs med nas// gzugs khams yum la nyon mongs kyi// rnam rtog rags su song
ba las// lhun po 'og na tsha ba'i mtsho// mnar med sems can dmyal ba'i gnas// de steng dmyal khams rim pa ru// chu bur can gyi bar du yod// dmyal ba'i sgo bzhi 'dzam gling gi// ma dros mtsho 'og dpag

tshad ni// nyi khri dmyal ba'i 'jug sgo la// nyi tshe nye 'khor de yi lam// tshad med tsha grang sna tshogs snang// ri rab rmang dang thang 'khob na// yi dwags rigs tshogs sum cu drug/ bkres skom 'dod sred yid la

gdangs// sa steng sa 'og mun pa'i gling// byol song bye ba so drug la// gti mug gsod rdung sdug bsngal snang// ri rab bseng na lha min rnams// 'thab rtsod smas pa'i duHkha spyod// gling bzhi mi la 'du byed
rkyen// skye rgas na 'chi sdug bsngal snang// 'dod lha rigs drug 'chi 'pho dang// dang po chags nas bsam gtan gsum// man du me bdun chu gcig rlung// gtor nas bskal pa che chung gis// 'jig rten
chags 'jig stong gnas kyi// mi rtag rkyen dbang bde sdug dang// gzugs khams bcu bdun gzugs med bzhi// khams gsum 'khor ba'i srid pa na// 'dod khams nyon mongs ye shes che// 'byung lnga yul lnga

sgo lnga yis// 'gro lnga 'gro ba so so rnams// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos// ma rig rnam shes sna tshogs 'di// rang snang bzhin du kun la snang// dbang po sngos dang yid 'gyu la// snang srid rtag pa nyid du
'dod// sems can rtog pa so sor gzung// 'gro kun spyi btsan de ltar bzhed// lha min la sogs 'ga' zhig la// rigs drug drang ba'i snang bar 'ong// dman pa'i rigs ni phal che la// rang

snang min pa gzhan mi snang// rang snang log pa'i rtog tshogs de// gzhan snang 'khrul pa'i sems can la// yod do mnyam du rtog pa de// spyi mthun snang ba gcig tu med// rang snang bzhin du gzhan ma la// sems

can rigs su gcig pa la// skye ba rnam pa bzhi ru byung// la la'i dug la la la'i sman// la la'i dgra la la la'i gnyen// la la'i nub la la la'i shar// la la'i mtshan la la la'i nyin// la la'i skyabs la la
la'i gshed// la la'i snang ba la la'i mun// mdor na dbang po'i sgo rnams la// 'byung ba phyi nang skye 'gag rnams// don gcig nyid la tha dad pa// chu la rigs drug so so yis// mi gcig so sor mthong ba
bzhin// kun kyang de bzhin nyid du shes// 'ga' zhig mnar med dmyal bar skye// 'ga' zhig bla med byang chub 'thob// 'ga' zhig 'khor ba'i gnas mthong ste// 'ga' zhig rgyal ba'i zhing du gsal// sems
can blo rigs so so la// snang ba bden pa gcig tu med// ma nges rtog pa sna tshogs pa// gcig tu ma rig bden par gzung// 'khor 'das gyes pa de las byung// yang dag don la gnyis su med// rang rig

ci 'dra 'gro ba kun// de 'dra chos kun thams cad shes// snod bcud gnyis po lhan cig skyes// rang 'khrul tsa na kun kyang 'khrul// 'khor ba min pa'i snang ba med// rang grol dus na kun kyang grol// 'od

gsal min pa'i yul ma grub// sna tshogs gzugs can yid las skyes// gzugs rnams thams cad snang ba'i dpal// sna tshogs snang ba ngo mtshar che// 'khrul snang rtog pa tha dad yin// nyin mtshan gnyis kyi bye
brag ltos// 'khor ba'i nyes pa de yis shes// mun pa'i gling na mthong lugs mang// 'od gsal ba la ci las med// 'khor 'das rtsa ba ci la spyod// khams gsum srid pa'i sdug bsngal las// tsha ba'i dmyal
ba brgyad po ni// 'khor lo bcu drug sdug bsngal can// ma rig zhe sdang rgyu rkyen gyis// dud 'gro la sogs bsad pa yis// gcad gtubs bzhin du yang sos pa// lcags kyi dra ba me 'bar nang// mtshon cha'i
char bab gshags gtubs byed// lus la me 'bar gzhob tu 'tshig/ bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad kun gyis// sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa myong// gshin rjes mun nag me la bsreg/ mi lus mdung thung sum brgya

yis// btsugs pa'i sdug bsngal stong gi cha// mi phod rang lo lnga brgya thub// thig nag rgyu ni srog gcod dang// ma byin blangs pa lcags tshan gyis// thig btab sog le 'bar bas 'dra// sdug bsngal snga ma'i steng
du yang// sta res gzhog cing gsor gyis 'bugs// lus la spu gri char bab gtub// yang sos sdug bsngal bcu 'gyur che// tshe ni rang lo stong thub bo// bsdus 'joms rgyu ni lus sdig
gsum// 'dod log tshul khrims nyams pa yis// sdug bsngal snga ma'i steng du yang// 'jigs su rung ba'i gshin rje yis// lcags kyi pha bong bar du 'tshir// 'dod pa'i bud med gzugs mthong nas// shal ma

ri la 'dzeg pas sdug/ phur bus 'debs shing tho bas brdung// lcags ri me 'bar logs la bsreg/ tshe ni rang lo nyis stong thub// ngu 'bod rgyu ni las gsum ste// bag med chang la spyod pas byung// snga ma'i

steng du lcags bsregs pa// 'drud cing yan lag me ru 'bar// zangs khu khol ma khong du ldud// lus 'tshig khyi rgod nang khrol za// mtshon cha'i char babs srin bus za// kyi hud ngu 'bod sgra chen 'byin// tshe ni

rang lo stong phrag bzhi// ngu 'bod chen po las gsum dang// chang 'byung rdzun smras rgyu las byung// sdug bsngal snga ma'i steng du ni// lcags bsregs sa gzhi me 'bar steng// lce la phur bu rgyang grangs rgyang// thong
gshol 'bar bas rmod pa dang// khwa ta 'bu srin sbrul gdug za// gshin rjes zhe 'debs mtshon chas gtub// chu srin 'jigs pa'i kha ru 'dzud// rang sha za zhi ngu 'bod byed// de rnams rang lo brgya

stong thub// tsha ba'i rgyu ni sngar las steng// log lta skur 'debs sngon sdug steng// nags me 'tshubs pa'i nang du bsregs// dug sbrul 'bar bas rkub nas za// brag bar btsir zhing gzong gis 'bigs// bum

pa'i nang du khro chur 'tshod// gshed po rnams kyis gshog gtub byed// sngon pas bcu drug 'gyur gyis sdug/ rang lo khri dang drug stong thub// rab tu tsha bar skye ba'i rgyu// lus ngag mi dge bdun spyad dang// lta

log dbang phyug rgyu smra yis// yid gsum sdug bsngal snga ma'i steng// lcags zangs nang du zangs khur 'tshod// skam pas lce 'dren nang khrol 'byin// bya khyis lus rnams dum bur gtong// mtshon snon dbang po
gcod gtub byed// 'di yi sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab// rang lo 'bum khri stong phrag gnyis// mi bzad rab 'bar mnar med rgyu// mtshams med lnga sogs spyad pas su// lcags mkhar sgo med nang du ni// me
'bar bkres skom nad rnams dang// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad tshang// sems can dmyal ba dpag med pa// 'di yi sgra ni thos pa na// dmyal ba gzhan kun bde mor mthong// dmyal ba gzhan gyi me
kun ni// 'di yi drung na bsil bar 'gyur// steng nas mtshon cha'i char 'bab cing// 'og nas sa gzhi me ru 'bar// bar du dud 'khrigs khro chus 'tshod// gshed po rnams kyis rdeg gsod byed// tshe ni bskal
pa grangs med do// de ltar dmyal ba'i mi de rnams// mi lo lnga bcu rgyal chen zhag/ de yi zla ba bcu gnyis la// lo bsgrangs lo ni lnga bcu la// yang sos rang lo gcig yin no// de la lnga bcu thig

nag gi/ zhag tu byas nas bsgrangs pa yis// rim gyis de bzhin bsgrangs pa yin// mnar med tshe tshad bskal pa'i bar// las kyi rnam smin ma zad na// de bas bskal pa mang du bstan// tsha bas lus gdung mod
la ni// shin tu grang ba'i dmyal ba brgyad// rgyu ni dge 'dun dkon mchog dang// mi dang dud 'gro la sogs la// gos bshus spu phyi 'khyags su bcug/ chur bskur bsdigs bsad mnan skyigs dang// skyabs

gnas phral ba'i rnam smin gyis// lhags pa'i ngar gyis chu bur 'gyur// rnag khrag chu rdol so 'thams shing// khyab pas lus 'thums las shu zer// kyi hud sgra 'byin cho nges 'debs// pad+ma dmar ltar lus po

gas// ut+pal lta bur lus tshal mang// grang ba'i sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab// chu bur tshe tshad til gzhong gang// lo brgya til re phyung zad yin// gzhan ma rnams ni nyi shu 'gyur// grang ba'i sdug bsngal

bsran thabs med// nyi tshe ba yi dmyal ba ni// gling bar rnams dang mun pa'i gling// 'dzam bu'i mi dang dud 'gro'i khrod// yi dwags lha min khrod na gnas// rgyu ni mi dge'i rnam smin rnams// dge ba cung zad

'dres pa yis// nyon mongs dug gsum rkyen gyis su// dge sdig sngon la gang spyad de// 'bras bu sngon la 'ongs pa ste// sdig spyad nyin par sdug bsngal zhing// mtshan mo bde bar longs spyod phyed// dge ba nyin

par bde spyod cing// mtshan mo mi bzad sdug bsngal spyod// nye 'khor lcags khang sgo med nang// rlung gis sgo phye phyi rol 'bros// shing rnams mtshon cha'i char du bab// ri brag thams cad spu gri'i so// chu rnams
ro myags 'dam rdzab kyis// ri rnams dmyal srungs 'jigs pa'i gzugs// sa gzhi me mar mo yi 'obs// rang snang log pa'i sdug bsngal te// 'jigs pa bzhi la skor zlog ni// phyogs bzhi sgo bzhir 'byin
'jug byed// dmyal ba rnams ni rdzus skyes pas// skad cig de la sdug bsngal rdzogs// bde bar gnas skabs yud tsam med// dug lnga ser sna la sogs kyis// skyon pa'i mi dge bcu spyad cing// khyad par ma
byin 'dod sred dang// brnab sems g.yo sgyu'i las spyad pas// yi dwags rigs ni dpag med kyang// bye brag sum cu drug sogs rnams// bsdus na sgrib pa can bzhi'o// gnas ni sa 'og sa stengs na// lus

ni pho mo mo rigs mang// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi nad kyis mnar// sdug bsngal dmyal ba'i rigs mthun yod// khyad par ser sna'i 'jur 'gegs kyis// gzhan gyi dge bsgrags rang la spyad// mi dge phyi yi sgrib pa
can// gnas med bye ma'i thang stong la// tsha grang gnyis kyi sdug bsngal spyod// skyabs med mun pa'i glong na 'khyam// mgo bo che la mid pa phra// gsus pa gru tsam rkang lag phra// lus po mi theg
'tshig cing 'chag/ grang bas gos med chu bur can// tsha bas mes tshig bsil skyabs med// 'bros pa'i gnas med gshed mas bskor// nang gi sgrib can ltogs skom yid// las sgrib brgya mtsho'i chu yang
skam// bza' btung gang yang mi snang zhing// gnas skabs tsam re zas mthong yang/ kha ru bsleb dus rul myags dang// lcags bsregs thu lum 'bar bar 'gyur/ kha la me 'bar khong par dug/ dmyal ba lta
bu'i sdug bsngal myong// sgo khur zas skom gnas mthong tshe// 'jig pa'i lam bsgral spyin tsam na// stobs can mtshon cha thogs pa yis// rang snang log pas srung bar mthong// gsad dogs 'jigs pa'i sdug

bsngal dang// ri rnams dgra dang rtsi shing mtshon// chu rnams me 'bar tshig dogs skrags// spyi thun zas nyid rnag khrag tu// mthong ste zos shing tshim pa med/ kha nas ngan skyugs lus khengs shing// rang sha za zhing
cho nges 'debs// mkha' la rgyu dang 'brog dgon 'khyams// 'ga' zhig gzhan la gnod 'tshe ba// glags lta gtor ma dri za dang// bdud rigs rdzu 'phrul ldan pa la// sdug bsngal mi bzad 'jigs pa

yod// skye gnas phal cher rdzus skyes la// tshe ni mi lo zhag byas pa'i// brtsis pa'i rang lo lnga brgya thub// ring shos bskal pa gcig thub bo// gti mug mi dge'i las bcu spyad// khyad par 'dod log g.yem pa

dang// ngag 'khyal tshul khrims 'chal ba'i rgyus// dud 'gro rigs ni dpag med na/ kha 'thor klu dang lha min rigs// gzugs ni ma nges sna tshogs las// gnas ni sa chu me rlung mkha'// rtsi shing mi gtsang dri nga
dang// srog chags lus dang mun par 'khyams// zas ni rigs pa yid dge sems/ kha zas sna tshogs 'tsho bar byed// tshe ni nges med skad cig nas// bskal pa'i bar du thub pa yod/ kha 'thor byol song

rigs bzhi rgyu// gti mug btang snyoms mi dge dang// dge ba spyad pa'i mthu stobs las// mi shes mun pa'i bsam gtan gyis// bya dang glang po sa srungs sogs// lha yi rigs kyi dud 'gror skyes// dge ba phra
mo dngos logs pas// mi yi khrod kyi dud 'gror 'gyur// gti mug gsod gcod rdzun tshig gis// dmyal bar gnas pa'i dud 'gro ste// de rnams sems med sprul pa dang// sems can blun rmongs gnyis yin

no// phal cher gling bar mun pa dang// sa 'og chu dang rgya mtsho gnas// rkang mang rkang med rkang gnyis dang// rkang gcig rkang bzhi gzugs med yod// sdug bsngal mgon med dgra mang zhing// bkol spyod
gsod gcod bran du 'khol// ma bu nying sha rang sha za// gcig gis gcig 'joms za ba dang// bkol spyod gsod rdung byed pa rnams// dngos su mthong yang mi go bas// glen zhing gti mug mun

pas bsgribs// bya gcan ri dwags glang chen sogs// sha rus pags pa spu yi phyir// tshor ba'i sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab// nya thal chu srin sbrul gdug rnams// rang gis gzhan za gzhan gyis rang// mang du

'dus pas gcig la za// gcig gis mang po'i gshed du byed// bya rog 'ug pa byi la khyi// zhe sdang las skyes sha za'i tshogs// wa dang spre'u bya byi srin// 'dod chags brnab sems sred pas sdug/ nya dang phye leb
bung ba bya// 'dod yon sdug bsngal grogs su mthong// rta glang phag pa lug gi rigs// srin bu mngal gnas gti mug can// ri dwags sa bdag dngang skrag brgyal// rang snang dgrar langs srog 'chad

yod// lus nad yid la zug rngu ni// dud 'gro rnams la rgyun mi 'chad// mgo ni 'phred lta kha 'thur bstan// lha mi las byol ngan song rtags// lus kyi phra rags rdul phran tsam// ri rab tsam gyi khyad par
gyis// gzugs dang kha dog stobs khyad che// 'dod log zhe sdang gdug rtsub dang// sbyin sogs phyin ci log song bas// dud 'gro'i rigs kyi gtso bo ni// klu bdag ba glang gdong pa can// mgo mjug sbrul la
khog pa mi// klu brgyad 'khor tshogs 'bum dang bcas// rkyen sdug sbal sbrul 'jigs pas bskor// rgya mtsho chu mig ne'u gsing gnas// dkar phyogs dge ba bskyed pa rnams// bdud rtsi'i zas za longs spyod
ldan// rdzu 'phrul stobs dang nus pa che// gnag phyogs gdug pa'i dug rlabs 'phro// gang dang lhan cig khros nas gnod// rang nad mdze sogs gzhan la dgod// na rag sdug bsngal cha re yod// zas su mi

gtsang dri nga za// mkha' lding bye tshan char bab dang// lha min khros pa'i chad pa yis// dmyal ba lta bu'i sdug bsngal yod// snga dro rdzu 'phrul sems gsal ldan// lha mi'i snang ba skabs su 'char// phyi dro gti mug
dud 'gro yis// mun nag dug chu khol mar 'tshod// rgyal bas bsngags pa'i mtsho// phrag dog mi dge'i rnam sems kyis// sha za khrag 'thung gzhan yul bcom// gnod sems dge dang 'dres par byed// gti

mug smon pa phyin ci log/ rgyamatsho'i nang song ri rab kyis// khong seng mun pas 'thibs pa ru// lha min dbang po sgra gcan 'dzin// bu dang chung mar bcas pa dang// rin chen gzhal yas longs spyod dang// tshal

dang me tog 'bab chu'i steng// bya dang bung ba'i tshogs kyis gang// de ru skyes pa'i lha min rnams// shas cher dud 'gro'i bsam pa la// gzugs kyang dud 'gro'i mgo bo can// rdzu 'phrul rgya mtsho 'khrug pa
dang// ri rab g.yo nus 'thab rtsod dga'// sdang sems skyes dus dmyal ba dngos// mi yi lo la zhag byas pa'i// bsgrangs pa'i rang lo lnga stong thub// 'ga' zhig 'thab rtsod bar der
'chi// 'phos tshe dmyal bar ltung ba mang// de la sogs pa dud 'gro'i rigs// duHkha bshad pa brjod mi lang// sbyin sogs dge las spyad byas kyang// bsam pa ma rungs smon pas te// mi dge ba la bstod
byas rgyus// lha min rigs ni rnam gnyis te// bdud rigs yi dwags rdzu 'phrul can// dud 'gro rigs su gtogs pa yin// grong khyer 'og nas 'phreng ldan ni// rgya mtsho mtshams kyi ri rab logs la ni// rin

chen gzhal yas dga' ba'i tshal dang bcas// ljon shing rdzing bu longs spyod sna tshogs ldan// lha min rgyal po dbang ston chung 'khor tshogs// sna tshogs sde rigs khri phrag bcu gnyis ni// gzugs ni sna tshogs

bde sdug 'dres par spyod// dregs pa'i nga rgyal lha la rtsod 'dod cing// rdzu 'phrul lus kyis nyi zla'i 'od kyang sgrib// ri bo g.yo dang gnam grum sgra skad sgrogs// rang lo drug stong dbang sgyur ba yin// sdig

bcas mchod sbyin tshul chos rgyu yis skyed// grong khyer btses ldan ri rab log/ grong khyer gnyis rtses brgya stong na// sngon bas lhag pa'i khang bzangs dang// gser dang g.yer kha mi 'phreng tshal// 'dres pa'i tshal
bzhi'i skyed tshal dang// rgyal po me tog 'phreng 'dzin la// lha min bu mo rnams kyis mchod// stobs dang longs spyod dga' bar byed// lha min rang lo bdun stong thub// 'jig rten dge ba'i longs spyod

kyis// gsum pa gser gyi sa gzhi'i steng// grong khyer sum brtsegs can zhes pa// gser 'od ldan pa'i rin chen gyi// dpag tshad brgyad stong khang bzangs la// bkra shis rang mdzes chu rgyun dang// shing ljon
skyed tshal du ma la// bya dang bung ba'i tshogs kyis gang// bdag nyid chen po thag bzangs rigs// lha min bu mo rab mdzes rnams// rin chen rgyan sras rtse dga' byed// 'jigs pa med pa'i rdzu 'phrul

ston// stobs chen rab dgod nga rgyal rlom// lha min thams cad stags skyed cing// longs spyod rtse rgod bag med spyod// tshe 'di rang lo stong phrag brgyad// de ltar lha min rigs rnams ni// dud 'gro rigs man

ngan song gnas// 'phos te lha dang mir skyes kyang// rang rang rgyu mthun 'bras bu 'byung// phral du dmyal bar ltung bar byed// chags sdang gnyis kyi sred pa yis// lha dang lha min 'thab rtsod rgyu// rkyen ni lha min

bu mo yis// lha yi gnas su ltas pa las// lha yi bu rnams 'dod pa g.yos// lha yi bdud rtsi'i char phab pas// lha min rnams ni 'dod pa skyes// zas la chags shing mo la sred// mig ser phrag dog nga rgyal
gyis// lha min sgra gcan dbang ldan khros// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed 'gyur// mi rnams dge spyod 'thab rtsod ni// dkar po'i klu rnams dga' ba yis// mi yul bkra shis bde legs

'byung// 'dres spyod lha min nag tshogs tsam// 'phreng thogs lha rnams rgyal bar 'gyur// mi rnams mi dge log spyad na// lha mi dpung skyed zhe khros nas// nag po'i klu dang ma mo yis// lo nyes nad yams

'khrug pa dang// gangs chad chu rdol glog gi sgras// gling bzhi'i mi la 'tshe bar byed// dang po lha min rnams tshogs nas// nag po klu yi phyogs byas te// sgra gcan dbang po g.yul 'gyed 'ong// de rnams rgyal
chen rigs bzhis 'joms// pham pas grong khyer gnyis pa yi// rgyal pos me tog 'phreng 'dzin gyis// 'khor rnams sbran te go bgos nas// mi bzad g.yul 'gyed drag po la// rgyal chen bzhi yis pham par

byas// de tshe grong khyer gsum pa yi// rab dgod thag bzangs dbang po khros// kye/ lha min rnams la stobs med cing// lha min bu mo g.yo sgyu can// lha yi yid ni mi sdud dam// nor rgyas klu sogs nag po'i

tshogs// tshar gcad bya phyir chas so zhes// lha min dbang pos kun la bsgos// lha min grong khyer sum brtsegs kyis// shing rta mtshon cha go bgos nas// bu mos lha bu mgo skor zhing// rnga sgra lha min cha sgra

yis// ri dang nags tshal mtsho rnams g.yos// de tshe lha rnams dga' ba'i tshal// lha dbang chos bzangs mdun sa nas// kun la bka' bsgos shing rta'i tshal// go cha 'dod phyir rgyug par byed// rtsub 'gyur

tshal du g.yul 'gyed tshe// glang po chen po sa srungs bu// lus chen dpag tshad stong yod pa'i// mgo'i stong de stong ri rab stong// de stengs lha yi dmag tshogs 'bum// bu mo mdzes mas rtse dga' byed// lha yi bu

rnams rin chen brgyan// shing rta zhon nas mtshon cha thogs// bar snang thams cad gang ba yis// sgra chen sgrog cing dong bar byed// de tshe stobs ldan nag po ma gtogs pa// lha min thams cad spu zing byed// lha

min rnga sgras rgya mtsho 'gul// klu rnams rgyugs pas sa gzhi g.yos// gnod sbyin khros pas skar mda' ltung// 'jig rten skyong pas gling bzhi nyul// dang po klu rnams dug char 'phen// me 'od 'brug stong glog

dmar 'gyed// de tshe lha min dga' ba'i sgra// ha ha 'byin cing rgyug par byed// de la kun tu rgyu ba'i lha// 'phreng thogs bcas pas g.yul 'gyed 'gyur// de la lha min ri bo 'phen// thams cad mtshon cha'i char

'bebs byed// de tshe lha rnams mtshon cha'i char// phab pas ri ldeg rgya mtsho 'khrug/ sgra ni gnam sa grum mnyam grag/ mtshon cha rdo rje ser ltar bab// glog 'phreng bskal pa'i me 'od 'phro// lha min rgya mtsho'i nang
gnas rnams// snying 'gas dran med phyogs bcur rgyug/ de tshe rab dgod thag bzangs khros// lha yi dbang po'i thog tu mchongs// ral gri mtshon cha'i 'khor lo 'phangs// de la glang po sa srungs
bus// sna yi dbugs kyis 'gyel du bcug/ rdo rje rmig pas phye mar brlags// lha dbang sprul pas nam mkha' khengs// gnam lcags char phab lha min bros// sngon gyi bsad bcad rnam smin gyis// la la smas

shing la la shi// lha min bu mo mya ngan byed// smas shing mi dang mtshungs pa yin// phrag dog gdug pa'i las 'bras kyis// dngos po gang mthong go dang mtshon// lus kyi las su gsod dang rtsod// ngag tu rgyob dang

sod sgra sgrogs// yid la rtag tu dgra dang 'khrug/ shi ba'i ro ni rgya mtshor skyur// mtsho ni khrag tu 'khrug par 'gyur// mgo dang sked pa ma chad na// lus la mtshon bsnun rma yis ni// las ngan yod pas 'chi mi

'gyur// rtag tu las kyi sdug bsngal spyod// lha rnams srog gcod spangs pa yis// mi 'chi rma byung de kar 'tsho// lha rnams dga' ba'i tshal du bzlog/ sdang sems med pas dga' bde spyod// lha min rang yul

'thab rtsod byed// ngan song sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab// ma rig 'khrul kyang sbyin pa dang// tshul khrims dge bas las grub phyir// gling bzhi dang ni gling phran gnas// sgra mi snyan na dge ba'i mthus// gzugs

bzang khru ni sum cu gnyis// rdzus skyes tshe lo stong thub cing// longs spyod 'dod lha bzhin du yod// lus 'phags khru brgyad skyem byed legs// drod skyes nyis brgya lnga bcu thub// ba glang spyod pa khru bcu drug/ sgong

skyes lnga brgya longs spyod che// 'dzam bu gling na khru bzhi pa// mngal skyes lus kyi rig rtsal che// tshe la nges med dpag med nas// bar du brgyad khri tha ma bcu// de las thung ba ma yi mngal// gling bzhi tsam nas
mngal skyes mang// dbyibs dang kha dog sa gzhi 'dra// thun mong mi rtag skye shing can// bsod nams las grub 'dzam bu sras// las kyis sa par bshad pa 'di// bskal ba dang nas tha ma'i bar// dus kyi

bzang ngan rim pa ru// bde sdug gnyis la rim par spyod// tshe lo dpag med brgyad khri'i dus// mi yi gzugs gzung chags sdang chung// sgra mi snyan bzhin longs spyod che// sa zhag ma rmos sa lu ljang// rtsol ba
med pa'i longs spyod yod// sde rigs khyim thab med par bde// bar du las kyi chags sred kyis// gsog 'jog btsal bas longs spyod nyams// byang chub sems ldan kun don gyis// rgyal po byung nas sde
rigs dgos// 'dod nyung btsun pas bram zer grags// mkhas pa rje'u rigs phal pa dmangs// ngan spyod snol bar grags pa bzhi// las kyi rtsol bas longs spyod ldan// khyim thab ngo tsha'i 'dzin rtog
byung// bsod nams las la spyod pas bde// de nas chags sdang dge sdig dran// zug rngu las dbang cher song nas// brgyad khri bcu par thub pa yi// mu ge nad mtshon me chu rlung// lo zla zhag
bdun go rims 'ong// dge bas dus kyi bskal pa bzang// bsod nams las byung gser zangs dngul// lcags las grub pa'i 'khor lo yis// sgyur rgyal mi yi dbang phyug po// 'khor lo nor bu bud med

de// blon po dmag dpon glang chen bdun// nye ba ral gri pags chen dang// tshal dang gos snam mal cha bdun// longs spyod kun la dbang byed cing// sprul sku'i bstan pa rin chen sgron// dge slong rnams ni
'byung ba'i phyir// nyams pa med pa'i tshul khrims ldan// de nas las dbang mi dge mthus// tshe dang longs spyod stobs rnams bri// gdul dka' 'dul ba'i dus la bab// rgyal po sde dpon so sor

'byed// bston pa'i chos la sde rigs gyes// theg pa sna tshogs grub mtha' gcod// spang blang bde sdug sna tshogs 'byung// gnyen po mi thub ngan dbang 'chor// mi dge bcu sogs ngan spyod dus// lnga bcu'i tshe

la rtags tsam 'dzin// bzhi bcu'i dus na bstan pa nub// bde skyid zad pas ngan 'gror mtshungs// de rnams dge sdig rnam smin gyis// dbang gi 'bras bu thun mong dang// thun mong ma yin gang byas myong// sna
tshogs las kyis skyed pa'o// nyon mongs rags shing bsod nams phra// mi dge rtag tu sdug bsngal ba'i// rtsod ldan dus kyi snyigs ma lnga// nyon mongs che la gnyen po chung// rmongs pa phyin ci log la

gsal// dus kyi snyigs ma 'gyur ldog che// tshe thung nad mang blo bur 'chi// zas la bcud med 'tsho bas 'phongs// nyon mongs dug lnga rang khar spyod// dbang phyug sgyur smra'i chad lta 'dzin// dge dman sdig pa

dga' che bas// mi lus thob kyang mi khom gnas// skye rgas na 'chi'i rba la g.yeng// ma rig las kyi rnam shes de// mi gtsang khrag gi mngal nas su// tsha grang 'khyams rtags ris non pa'i// sdug bsngal myong

zhing 'jur mig la// drangs pa'i tshul gyis skyes tsam na// gsar gyur pags bshus gshed mas khyer// sngangs skrag skye ba'i sdug bsngal myong// las kyi rnam smin lus po la// phyi rol ltogs 'khyams ngal dub

dang// mtshon dang 'byung ba dug gi nad// rlung mkhris bad kan gdon 'dus kyi// rtag tu lus la 'tshe nad mang// bu dang chung ma gnyen bshes tshogs// 'brel pa dgra dang mnyam du gnod// byams gnyen phan

btags bral dogs brtser// sdang dgra gnod skyal byas dogs dang// ma ldang ma phyid dogs pa yis// med pa 'tshol ba'i sdug bsngal spyod// yod pa 'tsho skyong zhen chags che// mnga' rigs che chung gang yod
la// sred pas dud 'gro bas kyang gdug/ mi tshe ltogs dogs yid gdungs shing// yi dwags bzhin du bkres shing 'phongs// chog shes med pa'i sdug bsngal la// bde bar lta zhing sdug
bsngal spyod// grogs bshes gshin yul rnams dang bral// dgra yi tshogs kyis bcom gyur te// mdza' yang 'bral la sdang yang 'grogs// dus rnams kun tu bde ba med// bzang po khengs shing grags pas
myos// mtho la snyeg 'dod mnyam la 'gran// phrag dog sma la mnyam pa yi// sdug bsngal rgyu 'bras rang gzugs 'gyur// ngan pa kun nas 'phongs pas nyen// bde ba'i go skabs med pa la// thar pa bsgrub
'dod gser bas dkon// mi dge phra rags rdul bas mang// rnam rtog 'byung ba'i lus stobs bri// phyi nang bde skyid dman par gyur// lus nyams sems rmongs nad khams mang// mdangs shor tshe thung rgas
pa'i dus// snum zad me bzhin pha rol tu// 'gro la khad de sdong rul bzhin// gso thabs med pas kun gyis mnyam// rgas pa'i sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab// rgas pa zhum zhing stobs zad nas// tshe dang srog

dang drod 'gags pa// nad gcod sdug bsngal zug rngu ni// sha rus pags bral rtsa rgyus 'chang// srog snying rnam shes rten bur bral// 'jig rten zhig pa'i dngangs skrag gis// snying khrag po ste 'chi ba yi// sdug

bsngal bshad na glo snying 'brum// rang snang rang rig ma shes pas// snang med mun pa'i bar dor 'khyams// dbang po kun tshang thogs med kyis// snga phyi'i rigs mthun kun mthong ngo// ngo mi shes pas mun par
'thums// khams gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal spyod// 'chi ba las zad tshe ma zad// sdug bsngal blo bur rkyen gyis 'chi// las zad tshe zad mnar nas 'chi// de la bzlog thabs ma mchis pas// bsod nams
ma zad tshe zad 'chi// nad med bde bar blo bur 'chi// las ngan zad nas tshe zad 'chi// tshe ring nad med bde bar 'chi// blo bur tshe zad dge bas bzlog/ lus sems rang bcud zad pa yi// dus kyi tshe zad

'chi ba la// sangs rgyas stong gi mthus kyang rdugs// mdor na 'tsho rkyen yod pa na// rgas kyang 'chi ba bsring du yod// 'tsho rkyen med na gzhon yang 'chi// tsho la nges med sprin dang 'dra// tshe 'di'i snang ba nub pa

la// 'chi ba zhes ni tha dad rtags// 'chi 'pho'i sdug bsngal yod re 'khrul// mi lus don med glang gi snying// g.yeng bas mnar ba'i spre'u ste// yun rings nad par gcong can 'dra// 'du byed 'bad pa don re

chung// khom ldan mi lus nyin mo'i dus// skar ma bas kyang shin tu nyung// dge ba brtson pa'i 'du shes kyis// tshul khrims sna re bsrungs pa yis// ri rab gser nas 'phang du med// 'bum dang drug khri brgyad
stong ste// phyid ni lha min gnas su bstan// steng du bang rim bzhi po ni// rin chen bzhi las grub pa yi// khri phrag drug cu'i ri bo mdzes// phyi rim ri bdun rol mtsho bdun// gnya' shing 'dzin gyi
rten gnas// phyogs kyi gtso bo rgyal chen bzhi'i// gnas bzhi gnas 'khor bcu bcu steng// bzhi bcu gnas kyi 'og ma ni// bang rim dang po'i 'phreng thogs nas// skyabs song mchod sbyin dang byas
rgyus// phyogs dang zur dang mtha' gnas pa'i// nyer mtsho dkar po thams cad dga'// nags tshal yid 'ong nye ba'i tshal// gnas bcu skor ba'i yul de la// rin chen sna tshogs mdzes pa'i tshal// me tog

ljon shing du mas brgyan// chu gtsang sbrang chang rgun 'brum chang// 'bab chu sna tshogs 'thungs pas myos// sgra snyan bya dang bung bas khengs// rgyan gos longs spyod bza' btung rnams// bsams pa tsam gyis 'byung

ba dang// mdzes pa'i lha mo brgya phrag gis// sna tshogs mchod pas mgu bar byed// me long tshal du sngon gyi las// snang 'gyur dran pas dga' bde skye// rlung bzhin skad cig 'dod kun rgyug/ 'dod pa'i zhen

pas dngos su 'khrig/ bu tsha pha ma'i mngal du ni// pha ma'i rtsib logs g.yas pa nas// zhag bdun gnas te lo lnga'i tshul// gos dang khang par bcas pa ru// skyes nas zhag bdun nang du rdzogs// 'phreng thogs
la sogs lus kyi tshad// rgyang grags bzhi cha gcig yin la// rgyal chen bzhi ni rgyang grags phyed// skyes te bde bar ldan par 'gyur// gnyis pa lag na yol thogs ni// tshul khrims dkon mchog mchod pa

dang// dman pa'i 'gro la sbyin byas rgyus// gzhan rnams sngon nas pad+ma'i nang// mdzes pa'i gzugs dang bung sgra snyan// rlung gis dri zhim ro reg dga'// yul lnga'i bde ba sbyor ba ni// sngon las lhag ste rdzus

skyes ldan// 'khor lo sgyur ba dper bya min// lha mo rnams dang lhan cig rtse// sred pa 'phel bas gzhan du 'pho// de nas gsum pa rtag myos kyi// gnas bcu gzhan la snod yangs shing// sdom ldan sbyin gnas

skyob pa'i rgyus// lha dga' ut+pal pad+ma'i tshal// 'dod pa lnga yi longs spyod la// snga ma gnyis pas bcu 'gyur lhag/ yid kyi bde ba longs spyod ldan// mdzes pa'i lha mo myos ma dang// bya dang bung ba bde bas
myos// me tog char 'bebs glu gar gyi// sil snyan mchod pa bsam mi khyab// khyad par dga' ba rtag tu 'phel// de nas bzhi pa pi wang gnas// rgyal chen bzhi ru skye ba'i rgyu// kun dga' gnas dang mchod
sbyin sogs// dge 'dun zhabs thog brtson pa yis// tshul ldan chos bkod pa las// dri dga' shar nas yul 'khor skyong// dga' ldan 'phags skyes lho yi phyogs// gzugs myos nub na mig mi
bzang// lus ngan byang phyogs lcang lo can// rin chen gzhal yas 'od 'phro'i nang// yid 'ong mdzes pa'i lha mo yis// rtse zhing sgra snyan sgrogs par byed// mdzes pa'i ri bo sna tshogs

la// mtshungs med me tog ljon pas brgyan// bya dang bung ba gsung snyan sgrog/ chu bsil 'bab chus ro bcur ldan// sna tshogs 'dres pa'i dge ba yis// sna tshogs mdangs ldan tshul du 'ong// tshal rnams kha

dog spos so ste// rang lus de yi kha dog 'gyur// dper bya shel dang mtshungs pa yin// rnam pa du ma'i bde ba yis// yul drug myos par phyed pa yin// phyir zhing srid pa cher 'ong bas// srid pas ma tshim tshe zad
nas// gzhan du 'phos te las kyis ltung// de 'khor kun tu rgya ba'i lha// bye ba gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang// sgron me phul ba'i sbyin stobs kyis// mkha' la nyi zla gza' skar grags// gling bzhi mun sel

legs nyes ston// nyi ma me shel drod kyi 'od// dpag tshad lnga bcu rtsa gcig 'og/ zla ba chu shel bsil gyi 'od// dpag tshad lnga bcu gyen 'phang ste// nyi ma'i 'od kyis 'phel 'grib byed// nang na skyed tshal grong

khyer dang// dga' bas brgyan pa'i longs spyod ldan// rang rtsal rlung gi shugs kyis 'khor// rgya mtshor gnas pa'i rdzings bzhin du// gzhal yas mi g.yo rlung nyid g.yo// nam phyed nyi ma nub pa dang// nyi ma phyed

dang 'char dus gcig/ skar ma dpag tshad re re ste// thams cad gzhal yas khang yin yang// de'i lha tshe zad 'chi ba'i dus// gzhal yas khang zhig rgya mtsho'i nang// skar mda' ltung zhing klu rnams bkrag/ 'di

rnams mi lo lnga bcu zhag/ gcig tu rtsis pa'i zla zhig ni// rang lo lnga brgya tshe yi tshad// de nas mi dang lha yi tshad// nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur rim bzhin no// sum cu rtsa gsum skye ba'i rgyu// dgra bcom pha ma mchod

byed cing// tshul khrims skyon med sbyin pas 'grub// brgya byin lha yi dbang po la// bye ba stong gi lha mos mchod// lhun po'i rtse mo brgyad khri'i steng// grong khyer chen po blta na sdug/ bye ba'i dbus na chos bzangs

gnas// rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzangs ni// dpag tshad lnga brgya rin chen gyi// gzhal yas nyi zla'i 'od bas gsal// dpag med dga' ba'i tshal rnams dang// rin chen rdzing bu du ma rnams// me tog tshogs

kyi ra bas brgyan// bung ba bya rnams mang pos gang// dri zhim ngad ldan mtshungs pa med// rin chen bye ma brdal ba'i steng// khang bzangs brtsegs pa dpag tu med// tshal dang nye ba'i tshal rnams dang// dus

dang dus min zas dang gos// lha yi rgyan rnams yid bzhin 'byung// rma bya ngang pa rta dang glang// lha yi byol song dga' bas rtse// lha yi bu mos dga' bas mchod// de sras lha kun bde bas khyab// nye dbang sum
cu rtsa gnyis rnams// lha gnas grong khyer nyams dga' bar// kha dog gzugs mdzes phun sum tshogs// thams cad rin chen sa gzhi la// gzhal yas khang mdzes skyed tshal dang// rin chen rdzing
bu spos dang ldan// me tog sna tshogs rab bkra zhing// ljon pa 'bab chu mdzes ldan dang// bza' btung rin chen snod rnams dang// rin chen khri gdan bkra ba'i gos// 'od ldan rgyan kun bsam pas

'grub// bu mo mdzes ma du mas mchod// dus 'da' yul lnga'i dga' bde spyod// nyi zla bas lhag 'od 'bar mas// nyin mtshan cha ni gnyid mi gnyid// me tog kha ni 'byed 'dzums dang// bya skad sgrog mi sgrog

gis 'byed// lha dag gnas ni de rnams kyi// shar phyogs shing rta sna tshogs tshal// rtsub 'gyur lho la 'dres tshal nub// dga' bas brgyan pa byang na yod// byang shar yongs su sa brtol shing// lho nub khrus kyis

rdzing bu dang// nub byang a mo la ki rdo// shar na chos bzangs mdun sa yod// mtha' la lag na rdo rje'i gnas// thugs rje las byung rnga bo che// lha min gdug rtsub bzlog pa yis// gzugs med chos kyi sgra

sgrogs yod// gnyis gnyis 'khyud nas dbang po sprad// ma yi mngal du zhag bdun gnas// byis pa lo drug lta bu skye// de tshe ma mthong yul mthong bas// ngo mtshar yid g.yo brtags dpyad byed// rgyu de sngon gyi

dge bar shes// dga' zhing yi rang bag dang ldan// lus kyi tshad ni rgyang grangs gcig/ skyes nas zhag drug bar du rdzogs// lha mo mdzes ma mang du 'byung// bde ba'i longs spyod tshogs kyis mchod// bag med
sred pas skye gnas brjed// bslar zhing sred pas dus 'da' med// dge ba'i las zad tshul min gyis// lha yang sdug bsngal shin tu che// 'jig rten gnas kyi mchog yin yang// 'phags pa ma gtogs sdug

bsngal bas// longs spyod sred pa'i le lo yis// thar lam bral te tshe zad dus// rang lo stong phrag gcig thub nas// lha yi nye ba'i 'chi ltas lnga// 'dod log skyes pas lha mo rnams// gzhan gyis khyer zhing
'bros par byed// khang bzangs rnams kyang 'jig la khad// mdzes pa'i me tog 'phreng ba brnyings// 'od kyang sngar bas chung du 'gro// gos dang rgyan gyi kha dog nyams// nges par 'chi ba'i rtags lnga
las// bza' btung thams cad rul ba dang// lus la 'od med dri ngan 'byung// mi snyan sgra thos grogs kyis 'bor// khang bzangs bstan yang 'jig par 'gyur// mig mi phyed cing 'dzum par 'gyur// sngon
chad med pa'i sdug bsngal 'byung// a tsa ma yi smre sngags 'don// kye ma kyi hud 'dre log byed// zhag bdun bar du sdug bsngal myong// dmyal ba bas kyang sdug bsngal che// sngon gyis bsod nams ma
yin pa'i// las kyi 'bras bu 'thur du lhung// de mthong sdug bsngal bsran mi bzod// de phyir thar pa ma thob na// lha yi bde ba sdug bsngal dngos// 'di la su zhig smon par byed// lhag pa'i tshul

khrims rnam pa bdun// khyad par 'dod log spangs nas su// pha ma nad pa chos smra la// longs spyod byin zhing chos 'tshol ba// ri rab nas ni drug 'bum khri// brgya stong steng gi nam mkha' la// rlung gis rin chen

sprin phung bteg/ de stengs mtshe ma'i grong khyer ni// rab mdzes nyi shu rtsa bdun ni// thams cad rin chen ri mchog steng// sum cu rtsa gsum gnas gzhi la// de las bcu drug 'gyur gyis 'phags// dge ba'i

las kyi mthu yin te// de bzhin gnas rim de dag kyang// rin chen lnga las grub pa ste// mtho ba dpag tshad stong phrag la// dri med shel ltar 'od gsal zhing// rin chen ljon pa bkra ba la// bza' btung gos

dang rgyan rnams ni// bsams pa tsam gyis 'byung bar 'gyur// rin chen me tog du ma dang// bya dang bung ba sgra snyan 'byin// bsam gyis mi khyab tshal bcas dang// rin chen khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang// lha bu re

la lha mo stong// mdzes pa'i rnam 'gyur sil snyan sgra// dri zhim ngad ldan bde ba myong// rma bya ngang pa shing rta zhon// ri bo'i ngos dang mkha' la 'gro// 'phags pa'i bya rnams chos sgra sgrogs// bskul yang sred pa'i
dbang du 'gro// mi rtag de yi don mi rtogs// bag med 'dod pa lnga la zhen// de na rgyal ba'i thugs rje las// rabs bdun rgyal ba'i mchod ten yod// rin chen bdun las byas pa yi// mdo rnams lha dbang
ston par byed// de yis bsod nams ldan pa'i lha// bag yod chos spyod gong du 'phags// lus sems can na myob pa las// mdzes ldan 'khyud pas 'khrig tshim byed// byis pa lo bdun lon 'dra skye// sngon gyi

skye gnas rjes su dran// rgyang grags gcig dang bzhi cha gcig/ zhag lngas tshad lus rdzogs pa yin// bag med spyod pas skye gnas 'grib// bag med lha rnams longs spyod bslus// sngon gyi dge zad bde skyid
nyams// ngal dub yul 'gags 'khor gyis spangs// lus 'dor yid skrag 'chi ltas 'byung// 'og tu ltung ste dmyal bas gtug/ lha la smon pa'i bsam gtan 'khrul// rang lo nyis stong tshe tshad rdzogs// de
las khyad 'phags dga' ldan ni// sbyin sogs tshul khrims dag par bsrungs// chos la sems pa'i byams pa yis// lta bas yid smon byas pa yis// dga' ldan gnas nyid nyams dga' ba// dri med 'od kyi
gzhal yas khang// sna tshogs mdzes pa reg na bde// lha'i bu dri med zla mdzes la// re re lha mo 'bum phrag bskor// yid 'ong mdzes pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis// mchod byas bde ba dpag tu med// rin chen sna
tshogs sa gzhi la// bdud rtsi chu bsil rdzing bu mdzes// me tog kha dog dpe legs brgyan// tshal mchog dgos 'dod char bzhin 'bab// rin chen lhun po sna tshogs la// ljon shing bya tshogs du

mas gang// snyan pa'i sgra 'byin bar snang las// sil snyan chos kyi rnga sgra sgrogs/ khang bzangs rin chen them skas can// dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bas mdzes// dri zhim spos kyi ngad ldan zhing// rin chen shing rta zhon

nas su// glog 'gyu tsam gyis gar 'dod bgrod// tshe rabs snga ma dran pa yod// de na sngon gyi smon lam mthus// 'phags pas sprul pa'i lha rnams yod// rgyal sras mi 'pham mgon po bzhugs// byang chub lam
la 'god par mdzad// phyogs bcur sprul pa bsam mi khyab// bde ba che la lha rnams bskul// 'khor lo bskor ba bla na med// 'dod pas myos pas lha rnams ni// lag bcangs reg pa tsam gyis tshim// zhag

bzhi lo brgyad tshul gyis skyes// lus tshad rgyang grags phyed dang gnyis// mngal nas dus bzhin tshad lus rdzogs// de tshe sngon gyi dge dran spyod// bsod nams ldan rnams pad+ma la// rdzus skyes ting nge 'dzin la

gnas// tshe lo stong phrag bzhi thub bo// rang gi rtsol ba'i nga rgyal gyis// rkyen las ma ltos rang 'khrul ba'i// sbyin sogs tshul khrims dge ba rnams// sngon las lhag pa'i 'bras bu yi// 'phrul dga'i lha dbang

'khor bcas rnams// brgya byin 'bum pas bde stobs lhag/ rin chen sna tshogs sa gzhi la// ri bo ljon shing me tog dang// skyed tshal sna tshogs mdzes par bskor// gzhal med khang chen khri stan dang// dri

mchog gdugs dang ba dan dang// gos dang 'phreng ba rgyan rnam pa// rol mo sil snyan du ma dang// zhal zas ro brgya ldan pa'i bcud// rang gis bsams pa tsam las su// 'dod pa rang gi sprul pa ste// lha mo

'bum phrag mang po dang// rgod cing reg pas yid tshim byed// lag tu me tog gtad pa tsam// zhag gsum pad+ma'i nang nas su// lo dgu lon pa lta bu skye// lus tshad rgyang grags phyed dang gnyis// zhag gsum

rdzogs te sngon la dran// dpag med 'dod yon lnga spyod cing// dregs pa'i nga rgyal zhen pa rnams// stobs ldan bdud dbang rigs su 'gyur// de rnams lha dbang zlog par byed// dga' ldan gnas las khyad 'phags kyang//
'phags pa ma yin lha rnams tshal// 'dod yon bde la sred pa yis// sngon gyi dge zad dus 'das te// nye dang ring ba'i 'chi ltas bcu// byung ste nyams nas ngan song lhung// tshe ni rang lo stong
phrag brgyad// 'dod pa gzhan gyi ster ba yi// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed skye ba'i rgyu// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod la sogs// ma nyams skyon med bsrungs ba'i mthus// 'chi kha dag pa'i sems ldan
rnams// khyad 'phags lha yi rigs su skye// 'chi khar log ltas mtshams sbyor ba// bdud rigs rnams su skyes pa yis// de 'bras mnar med gnas su 'gro// log lta spangs pa'i dge ldan

pa// gzhan la dbang byed stobs dang ldan// dbang sgyur lha yi gzhal yas khang// rin chen bye ma brdal ba'i ljongs// ri bo brtsegs pa'i steng na// kun gsal 'od kyi khang pa ni// gru bzhi gru mang them skas
dang// skar khung ba gam du mas mdzes// lha yi rol mo du mas spras// gser dngul shel dang baiDUr+Ya// mar gad rA ga sbug la sogs// spel legs 'ja' tshon 'od kyis brgyan// skyed tshal rdzing bu me tog
bcas// gar 'dod rdzu 'phrul yud kyis 'gro// bza' btung gos dang rgyan mchog dang// dri mchog phye ma 'phreng ba dang// sil snyan snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs kun// 'dod khams kun las 'di nyid lhag/ khang
bzangs la sogs lha mo rnams// re re 'od dang kha dog gzugs// mdzes pa'i glu gar rtsed mo rnams// 'jig rten gsum na ma mchis pas// chags phral mgon po ma gtogs pa// 'di la mi sred su zhig

'ong// ltas pa tsam gyis 'khrig pas tshim// lag mthil me tog pad+ma'i nang// bu tsha lo bcu'i rnam pa skye// lus kyi tshad ni rgyang grags gnyis// zhag gnyis nang du tshad lus rdzogs// sngon shes sngon gyi dge ba

dran// de nas gzhan dag lha mo yis// 'dod yon lnga gter bag med kyi// sred pa phyir 'phel dus 'da' ste// nam zhig sred pas chags sdang skye// mi dge bdud kyi bsam pa 'char// 'chi ltas lnga tshang bdud
kyis dbang// las kyis mnar bas na rag spyod// de las ldog pa'i lha rnams ni// 'phags pa'i blo ldan bsam gtan gnas// zhen pa med pa'i bde la spyod// rang lo khri dang drug stong thub// pho mo'i gzugs
can 'dod pas 'khrig/ 'dod chags bzhi yi srid pa la// 'dod yon lnga las 'dod chags pas// bde ba rags pas 'dod khams pa// de ru skye ba'i gzugs can rnams// kun rdzob gos dang khang par
bcas// 'dod pas skye ba gsum yin no// 'chi ba ma gtogs lha rnams la// skye rgas na ba'i sdug bsngal med// sngon gyi dge ba'i 'bras bu yin// bsod nams zad pa'i rnam smin gyis// 'chi khar mnar med
pas kyang sdug/ lhun po'i steng na gnas pa yi// 'dod lha'i bde ba sdug bsngal te// las kyi yid byed 'khrul pa yin// 'khor ba dag na bde ba med// bde bar 'dod pas sdug bsngal 'grub// gzugs kyi
khams gnas bcu bdun la// gzugs la gzung bas gzugs khams pa// dug gsum 'dod zhen bral ba yi// sbyin dang tshul khrims gtsang ma'i gnas// bzod pa bsam gtan cher gnas pas// bsam
gtan dang po 'thob pa'i rgyu// dge ba sngon pas dag par spyod// 'dod khams tshe 'di'i bde ba rnams// chags zhen sred pa'i rgyur mthong nas// de nyid spong 'dod bsam gtan la// zhen pas
mtshams sbyar tshangs rigs skyes// spro bas tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don// gzhan phan yod pas tshangs chen du// chung 'bring chen po'i bsam gtan de// gti mug dang ldan 'khor ba ste// don rab 'byed shes
'phags pa'i lam// de rnams rdzus skyes gos dang bcas// bzod pas gzugs bzangs phun sum tshogs// tshangs rigs lus tshad dpag tshad phyed// dpag tshad gcig gnyis rim pas rdzogs// rin chen sna

tshogs 'od kyi zhing// mtho dman med pa'i mnyam pa nyid// tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang chen ni// 'dod khams rin chen kun las lhag/ de 'od sus kyang sgrib mi nus// chos kyi sil snyan sgra mi 'chad// pho dang
mo yi ming yang med// dpag med longs spyod ldan gyur yang// 'dod pa med de bde ba'i ngang// gnyid dang nyin mtshan rtog pa bral// bsam gtan zas kyi dga' ba spyod// kun kyang rdzu 'phrul 'od dang

ldan// 'dod khams sdug bsngal gnas su mthong// nyi ma srin bu me khyer mtshungs// tshangs pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// rgyal ba rnams la chos gsung bskul// de phyir mi mjed bdag po zhes// khyad par 'phags
pa'i lha yin no// phyin ci log rnams log par lta// gzugs khams lha rnams thun mong du// lus rdzogs gos dang gzhal yas khang// bcas pa 'og min bar du yin// thun mong ma yin bsam gtan

khyad// gong mas gong ma khyad du 'phags// bsam gtan gnyis pa rtog med bsgom// 'od chung du skyes sngon pas lhag/ lus kyi tshad ni dpag tshad bzhi// spro dga' dang bcas bsgom pa las// dpag tshad brgyad
gzugs tshad med 'od// phul du 'byung bas 'od gsal 'od// lus la dpag tshad bcu drug go/ 'di rnams gnas ni dngos 'dzin med// 'od snang las grub gzhal yas yin// shin tu dga' bde bsam
gtan spyod// tshim par gyur pa'i zag bcas yod// de nas dga' bde zhen pa bral// shes bzhin rtse gcig rig pa las// bsgom pa bsam gtan gsum pa'i don// dge chung bstan byas tshad med dge// bstan
pa thob pas dge rgyas skyes// lus tshad rim bzhin so gnyis dang// ro zhing brgya dang nyi shu brgyad// bsam gtan dben pas gang bsams 'grub// mtshungs med 'od kyi gzhal yas na// 'grib pa med pa'i
bde ba 'tsho// rang bzhin rtogs pa ma bral bas// gzung 'dzin nyon mongs gting na zhen// zag pa zad na 'phags lam ste// bsam gtan bzhi par skye ba'i rgyu// rnam rtog tshogs la mi g.yo bsgom// smin med
skye ste lus kyi tshad// dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu'o// de nyid goms stobs bsod nams skyes// lus la dpag tshad lnga brgya yod// mi 'gyur gzhi che 'bras bu che// lus la dpag tshad lnga brgya
yod// lus la dpag tshad stong gnas te// nyon mongs bag la nyal ba yod// 'jig rten kun rtog ma bral bas// nam zhig bsod nams las zad mthus// nyon mongs skyes nas dus 'da' byed// don shes
bsam gtan 'phags lam bgrod// shes rab mi ldan bsam gtan ni// g.yang sar gnas pa'i dmus long de// gnas chos 'thur ma ltung ba bzhin// srid pa'i ngan song g.yang la ltung// bsam gtan gnas
pa'i lha kun ni// gnas skabs tsam gyi bde ba ste// 'khor bar ldog pa'i bsam gtan yin// bsam gtan bzhi pa'i lha rigs cig/ 'du shes bkag nas dben pa byed// de yis mya ngan 'das par
'dod// nam zhig 'du shes sad pa dang// phyir zhing log ltas mtshams sbyar nas// mkha' la rgyu ba'i yi dwags te// tshe ring lha rnams mnar med skye// mi khom brgyad gnas 'gro ba yin// bsam gtan rdzun

pas thar mi thob// gtsang ma rigs kyi lha lnga po// nyon mongs zag bcas bral ba yis// sbyin sogs dge bas skyed pa las// bsam gtan shes rab cha dang 'brel// nyon mongs cha che mi che ba// nyon mongs cha

chung mi gdung ba// bral bas gya nom snang ba dang// bsam gtan gnas pas shin tu mthong// dbang thob 'og min lus kyi bar// nyis stong bzhi stong brgyad stong dang// khri dang drug stong sum khri dang// nyis stong

lus kyi tshad yin no// tshe tshad tshangs rigs bskal chung ni// nyi shu de bzhin bzhi bcu dang// tshangs chen lnga bcu rtsa brgyad dang// 'od chung bskal chen gcig yin no// de nas yar la bcu bcur 'phel// sngon
dge tshe tshad ring ba yin// de rnams rang snang gzhan snang gi// gzugs dang gzhal yas khang dang bcas// ri rab la brten lha gnas yin// gzugs med rten la ma chags par// bdag tu 'dzin la chags pa
yi// bar snang sprin bzhin gnas pa ste// rgyu ni bsam gtan bzhi la brten// gzugs kyang nyon mongs rtog par mthong// gzugs kyi 'du shes bkag nas su// nam mkha' lta bur dmigs bcas pas// nam

mkha' mtha' yas skye mched de// rang gzugs mi snang mkha' lta bu// rnam shes sna tshogs skye mched la// rtog tshogs 'du shes bshig pa yin// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched de// rtog pa med pa'i 'du shes
la// ci yang ma yin skye mched de// yod pa nyid la med dmigs nas// ci yang med rtog de bshig pas// yod min med min skye mched do// sems nyid mtha' bral lhun grub las// ma rig 'khrul pa'i bzo
bcos kyis// nyon mongs can yid gang dang gang// goms pa'i snang ba de nyid la// gnas skabs de dang der snang ba// nyer dmigs zhi ba'i nga rgyal tsam// ji ltar lha yi bde ba yang// chab rom
steng gi bzhin du// dus tshod gcig la ma tshor 'jig/ shes rab zin na 'phags pa'i lam// 'dod gzugs bral bas zhi yin yang// bag chags ma dag 'khor ba ste// shes rab med kun 'og tu ltung// tshe ni

bskal pa nyi khri dang// bzhi khri drug khri brgyad khri thub// skyes pa de yi snang ba shar// 'chi ba de nyid 'gag pa yin// de ltar gang du skyes nas yang// skye shi'i las dang nyon mongs kyi// sdug bsngal rba la 'dzad pa
med// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa gzhi'i rgyud mchog rin po che sbungs pa las// 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// ma rig 'du byed skyen pa yi// sdug bsngal srid pa'i

rgya mtsho na// ma srid pa ni gang yang med// ma la bu skye kun gyi chos// bu la ma skye ka rta ste// chu las skyes nas zhag bdun ni// ma med tshe yi dus byed la// rang gi kha nas ma skyes te// ma yis khar mid khong du

song// zhag bdun ma yi mngal du sdod// lus rdzogs spyir thon ma yis g.yos// ma dang mnyam du chu la 'phong// srid pa las kyi 'khrul pa 'di// kye ma 'dus byas rnam smin dag/ skye shi 'jig pa'i chos can

te// snod bcud mi rtag chags 'jig stong// phyi yul mi rtag dus gzhi 'gyur// nang lus mi rtag skye rgas 'chi// snang ba mi rtag rmi lam 'dra// byas chos mi rtag sgyu ma bzhin// yul mkhar mi rtag dri za'i

grong// dgra gnyen mi rtag tshong dus 'gron// zas nor mi rtag sbrang bu'i rtsi// sgyu lus mi rtag chu bur 'dra// bzhin mdog mi rtag bar snang 'ja'// tshe 'di mi rtag nam mkha'i glog/ btsan po mi rtag ri gzar
dbab// dngos po mi rtag nam mkha'i sprin// 'dod yon mi rtag smi sgyu chu// gtan po mi rtag 'khyag thog mkhar// snga phyi mi rtag ston ka'i rab// skye shi mi rtag chu yi rba// rang gzhan

mi rtag rtswa kha'i zil// bzang po mi rtag shi ba'i ro// mtho dman mi rtag chu khyer shing// 'du byed mi rtag gar mkhan bzhin// gcig tu mi rtag sna tshogs 'gyur// 'gyur zhing 'gyur zhing snying po med// 'jig rten mi rtag zog dang

gsob// 'dus byas rkyen gyis sna tshogs bsgyur// sdug bsngal min pa gcig kyang med// ma rig rnam shes 'khyams po 'di// thog med dus nas da lta'i bar// nyon mongs dbang gis skye shi ni// yang nas yang du
lus blangs pa// dpag med rdul gyi grangs pas mang// sems can gcig gi lus la yang// yang yang blangs pas bsgrang mi lang// sha rus bsags na sa rdo tsam// rnag khrag bsags na rgya mtsho bas// mang

bar song yang don med yod// gzhan gyi lus blangs lta ci smos// snga ma shi ba'i ro mthong na// phyi ma skye ba glo snying 'dar// 'khrul pa'i rtsa ba ma chod na// las kyi skye ba chu rdol bzhin// srid pa'i skye

sgo mi khegs pas// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'dir// ma rig chu bos shugs kyis 'khyer// sdug bsngal skye shi'i rba la g.yeng// zad cing stongs pa'i dus mtha' med// sems can nam mkha'i mtha' dang

mnyam// 'khrul pa'i glong na tshad gzung dka'// rkyen ngan 'khor ba'i 'khrul 'khor yin// rang gis rang 'khrul smyon pa bzhin// gcig tu mi gnas 'khrul pa'i blo// ma rig zhing gi sa bon la// 'du byed rnam

shes blo 'ur ba// dge sdig las kyi so nam gyis// 'bras bu bde sdug mtho dman ni// nges med rnam pa sna tshogs pa// las kyi 'khrul 'khor rlung gis bteg/ rigs drug 'khor ba'i grong khyer du// mi dge las

dang nyon mongs kyi// rgyu gnyis rkyen gsum mtshams sbyar nas// gnag pa'i rnam smin rgyu rkyen gyis// ngan song gsum du sdug bsngal spyod// mnar med gnas su yun rings 'khyams// dkar ba'i rgyu rkyen 'bras
bu yi// lha mi'i gnas rnams ma lus skyes// lung ma bstan pa'i btang snyoms kyis// byol song mun pa'i gnas su 'khyams// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs mang la// sdug bsngal mi 'dra dpag med myong// lhar

skyes gson por ngan song ltung// lha min grong khyer rang gis bsreg/ mi yi rgyal po grong sprang byed// seng ger skyes nas gzhan gyis zos// yi dwags zas kyis brnangs nas shi// dmyal ba rang gi srog gcod

byed// ma ni chu ru 'gyur ba yi// mi rtag 'gyur ba'i chos can la// nges med log pa'i sdug bsngal 'byung// 'khrul snang bya spu rlung khyer 'dra// res 'ga' mtho la res 'ga' dma'// mnar med gnas na zhen

yun ring// las zad tshe na 'dam nas thon// skam sar snyogs pa srid pa tsam// 'khor ba'i chu bo gting zhen che// sdug bsngal rba glong sna tshogs 'khrul// 'khrul rtog blo la 'dzad pa med// sangs rgyas thams
cad kyi bstan pa gzhi'i rgyud mchog rin chen spungs pa las// 'dus byas mi rtag par bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// skye med gzhi rtsa ma chod pas// 'gag med 'khor ba'i skye shi la// gcig nas gcig

rgyud lu gu rgyud// rgyun chad med pa chu bo'i rgyun// sdug bsngal chu bo'i gnyer ma 'dra// phyi ma skyes pas snga ma 'gag/ skye shi gnyis la zad pa med// gcig nas 'pho zhing gcig tu skye// 'chi kha'i shes pas mtshams

sbyar nas// phyi ma de yi snang bar skye// dge sdig gnyis kyi bzang ngan la// sngar gyi bag chags sbyangs stobs kyis// goms pa 'chi khar des mtshams sbyar// blo bur rkyen gyis gzhan 'gyur na// de dang de snang skye
ba 'thud// bzang po'i las ni bzang po 'thud// ngan pa las ni ngan pa 'thud// gnas skabs rkyen gyi 'khrul pa byung// mtha' bzhug las kyi 'phrod 'thud de// 'dres pa las ni 'dres pa

'byung// gzhi ma dkar po gcig nyid la// tshon rtsis kha dog bsgyur ba bzhin// kun gzhi rnam shes snam bu la// rgyu rkyen gnyis kyis snang ba bsgyur// chu bo chu bran lu ma rnams// drag 'bab dal 'bab skong mor

'khyil// gang byas chu gzhun gcig pa bzhin// bde sdug btang snyoms gang snang yang// ma rig 'khrul pa'i rgyun du gcig/ bde chen ye shes ma rtogs na// sdug bsngal chu bo rgyun mi 'chad// 'di phyi bar dos

mtshams sbyar nas// 'khor ba zo chu'i khyud mo bzhin// rgyun chad med par khor yug byed// nam zla dros pa'i dus kyi tshe// drod gsher gnyis kyi rkyen las su// sa bon byed mkhan med par skye// myu gu 'bras bu skye
ba bzhin// sems can rigs mthun 'dzom pa'i tshe// las dang nyon mongs rgyu rkyen gyis// bar do'i khams rnams thams cad kun// byed po gzhan nas med pa ru// rang gzhan 'dzin pa'i rnam shes kyis// mi

gzugs srid pa'i skye ba zhes// blo bur dbang po gsar pa la// snang ba der 'dzin skye ba zhes// ming du btags te 'khrul snang yin// a 'thas zhen pas sdug bsngal te// rgas nas na ba zhum zhing 'gyur// tshe
dang drod dang srog 'gag pa// snga ma nub pas 'chi ba zhes// tha snyad btags te 'khrul pa dngos// skye 'gag gnyis kyi so mtshams de// bar do zhes pas nying mtshams sbyor// snga ma'i bag chags rmi lam

ltar// zhen pa ma dag chags sdang 'khrul// phyi ma'i nyer len sgyu ma ltar// sred pa'i 'phen pas skye ba len// 'di phyi bar do khor yug ste// sa bon las ni myu gu dang// myu gu 'bras bu sa bon 'khor// rang 'byung

rang rkyen rang 'khor yin// rang sems dge dang mi dge'i rgyus// rang rkyen 'chi khar zhe sdang skyed// bar dor de yi lam du zhugs// phyi ma dmyal ba'i skye ba len// mi ru skyes kyang rgyu mthun 'ong// de bzhin 'dod

chags mir skye la// ser snas yi dwags gti mug gis// byol song gnas skye phrag dog gis// lha min gnas la mngon pa yi// nga rgyal lha yi skye ba len// skye shi gnyis kyi bar de ru// phal cher yun ni zhag bdun

srid// ring ba bdun phrag bdun yin la// gzugs med lha dang mnar med myur// bag chags dbang po kun tshang ba'i// thogs med rlung 'dra'i shes pa de// lhar skye steng la mi la g.yas// lha min mgo bo g.yon

du lta// dud 'gro yi dwags 'thur la lta// dmyal ba spyi tshugs snang bas ltung// rgyud lnga'i lam la re mos 'khor// rigs mthun rkyen tshangs skye ba len// rkyen ma tshang ba bar do ste// 'gag rkyen byung bas 'chi ba
yin// gcig nas gcig tu 'gro ba yi// yul la 'khor ba ma yin te/ kha chus 'thums pa'i srin bu bzhin// rang gis rang nyid gtums nas su// rang sems ma rig 'khor ba yin// 'khor ba
logs na rdul tsam med// dge bas la 'thud bde ba 'khor// sdug bsngal las 'thud sdug bsngal 'khor// las dang rgyu rkyen gang 'dzom 'khor// ma rig pa la rgyun du 'khor// 'khor ba zad na mya ngan
'das// sems rgyud gcig la gnyis mi 'ong// gnyis med ye shes ma rig pas// kun nas nyon mongs 'khor bas te// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rang 'khrul yin// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa gzhi'i
rgyud mchog rin chen spungs pa las// ma rig pa la 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgyun mi 'chad par bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// thog med dus nas bag chags kyis// kun tu rtog pa sna tshogs te// dkar

ser dmar ljang mthing ba'i mdog/ lci yang smin sdud go 'byed pa'i// sa chu me rlung nam mkha' dang// rnam par shes pa'i khams dang drug/ phyi nang nang du snang ba dag/ byed po med par rang nyid la// yul drug

dbang po'i rnam shes kyis// rtog dpyod dgag sgrub btang snyoms pa// phyi nang bar gsum so so ru// rtog pa bco brgyad mthong gyur nas// nyon mongs khams rnams thams cad byung// spangs sems zug rngu zhe

sdang ste// de yi rgyu rkyen rang snang las// dmyal ba'i 'gro ba des bskyed nas// sdug bsngal las kyi rang gzugs 'byung// bsgrub sems zhen pa 'dod chags la// rgyu rkyen de yi las 'bras ni// 'du byed mi yi
grong rnams skyed// sred zhen nyon mongs ser sna'i mthus// rang gzugs yi dwags 'gro kun 'byung// btang snyoms gzung 'dzin gti mug las// dud 'gro'i khams rnams de las byung// bdag gi ba la nges

shes skyed// nga rgyal lha yi 'gro kun bskyed// gzhan du rtog pa'i phrag dog gis// lha min 'gro kun de las skyed// kye ma gnyis snang rtog pa 'di// de la chags shing sdug bsngal ba// zhe sdang btang snyoms ma rig

pas// nga dang bdag gi sred zhen gyi// kun tu 'ching byed nyon mongs drug/ gnas su rang rgyud ma rig 'khor// kun 'byung kun rdzob sdug bsngal 'di// don dam rang bzhin nyid ma yin// rnam par dag pa bdag
med chos// kun la khyab pa'i chos nyid de// gal te nyon mongs de ma yin// sems can 'khor bar ci la 'khyam// gal te rnam dag de ma yin// sangs rgyas rnams ni ci phyir grol// lhun grub 'gyur ba med

rtogs na// rnam dag ye shes chos kyi dbyings// ma dag kun nas nyon mongs pa// lha rnams 'chi 'pho ltung ba dang// mi rnams skye rgas na 'chi spyod// lha min 'thab rtsod las la mnar// dud 'gro bkol spyad
gsod gcod dang// yi dwags bkres skom 'jur 'gegs spyod// dmyal ba tsha grang sdug bsngal spyod// las kyi sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab// nyon mongs mtshon rtse gzings pa 'dra// sdug bsngal chu

bos khyer ba 'dra// chags zhen 'dam du bying ba 'dra// 'khrul pa ri dwags rgyar chud 'dra// byed po gzhan med dbang med pa'o// bdag med rig pa col re chung// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa gzhi'i rgyud
mchog rin chen spungs pa las// kun nas nyon mongs pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// thog med dus nas bdag gzhan gyi// gzung 'dzin rkyen dbang 'du byed kyis// kun slong ngan pa'i las bsags
pas// srog gcod pa yi ngo bo ni// mtshon dug sngags dang stobs sogs kyis// lus sems srog dbang phral ba yin// dbye na zhe sdang dgra gsod pa// 'dod chags longs spyod 'dod phyir gsod// gti mug
don ma rtogs phyir gsod// pha ma bkur 'os gsang chen yin// mi dang mir 'os gsod pa 'bring// dud 'gro la sogs chung bo yin// byas zin byed dang byed 'gyur la// rang dang gzhan la byed du 'jug/ yi
rang phul ba rnam pa gsum// 'bras bu mnyam pa nyid thob ste// rgyu mthun 'bras bu gsod la dga'// dbang gi 'bras bus gsod par skye// rnam smin 'bras bu srog lan dang// dmyal ba'i gnas su skye bar
'gyur// phan sems kyis ni sman byin dang// bsam pa med par mtshon shor ba// dbang med shugs kyis shi ba rnams// sdig tu mi 'gyur srog gcod yin// gzhan rnams rang gi srog dang mtshungs// ma byin

len pa'i ngo bo ni// pha rol bdag tu gzung ba'i rdzas// mi dga' bzhin du blangs pa'o// dbye ba stobs kyis phrogs pa dang// rgyu yis dkris par spyad pa dang// 'jab bu ma tshong blangs pa'o// dge 'dun dkor

rdzas chen po ste// sman pa rnams ni 'bring yin la// lhag pa'i rdzas bsogs chung ngu'o// gzhan dag tshul ni gong ltar ro// bdag med nor dang sa yi gter// sdig tu mi 'gyur ma byin len// gzhan dag rang gi
rdzas dang 'dra// rgyu mthun 'bras bu rku snying 'dod// dbang gis choms rkun gnas su skye// rnam smin rang nor gzhan la 'chor// yi dwags bkres skom gnas su skye// 'dod pas log par g.yem pa ni// rang

ngam gzhan gyi chung ma la// gnas ma yin par spyod pa'o// dbye ba rigs dang chos dang khrims// bsrung ba rim pa gsum yin no// dgra bcom dge slong sun phyung che// bdag pos bzung ba 'bring pos te// phal

pa rnams ni chung ngu'o// gzhan srog 'don pa sdig mi 'gyur// gzhan rnams rang gi lus dang mtshungs// rgyu mthun 'bras bu 'dod log che// dbang gis mi gtsang gnas su skye// rnam smin bud med gzhan dbang
'gro// dud 'gro 'am ni dmyal bar skye// chang ni nyes pa kun gyi rgyu// myos pas lha gsod 'byung ba 'khrug/ tshe yi bar chad bsod nams 'bri// nyon mongs kun skyed ngan song lhung// rdzun gyi ngo bo

bdag gzhan bslu// dbye ba zhor 'byung gnod pa'i rdzun// mi chos bla ma mgo bskor rdzun// mchod 'os bslus pa rdzun chen la// phal pa rnams la 'bring pos te// ma brtsal brjod pa chung ngu'o// gzhan la phan na

sdig mi 'byung// de min smra ru mi rung ngo// phra ma mdza' mthun 'byed la ngag/ dbye ba ngo 'phro lkog tu 'phro// thabs kyis phra mas 'byed pa yin// dge 'dun dbyen byas chen po ste// gang zag dkrugs pa 'bring
yin la// mi mthun lab brjod tha ma'o// bstan la gnod bzlogs dbyen yang rung// de min skad cig byar mi rung// rgyu mthun 'bras bus dbyen ma dga'// dbang gis grogs po mi rnyed cing// rnam smin
mdza' ba kun dang 'bral// lha min gnas dang dmyal bar ltung// tshig rtsub zhe la 'debs pa yin// dbye ba gdong du rtsub pa dang// zhor gyis gtam dang bsre ba dang// phyogs rigs med par rtsub

pa'o// sems skyed byang sems sman pa che// dge la blo ldog 'bring po ste// phal pa rnams ni chung ba'o// ma rungs bzlog pa sdig mi 'gyur// de min zur tsam smra thabs med// rgyu mthun 'bras bu tshig rtsub

cing// dbang gis kun gyis mi snyan brjod// rnam smin rtag tu 'thab zla mang// dmyal ba'am ni yi dwags skye// 'khyal tshig bag med tshig yin te// dbye ba bden la gshe ba dang// bre mo'i gtam gyis zlo ba

dang// gzhan gyi rjes su 'jug pa'o// dkon mchog skur 'debs chen po la// gzhan la smod pa 'bring po ste// don ma rtogs pa chung ngu'o// ngag 'khyal snang ba'i skabs med do// rgyu mthun 'bras bu ngag 'khyal

smra// dbang gis rang ma nyan mkhan med// gtan rnams ci smras chol bar 'gyur// ngan song gnas ni gsum char skye// rgod bag ngag gi nyes pas te// 'byung med 'khrug cing bar chad ldang// mi ma yin rnams
khro bar 'gyur// bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu dus las 'gyangs// brnab sems rang gzhan bde ba la// 'dod sems chags par byed par yin// dbye ba rang la zhen chags dang// gzhan la yod pa thob 'dod
dang// kun la ser snas bcings pa'o// dkon mchog dkor la brnab pa rdzi// rgyu mthun 'bras bu ser sna che// dbang gis 'bras bu dngul zhing 'phongs// rnam smin longs spyod don med mdzad// yi dwags
gnas su sdug bsngal myong// gnod sems ngan byed zhe sdang ngo// dbye na rang gnod khro ba dang// gzhan la gnod pa skyel ba yin// spyi la gnod pa gdub rtsub bo// pha ma 'phags la gnod sems lci// rgyu
mthun 'bras bu bsam ngan 'byung// dbang gi 'bras bu gnod pa byed// rnam smin rang la sdug bsngal 'byung// snang ba dgrar langs dmyal bar ltung// log lta lta ba phyin ci log/ dbye na chos

dbyings bdag tu lta// dge sdig rgyu 'bras med par lta// thams cad phyin ci log tu lta// bden pa'i don la log lta ci// rgyu mthun log lta che ba dang// dbang gis gang la yid ches mos// rnam smin chos med
mun par skye// yang na skad cig mnar med ltung// tha mal gti mug rang kha mar// byings rmugs gnyid kyis rig pa 'khrul// bag la nyal gyi las bsags pas// dud 'gro mun pa'i gling du 'khyam// gnyid ni
'khrul pa'i yang 'khrul lo// de ltar dug gsum nyon mongs rkyen// mi dge bcu yi las spyad pas// dug can khong du zos pa bzhin// mi dge rgyu 'bras smin dus su// ngan song gnas na bzod glags
med// gnas skabs dge bas phan btags nas// lha mir skyes kyang sdug bsngal spyod// mi dge'i rnam smin bzur thabs med// rgyu gnag 'bras nag mi bzod do// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa gzhi'i
rgyud mchog rin chen spungs pa las// rnam spyod nag po phyogs kyi mi dge rgyu 'bras bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// dag pa la byung kun slong gis// mi dge las bzlog dkar ba'i las// rang bde

gzhan phan dge ba bcu// gzhan srog 'don cing tshe la skyob// 'bras bu tshe ring nad med dang// mi dang lhar skye mtho rigs 'gro// mi mthun srog gcod spangs pa yin// gong 'og kun la mchod sbyin byed// 'di
phyir mi 'dzad longs spyod 'phel// tshangs spyod don la gnas par byed// gtsang gnas bud med bzang mo 'thob// bden pa'i gtam gyis gzhan phan smra// ngag la kun nyan gtso bor 'gyur// mi mthun dgra zin
mthun 'jug sbyor// kun gyis bkur zhing grags par 'gyur// 'jam zhing dngas pas kun tshim byed// lha dang mi yi dbyangs snyan thob// bden pa'i don la yid ches smras// dam chos longs spyod 'bral med
'byung// chog shes ser sna bral ba yis// chags bral longs spyod che bar 'gyur// phan sems gzhan la mgu che ba// 'gro kun byams shing yid 'ong 'gyur// dag pa'i chos la spyod pa yis// yang dag lta ba

mchog 'thob 'gyur// mi mthun mi dge bcu sogs yang// mdun dang spyod dang yang dag blangs// khyad par chung 'bring chen po'o// byas dang 'god byed yi rang gsum// 'bras bu mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur// sngon

byas da byed byed 'gyur gsum// sngar yod da lo phyi lo yis// so nam ston thog dpe mtshon te// 'bras bu che 'bring chung ba yis// 'phel dang ma 'phel ma grub pas// dge kun 'bad pas myur du sgrub// le lo mi
dge'i bdud kyis khyer// brtson 'grus don kun myur du 'grub// dge ba yar ngo'i zla bzhin 'phel// so so 'bras bu bde bar smin// sems can nyon mongs las dbang song// mi dge ba la ngang
gis 'bags// dge ba bcu po spyad ka yang// lha dang mi yi sa bon yin// nam mkha'i kha dog dbyibs bral la// nam mkha'i mdog ni sprin gyis 'byed// rnam shes dngos med stong pa la// rang rtsal las kyis
kha dog bsgyur// mtho ris ngan song gzugs su grub// ma rig las kyi rang gzugs yin// mi dge spangs pas ngan song khegs// dge ba chung dus mi lus tsam// 'bring pos gtsang ma chen po yi// 'khor lo
sgyur ba nyid du 'gyur// dge ba tshul khrims bzhi bsrungs pas// rgyal chen sum cu rtsa gsum 'thob// rang byung chos tshul bsrungs pa yis// mtshe ma dga' ldan gnas su 'gro// dge che gtsang ma'i khrims
bsrungs pas// 'phrul dga' gzhan 'phrul dbang byed 'thob// khrims bsrungs byang chub thob pa'i gzhi// 'dul ba'i sde las byung bzhin bsrung// tshad med bzhi ldan gzugs khams ma// rnam par mi rtog
gzugs med lha// shes rab ldan pa'i 'phags pa'i sa// zag med theg gsum 'bras bu thob// dge ba des mtshon dge ba kun// bsod nams ye shes bsngos pa na// dam pa gnyis kyang thob par
'gyur// gzhan gyi 'bras bu lta ci smos// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa gzhi'i rgyud mchog rin chen spungs pa las/ rnam par dkar ba las kyi 'phen pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// snang ba sems las
byung ba'i phyir// mdangs sum rmis pa'i rmi lam bzhin// bde sdug gnyis kyi legs nyes de// dge sdig rtog pa'i rang gzugs yin// sems dge chos rnams thams cad dge// sems mi dge na kun mi
dge// mnar med dmyal ba su yis byas// sdig sems yin pas rnam smin byung// ma yin 'brel med rnam smin bral// mi dge gzhan la dgod du med// dge ba gzhan gyis 'phrog tu med// rang gis las byas

rang la 'ong// rang nyid khong du dug zos pas// 'bras bu gzhan la mi smin te// rang dug rang la zug rngu ldang// che la che la 'bring la 'bring// chung ba chung ba'i dug bzhin du// rang gis mi dge gang byas
pa// gzhan la mi 'byung rang la ni// de dang de 'bras sdug bsngal 'byung// rnam smin 'bras bu bcos su med// rgyu yi dus na yong ba yin// rang nyid tshad pas gdungs pa'i dus// btung bas skom pa sel ba
yin// gzhan skom pa la de mi 'byung// de bzhin dge ba'i lan stobs kyang// rang gis byas pa rang la smin// rang sems dge bas thar pa thob// snga ma'i rgyu yis phyi ma'i don// 'bras bu rim gyis cig car
'byung// so nam sgyu ma'i ston thog mtshungs// dge sdig rgyu 'bras mi 'dre ste// rnam par smin pa so so yin// dkar po dang ni nag po gnyis// gcig pa ma yin so so min// dper na ldum ra gcig
gi nang// sa bon dug btab dug tu skye// 'bras bu sman du 'gyur mi srid// de bzhin kun tu rtogs pa'i sems// mi dge ba las sdug bsngal 'byung// bde ba 'byung ba srid ma yin// sa bon sman las 'bras bu
smin// dug tu skye bar ga la 'gyur// dge ba las ni bde ba thob// sdug bsngal ba ni yong mi 'gyur// sdig pa chung yang mi brnyas spang// rdul phran bsags pas ri rab tsam// dge ba chung yang mi spang

blang// chu thigs bsags pas rgya mtsho tsam// nyi zla thang la lhung yang srid// chu ni me ru 'gyur yang srid// las kyi rgyu 'bras bslu mi srid// dge sdig rnam pa so so la// chung ngu nas ni chen po'i bar// zer sogs
cha 'bring dpal sbyang 'bad// skyon gyis ma gos yon tan sgrub// dge sdig sman gyis dug 'joms bzhin// sdig pas dge ba stobs che'o// bzang ngan las kyi byed lugs la// rgyu 'bras mi bslu bden pa'i

don// dper na dpag bsam sa bon ni// phra mo'i ljan ljen chu bran na// 'bras bu lo ma me tog dang// rtsa ba sdong po cher 'khrungs shing// sbyor dngos rjes gsum tshang ba yi// rgyu gnyis rkyen rnams tshogs pa
na// 'di phyi gnas skabs ma lus par// bde sdug rnam smin chen po 'byung// mthar thug rgyal sras de bzhin gshegs// bdud sdig mnar med khyad par ltos// dkar nag rgyu rkyen so so la// dge sdig gnyis
ni mnyam bshad pas// gcig gis gcig gi mgo mnan pas// thab nang gnas pa'i me bzhin du// 'bras bu smin par ma nus pa// gang zhig rkyen dang phrad gyur tshe// bskal pa brgyar song chud mi zos// lus

can kun gyi las rnams kyi// dus la bab pa'i 'bras bu 'byung// bud med sbrum gang zla rdzogs bzhin// sus kyang 'gag par mi nus so// 'di dang phyi ma bar do ru// las ni grib ma bzhin du 'brang// sdig pa

mi dge'i rnam smin te// phar la spangs pas tshul la 'khri// bros pa tsam gyis 'ded du 'ong// phyi nas 'ded cing sngon nas bskor// ga ru phyin cing gar bsdad kyang// med pa'i sa phyogs yod ma yin// ci la yang
ni ma gtogs so// de phyir sdig dang bsngongs pa yi// las la bde ba ga la 'byung// rang srog gcod pa'i sdig gcod 'jigs// ngan song gnas na mu mtha' med// rang sdug rang gis myong ba la// 'phags

pa'i thugs rjes skyabs thabs med// chos dbyings shin tu dri med kyang// dmyal sogs sdig pa rang snang ste// nyi ma'i 'od la dmus long gis// mun par mthong ba rang gi skyon// nyi ma'i 'od la 'pho 'gyur
med// thub pa chos kyi sku can la// rag sha glang mgo dmyal ba'i gzugs// las kyi rang gzugs mthong ba yin// rag sha glang mgo dmyal snang med// me chu las kyi 'khrul snang la// rnam smin ma
zad par de ru// gang gis kyang ni bzlog mi 'gyur// rnam par smin la re ba med// mi dge bya bar su yi phod// 'khor lo sgyur ba la sogs pa// smon cing bsngags pas bstod pa la// bdag nyid dge ba cis mi
spel// las kyi rgyu 'bras dmigs bzhin rtsis// ngan song g.yang la nyam re nga// lha mi'i gnas na yid re spro// thar pa bsgrub 'dod gyen la snyegs// mig gnyis 'thur la ma dbab cig/ sngon byas las la

'gyod tshangs gyis// da byed sdig pa srog dang bsdos// dge sdig nyon mongs dang bral ba// 'khor ba 'di nas 'da' mi srid// srid pa'i gnas na g.yang sa che// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i gzhi rgyud
mchog rin po che spungs pa las/ rgyu 'bras dpe'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// kun rdzob 'khor ba'i bden pa ni// ma rig bdag gi khang pa nas// ma tshor thang la 'khyams pa yis// srid pa'i g.yang la lhung nas
su// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i chus khyer mtshungs// myang 'das don dam bden pa ni// sdug bsngal 'khrul rtog rba rlabs las// stobs ldan bla ma'i mnyen pa yis// bslab pa gsum gyi grur bcug nas// brtson
'grus skya bas skam sar bton// byang chub sems kyi khang par bcug/ dgos 'dod longs spyod gter dang sprad// mi 'gyur don gyi bden par brjod// srid pa'i rtse mo man chad nas// mnar med dmyal ba'i
bar 'di ru// dug gsum ma rig rgyu skyed phyir// khyi yag 'bu srin yan chad kyi// lus blangs snga ma phan chad du// sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig yin par zad// sdug bsngal gnas las ma bzlog na/ 'khor ba rang

zad mi 'gro zhing// rang ldog byed par mi 'gyur bas// sngar yang zhe sdang sna khrid nas// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal sbyangs pa'i rtags// ma ning rigs snyam 'jigs pa'i gzugs// tshe thung nad mang gsod la

dga'// tshig rtsub skad gyong lhang lhang po// skad che bag med sku tsher smra// rtag tu sdangs ltar spu zing byed// rmi lam me 'bar mtshon gyis btsog/ zangs chu khol mar 'tshod pa dang// dbyug pa mtshon cha thogs

pas 'dod// gcan gzan khyi dang sbrul gyis gtso// rang gi lus la gsal shing 'dzugs// 'bros pa mi shes re nyil 'ong// de ni sngon du skyes pa'i rtags// sdig pa byang ba ma byas na// da dung rgyu mthun de ru

'gro// rtags su gsod gcod 'jigs sngangs rnams// je mang je spro 'bad pa la// blo mi ldog cing spyod par 'gyur// de las bzlog par bya ba ni// dmyal ba'i rgyu 'bras shes par bya// rgyu log lam nor 'bras
bu gdug/ rgyu ni mi dge che chung 'bring// lam ni de la spyod pa yis// rgyu 'bras dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung// srog sdom byas pa'i dge spyod mthus// rgyu ldog lam dang 'bras bu 'gog/ de

bzhin chags sems yi dwags 'khrid// gal te dge bas mir skyes kyang// bkres skom rigs nyams nyon mongs dang// dbang po ma tshang ltogs sred che// skra nag mig khung khro mig dmar// ser sna 'dod che rgyu

la chags// 'dod pa mi rnyed re ba che// sbyin gnas mthong na log lta skye// rku 'dod mi gtsang zas la dga'// mdog ngan bzhin mi sdug par 'ong// rmi lam gnas med 'khyams pa dang// thang stong nyal zhing rlung

gis 'khyer// zas skom nor gyis bkres par 'ong// de yi sgrib pa ma sbyangs na// rgyu mthun ma byin len snying 'dod// bzhugs dang sred pa che ru 'gro// phyi ma yi dwags skye ba'i rtags// rgyu ni mi dge 'gog pa

dang// sbyin gtang dge bas yi dwags bzlog/ gti mug dud 'gro'i gnas su khrid// mi ru skyes kyang de yi rtags// sha che gzugs lhod sbu sna mang// gnyis dang le lo brjod ngas che// sa 'drud rtsa gcod sna

bslud mang// dbyibs glen lce chung smra mi gsal// chu dang mun khung rdzab la dga'// lus la sbrang 'du bskum nas nyal// ma smin zas dang mang du za// mkha' la snom zhing bab col smra// rmi lam sa yi phug tu

phyin// mun khung chu nang rdzab tu nyal// rtswa zos dud 'gro'i khrod du bsdad// sbrul dang sbal pas skor ba rmi// de sgrib ma sbyangs rgyu mthun gyis// gtsang sbra med par btsog la spyod// gnyid dang rmugs pa je cher

'gro// phyi ma dud 'gror skye ba'i rtags// zlog pa mi dge'i las smang zhing// gtsang ma'i tshul khrims rten 'brel 'gog/ phrag dog lha min gnas su 'khrid// mi ru skyes kyang bag chags kyis// khengs shing 'khon

'dzin 'thab la dga'// lus che mig dkar mche ba rno// nga rgyal che zhing gtum la hus// tshig ngan go cha mtshon la dga'// nyon mongs stobs che blo sna mang// rgyu mthun phrag dog gnod sems che// lha min
gnas su 'phos rtags te// mi dge spang zhing dge che bsgom// rgyu spangs 'bras bu 'gag pa yin// ngan song gnas nas lha mi thog/ 'dod chags dge bas mi ru 'khrid// mi las 'phos rtags 'phags pa

brten// dad pa che zhing ngo mtshar 'dzin// mngon rtags snyan grags dge la dga'// ngo tsha shes dang khrel bag che// nyon mongs chung zhing gtong la dga'// bzo dang rig pa'i gnas la mkhas// rgyu mthun dge ba
dmigs bcas sgrub// de nyid 'gog pa bla ma rten// dge ba dmigs med bsgrub par bya// sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa yis// 'dod lha rigs drug gang rung ste// dge ba nga rgyal lha ru 'khrid// de las 'phos
rtags spyod lam mdzes// rang bzhin 'jam zhing gtsang sbra che// byams sems che zhing glu la dga'// 'phreng byug spos dang rol mo dang// mang po tshogs pa'i khrom la spro// phyug cing longs spyod chos
la gtong// rgyu mthun spyod lam mkhas su 'gro// skal bzangs chos kyi snod du 'gyur// de nyid chags bral dge ba dang// mi sdug byams dang dga' ba yis// bsam gtan bsgoms pas gzugs khams
skye// de nyid ma gtogs rtse gcig gi// zhi gnas gzugs med khams su 'pho// 'gog pa'i bsam gtan 'khor ba 'gag/ khams gsum srid pa'i rgya mtsho nas// rigs chad mi khom gnas brgyad ni// sngon gyi

dge ba chung ngu yis// mi lus thob kyang chos brgyad dga'// sdug bsngal mthong yang zhen mi bzlog/ rnam smin rgyu 'bras la mi 'jigs// sems can sdug la snying mi rje// sangs rgyas chos la yong mi dad// ngo tsha

khrel med tshul mi gtsang// mi dge ba la ngang gis 'bag/ bla ma mi gus log snang che// yon tan mi dran skyon la rtog/ byas pa drin du mi gzo ba// mi khom gnas su skyes pa'i rtags// dmyal ba'i lam la zhugs
pa yis// mi lus ngan song sems can yin// 'khor ba mu mtha' med par 'khyams// dper na gser dngul rin chen snod// mi gtsang dri mas gos pa na// snod bcud gnyis ka lcags pa bzhin// chos dbyings
shin tu zab pa la// ma rig dri mas 'khor bar 'khyams// las kyi sgrib pas ngan song lhung// ngan song sbyang phyir sdig pa'i tshogs// dag byed stobs bzhi'i sgo nas bshags// bden stobs dkon mchog rjes
dran dang// 'gro la snying rje'i bsam pas su// sngan chad 'khor bar 'khyams pa yi// sdig pa mi dge'i las rnams la// nyes pa slar ldog gnong 'gyod kyis// rnam par sun 'byin zhen log pa'i// 'jigs shing
dngangs skrag gnyen po ste// btsan pos dbang med las la bskos// 'gal na gshed mas gsod pa la// 'jigs pas yengs thabs med pa bzhin// yengs med ngan song 'jigs pa la// sngar byas las la
'gyod pa bskyed// phyi ma mi byed dam bca' bsdam// rang bzhin bcas pa kha na yi// ma tho'i las sgrib dag pa'i rtags// lus sems bde zhing dge stobs 'phel// rmi lam khrus byas gyen la 'dzegs// gsar
pa'i gos gyon nyi zla mthong// mkha' la 'phur dang bshal ba rmi// sdig pa dag rtags ngan song 'gags// dge ba spel zhing snying rje bsgom// nyon mongs rags bcom gtsang gnas 'thob// gtsang ma'i bzod
brtson tshul khrims kyis// zhen log tshad med bzhi bsgoms pas// khams gsum srid pa'i gzugs 'gags nas// so sor rtogs pa'i 'gog pa yi// ting nge 'dzin la goms byas pas// las kyi sgrib pa zad
byas nas// 'khor ba'i dgra bcom 'phags lam la// zhi ba'i don la bskal mang gnas// 'phags pa'i thugs rjes ma bskul na// myang 'das lam la phyin mi 'gyur// rang sangs rgyas kyis nyon
mongs bcom// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i gzhi rgyud mchog rin po che spungs pa las// 'bras bu 'gog pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// lag mtha' med pa'i dus 'di ru// ma rig rgyu rkyen las byung
ba'i// sems can nam mkha' mtha' dang mnyam// ming du btags pa khams gsum la// bde gshegs snying po 'gro rnams kun// mnyam pa nyid du yongs khyab kyang// mi yi gru la ma brten pa'i// sdug bsngal
chu las mi sgrol bas// thar lam sgrub pa'i rten gcig pu// mi lus thob pa shin tu dka'// dge ba phra mo tsam dang ni// mkhar chen dag las 'byung ba yi// rmi lam tsam las thob pa dka'// sngon tshe bsod
nams dge ba'i mthus// 'bras bu dus 'dir byung ba yin// gtsang ma'i mi lus ma thob na// ngan song gnas na thar lam bral// bsod nams ldan pa'i lha yis kyang// g.yeng bas thar pa thob pa
