min// longs spyod ldan pa'i rnam thos bu// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i dbang phyug kyang// thar pa thob pa'i rten ma yin// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kun// mi lus la brten byang chub bgrod// mi yi lus
tsam thob pas kyang// mnyen pa med pa'i gru bzhin du// 'khor ba mi bgrod gzugs brnyan yin// ngan song gsum dang tshe rings lha// mtha' 'khob dbang po ma tshang ba// log lta lkugs pa brgyad rnams
sdud// khom ldan mi lus shin tu dkon// dal ba phun sum tshogs pa kun// grogs po sangs rgyas 'byung ba dkon// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mthong ba yi// zhen chags bral ba'i mig ldan dkon// sangs rgyas
yon tan mthong ba yi// rig pa can gyi dad pa dkon// mi rtag rgyud la bskul ba ste// brtson 'grus ldan pa'i byang chub dkon// rang gzhan 'di phyi'i dgos 'dod 'byung// dal 'byor mi lus rin chen
de// lhag bsam ldan pas don gnyis 'grub// nor bu rin chen dper byar min// sems can rdul phung tsam lus su// mi lus sor steng rdul bas nyung// ngan song gnas ngan gzhan dag las// rtsig logs

gtor ba'i sran 'bru'am// me long ngos la gser phye gtor// chags pas mi lus thob pa nyung// mi lus nam mkha'i skar ma tsam// dal 'byor thob pa nyi zla dkon// rgya mtsho cher dbus gnya' shing bug/ mtha'
yi rul sbal mgrin chud pas// dal 'byor mi lus thob pa dkon// thob kyang dus brgya'i za ma gcig/ lan cig thob pa srid pa tsam// phyi nas thob pa brgya la dka'// nor bu rin chen rnyed dus su// 'dam du
ma bskur phyi bdar gyis// rgyal mtshan rtse la gsol ba thob// dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i sgrom du chug/ phyin ci log gi dgra kun la// ma bskur bstan pa'i sgron mes bsrungs// 'phongs pa'i sdug
bsngal ma lus sol// bde legs phun sum tshogs kun 'byung// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i gzhi rgyud mchog rin po che spungs pa las/ rten dal 'byor rnyed dka' ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig
pa'o//// kye ma dal 'byor thob kyang ni// gal te phan pa ma bsgrubs na// phyis nas 'byor ldan mi 'gyur te// 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag cing// mi rtag 'jig chen ci bas te// dper na sbrul gdug
chen po bzhi// snod nang bcug nas kha ma gcad// ma reg ma bltas bsrung du bcug/ shor na gshed mas ral gris gsod// sbrul rnams rang gnas dka' ba bzhin// rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa bzhin// ma

'phel ma zad rang sa ru// nad med so la sdod pa dka'// gal te 'phel zad cis kyang 'chi// sngon du ma shi'i dpe med dang// phyi ma mi 'chi'i khas len med// da lta 'chi bas mi 'jigs pa'i// sa phyogs de ni
mthong thos dang// dran pa'i yul na med pa yis// 'di la dgag par bya thabs med// gnyen bshes brtse mang mtha' skor yang// nyin mtshan gcig kyang shol thabs med// brtse ba'i bu dang mdza' ba
grogs// 'di la skad cig bsgo mi nus// zang zing nor dang mdun gros gtam// 'di la bsrung thabs gang la yod// che btsun dregs pa ldan gyur kyang// 'chi bdag bdud la bzlog mi tshugs// sangs rgyas
stong gi mthu stobs kyang// 'di la skyob par mi nus na// thabs gzhan kun gyis lta ci smos// dper na ri bo chen po bzhi// skyes bu lag pa brkyang bskum tsam// 'jigs pa'i dbus nas 'bros thabs med// de
bzhin skye rgas na 'chi las// sus kyang 'bros thabs ma mchis pas// skyes pa'i mtha' de 'chi nges yin// tshe 'di mi rtag myur du 'chi// ri gzar kha yi chu 'bab bzhin// nyin mtshan gcig gis gcig ded

nas// 'chi ba'i phyogs su phar phar 'gro// rtsal po che yis mda' 'phangs bzhin// tshe 'di skad cig mi sdod par// 'chi la je nye je nye 'gro// 'di dang phyi ma 'brel nas yod// skye shi gnyis po lag 'brel

ba// bsha' lug gshan pas khrid pa bzhin// gom gang phyin cing shi la nye// de bzhin long med pha rol 'gro// rmi lam glog dang sprin bar gyi// nyi ma lta bur yud tsam yin// rgyu rkyen mang po tshogs pa yi// 'dzam

gling las kyi sa pa rnams// tshe la nges pa med pa dang// lus la snying po med pas su// nad dang gdon dang phyi nang gi// 'chi rkyen rnam pa mang ba'i don// mi tshe zas kyis gsos nas kyang// 'tsho bar mi 'gyur
ltogs nas 'chi// 'chi ba'i rkyen ni shin tu mang// sang tsam 'chi'am sus shes na// rtag tu bsdad snyam mi byed par// de ring nyid la brtun te bya// snyoms las le lor sdod pa de// 'chi bdag
bdud dang phrad tsam na// bzur thabs med de thog rgyab 'dra// yun ring 'dod la skad cig tshe// skye ba'i mthun rkyen thams cad zad// 'chi ba'i 'gal rkyen kun tshang nas// phyi yi 'byung ba thams cad

'khrug/ ngan skyugs rnams kyis lus khebs shing// stobs zad bag bzhi sa la lhung// ngal dub ldang dub lus kun na// dbugs ni ngar ngar dngang skrag byed// shes pa phyad phyod ban bun du// yi mug ga chad
dus de ru// gnyen bshes tshogs kyis mtha' skor yang// srog gcod tshor ba rang gis myong// shi nas zla med gcig pur 'gro// gnyen gyis ma phan bshes mi phan// nye ba rnams la ci phyir chags// zas nor

rnams kyis mdun gang yang// dang khar 'ong ba chu las med// pha rol nor med lag stong 'gro// bsags pa'i nor ni gzhan gyis khyer// rnam smin shi ba'i rjes su 'brang// nor phyir sdig pa ci la bsog/ btsan
po dbang chen mdun ma yang// dbang med 'chi bdag gshin rjes khrid// rgyab rten mgon skyabs su la re// yul khyim mkhar sogs rmi lam bzhin// skad cig mi rtag zhig nas 'gro// lus dang kha dog stobs

rnams kyang// kun nas mi mthun zug rngu ldang// rnam par bam zhing 'bus gzhigs dang// rul dang myags dang dngos po la// khyi dang phag kyang skyug bro ste// mi lus chos med phyi ma'i dgra// 'jig rten pha rol
'gro tsam na// skyabs gnas dkon mchog ma gtogs pa// cis kyang phan pa med pa la// bdag 'dzin can tsho'i ro brgya la// 'chi ba'i 'jigs pas bsam mi khyab// de bas kyang ni phyi ma 'jigs// chos med
ngan song gnas su 'gro// mdo med gser gling stong log byas// rgyus yod bzhin du ltogs grir shi// don med mi lus sha thang chad// mtho sar bslebs nas g.yang la 'phyong// dug sbrul mtsho nas thon pa

dka'// mun pa'i gling na nyi zla med// nor bu rin chen dus der stor// dbul po rnams kyi phun tshogs bral// las kyi gshin rje zhe re gnag/ 'khrul pa'i sems can nyon re mongs// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
bstan pa'i gzhi rgyud mchog rin po che spungs pa las/ 'chi ba mi rtag pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// 'khor ba gting mtha' med pa nas// skye shi sdug bsngal zad med la// skyabs gnas nus pa shin tu

dkon// 'jigs shing skrag pa'i mi rnams kun// bde ru re ba'i skyabs gnas su// ri dang nags tshal ljongs rnams dang// ljon shing skyed tshal khang pa dang// yo byad grogs bshes rgyal po la// skyabs su 'gro
ste mchog ma yin// la la lha klu gnod sbyin dang// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i bdud rigs la// skyabs su 'gro ste phan mi thogs// kho rang yang ni sems can la// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ci la

skyob// 'ga' zhig phyin ci log gi blos// phya dang dbang phyug la sogs la// skyabs song log pa'i gnas su 'gro// dgra 'ong mi la skyel ma bcol// sngon la skyel ma dgras khyer bzhin// mu stegs kho rang dmyal
bar song// gzhan la bskyab thabs ga la yod// skyabs de mchod 'os ma yin pas// dad pa'i gnas min spang bar bya// sdug bsngal kun las thar pa las// skyab tu nus pa shin tu dkon// 'jig rten khams
na 'byung dka' ba'i// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// dad pas skyabs su 'gro byed cing// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yi lam// shes rab kyis ni lta byed

pa// skyabs gnas rnams kyi mchog yin la// snying nas blo phugs de la gtad// chung 'bring chen po'i blo ldan pa// dang po tshe 'dis bslus par mthong// 'jig rten chos brgyad blo log nas// ngan song sdug

bsngal 'jigs pa la// tshe 'di ji srid 'tsho yi bar// gnas skabs skyabs su 'gro bar bya// nyams len mi dge bcu spang zhing// dge ba spyod cing mi rtag bsgom// legs smon sdom pa skye ba yin// 'bras bu lha
mi'i go 'phang thob// de nas gnyis pa gang zag 'bring// 'dus byas thams cad 'jig par mthong// bde sdug kun la blo log nas// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal shes pa yis// dus ni ji srid 'tsho yi bar// thun
mong skyabs su 'gro ba dang// nyams len rang don bslab bya gsum// spyod cing bden pa stong pa bsgom// nges 'byung sdom pa skye ba ste// 'bras bu 'phags pa nyan rang thob// skyes bu mchog tu gyur pa
rnams// sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal mthong// rang gi don la blo log nas// theg pa dman la 'jigs pa yis// byang chub snying po ma mchis par// khyad par mchog gi skyabs 'gro byed// nyams len

gzhan don phar phyin drug/ spyod cing stong nyid snying rje bsgom// byang chub sems kyi sdom pa skye// 'bras bu rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob// skyabs su 'gro ba'i byed lugs ni// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal zad pa

dang// sangs rgyas yon tan mthong ba yi// dad pa sgo gsum gus pa yis// rnam pa thams cad kun mkhyen dpal// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de sras la// ston pa bya zhing de nyid kyi// go 'phang thob phyir skyabs
'gro bya// tshig tu brjod pa skyabs 'gro min// don gyi skyabs 'gro sangs rgyas mchod// sgom yang de la sgrub kyang de// gtad so de la 'phul ba de// gsol ba de la btab pa yis// byin rlabs de yi go
'phang thob// chos la skyabs 'gro de yi gsung// skyabs su mchi ba kha chos min// sangs rgyas 'dod phyir lam de nyid// gang zag rigs dang mthun pa ru// theg pa gsum gyi dam chos la// thos
bsam sgom gsum shes rab kyi// blos sbyong bslab gsum nan tan skyed// skyon dag yon tan gong du 'phel// lam mthar phyin pas go 'phang thob// dge 'dun sangs rgyas mdzad pa la// tshig gi mi phan rjes su
bsgrub// thar pa lam ston grogs nyid du// zag pa med pa'i skyabs 'gro la// mi dge'i khyim spangs rab tu byung// dge ba'i tshul khrims sdom pa gsum// 'bral ba med par grogs su bsten// dge slong dgon
par rtsal rdzogs pas// go 'phang bla na med pa thob// dkon mchog rin chen rnam gsum la// dge 'dun skyabs song rab byung bas// mi dang mi lon log snang can// 'gran sems can kun mchod byed
'gyur// chos kyis 'khor ba'i skyon dag nas// mya ngan 'das pa'i yon tan 'byung// sangs rgyas nyon mongs sems can la// rnam kun mkhyen nyid sangs rgyas thob// dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa de// tshe
'di'i nad gnod dgra bgegs kyis// 'tshe ba rnams ni zhi ba dang// sdig sgrib bral bas phyi ma ru// ngan song 'jigs pa kun las thar// tha mal 'gro ba 'khrul gnas nas// 'jigs tshogs log pa las
skyabs te// sangs rgyas lam la rab zhugs pa'i// sdom pa kun gyi rten du 'gyur// sdom pa 'di gnas kun kyang yod// skyabs 'gro nyams na bslab kun nyams// skyabs 'gro bstan pa'i srog shing yin// skyabs

gnas sangs rgyas nyag gcig ste// thub pa'i chos kun de la tshang// tshogs na de yi mthar thug go/ sangs rgyas kun ston skyabs rnyed nas// 'jig rten ngan la skyabs mi zhu// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan gus
byas kyang// de yis brgya yi char mi phod// lam mchog chos la skyabs song nas// sems can rnams la 'tshe mi bya// byas na lam de nyid las bzlog/ yig 'bru tsam la dad byas pas// 'gro ba kun la phan bde
'byung// dge 'dun skyabs song bstan pa ni// smad dgra mu stegs rnams mi 'grogs// sdigs dang 'grogs na dge ba stor// dri ngan 'gos pas mi gtsang ltung// rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'i lam zhugs pa'i// ser
ru gos tsam 'chang ba la// ston pa'i 'du shes gus pa blang// dkon mchog bka' drin ma brjed phyir// dus dang rgyun gyi mchod pa 'bul// tshogs rdzogs sgrib pa'i las rnams 'dag/ dog la drag po ci byung
yang// thabs gzhan mi btsal mkhyen tshig gcig/ phyogs dang gnas ni gang 'dug kyang// dkon mchog zhing yin der shes bya// tshe dang 'gal ba chen po'i don// skyabs gsum mi spang srog ltar brtsi// bslab
pa mtha' rdzogs yon tan ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis brjod par dka'// mtha' yas mu med bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i gzhi rgyud mchog rin po che spungs pa
las// skyabs gnas khyad par can gyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// yang dag ma yin kun rtog las// kun rdzob log pa'i bden pa de// sdug bsngal kun 'byung nyon mongs rnams// tshul bzhin ma yin
lhan cig skyes// ma rig las byung kun brtags kyis// ma rig nyon mongs khams rnams las// dge bas lha mir skye ba'i las// mi dge ngan song skye ba'i las// rgyu 'bras shes kyang de yi ni// rang bzhin ma
shes las 'bras la// rmongs pa'i ma rig las spyad pas// rten 'brel lus su 'byung ba la// don dam gnas lugs bden pa yin// mthar thug 'gog pa'i lam zhugs nas// srid pa'i lugs bzlog tshogs
sbyor gyi// lam zhugs gnyen pos 'khor ba spangs// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal shes pa la// lha mi gdug par mi shes pa'i// dge ba'i las la spyod pa yi// rgyu 'bras rmongs pa'i ma rig bcom// khams gsum
gnas la chags zhen med// las kyi sgrib pa zad pa yis// 'bras bu dgra bcom rang rgyal thob// mthong ba'i lam zhugs gzung 'dzin spangs// kun brtags gzhan dbang sna tshogs kyi// ma rig pa yi rtog
tshogs bcom// nyon mongs khams rnams sgrib pa zad// bdag gzhan gnyis kyi bdag med rtogs// 'bras bu sa bcu'i yon tan thob// sgom pa'i lam zhugs bag nyal spangs// de nyid kho na la rmongs

pa'i// lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig bcom// shes bya'i bzang zhen sgrib pa zad// mthar phyin mi slob pa yi lam// lhun grub sa la rdzogs sangs rgyas// thams cad don gcig nyid la rgyu// lam gyi mthar thug snying
po'i don// gzhi rdog lam gyi 'bras bu'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i gzhi rgyud mchog rin po che spungs pa las/ lam gyi bden pa la 'jug pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// dper na sa gzhi

dul ba yi// rgyu rkyen 'dzoms pa'i zhing sa la// sa bon tsha ba so nam drod// 'bras bu tsha ba skyur ba ste// sa bon mngar ba so nam bsil// 'bras bu mngar dang bska ba skye// de bzhin rnam rtog sems kyi
gzugs// bsod nams las byung mi lus kyi// ngan rtog kun slong phyin ci log/ mi dge las spyod ngan song 'grub// bzang rtags kun slong byams pa yis// dge ba spyod pas bde 'gro gnas// yang dag lam
zhugs byang chub thob// yang khar gnas pa'i 'phye bo bzhin// yan lag gnyis su gom gang 'khrul// yar la 'gro'am mar la ltung// so mtshams lam bzhin mi lus kyang// 'di nas lam log srid par
ltung// bden pa'i lam zhugs zhi ba 'thob// 'khor 'das so 'gag dal 'byor te// 'khor ba spangs nas myang 'das don// dge 'dun rjes su dran pas 'byung// bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin

pa la// lus kyi bya ba gtso ba'i phyir// bya ba rgyud ces rgyal bas gsungs// theg pa sna tshogs gdul bya'i blo// sde snod ma mo'i tshogs rnams las// blo dman phal gyis rtogs bya'i phyir// bstan pa'i snying po rgyud

'di nyid// dgra bcom chos kyi spyan la gtad// gtsug lag khang skyong mchod byas nas// mi nub 'dzam bu gling du dar// de tshe lha dang lha ma yin// dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten nas// lhag pa'i 'khor rnams yi
rangs te// bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod// mi mchog lha yi lhar gyur pa// rkang gnyis gtso bo chos kyi bdag/ dam pa'i bde ba 'byung gnas la// kun nas dang bas phyag 'tshal bstod// sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i gzhi rgyud mchog rin po che spungs pa las/ mtshan gtad rjes su yi rang phul ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa thams cad kyi gzhi'i rgyud mchog rin chen

spungs pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so//// u rgyan gyi mkhan po pad+ma sam b+ha ba dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ka ba dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// phyis u rgyan nyid kyis ma dag pa rnams
rang 'gyur mdzad nas gsal bar byas pa'o//// e ma ho/ rgyal bas lung bstan pad+ma bdag gis su// smon lam stobs kyis rgya nas bod du phyin// gtsug lag khang skyong mnga' bdag bsam pa

bsgrubs// sangs rgyas bstan pa bod du dar rgyas byas// khyad par lnga brgya'i dus su bstan pa'i rtsas// sangs rgyas bstan pa spyi yi thun mong du// bya ba gzhi rgyud rin chen spungs pa 'di// yi ger bris nas rin
chen gter du sbas// skyes bu las can gcig dang phrad par shog/ mad+galaM//// rgya gar skad du/ ma hA pa na sa ma a bi bo d+hi sa ta ma hA tan tra kha ya ma la nA ma/

bod skad du/ theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa byang chub lam gyi rgyud chen nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das mi las 'phags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos
pa'i dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das mi las 'phags pa'i rgyal po dga' ldan lha'i gnas// rin po che'i gzhal med khang chen po na/ lhag pa'i 'khor 'jam dpal dang// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po
dang// mi 'jigs pa dang yon tan mtha' yas rgyal po dang// stobs po che la sogs pa'i rigs can rnams dang thabs cig bzhugs so// de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba'i mdzod 'dzin
gyis sgo bsam mi khyab par bstan pa ni/ rdul med rdul bral dri med dang// rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed kyi// sangs rgyas sras rnams gang byung ba// dpal ldan sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes// re re'i zhing

du sku gsung thugs// lham me lhan ne lhang nge ba// ma g.yos bzhin du 'phros pa ni// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i gsang ba las// sku ni gdul bya'i grangs dang mnyam// gsung ni sgra skad ji tsam par// thugs ni mi
g.yo kun la khyab// yon tan nam mkha' mdzod mnga' ba'i// 'phrin las tha dad don gcig ste// nam mkha'i mtha' la rab gnas pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi snying po yi// khams gsum pa yi ngo bo nyid// ma

dag pa yi mun pa la// dag pa nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor sad byed pa'i// dad pa chos dbyings rgya mtsho las// ye shes snang ba la me ba'i// yid bzhin nor bu'i sems nyid la// theg pa
sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis// dgos 'dod sna tshogs don mchog gsum// tha ma 'bring dang mchog gyur pa'i// 'gro kun lam la dgod par mdzad// rang nyid 'dod pa las grol nas// sems can yongs su

smin pa'i phyir// theg pa 'di la 'byung 'dod gang// zhe 'dod skyo ba'i blo spangs te// byang chub sems ni gcig spyod pas// kun mkhyen yon tan 'byung ba la// theg pa chen po'i don la ni// bag med spyod pa rab
spangs te// dran dang shes bzhin ldan pa yis// bshes gnyen zhi dul nyer zhi ba'i// yon tan bcom ldan lung gis phyug/ brtse ba'i bdag nyid skyo ba spang// kun la snyoms pa'i yab yum lags// 'khor ba'i
yid sun dad par ldan// bag yod dran pa'i blo gros can// bdog pa kun kyang chos phyir srog/ 'dor nus rnal 'byor rab tu brtson// rang gi sems ni 'dul ba dang// gzhan gyi sems ni gzung ba'i
don// bsod nams ye shes 'phel ba'i rgyu// tshul dang mi mthun med pa ru// kun tu spyod lam gtsang ba yi// legs par dkrugs shing go bgos te// lha dang mi rnams 'dul ba'i phyir// gtsang ma'i sa phyogs
nyams dga' bar// yangs pa'i khri la gdan bshams te// legs pa'i tshon gyis kha bsgyur la// rngul zan nag po bshams byas la// bcos bu'i ras rnam sna tshogs bting// rkang rten bcas pa'i khri la
'dug/ rkang pa legs bkrus 'dzegs nas su// chos gos gtsang ma rab bgos te// byang chub sems ldan mdangs snum pas// chos kyi stan la rab 'dug ste// dge bsnyen dge slong pha ma dang// rgyal po dag

dang de yi 'khor// sems can rtse gcig lhag gyur la// phrag dog le lo rnams spangs pa'i// byams shing mchu ba'i gtam snyan gyis// sna tshogs don ldan chos bshad pa// thabs la mkhas pa chen po'i tshig/ 'di

lta ste/ sha me sha ma ba te/ sha me te sha tru ang gu re/ mam ku re/ mA ra ji te/ ke ra Te/ yu ke yu re/ te tso ba ti/ o lo ya ni/ bi sha tha/ ni rma le/ ma la sa ni ye/ khu khu re/ kha ge gra swe/ gra swa ni/ o

mu khi/ sa rang mu khri/ a mu khri/ sha mi ta ni/ sarba gra ha na/ b+han d+ha na ni/ ni gri hri tra/ sarba ra pra tha ti na/ bi mug ta/ ma ra ba sha/ s+tha pi twa b+hu ta mu tra/ a nud ga ti twa/ sarba ma rai/ pu tsa ri ta/ pa ra pa ri shud d+h+ye/

bi gad tshwa ru/ sarba ma ra ka ma ni/ zhes pas nyon mongs sel ba dang// bdud dpung tshar gcod tshig yin pas// legs par kha ton byas pa na// bdud kyi rigs kyi lha rnams kyis// theg pa chen po'i rigs can
gyi// drung du 'ong bar mi 'gyur te// 'ongs kyang bar chad mi tshugs pa'o// kun la snyoms pa'i brtse sems kyis// byams pa'i yid kyis bdud btul nas// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor du// bdag la sman

pa'i 'du shes bskyed// chos la sman gyi 'du shes dang// chos nyan nad pa'i 'du shes kyis// kha bub snod bzhin skyon spongs la// khyod ni ma yengs rtse gcig nyon// nga yis legs par bstan pa'i don// zhabs

rdol snod bzhin ma song bar// dran dang shes bzhin ldan par zung// dug can nyon mongs ma sbags par// byang chub sems la nan tan bskyed// yengs pa'i rkyen gyis sa mi chod// ma yengs sangs rgyas kun gyi

lam// byang chub sangs rgyas yun mi ring// zhes bka' stsal to// theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa byang chub lam gyi rgyud dang mnyam pa las// gleng gzhi sna gtad pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas
rigs ldan 'khor gyi nang// lha yi dbang pos stan las langs// gus pas thal sbyar phyag 'tshal nas// spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol// kye ma bcom ldan lha yi lha// sems can nam mkha' mtha' dang
mnyam// rtog pa sna tshogs tha dad la// theg pa gcig gis ji ltar sgrol// byang chub sems su gang ltar 'dus// the tshom bsal phyir gsung du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rigs
ldan brgyud par bcas// sems can mkha' dang mnyam pa las// sangs rgyas 'phrin las de tsam ste// khams gsum 'di dag sems can du// byang sems thig le gcig tu bstan// de nyid ma rig bag chags
kyis// kun tu rtogs pa tha dad pa'i// 'khrul pa'i sems can dpag med rnams// gdul byar gyur pa tha 'bring mchog/ byis pa 'phags pa byang chub sems// ma rig ma dag drug pa las// dper na dpag
bsam shing gcig gis// rtsa bas sa 'og klu yi don// sdong pos sa stengs mi rnams dga'// rtse mos sa bla'i lha rnams mgu// srid gsum dga' bar mdzad pa bzhin// byang chub sems gcig 'od zer
gyis// dge bas lha mi'i bde ba bsgrub// de spangs nyan thos rang sangs rgyas// spangs thob sa bcu la gnas pa'i// theg gsum sku gsum zhing khams su// dga' mgu rangs pa'i bsam pa
can// byang chub sems ni gcig tu bstan// sems can nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam la// nyon mongs khams rnams re re zhing// de dag bcom gyis gang la lang// byang chub sems ni gcig bcom na// de

rnams thams cad bcom pa yin// bcom ldan byang chub rdo rje ni// shes rab snying rje chen po yis// theg pa ma lus kun 'dus pas// theg pa chen po zhes su brjod// thams cad ma lus bskyaid pa'i phyir// theg

pa chen po sa gzhi 'dra// thams cad ma lus shong ba'i phyir// theg pa chen po bar snang 'dra// thams cad ma lus khyab pa'i phyir// theg pa chen po nam mkha' 'dra// thams cad ma lus dbang byed phyir// theg pa
chen po rgyal po 'dra// thams cad ma lus gcig yin phyir// theg chen byang chub sems yin no// theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa'i byang chub lam gyi rgyud chen nam mkha' dang mnyam pa las// gleng
bslangs theg pa chen po ngos gzung ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// kun la khyab pa'i chos nyid dbyangs// rgyal ba'i gsung dbyangs gcig las su// sems can mos pa tha dad pa'i// chos tshul mtha' yas
dpag med las// mdor bsdus sbyong byed gnyen po'i chos// brgyad khri bzhi stong grangs brjod pa// dug gsum lhan skyes 'dul ba'i phyir// 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i sde snod du// sems can rnams la gnod pa
spang// sdig pa ci yang mi bya bar// sdom pa gsum po tshul bzhin bsrungs// mdo sde 'dzin pa'i sde snod la// 'gro ba kun la phan don du// dge ba phun sum tshogs pa yi// ting 'dzin lhag pa'i bsam pa
bstan// ma mo 'dzin pa'i sde snod kyis// rang gi sems ni gdul ba'i phyir// sna tshogs tshul gcig don ston pa'i// shes rab gsum la nan tan bskyed// rigs pa gnyis la legs gnas pa'i// rang rig ye
shes mngon du byas// 'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa las// gnyen po kun 'dus sde snod yin// don gcig nyid las ma rmongs pa'i// 'bras bu gcig tu rgyal bar gsungs// thog med dus na ma rig pas// bag
chags nyon mongs dbang gis su// las kyis skye ba dpag med blangs// skye shi gnyis kyi sdug bsngal la// bsgrang gis mi langs mtha' las 'das// sems can gcig gis lus blangs pa'i// sha rus bsags

na ri rab tsam// khrag dang chu ser rgya mtsho tsam// sdug bsngal nam mkha'i mthar mi shong// don med srid pa'i glong du 'khyams// shas cher ngan song rba la g.yengs// da ltar dran yang skyi sha g.ya'// don med
'ba' zhig yin par zad// mi shes srid pa'i glong 'di na// gzugs med stong pa'i chags zhen can// sems can mtha' yas bsam mi khyab// gzugs can dbang po phyogs gcig tu// yul lngar
zhen pa dpag tu med// 'dod khams yul drug phyi nang du// chags sdang zug rngu'i las kyis mnar// khams gsum bag chags bar do na// sems can mkha' yis khams mnyam las// las kyis 'khor
ba'i 'dod gzugs rnams// phal cher ngan song gnas na 'khor// mi lus thob pa shin tu nyung// de las dal 'byor thob pa ni// nyin mo'i skar ma mthong bas dkon// lan cig srid pa'i mi lus kyang// don
med kha rje dbang thob min// bla ma dkon mchog thugs rje dang// rang gi bsod nams tshogs bsags pa'i// dge ba'i 'bras bu tshe 'dir smin// gnas skabs sprin bar nyi ma tsam// rtag mi thub ste 'gag pa'i

chos// de bas dam pa'i chos dkon te// bskal pa stong phrag mang po ru// dam chos nyi ma 'char ba nyung// chos med mun pa'i 'jig rten mang// rang sems sangs rgyas mjal ba de// yid bzhin nor bu bas kyang
dkon// ston pa'i dam chos spyod pa ni// 'khor lo sgyur rgyal nyid las nyung// dge 'dun rjes su bsgrub pa'i dus// me tog u dum bar bas dkon// sngar 'das ma byon da ltar gyi// sangs rgyas bstan pa dpag
med kyang// theg mchog byang chub lam ldan gyi// 'bras bu myur du thob pa 'di// kun las lhag pa'i smon lam gyis// ma rungs gdul dka' 'dul ba yi// mi mjed shAkya thub pa'i zhing// nyon mongs ye shes

spangs thob bral// de yi rang bzhin des grol phyir// theg pa chen po'i lam zhugs rnams// rgyal ba'i chos sku nyi ma la// mkha' la gsal 'grib med gyur kyang// byis pa blo dman rigs rnams la// sa yi sde

ris nyi ma rgas// ston pa mya ngan 'das tshul ston// lnga brgya phrag bcur bstan pa 'grib// chos min mun pa'i dbyug skor byed// mi lus thob kyang don re chung// bsod nams ma yin mthu las byung// mu ge nad
dang mtshon gyis 'jigs// bcu pa'i bar la dam chos nub// byams pa'i thugs rjes dge la 'jug/ gnas skabs bsod nams yar la 'phel// rdo rje'i sku la 'gyur med kyang// sems can rnam rtog las kyi

sa// bstan pa re la ston pa re// che chung ring thung du ma 'byung// rmi lam sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul yin// yang dag don la bstan pa gcig/ kun mkhyen ye shes gcig la 'dus// ma rig pa la bstan pa mang// mangs
pas de bzhin nyid ma rtogs// nam mkha' gcig las mang mi yod// mangs na bug gsar mthong bas zhan// nam mkha' ma rtogs ji bzhin no// bde gshegs snying pos kun la khyab// rgyu med sems can gang
yang med// rkyen thob mi yi lus sems la// rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs gnas pa'i// nam mkha' lta bu'i chos nyid de// phyogs ris med par kun gyi yul// nyi ma lta bu'i rig pa'i 'od// mthongs
nyi bzhin du nyams su long// phyi nang med par mnyam pa nyid// theg pa chen po 'di don la// mi lus sangs rgyas dgongs pa can// lhun grub nyid du yongs grub kyang// gzhan dbang rkyen gyis gnyis su

snang// kun brtags blo bur 'khrul pa 'dod// gser 'gyur rtsi yi rnam pa yis// lcags ni gser du byas pa bzhin// mi gtsang sgrib pa'i lus spangs nas// dri med rgyal ba'i sku ru 'gyur// thugs rje'i nyi 'od
phyogs bcur brdal// ma rig mun pa'i tshogs rnams sel// ye shes snang ba kun tu gsal// yang dag chos la spyod pas thob// don grub thob par 'gyur nas ni// 'di la 'bad pa ma bsgrubs na// byas
pa don med sdug bsngal rgyu// 'dus byas mi rtag 'jig chos can// lo zla tshes grangs mi rtag ste// dus kyis bdas pas phar phar 'gro// skad cig mi sdod myur du 'chi// dus kyis 'pho bskyas byung tsam

na// mdza' ba rnams kyang med par 'gyur// mi mdza' rnams kyang med par 'gyur// phyi yi gnas kyang med 'gyur la// nang gi rdzas kyang med par 'gyur// de bzhin bdag kyang med 'gyur bas// mi rtag shi ba'i
dus kyi tshe// yun rings dus su dka' spyad pa'i// 'jig rten chos kyis ci la phan// de bas chos tshol 'bad pa skyed// chos med gson pa ci zhig rung// de bas 'jigs pa kun sel ba'i// 'gro ba'i mgon la
skyabs su mchi// de yi thugs su chud pa'i chos// byang chub sems la bdag nyid 'jug/ mi lus thob nas chos med pa// gser gling stong log byas pa 'dra// mi lus 'dabs nas mi len pas// shi bas byang

chub thob mi srid// de 'dra'i mi lus stong log mkhan// snying po med las snying por gzung// gzo dang gsob kyis ma bslus sam// 'jig rten mi rtag sgyu ma 'dra// rang gi rang bslus ngan song gzugs// rdzun
la bden 'dzin gti mug can// mi shes blun po dud 'gror 'pho// rtog pa rags la chags sdang che// gsod la dga' zhing dmar la rngam// las kyi gshin chen dmar po de// dmyal ba'i las mkhan bsleb pa

yin// yod pas mi chog med la brnab// g.yung po ser snas sred pa de// yi dwags gnas na snga phyi med// sdug bsngal gnas la rgyun du 'khor// chu bo 'thur song gyen mi ldog/ de bzhin ngan song sdug bsngal
las// thar pa thob pa ga la srid// gnas skabs tshul min ma gtogs so// 'khor ba pa la bde ba med// 'khor ba'i bde ba sdug bsngal yin// glen pa dug can zas la zhim// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsgrub
la dga'// 'dod pa bde ba thob 'dod kyang// bsgrub pa sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig bsgrub// sdug bsngal rba la g.yeng tsam na// 'khor ba'i 'bras bu dus der grub// mi gtsang khrod kyi srin bu

bzhin// bde ba la chags sdug bsngal grub// thun mong rgyud lnga'i sdug bsngal las// bye brag las kyis sdug bsngal ni// lha la 'chi 'pho sdug bsngal ba// mnar med dmyal ba'i duHkha che// lha min chags sdang
brtsad pa yis// rang snying gas nas 'chi ba dang// mi la rkyen dbang 'du byed kyis// zad pa med pa'i zug rngu dang// dud 'gro mi shes mun pa la// gcig gis gcig za 'jigs pa dang// yi dwags zas mthong

tshe na dgra// gshed pos gtse ba'i duHkha dang// dmyal ba dus min rgyun du ni// sdug bsngal thams cad bsran thabs med// las kyi rnam smin ma zad na// dmyal ba'i tshe la 'dzad pa med// las ni nyon mongs
dbang gis byas// nyon mongs ma rig 'khrul pa la// byang chub sems gcig ma gtogs pa// zad pa med par rgyun du 'khor// mu mtha' yod par ngas ma mthong// log 'khrul sems can snying bsran can// mi
lus so mtshams mkhar na yod// da res yod na gtan du yod// de bas bsgrims te gus 'bad na// thos pa mang po'i mi phyir 'brongs// dge ba'i bshes gnyen thod bzhin bskur// 'gro la snying rje'i sems

kyis su// lus dang srog la ma lta bar// theg chen dam chos myur du tshol// sngon gyi rgyal ba sras bcas kyis// dam pa'i chos ni tshol ba'i phyir// slob dpon bka' las mi 'da'i don// srog las 'phangs pa'i
blo bur nas// nyam nga med pa'i bsam pa yis// lus la lcags gzer stong btab cing// sha la mar me stong btsugs te// sha bzhar rus pa gcog pa dang// khrag gis chag chag btab nas su// chos 'dod
mchod sbyin bya dka' rnams// sdug bsngal byung yang bzod pa yin// 'gyod med snying nas gtong ba la// longs spyod g.yo ba smos ci dgos// de bas lam mchog 'dir zhugs gang// 'khor ba'i dgra bo snying
soms la// rgyal ba'i rjes su cis mi zhugs// pha rabs bu yis mi gcad par// rgyal sras rnams kyi thugs rje yis// bdag nyid 'di ltar 'khod pa la// bka' drin rjes su dran pa yis// byas pa chud zod mi

gtang bar// da ni dad pa rab tu skyed// byang chub sems kyi chos rnams la// nyin mtshan rtag tu bsam par gyis// sems can sangs rgyas snying po can// dus 'dir rgyal ba'i sras su 'gyur// de bzhin nyid du
bdag lung bstan// 'khor 'das gnyis kyi yon tan ni// nyon mongs dbang gis 'khor bar 'khyams// dkar nag las kyis bde sdug byung// dkar po'i las kyi yon tan gyis// 'dod rigs drug la mi
gcig pa'i// yon tan phra mo sna re yod// dmyal bas tshe ni snga phyi dran// yi dwags sngos pas zas thob 'gyur// dud 'gro rnams la zas skom yod// lha min rnams la rdzu 'phrul dang// mi yi lus la
sdom pa chags// lha rnams mngon par shes pa yod// gzugs kyi khams na bsam gtan gnas// gzugs med de las khyad 'phags thob// las zad nyon mongs 'gog pa yis// 'phags pa nyan rang dgra

bcom thob// lam zhugs 'khor ba'i nyams myong grol// rang don sa gnas bde ba thob// gzhan don sgyu ma'i snying rje 'byongs// de don gong du mthar phyin pas// sangs rgyas zhing khams bde ba can// chos kyi

dbyings la yangs dog med// mnyam yangs thang ni lag mthil ltar// sna tshogs me tog pad+ma'i ljongs// kha dog dri bsrung phun sum tshogs// rin chen gzhal yas khang chen po// rnam pa gzugs la rang bzhin

dbyings// kun tu snang gi pho brang na// nam mkha'i sku la mtshan dpes spras// rtog pa med pa'i ye shes can// phyogs ris med pa'i dkyil 'khor la// phun sum tshogs pa lnga dang ldan// 'gyur med 'od gsal rdo

rje gdan// mi g.yo bdag gzhan don grub la// bsam gyis mi khyab dpag par dka'// de don byang chub sems las byung// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i khyad// rgya mtsho ba glang rmig rjes chu// sar gnas

yon tan mthong tsam na// nyan rang yon tan rdul gyi chu// de tsam nyid kyis don thob kyang// lha yi bde ba sdug bsngal dngos// 'gro ba gzhan rnams lta ci smos// de la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams// ces re dbang
po ma 'gags na// mthong dang thos dang dran pa shes// gnas skabs tsam gyi 'dod pa la// lus srog sdug pa bkol nus na// gnas skabs mthar thug thams cad du// rang gzhan don gnyis bsgrub pa yi// ci
ste dam pa'i chos mi nus// sngon gyi bsod nams ma yin pa'i// dbang med las la bya thabs med// rang dbang yod pa'i lha mi rnams// rin chen gter kha 'byed dus su// longs spyod byed pa'i dus la

bab// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rab bsngags pa'i// sangs rgyas che ba'i yon tan rnams// thos pa tsam gyis mos pa skye// dran pa tsam gyis sdig pa 'dag/ mthong ba tsam gyis yon tan thob// nyams su blangs na

smos ci dgos// sa bon rul ba myu gu med// dad med rnams la chos mi 'ong// de phyir 'dod pa'i dad pa ni// skom pa chu yis gdungs pa bzhin// sangs rgyas chos la rtsol ba skyed// mos gus bu yis ma mthong

bzhin// nges shes gting nas thob par bya// yid ches zas kyi ro myang bzhin// 'gyur med dad pa khungs su tshud// dad pa'i sa gzhi bzang po la// byang chub ljon shing bskrun pa yin// rgyal ba'i bstan la rab tu
zhugs// byang chub dam pa thob par gyis// 'di nyid ma rtogs don med do// byang chub snying po kun khyab kyang// sngon tshe bsod nams chen mar bsags// bsags pa tshe 'dir zad pa'i

rigs// mi khom brgyad dang cha mthun pa'i// mi lus thob kyang skal chad rigs// 'gyu byed dbang po lnga gsal yang// dam pa'i don la mi shes rmongs// tshe 'dir sred pa'i ser snas 'jungs// zhe sdang khong khro

rgyun mi 'chad// 'jig rten khe grags blos mi spongs// phyin ci log las blo mi 'khyur// rgyun du nad dang sdug bsngal mnar// 'gal rkyen zad med rtag tu 'ong// zhum zhing sgyid lug dbang med rnams// chos kyi

snod med rigs chad yin// blo dman yul chung thos dgum sgrug/ chos la chog shes ngoms pa skyen// skyid 'dod dka' spyod mi nus dang// snying rje chung la rkyen mi khyag/ phyogs ris lta ba'i mu la zhen// chos dang
chos min shan mi phye// mtha' drug tshig gis don mi rtogs// nges shes chung la log lta che// bdag bstod gzhan smod shes rab can// rgyu 'bras khyad gsod phan sems bral// theg pa chen po'i rigs ma
yin// stobs chung nyan thos byis pa'i chos// theg chen nam mkha' lta bu la// theg chung khu tshur bzhin du bsdus// sa bon ma rungs mi 'khrung ltar// rigs chad rnams kyis don mi 'grub// bsod nams dman
pa'i rnam smin yin// theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa byang chub lam gyi rgyud chen nam mkha' dang mnyam pa las/ dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// gzung 'dzin rnam shes
'khyam po de// srid pa'i rtse mo man chad nas// dmyal ba'i srin bu yan chad du// skyes pa'i mtha' la thug med pas// nam mkhas gar khyab kun khyab pa'i// khams gsum bar do'i sems can gyis// pha ma ma

byas gcig kyang med// khyad par du yang ma nyid do// dus gsum rgyu rkyen las byung lugs// mi gtsang 'dam rdzab bu ga nas// skyabs med srin bu lta bu la// brtse ba'i mig lta snyan pa'i ngag/ 'dzum pa'i sngon
bsu byams pa'i sems// gces pa'i lus blangs zhim pa'i zas// 'khor ba'i rdzas dang rgyal srid byin// 'jigs pa'i skyabs byas lus sems bskyed// de yi drin ni dpag par dka'// dpe ni des mtshon 'gro
kun byas// pha ma phrag par bkal nas su// stong gsum lan gsum bskor gyur kyang// pha ma'i drin ni 'khor ba min// ci phyir ma yis bu yi don// lus dang srog la ma bltos par// dmyal ba lta bu'i sdug
bsngal myong// longs spyod rnams ni smos ci dgos// stong gsum nyungs 'bru tsam du ni// bsil nas bsgrang bar nus mod kyis// sems can gcig gis ma gtogs pa'i// lan grangs bsgrang bar ga la
nus// de bzhin drin ni brjod las 'das// drin can sems can pha ma rnams// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'khyam pa la// mir gyur snying rje mi skye na// rang nyid smon pa ba glang yin// nyin sha za ba'i

bu dang 'dra// bu skyes ma yi gshed mar che// nyin gcig dgra la bskyabs pa la// phan pa drin du gzo ba dang// mtshan gtsig gnyen du 'grogs pa la// gnod spangs phan pa byed tshod la// thog med gyur nas da
la thug/ byams pas bskyabs pa'i pha ma la// gnod spangs phan pa cis mi 'dogs// ma rig 'khrul pa'i dus kun na// sems can thams cad pha ma yin// de la gnod pa byar mi rung// rig pa lam du khyer
dus su// sems can thams cad yi dam lha// lha la gnod par byar mi rung// don la sems can sems nyid gcig/ log lta gnod pa byar mi rung// byas na 'di phyi mtshams gsum du// lan chags rnam
smin rgyun mi 'chad// sems can gcig gis srog bcad pas// lan chags sdig pa stong du 'gyur// ma yi drin las byung ba de// tshe 'di'i ma bsad mtshams med pa'i// dmyal bar 'gro ste shin tu lci// de yi
nyes pa su yis bzlog/ ma la ngan sems 'gyus pa tsam// khams gsum sems can bsad dang mtshungs// de bzhin sems can thams cad la// snga phyi ma gtogs khyad par med// sems can gnod pa tsam
gyis kyang// de dang de yi bar chad 'byung// dngos grub rnam gnyis thob mi 'gyur// 'gro ba kun la sems snyoms pas// byams pa'i sems kyis phan 'dogs kyang// phan 'dod phyin ci log pa ni// mya ngan
gsang ba'i lcebs pa dang// tshul khrims 'chal ba'i phan sems dang// rtsod pa'i phyogs su nor ster dang// bstan pa bshig pa'i 'gro don dang// snying rje bsgoms pas dgrar langs dang// mgu mkhan med
pa'i dka' spyad rnams// gzhan la phan btags rang la gnod// bden par 'dod pa log par song// dge ba byas pas sdig tu gyur// chos la btsud pas 'khor bar 'ching// sbyin pa btang bas dug tu
'gyur// gcig skyabs byas pas kun dgrar song// bstod pa byas pas smad par 'gyur// tshul khrims bsrungs pas sdig la 'bags// zug rngu sel bas nad du ldang// mi nus pa yi khas che dang// sdug la rtag

tu byams byed dang// dper na sbrul la 'o ma bzhin// byang chub lam du 'di mi 'gro// de bas mkhas pa 'di spang ngo// dmigs su 'gro na gang phan bya// sdug bsngal mgon med gyur pa yi// dbul zhing 'phongs
pa'i 'gro ba ni// rigs ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa// gang la gang phan de nyid du// mi mthun gnas nas mthun par bskyal// sdug bsngal sel bar gang gyur dang/ bde bar thob par ci yod gyis// lus kyi bya ba
ngag gis tshig/ yid kyis 'phen pa thams dang rdzas// sbyor ba dngos dang rgyud pa ru// sems can gcig nas mang po'i bar// mngon sum rjes dpag med pa ru// rang gi ci nus smon lam
gdab// gzhan la bskul gdab yi rang bya// sems can gcig la phan byas pas// de yi yon tan dpag tu med// mang po rnams la smos ci dgos// thabs la mkhas pa'i phan pa yis// sems can dge ba'i
las la 'khod// 'di ru phan pa'i bya ba dang// phyi mar phan pa'i smon lam gdab// byang chub lam du 'gro ba yis// don dang ldan pa'i 'bras bu thob// sgo gsum bag ldan sdom pa yis// lus ni mdzes shing

'dzum dang ldan// 'jig rten 'chal tshig mi brjod cing// 'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig smra ba// zhi zhing dul ba'i spyod pa can// khro ba med pa'i phan sems la// dran pa bzhi dang ldan pa yi// rtag tu dur khrod dgon

par 'dug/ kun kyang yid du 'ong bar 'gyur// pad+ma'i 'byung gnas bzang po la// ngang pa'i tshogs 'du de bzhin no// rang 'dod med pa'i gzhan phan ni// skyon la yon tan stobs che ba'i// phan par 'gyur na
sdig kyang bya// gnod par gyur na dge yang bzhag/ sems dge ba la nyes pa med// brgya srog thon na gcig srog gcad// 'jungs pa'i nor blangs tshogs su spyad// ngan song khegs na mi tshangs spyad// phan

stobs che na rdzun yang smra// ngan byed pa la dbyen yang 'dzud// ma rungs pa la sun yang dbyung// grogs por byas shing blo sna bsgyur// gshed por byas shing dge la bskul// ma tshor btang snyoms rkun bu'i

tshul// bde thob sdug bsngal bral ba yi// gnyen por gang 'gro bya ba la// zhi dang drag po dgug dang bskrad// bstod smad mtshang 'bru 'brid pa dang// tshar bcad rjes bzung rdzu 'phrul dang// rgyal ba'i
mchod rten bsod nams dang// mchod sbyin las sbyor thabs mkhas pas// thar pa'i lam la ci tshud pa'i// rten 'brel 'gro la ci phan bya// rang stobs nus pa ci yod dang// stobs can gzhan la grogs bcol
zhing// phyogs ris med par 'gro rnams la// 'jigs pa rnams kyi mgon dang skyabs// dbul ba rnams kyi zas dang nor// 'phye bo rnams la gnas dang yul// dmang po rnams la srid dang sde// rmongs pa

rnams la slob dang ston// phan bde'i gnas su gang 'gyur la// skad cig tsam gyis yi dga' ba// don du 'gro ba gzhan la ni// gang dag phan par bya ba nyid// phan la drin du rtsod pa dang// lan ma gzhal du

'dod pa dang// rnam par smin la re mi bya// 'dod pas phan sems sems khral 'byung// sdug bsngal nyid du de 'gyur to// gang gi sdug bsngal mthong ba'i tshe// bdag la nus pa yod bzhin du// de nyid don ni
ma byas na// srog 'di gson pas ci mi rung// byas pa brjed pa dud 'gro'i bu// pha ma bslus pas skyabs dang bral// de bas sdug bsngal khur len pa'i// ma yi rjes su rang nyid 'jug/ bka'
drin lan bzlog bzod par bya// thar par 'dod pa'i yid ldan rnams// thar pa'i lam du mi 'gro na// sems can las kyis sdug pa la// las ma zad par de mi 'dzad// gnas skabs phan yang mthar thug

tu// slar zhing 'khor ba'i 'ching byed 'gyur// 'bar ba'i me la shing mnan bzhin// las kyi 'khrul 'khor skyed par byed// 'jig rten 'dod pa chung ngu de// sman chung tsam gyis dug chen bslang// dug gsum

rtog pa stobs bskyed nas// bde ba mchog la rgyab phyogs 'gyur// 'gro ba smin par ma gyur na// sa bon tshig pa'i myu gu bzhin// phan btags pa la don mi 'byung// sdug bsngal ba la rgyun par gnas// 'khor
ba 'di nas 'da' mi 'gyur// kun la khyab pa'i byang chub sems// gzhi la gnas pa'i sa bon de// lam gyi rkyen gyis bskyed byas nas// 'bras bu byang chub thob pa'i don// bdag pas gzhan gces lhag pa'i
sems// gang mchis sangs rgyas chos kun mchis// sems can thams cad smin par nus// dmigs pa med las dmigs pa ni// rang gis brtse ba des mtshon nas// gang dag 'gro kun sdug bsngal
ba'i// las kyis nyes pa'i chad pa rnams// bdag ni 'khor ba'i mthar gnas par// dmyal bar song yang bzod byas nas// gzhan gyis dka' ba dang du blangs// mgo dang rkang lag lus gtong ba'i// srog la

bab kyang 'gyod med pa'i// rgyal srid la sogs lta ci smos// dran dang shes bzhin ldan pa yi// snying rjes sdug bsngal chen po ni// sems can don du bzod bya ba// 'di ni byang chub chen po'i lam// phyin ci ma

log yang dag de// las kyis snying rje de min 'gyur// snying rje chen po khyad par che// las kyi snying rje 'khor ba ste// lhag pa'i snying rje don gnyis ldan// bzod pa dka' thub dam pa ni// mya ngan 'das pa mchog

ces bstan// pha mas bu tsha bde 'khod nas// rang nyid sdug kyang tshim pa bzhin// bdag gis bde ba ji snyed pa// chags pa med par kun la gtong// rang nyid sdug kyang skrag pa med// slar zhing bde ba chen po

'phel// ma rungs gnod chen skyel ba la// phan pa che ru bya ba nyid// bde ba'i 'byung gnas sems chen po// byang chub sems dpa' mchog chen po// 'gro ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal las// skyob pa snying rje chen po
ste// bde la 'khod pa byams pa yin// don gnyis spro ba dga' ba la// kun la phyogs med btang snyoms te// tshad med bzhi ldan byang chub sems// sems can yongs su smin byed pa// 'di ni skyes bu chen
po'o// dam pa rnams kyi rjes 'jug pa// gnyis med rtogs phyir 'di nyid dgos// 'di dang mi ldan stag tshang du// wa skyes mi rung ltas ngan bzhin// sems can rnams ni bslus pa yin// rgyal
ba'i sras su mi rung ngo// byang chub sems dang rab ldan pa'i// dus mtha'i me bzhin sdig can rnams// re re zhing du 'joms par byed// bskal par bsags pa'i mun pa yang// sgron mes skad cig sel ba
ltar// thog med dus nas bsags pa yi// las kyi sgrib pa 'thug po yang// byang chub sems ni skad cig gis// dga' 'gyur gzhan gyis de ltar min// gal te tshul khrims skyon byung ba// gang gi sel bar mi
nus pa// byang chub sems kyis sos par 'gyur// dge gzhan 'bras bu chu shing gi/ snying po 'byin pas zad 'gyur bzhin// byang chub sems kyis dge ba ni// rtag tu dpag bsam ljon pa bzhin// 'bras bu
'byin pas mi 'dzad 'phos// yon tan mtha' yas dpag med do// sems can rnams kyis mgon bcas pa'i// dge ba'i rtsa ba gang byas la// bu la phan byas ma dga' bzhin// rgyal ba sras bcas mgu bar
'gyur// sems can don byed ma gtogs pa// rgyal ba mnyes pa'i thabs gzhan med// 'di ni mchod pa chen po ste// bag chags rnams kyis ci mi 'grub// sems can rnams la brtse ba yi// chos la sems pa
gang yin la// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i rgyal dbang po// bu sdug 'dra bar dgongs nas su// gzigs shing byin gyis rlobs par 'gyur// 'od kyis bskul nas dbang bskur byed// de yi mthong thos dran pa

tsam// gla rtsi dang ni tsan dan dri// gang la reg pa dri 'gos ltar// sems can sdug bsngal nyon mongs sel// bde la shugs kyis 'khod pa yi// byang chub sems dang ldan par 'gyur// byang chub sems dang gang
ldan pa// sdig bral bde ba ngang gis 'phel// gzugs dang kha dog yid 'ong zhing// ngag snyan sems la yi rang dad// ci byas mdzes shing sdug pa yi// kun gyis bskur zhing rab tu bsngags// 'gran zla bral
ba'i rgyal sras zhes// 'jig rten lha mi'i phyag byar 'gyur// sems skyed pas ni gzhan don 'grub// yang dag byang chub rang gis thob// gnyis su med pa'i de bzhin nyid// sangs rgyas sa la rab tu
gnas// yang dag mtha' bral brjod las 'das// theg pa gsar du zhugs pa yi// las can dang po'i sems can la// rjes su yi rang dang byed tsam// de dang de yi yon tan ni// stong gsum ri rab srang la

gzhal// tshad bzung rung gi de lta min// de bzhin sa rnams 'bras bu ni// skyems skyed bzhin du rtsol med thob// rang nyid log lta ma skyes na// byang chub sems la gang gis kyang// gzhig cing gzhom du med pa
ste// dper na rdo rje pha lam nyid// rdo rje nyid kyis ma bcag na// gzhan gyis gcog par mi nus bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' sems ma la// log par lta ba ma gtogs pa// gzhan gyis
'joms par mi nus la// gcig gis gcig la gnod byas na// de la mchod sbyin tshul khrims dang// bsam gtan thob pas skyob mi nus// log lta skad cig skyes pas kyang// yon tan thams cad brlag par
'gyur// byang chub sems ni gong skyes la// su zhig log par lta byed na// bskal par bsags pa'i dge ba yang// skad cig nyid kyis med par byed// de las byang chub sems ldan yang// sdig pa'i nang nas
shin tu lci// ngan sems skyes pa'i drangs bzhin du// sdug bsngal mi 'dzad mnar med ltung// byang chub sems med 'jig rten gyi// 'bras bu brgya byin nyid dang ni// tshangs pa'i gnas kyang mi thob

la// nyan thos rang rgyal ga la 'byung// sangs rgyas nyid ni ci phyir thob// sa bon med pa'i myu gu de// ji ltar 'bad kyang mi 'byung ngo// theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa byang chub lam gyi rgyud chen nam
mkha' dang mnyam pa las// sems can yongs su smin pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// gang dag byis pa'i skye bo rnams// mya ngan 'da' bar gang bzhed pa// sangs rgyas bstan pa rin chen la// tshul bzhin
'jug pa 'di lta ste// ngan song gnas la 'jigs pa yis// 'khor ba'i chos la zhen log nas// so so thar pa'i sdom pa ni// snying rjes sems can thams cad la// mi dge 'dod pa spang ba ni// yul ni mkhan
po slob dpon dang// dad pa'i dge 'dun tshogs pa la// gsol ba gdab la bslang bar bya// dal 'byor ldan pa'i rten la ni// thun mong skyabs 'gro tshul khrims skye// khyim pa dge bsnyen nyid dang

ni// tshangs spyod rab byung tshul khrims bcu// dge slong pha ma rigs bdun po// so so'i bslab pa tshul bzhin bsrung// rten ni lus kyis sdom pa gtso// lus kyi spyod lam rab bsdams na// rgyal mtshan 'dzin
pa'i tshul khrims gnas// dus ni lus de 'tsho yi bar// bsrungs pa'i phan yon 'di phyir 'byung// rang nyid 'khor ba las thar 'dod// 'bras bu gnas skabs lha mi la// ting 'dzin zin pas 'phags

pa thob// phul lam shi 'am nyams pas stong// cho ga brjod pa'i tha mar thob// dang po 'khor ba'i zhen pa las// blo dman shes rab chung ba rnams// bzlog phyir so so thar pa bstan// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal

mtha' dag gi/ rtsa ba khyim na gnas pa de// khyim med sdug bsngal kun spangs pas// bde ba'i 'byung gnas kun gyi gzhi// mngon par rab tu byung ba tsam// nga yi bstan pa rgyas par byed// bskal bzang 'di la
byang chub 'gyur// lha dang mi rnams dga' mgu ste// de la mchod pa tsam gyis kyang// sangs rgyas rnams kyis rjes su 'dzin// mnyam nas sangs rgyas kun smad nas// de yi nyes pa bsam mi

khyab// tshul khrims sdom pa tsam gyis kyang// nyi ma mkha' la shar ba'i 'od// mun pa'i tshogs rnams zil gnon bzhin// nga yi rgyal mtshan 'chang ba tsam// skye bo mu stegs zil gyis gnon// sdug bsngal 'khor
ba'i mun pa sangs// snang byed sangs rgyas bstan pa la// dmigs ldan rnams ni 'khod phyir ro// dmus long mi khom gnas na rmongs// khyim thab sdug bsngal btson rar 'khyams// 'di la rmongs pa su

zhig thar// dang po'i las can pho mo rnams// yar la blo sems cher bskyed nas// shes rab snying rjer ldan pa yi// theg pa mchog la 'byung 'dod gang// sems can sdug bsngal kun mthong nas// rang 'dod zhi
bde blo las log/ byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa la// btang snyoms skad cig mi sdod par// bdag pas gzhan gces bsam pa yis// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// mkhas shing don dang ldan pa yi// byang
chub sems dpa'i slob dpon la// lus dang bdog pa kun phul la// spyan sngar 'dug ste sems skyed blang// rgyu ni sdig pa med pa'i sems// khyad par skyabs 'gro skye ba yin// byang chub sems ni rnam pa
gnyis// kun rdzob dang ni don dam mo// kun rdzob thabs la mkhas pa yis// sems can kun gyi don byed pa// smon pa dang ni 'jug pa'o// don dam gzod nas ma skyes pa// de rnams rang bzhin shes
pa'o// sems dge ba ni kun dge bas// byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes gtso// byang chub snying po ma mchis par// tshogs gnyis dge bas sgrib pa sbyang// sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir// 'bras bu sa lam
yon tan thob// log lta skyes na sems bskyed nyams// stong la sems bskyed sgor zhugs na// byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa rnams// thob par nga yis legs par bstan// rang 'dod chags sdang ma spongs
na// 'khor ba 'di la mi 'phags ste// zhi bde tsam du gnas pas kyang// rang gzhan don gnyis mi 'grub pas// kun mkhyen yon tan rtogs pa yi// bde ba chen po 'thob pa la// kun la phan sems 'byongs
pa yi// mnyam pa nyid du 'char ba la// byang chub sems ni rab tu skyed// rang sems dge na gang byas dge// bsam pa bzang las sangs rgyas 'byung// sems bzangs po la bdud mi tshugs// rgya chen yangs
pa'i sems la slobs// dper na rgyal po'i bu skyes pa// chung yang 'bangs rnams zil gnon bzhin// byang chub sems ni skyed ma thag/ nyan rang theg dman zil gyis gnon// shing rta chen po'i srol bzhin
du// yod pa'i lam du mi 'gro ba'i// thabs dang shes rab chen po yis// bdag gzhan don gnyis mnyam du 'grub// byang chub sems gnyis dbyer med pa'i// lam 'di sems can kun gyi

don// byang chub spyod mchog bdag gis spyad// snang srid rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor la// dngos po'i mtshan ma grol 'dod pa'i// stong pa nyid kyi sgrib pa de// dag phyir rang rig ye shes su// dngos su rtogs phyir

rigs 'dzin gyi// sdom pa gnyis med ye shes yin// bla ma sangs rgyas mthong ba yi// gus pa gsum gyis rten byas nas// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig blang// byang chub sems gnyis sngon song ba'o// bla ma'i

mos gus dbang thob skye// thun mong spyi dang khyad par gyi// rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig rnams// rten lus rten byed sems gnyis po// dbyer med lhan skyes gtso bo yin// dus ni 'khor ba ma grol bar// rang
bzhin gnyis med don rtogs pa'i// 'bras bu rang grol de nyid ni// myur du thob pa thabs kyis khyad// rang snang log na 'khor ba dngos// rang bzhin shes na sangs rgyas kyi// yon tan ye shes de ru
'thob// rang gzhan gnyis kyi 'bras bu de// grangs med la sogs bstan pa rnams// dam pa'i don du ma yin te// kun rdzob 'gro la thugs brtse ba'i// rgyu mthun de dag bstan pa yis// byang chub lam la
'gyangs pa'i phyir// rang rig ye shes mngon sum du// thabs la mkhas pa'i rten 'brel gyis// myur du gtan la dbab pa'i don// rigs 'dzin nang gi sdom pa bstan// sa dgu rtse yis bskal pa'i
bar// bgrod pa'i lam de mkha' lding gis// yud tsam zhig gis bgrod pa bzhin// grangs med gsum gyi 'bras bu de// tshe 'di nyid la thob byed pa'i// 'bras bu can gyi ming nas 'bod// sems can thams

cad sems gcig ste// rtog pa sna tshogs tha dad kyang// kun rdzob tha dad nges 'byung ba// sdom pa gsum yang 'bras bu ni// don dam theg gcig 'bras bu de// bla na med pa'i don thob phyir// bu tsha gzhon nu
rgan po'i tshul// rim pa bzhin du yar ldan du// gong mas gong ma khyad 'phags shing// kun don yon tan gcig la rdzogs// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sdom pa'i mchog/ e baM rnam pa'i bde chen po// dbang gis

yang dag ye shes kyis// rdo rje 'dzin pa thob par 'gyur// theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa byang chub lam gyi rgyud chen nam mkha' dang mnyam pa las/ tshul khrims sdom pa'i dbye ba'i le'u ste lnga
pa'o//// tshul min las dang nyon mongs pa// rang khar spyod pa'i 'gro ba rnams// rnam par smin pa'i rang gzugs kyis// lus kyis so so'i las spyad pas// 'bras bu 'khor ba'i gnas ngan gyis// ngan
song sdug bsngal bsags pa las// 'on te lhag pa'i dad pa yis// sdig pa mi dge'i las spangs pas// sdom pa yis ni tshul khrims dang// dge ba chos sdud tshul khrims dang// sems can don
byed tshul khrims kyis// mi khom brgyad spangs dal ba yi// lha mi'i nang nas bde thob pas// bde gnas lus kyi gnas lugs de// ma nyams sems kyis bde ba thob// gnyis med byang chub sems kyi
bcud// tshul khrims bsrungs las byung ba'i phyir// lhag pa tshul khrims bslab par brjod// 'dod yon lnga la ma chags par// zhen log lhag pa'i bsam pa yis// so sor rtog min ting 'dzin gyis// bsam
gtan chag nas yon tan thob// 'khor ba'i chos la zhen log nas// so sor rtog pa'i 'gog pa yi// ting 'dzin nyan rang yon tan 'thob// bdag pas gzhan gces bsam pa yis// so sor rtog pa'i shes

rab kyis// rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin la// spyad pas byang chub yon tan thob// gnyis med ye shes rtog pa'i phyir// tshul khrims don la khyad 'phags pas// lhag pa ting nge 'dzin slob ces// shes rab chen po
gcig nyid kyis// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin ma rig pas// 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid mi rtag pa'i// 'khor ba'i 'bras bu sdug bsngal bar// kun rdzob shes pa'i shes rab dang// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin shes pa

yi// myang 'das rang bzhin rig pa de// myang 'das mtshan nyid 'gyur ba med// sku dang zhing khams bskyed rdzogs kyis// ting 'dzin yon tan mthar phyin pa'i// myang 'das 'bras bu bde ba de// gnyis med ye
shes tshul 'chang ba'i// shes bya'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// rnam par rtog med lhun grub tu// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing khams la// phyir mi ldog par shes rab ste// gzung 'dzin gnyis las grol ba'i
phyir// lhan cig skyes pa'i rig pa de// lhag pa shes rab bslab par mdzod// bslab gsum dbang du mdzad nas ni// lhag pa'i ye shes rol pa ston// theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa byang chub lam gyi
rgyud chen nam mkha' dang mnyam pa las/ lhag pa gsum gyi nges tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// byang chub sems kyi chos nyid de// ya tha rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'jigs tshogs srin du yan
chad la// til la mar gyis khyab pa bzhin// che chung med par khyab gyur kyang// ma rig 'khrul pas don ma rtogs// dmus long lta bu'i 'khor bar 'khyams// ma rig rang rkyen ngan rtog gis// kun nas nyon
mongs skyes pa na// de dang de yi snang bar bshad// de la zhen pas 'khor bar sdug/ dus gsum sems las 'dun pas na// de yi snang ba ngan song grub// dug gsum grol na ngan song grol// de phyir 'dun pa'i
rtse la gnas// rang sems bzang rtog phan sems kyis// phyi rol de yi snang bar 'char// nang du sems la bde ba 'byung// phyi nang gnyis med lhan cig la// legs pa'i tshogs la rten 'brel

bsgrig/ phun tshogs rang gis byas pa mchog/ sems dge ba de rtag tu bde// mi dge'i sdug bsngal mtha' med do// dper na rdo yi snying po de// gang phrad tshon gyis kha dog bsgyur// de bzhin kun gzhi'i rnam shes

'di// dang po gsar bu'i rtog pa de// bshes gnyen grogs ngan gnas ngan dang// bya byed spyod lam ngan pa yis// rams dang btsod kyi grogs bzhin du// de dang de yi snang bar 'gyur// rkyen rnams 'thun pa'i

rten 'brel gyis// sdug bsngal thams cad skyed par byed// phyin ci log tu 'gro bas spang// rdul med pa la dri ma bral// chu shel snying po rkyen bral bzhin// dper na me mar snying po yis// mun pa zil gyis
gnon pa bzhin// bzang po'i rkyen rnams 'dzom pa nas// ngan pa thams cad zil gnon cing// sdug bsngal thams cad bde bar 'char// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das su grol// ma dag dag pa'i sems nyid

'di// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa// khams gsum pa yi ngo bo nyid// bde dang bde bas khyab pa 'di// sems skyed pa ni rgya che bar// gzhan don rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu// 'khor ba myang 'das bde thob
phyir// byang chub sems skyed rab tu brjod// kun gzhi snam bu dkar po la// kha dog bzo tshos rkyen gyis bsgyur// chos rnams thams cad rkyen gyis bsgyur// chos rnams thams cad rkyen yin te// 'dun pa'i
stobs la rab tu gnas// gang gis smon lam ci btab pa// de 'dra'i 'bras bu 'byung ba'i phyir// 'gro rnams pha mar 'du shes na// snang ba de yi zhing du 'char// sems can lha ru 'du shes na// yongs grub

sems nyid chos sku la// gzhan dbang rkyen gyis de ltar bsgyur// kun rtags spros bral rang rig nyid// gang ltar byas pa de ltar bas// 'dun smon stong pa rgya ma chung// theg pa'i khyad par 'di yi phye// bdag don
sems can kun yang bsgrub// sdig pa nyan rang rnams kyang spong// dge ba lha mi'i gnas na byed// de yi 'khor bar nyam thag pa'i// rang gzhan ci byed grol ba min// kun grol don gnyis grub pa la// byang
chub sems ni rab tu skyed// bdag gis lus ngag yid gsum gyis// sdig spang dus gsum dge ba'i mthus// btang snyoms skad cig mi bsdad par// rmi lam du yang mi brjed pa'i// 'dun pa rtse gcig ma bral

bar// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i 'gro ba kun// pha ma bu yis mtshon byas kyang// phyogs ris med pa'i mnyam pa nyid// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po las// brtse ba'i snying rjes bsgral nas su// thar pa'i lam la
tshud pa yi// byams shing drang ba'i sems kyis su// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par bya// snyam du bdag gzhan dbyer med kyi// byang chub sems skyed smon lam btab// de yi smon lam mthar phyin

pas// 'bras bu rang gzhan don gnyis kyi// sku gsum dbyer med dus gcig 'byung// rang gzhan snga phyi bzang ngan can// dman pa'i sems skyed nyan rang rgyu// rgyal po sngon la chu sgrol bzhin// rang nyid sngon
la byang chub nas// sems can phyi la 'dren 'dod pa// byang chub sems ni 'khrul par 'gyur// lug rdzi kun gyis mjug sdud bzhin// sems can thams cad ma grol bar// bdag nyid 'khor ba gnas 'dod
pa// byang chub sems ni stobs med 'gyur// de bas mtha' gnyis bral ba yi// thams cad mkhyen pa'i smon lam gdab// bdag nyid ci 'dra de 'dra ba// sems can kun la phan par 'gyur// byang chub sems

skyed nam mkha' bzhin// rgyun chad med cing phyogs mtha' bral// byang chub smon pa'i sems skyed de// bu tsha'i dus kyi 'dun pa yang// mi chen gyur nas rdzogs pa bzhin// 'dun pa'i rtsol ba cher yod de// phal
pa rnams kyis 'grub pa la// byang chub sems dpa' smos ci dgos// gang la zhugs pa'i sngon rol du// byang chub sems ni rab bskyed cing// don de nyid la 'jug pa dang// rjes su sems kyis bsngos pa
na// stobs dang nus pa cher 'phel nas// gang la zhugs pa'i don kun la// mi nus mi shes mi 'grub pa// med par byang chub sems kyis 'grub// dus gsum sangs rgyas 'phrin las kun// 'jug pa nyid du
smin pas byung// byang chub sems la phyogs med pas// sangs rgyas nyid la mtha' med do// byang chub sems la dmigs med pas// gdul bya nyid la rigs med do// byang chub sems la dus med pas// don
gcig nyid la 'gyur med do// byang chub sems la 'dzad med pas// 'phrin las nyid la thogs med do// byang chub sems la gnyis med pas// bdud kyis brdzi bar mi nus so// smon pa yid bzhin 'jug pa
la// lag len med pa'i sems bskyed ni// lag na yod kyang mi phan pa// dbul mo'i gter bzhin don mi 'byung// nus pa yod bzhin rang don sgrub// gzhan don mi byed dud 'gror skye// longs spyod yid
bzhin tshogs mi sogs// ser snas bcings pas yi dwags skye// chos rgyus yod bzhin chos mi spyod// phyin ci log pas dmyal bar skye// byang chub sems bral bde ba med// de bas byang chub 'jug pa
gtso// 'jug pa'i 'bras bu rgyun chags la// smon pa bzang yang gnas skabs tsam// blo gros dman pa'i le lo can// thun mong skyabs 'gro nas bzung nas// sngags kyi de nyid man chad kyi// sa bcu'i mthar
phyin lam rnams la// blo dang 'tsham pa'i nus pa yi// bsam pa'i khyad par ji bzhin du// sems can kun gyi skyabs khas blang// slo dpon che la sems skyed blang// thams cad mkhyen nyid dbang

por bzhugs// 'di nas bar med phyi ma'i mthar// smon lam gdab cing las 'phro 'thud// gzhan gyis bar du ma chod pa'i// skas kyi gdang bu lta bu ru// rim pa nyid la 'jug par bya// bla na med pa'i byang chub

de// myur du rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// dper na rgyal rigs bu tsha ni// dbang bskur thag tu rgyal 'gyur bzhin// byang chub lam rnams skad cig gis// shes rab chen po cig car du// 'jug pa thun mong ma yin
pa// bla na med pa'i rgyun du gsungs// ring bar 'dod lam ring rtags 'byung// thung bar 'dod lam de don rdzogs// 'jug pa rang nyid spyod pa dang// gzhan la ston cing 'khod pa ni// gnas skabs lam gyi
'jug pa yin// mthar thug sku gnyis don gnyis 'grub// gnyis su med pa byang chub sems// kun la khyab pa chos kyi sku// nyag gcig spros bral 'dus ma byas// thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan mtsho// byang

chub sems la rang byung ba// lhun grub mi rtog rtog pa can// byang chub lam la gang zhugs pas// dad dang thos dang tshul khrims dang// khrel yod ngo tsha shes pa dang// stong dang shes rab rnam pa bdun// 'di dag
'phags pa'i nor bdun te// mi 'dzad gter du spyi la dgos// snod ma yin la de mi 'byung// byang chub sems kyi yon tan gang// sdig sgrib bdud dpung thams cad 'joms// tshogs gnyis dge ba zla ltar
'phel// bum pa bzang po dpag bsam shing// 'dod 'jo'i ba dang rin chen bzhin// rang bzhin kun gyi don grub pas// gzugs mchis nam mkha'i mthar mi shog/ rjes su dran cing rgya chen spel// spel ba'i
tshogs gnyis sogs pa de// bsod nams zang zing mtshan bcas kyi// dge ba zag bcas la brten pa// rang gzhan don gnyis bsgrub pa'o// ye shes mtshan med dmigs med kyis// zag med dge la brten

nas su// rang gzhan don du tshogs sog pa// thun mong pha rol phyin pa dang// spyi dang mthun pa'i sbyin sogs kyi// zhing bsam dngos gsum dag pa yi// dge ba 'khor gsum yongs dag tu// sngo bar byed pa'i
tshogs rnams so// thun mong ma yin khyad par ba// sngags kyi smin byed sgor zhugs nas// bskyed rim bsgom pa bsod nams tshogs// rdzogs rim don ni ye shes tshogs// tshogs gnyis spel bas sgrib gnyis
byang// byang chub rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don// gzhan yang smon pa'i dus nyid du// rang nyid dman pas zhum pa dang// sems can mangs pas dka' ba dang// dmu rgod rnams ni 'dul dka' dang// phan lan
gnod byed rigs rnams la// srog la bab kyang blos mi gtang// sems can gcig gi bde nyams kyang// rang gi byang chub sems nyams ni// mang po blos btang nyes pa ni// bskal pa'i mthar

yang dag mi 'gyur// slar zhing byang chub nan tan skyed// mchod par 'os pa bslus pa dang// dge la 'gyod pa skyes pa dang// sems can g.yo sgyus brid pa dang// sems bskyed pa dang smad pa dang// tshul ma
yin pa spang bar bya// mchod 'os rnams la bsnyen bskur bstod// sems can thabs kyis dge la bkod// theg mchog dge la yi rang bya// sems bskyed pa la bsngags pa brjod// mi dge spong zhing dge ba

la// phra zhib rdul gyi cha nas spyad// ma dad pa yi chos nyan dang// ma gus pa yi phyag 'tshal dang// mi spro ba yi mchod pa dang// mi mos pa yi bstod pa dang// dge ba nyes pa can yin yang// ma nus pa la nyes pa

med// yang dag lam la gang zhugs pa// spyod pa pha rol phyin mchog nyid// sbyin pa'i ngo bo chags med dge// mtshan nyid yongs su gtong ba ste// dbye ba zang zing mi 'jigs chos/ khyad par chos kyi sbyin pa

'phags// mi mthun sar sna rnam par spangs// tshul khrims ngo bo dri med dge// mtshan nyid g.yo sgyu med pa de// dbye ba tshul khrims rnam gsum la// sdom pa dge ba don byed do/ khyad par zag med tshul khrims
mchog/ mi mthun phyogs su bag med yang// bzod pa'i ngo bo sdang med dge// mtshan nyid 'khrul pa med par bstan// dbye ba sdug bsngal dang du len// ji mi mnyam zhing chos la sems// theg chen mi skrag

bzod pa 'phags// mi mthun khong khro spang bar bya// brtson 'grus dge la spro ba la// mtshan nyid le lo med pa ste// dbye ba cha sbyin mthar phyin pa'i// lam mchog chos la brtson pa 'phags// mi mthun snyom las
rnam par spang// bsam gtan ngo bo dge la gnas// mtshan nyid g.yeng ba'i rtog tshogs bral// bde gnas don rab 'byed pa dang// de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'o// zung 'jug rnam par mi rtog bzang// mi
mthun rtog pas g.yeng ba spang// shes rab ngo bo bdag med rtogs// mtshan nyid don rnams rab 'byed pa// dbye ba kun rdzogs don dam shes// zung 'jug thos bsam sgom pa gsum// thabs la mkhas pas
bla na med// thabs kyi nang na smin grol mchog/ mi mthun phyogs su lhung ba yin// stobs kyi ngo bo spang bya 'joms// mtshan nyid spangs thob yon tan 'dzin// spongs dang thob pa yon tan te// zag med

bde thob khyad du 'phags// dman pa'i blo ni mi mthun phyogs// smon lam don ldan dge ba'o// mtshan nyid dge ba chud mi za// dag dang ma dag the tshom gsum// dag pa'i smon la mchog tu bzang// phyin ci log
pa mi mthun don// ye shes ngo bo thams cad mkhyen// mtshan nyid gang yang ma bsgrib pa'o// dbye na gzhi yi ye shes dang// cha mthun lam gyi ye shes dang// yon tan rab rdzogs ye shes
dang// thams cad mkhyen pa khyad par 'phags// mi mthun sgrib pa gnyis yin no// bdag nyid spyod cing gzhan la sbyor// spyod pa kun la legs pa brjod// nyams su blangs pa'i don che ni// tshogs gnyis
rdzogs pa'i bya ba ru// pha rol phyin bcu'i grangs bstan pa// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson bzhi// bsod nams tshogs rdzogs bya bar dgos// bsam gtan shes rab ye shes tshogs// thabs stobs smon

lam ye shes bzhi// theg chen 'jug pa'i khyad la dgos// gzhan drug theg pa chung la yod// thun mong pha rol phyin drug yin// pha rol phyin pa bcu yis su// go rim nges par ma nor bas// sa bcu rdzogs pa'i

yon tan thob// thabs mkhas nang gis phar phyin bcu// lus la ma zhen sbyin pa'i mchog/ ti la ma nyams tshul khrims te// sdug bsngal mi brdzi bzod pa mchog/ yengs pa med pa brtson 'grus la// g.yo ba med
pa bsam gtan gnas// 'khrul pa med pa'i shes rab kyis// bde ba chen po thabs kyi mchog/ thabs chen pha rol gnyis med stobs// smon lam dbyer med lhan cig skyes// rab byung ye shes 'od po che// srid
pa'i mun pa ma lus bsal// dpal ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas so// rgyal ba'i thugs rje'i gzugs sku ni// skye ba med pa'i yig 'bru mchog/ a yi dbyings nas rang byung ba// ka sogs nam mkha'i yi ge
dang// tsa la sogs pa rlung gi sgra// ta sogs me la sa sogs chu// la sogs sa yi rang sgra las/ khams drug yi ge'i gzugs su ni// sems kyi ri mo bris pa yis// tshig dang don dang glegs bam du// 'gro ba

kun gyi don phyir du// rgyal ba'i pha rol phyin bcu tshogs// yi ge 'bri dang mchog sbyin dang// 'chang dang klog dang kha ton bya// don sems 'chad ci yid la bya// tshul bzhin du ni bsgom pa bcu// bdag gzhan

'di phyi'i don grub bar// byang chub lam gyi spyod pa mchog/ shes rab rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs// chos spyod bcu la gang brtson pa// lha dang 'khor lo sgyur ba dang// mi yi gnas nas byang chub thob// log pas
ngan song dbul por 'gyur// sgyur byed bsam pa gtso che'o// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas chen po// gzhan don 'phongs pa sbyin pas bsdu// snyan par smra ba'i thabs kyis bsdu// rigs par mthun pa'i spyod
pas bsdu// 'dod pa grub pa'i don gyis bsdu// sems can rnams kyi bsam pa bzhin// ji ltar 'dod mthun spyod pa yi// byang chub sems la rab tu dgod// byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa rnams// pha rol
phyin pa bcu yi tshul// bslab pa gsum du 'dus par ni// rgyal bas chos kun nang du bstan// lhag pa tshul khrims bslab pa rnams// zag bcas lha mi'i tshul khrims la// zag med bde ba'i don

mthong bas// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims yin// lhag pa ting 'dzin bslab pa kun// zhi gnas ting 'dzin rtse gcig pa// 'khor ba ma dag ting 'dzin la// lhag mthong ye shes rtog pa ni// mya ngan 'das
pa'i ting 'dzin yin// lhag pa shes rab bslab pa kun// rgyu 'bras rten 'brel shes pa 'byung// kun rdzob 'khor ba'i shes rab la// rang bzhin gnas lugs shes pa ni// chos kun khong du chud pa yi// shes

rab ye shes chen po yin// ye shes ye shes khyad par che// ye shes ldan pas kun don shes// kun don yon tan gsum gyi bdag/ mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang// 'gro ba'i mar me ye shes sgron// byang
chub sems la phyag 'tshal bstod// bde dang sdug bsngal las skyes pa'i// kun rdzob lus la bde bas khyab// bde ba nyid ni sdug bsngal bas// bde ba ma nyams tshul khrims mchog/ nyams pas sdug bsngal
skyed pa'i gzhi// byang chub sems spangs yon tan bskams// bde chen 'khor lo'i thabs kyis ni// bde ba las ni bde ba skye// kun rdzob kun da lta bu ste// don dam bde ba'i gzugs can du// snang srid kun
la khyab pa yi// byang chub sems ni rab tu skyed// thams cad ro snyoms lhan cig skyes// rnam par mi rtog yang dag don// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// chos dbyings dam pa'i byang chub sems// spros
bral thig le nyag gcig dbyings// theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa byang chub lam gyi rgyud chen nam mkha' dang mnyam pa las// byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi mthus 'bras bu 'grub par bstan pa'i
le'u ste bdun pa'o//// gnas lugs chos nyid cig gis ngang// ma rig kun rtogs rig pa 'di// tha dad snang ba so sor spyod// skye bo rnams ni rang kha ma// phyi rol pa rnams log par rtogs// nang pa
phyogs rtogs yang dag rtogs// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i don gcig la// dbang po'i rim pas so sor go/ theg pa'i khyad par 'bras bu dang// dus ni lta spyod khyad par yin// khams gsum gnas na 'dod pa
yi// lha mir bcas pa'i theg pa 'di// ma rtogs 'jig rten 'dus byas la// rdzun par ma shes bde 'bras 'dod// tshe 'dir zhen pa'i lta ba la// 'khrul pa'i snang ba yengs med bsgom// spyod pa dge sdig lung

ma bstan// 'bras bu 'di dang phyi ma ru// bde 'gro ngan song 'khor ba yi// sna tshogs nges med sdug bsngal grub// blo ma log na thar mi 'gyur// nam zhig blo bsgyur da 'bras 'byung// sems can mkha' las
grol 'dod phyir// phyin ci log gi lam la zhugs// bdag tu 'dzin pa'i phung po lnga// 'di phyi bar do thams cad du// gcig pu nyid kyis byas pa yin// thams cad rtag pa nyid du 'dod// mi rtag

'byung ba bzhi po yin// rtag pa'i skyes bu mkha' la sdod// 'jig rten 'di nas pha rol du// phung po nyid mtshams sbyor ba 'khrul// rtag pa'i skyes bu dkar la 'dril// sems can kun gyi snying dkyil na// bungs
dang sbyar ba'i re re yod// de yis thams cad byed pa yin// rtag pa chen po gcig nyid la// dper na nam mkha' gcig nyid la// snod mangs nang du dum bur chad// de bzhin sems can ngar 'dzin

gyis// rtags pa dum bur mi rtag chad// ngar 'dzin spangs na gcig tu 'gro// bdag nyid rtag pa'i grangs can 'dod// chad par lta bar rgyang 'phen pa// tshe la snga dang phyi ma med// da lta blo bur byung ba
yin// dge sdig las dang rnam smin med// sems can sangs rgyas bde sdug med// me shi thal ba rlung khyer bzhin// shi nas ci yang med par lta// gnyis mthun spyad dang dbang phyug bsgom// mchod legs
sems can bde legs 'byung// ma legs sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'dod// gcer bu thal bas lus byugs shing// ral pa'i khur bu 'phreng bas brgyan// mdung thung mi mgo'i lag cha thogs// spyod pa dbyug gu
gsum pa dang// dud 'gro ma yi dka' thub spyod// 'bras bu 'di nas 'phos ma thag/ rnam smin rgyu 'bras mi 'dod pas// chad lta mnar med dmyal bar skye// gzhan yang ngan song gnas su lhung// blo log thar
pa thob bam ci// 'khor ba 'di las blo log nas// dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos nyan pas// nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa yi// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// gang zag bdag

tu 'dzin pa de// bdag med tsam zhig ma rtogs pa// chos kyis bdag med ma rtogs pas// phyi rol gzung ba'i yul la ni// rags pa rdzas ni dngos po 'dod// phra ba rdul phran si lu ma// rdul rnams bskor ba'i

bar bar na// cha med rdul rnams shong bar 'dod// mdo sde pa yi lta ba de// bye brag smra ba phra rag rdul// rdul phran cha med gcig tu 'dod// gnyis ka 'dzin sems de mi spong// skad cig cha med phag na

mo// bden pa bzhi la 'khor 'das gnyis// rgyu 'bras spang sgrub byed pa yi// shes pa skad cig mi rtag par// rgyun bcas 'gog pa'i ting 'dzin bsgom// spyod pa rang don tshul khrims bsrung// gzhan gyi don ni

mi nus shing// dur khrod dgon pa shing drung dang// bla gab med par ji bzhin gnas// phyag dar khrod dang phyis pa// chos gos gsum pa'i gos gyon zhing// stan gcig bsod snyoms thar chags pa'i// phyis mi
len pa'i zas spyod cing// cog pu'i spyod pa la sogs pa// sbyangs pa'i yon tan brtan pa yi// rgyun du zhugs nas dgra bcom par// brtson 'grus rab kyis tshe gcig 'grub// 'bring gis lan

cig phyir 'ong ba// lus gcig blangs nas phyi ma ni// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang// tha mas skye ba gsum blangs nas// dgra bcom pa yi 'bras bu thob// rang rgyal bskal pa mang po nas// sdug bsngal chos
la blo log kyang// byang chub sems dpa'i g.yeng bas 'jig/ rang lus ting 'dzin mes sbyangs nas// sangs rgyas mi 'byon sa phyogs su// smon lam btab nas skyes pa yis// slob dpon med par dur khrod
du// shi ba rus la brtag pa yis// 'khor ba rten 'brel lus la byung// shes na lugs bzlog ma rig pa// bkag nas bsgom pa tshe sngon gyi// ting 'dzin ldan pa rang sangs rgyas// gang zag bdag med cher
rtogs steng// gzung yul sems kyi cho 'phrul du// shes kyang sems su ma rig pas// chos kyis bdag med phyed rtogs te// gzung yul bcom pa'i 'dzin sems ni// thun mong phag na tsam du 'dod// don dam

stong pa nyid du ni// 'gog pa'i ting 'dzin bsgoms pa yis// bsgom par mi sad myos pa 'byung// spyod pa nyan thos rnams dang mthun// mang po ne tso'i khyu tsam lding// rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ni// rab kyis

mi tshe nyi shu dang// 'bring gis drug cu tham pa ni// bse ru lta bur rang sangs rgyas// 'gro don lus kyis rta yin byed// zhi bde chos la blo log pa// rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sems tsam ni// phyogs med bdag med
sems rtogs pas/ khams gsum 'di dag sems su shes// rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad po// rang rig rang gsal nyid du ni// mtshan nyid gsum du 'dus pa ste// chos kun spyi dang bye brag tu// sna tshogs
ming btags mtshan mar ltar// tha snyad 'dogs pa kun rtags zhes// ma rig 'du byed rkyen gyis skyes// rang bzhin skye med gzhan dbang ste// de rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// dbyer med ci yang 'grub
med don// yongs grub ces su bshad pa la// phyi rol snang ba dkar dmar rnams// rnam pa sgyu ma tsam du ni// rnam bden so sor bden par 'dod// don dam shes pa'i yul las 'das// de yang dri bcas dri

med pa// sems la ma dag dag par 'dod// rnam rdzun snang ba dkar dmar kun// phyi rol rdzun la nang du rdzun// dngos med 'khrul pa'i snang ba la// sna tshogs du mar snang ba yang// yang dag bde shes gcig
las med// dper na chu nang zla ba bzhin// gcig las cho 'phrul sna tshogs pa// gsal byed gzhan las ma bltos par// mtshan nyid gsum ga rang la tshang// bsgom pa byang chub sems nyid la// spyod pa gzhan
don mi dge spongs// pha rol phyin pa bcu la spyod// 'bras bu rang rig rang gsal du// gzhan las ma byung byang chub 'dod// sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos gsungs gang// bden pa gnyis la yang

dag brten// chos can kun rdzob bden pa dang// chos nyid don dam bden pa la// mtha' bral gshis kyis dbu ma 'o// kun rdzob yang dag sangs rgyas de// ma rtogs sgrib phyir kun rdzob ste// thog ma bar dang
mthar bsgrangs pa'i// 'khrul pa'i snang ngor bden pa la// yang dag log pa'i kun rdzob gnyis// kun rdzob rten 'brel chos rnams kun// rgyu 'bras mi bslu thad kar bden// mthun par snang zhing don byed
nus// rang bzhin brtags na bden pa de// rang gi sems su shes pa yi// bden rdzun grol ba yang dag yin// sgyu ma smig sgyu chu zla la// rdzun la bden par gzung ba yis// bslus pa log pa'i kun rdzob
ste// 'khor bar de yis 'ching bar 'gyur// thog mtha' 'gro 'ong med pa yang// chos rnams kun gyi chos nyid don// dam pa'i rang bzhin 'gyur med de// bslus pa med pa yang dag pa// don dam pa yi bden

pa zhes// rnam grangs stong nyid du ma rnams// rang bzhin dag pa'i chos nyid kyi// bye brag phye ba'i bden pa yin// rnam grangs ma yin spros dang bral// dus gsum 'gyur med mnyam nyid yin// de rnams rang rgyud
'dod pa la// snang ba kun rdzob tsam du ni// sgyu ma tsam gyis bden par 'dod// don dam du ni snang ba 'di// sgyu ma tsam yang med pa yi// nam mkha' lta bur mi dmigs kyis// 'bras bu de bzhin nyid thob
'dod// 'thab bral gshis kyi dbu ma ni// yod dang med pa'i mtha' bral zhing// mtha' gnyis mi gnyis mnyam nyid 'dod// phyi ma'i dus na 'di nyid la// gcig dang bral ba la sogs pa'i// rang gis kha ni

mi ches shing// gzhan gzhan grub mtha' sun 'byin pa'i// thal 'gyur ba yi dbu ma ni/ khas len bral ba'i lta ba 'byung// stong nyid snying rje'i bsgom lo can// spyod pa pha rol phyin sogs la// 'bras bu myur na

grangs med gsum// zhen pa'i chos la dus med do// sngon bsgyur dbang thob sngon byung du// sa bcu'i lam la rab gnas pa// thub pa chen pos zab pa'i gzung// dngos dang stong pa'i zhen pa las// ldog phyir
rig pa 'dzin pa ni// bdag med chos rnams thams cad kun// kun rdzob bdag med dam tshig la// bran bzhin dmigs pa'i 'og min nas// ye shes sems dpa' rgyal ba'i tshul// bris shing yid kyis

dmigs pa la// spyan drangs dbang bskur bzhugs gsol zhu// de la gtsang ma'i mchod pa phul// dngos grub de yis thob pa ni// kri ya ba yi lta ba'i yin// sgom pa don gyi lha drug la// spyod pa khrus dang gtsang
sbra byed// 'bras bu mi tshe bdun tsam na// rigs gsum go 'phang thob par 'dod// yo ga dam tshig sems dpa' ni// rang lus bsgom pa g.yog por lta// ye shes sems dpa' dpon gyi

tshul// spyan drangs rang la bstim nas su// sngags dang phyag rgya bsgrub byas pas// phyag rgya ma bkrol bar du ni// ye shes sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// rang nyid de bzhin gnas 'gyur lta// byang chub lnga yi lha

bsgom zhing// mchod yon sngags dang phyag rgya yis// spyod pas tshogs rdzogs dngos grub len// 'bras bu rnam snang go 'phang ni// mi tshe gsum gyis thob par 'dod// u pa lta ba yo ga la// spyod pa kri ya dag

dang mtshungs// 'bras bu rigs lnga'i go 'phang ni// mi tshe skye ba lnga yis thob// kun brtags phyi nas re ba'i phyir// sngags ni phyi pa zhes su brjod// snang srid chos kun bskyed pa yi// rig pa rang gsal rdo rje
'di// dngos 'dzin thabs kyis dgrol ba'i phyir// kun rdzob lta ba'i sku ru bskyed// dngos med stong pa dag pa'i don// lha kun don dam spros med bdag/ shes rab rig pas rtogs pa yis// snang ba lha yi

dkyil 'khor du// thabs dang shes rab sgom pa ni// ma hA yo ga'i lta ba la// dam tshig ye shes gnyis med du// sgom pa lha dang ma bral ba// dkyil 'khor chen por mchod pa la// spyod pa 'phrin las rnam bzhi

bsgrub// 'bras bu skye ba gcig la ni// mi skye'i chos la spyod pa yid// rdo rje dbyings kyi yon tan thob// thabs mang dka' med bslabs pa ste// dngos dang dngos med thams cad kun// skye med dbyings kyi

dkyil 'khor na// rig pa rang 'byung 'od gsal la// lha sku ma bskyed rdzogs pa yi// dran pa tsam gyis snang ba 'di// sku dang ye shes zhing du gsal// dbyings dang rig pa gnyis su med// stong pa de nyid 'bras

bu yin// bsgom pa'i ting 'dzin rnam gsum las// bsnyen bsgrub rnam bzhi sgor zhugs na// spyod pa ta na g+ha na yis// tshe 'di nyid la mchod thob pa// a nu yo ga'i rnal 'byor yin// ye nas snang srid snod

bcud kun// ma skyes rang byung chos nyid mkha'// kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin la// sangs rgyas chos kun ma lus rdzogs// lhun grub 'gyur med rdo rje gdan// don gyi dam pa rnam dag dpal// yang dag rdzogs
pa der sangs rgyas// sprul pa po rnams 'dir sangs rgyas// rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang// thams cad gcig gyur nan tan nyid// rdzogs pa chos nyid dag pa ste// bsam brjod bral ba'i ye shes
la// 'bras bu gdod nas lhun gyis grub// mi rtag chos rnams rtag par zad// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che// don gnyis ldan la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'khor ba 'di
nas thar pa'i don// sangs rgyas chos kun mnyam nyid las// dmus long g.yang la bskyur ba bzhin// phyin ci log tu khrid pa rnams// log pa'i steng du yang log bsnan// log lta sde drug rjes
'brang ba// las kyi sgrib pa 'thug po bsags// mi shes long ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyis// bskal par mun pa'i gnas su 'khyams// sangs rgyas che ba'i don 'dod phyir// 'ga' zhig 'khor ba'i mthar mi
gnas// 'phags pa ma yin de ltar min// bdag bstod gzhan la smod pa yin// phyin ci log ste sems dpa' yang// spangs pas thob pa'i yon tan te// thabs la mkhas pa'i skyes bu yin// dman dang byis
pas de mi shes// ma shes gzung 'dzin mtha' la zhen// 'khor ba 'di nas thar par dka'// de bzhin nyid rtogs kun 'dod kyang// ma rtogs 'bras bu so sor thob// theg pa'i mtha' la thug med pas// theg

chen lam la ma zhugs na// nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa yang// blo dman so so'i skye bo rnams// lam la drang ba'i thabs tsam la// yang dag lam gyi gegs yin te// 'gog pas myong ba'i ting 'dzin gyi// bskal
pa'i bar du lam la bsgribs// phal cher mu mtha' med par sgrim// dmyal ba gtan gyi gegs ma yin// nyan thos theg pa gtan gyi gegs// 'ga' zhig rang gnas byang chub de// sangs rgyas byin rlabs 'od
kyis bskul// theg chen chos la 'jug srid kyang// dper na chu rgal lan cig la// rje bcangs gnyis su mi byed bzhin// byang chub sems gnyis lam la ni// da lta sngon du 'jug par bya// phyi ma'i yid smon
lag rdum mda'/ kha tsam tshig las don la dka'// de bas da lta don 'di bsgrubs// las kyis 'phro 'thud so nam bzhin// 'bras bu dus gsum smin par 'gyur// gol 'chug med pa'i lam chen la// gsang
sngags pha rol phyin pa gnyis// bsgrub bya'i don du gcig pa na// gnyis su bstan pa don ci yod// mi gcig so sor song ba ni// gcig la dgos pa med par 'gyur// de don gcig par mgon por
gsungs// don chen lhun du 'grub 'dod par// 'ga' zhig lam rtags sos dal bar// thag rings lam la bskor nas 'gro// 'ga' zhig myur du bsleb 'dod pas// nye ba'i gsang lam gcad nas 'gro// de
gnyis lam gyi khyad las su// bsleb dus don 'go gcig pa bzhin// rim gyis cig car don yang de'o// mos pa'i 'dun pa so so yin// lam gyis mi mthun khyad par che// phar phyin dang po'i tshogs lam
nas// sems can don du sems bskyed nas// sbyor lam drod rtse bzod pa dang// chos mchog nas ni mthong lam bar// grangs med gcig gis lam sbyangs pas// mthong lam slob pa'i zung 'jug gis// chos
nyid bden pa'i don mthong bas// rab tu dga' ba'i sa non te// yon tan brgya phrag bcu gnyis 'char// de nas sgom lam sa brgyad par// gong nas gong du 'phel ba yi// grangs med gcig la
mi slob pa'i// sgom lam yon tan phyir mi ldog/ grangs med gcig tu bsgoms pa las// yon tan bcu 'gyur rim pas 'phel// sa bcu mthar phyin yon tan rdzogs// mi 'gyur rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du// bcu
gcig kun tu 'od chen po// bla ma sngags kyi lam du ni// slob ma yongs su smin byed pa'i// slob ma rang rig bdag nyid che// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kun lhags nas// rang rig ye shes mngon sum du// sa
