bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' la// ston pa yongs su grol byed pa'i// dbang bskur dgos pas gsang sngags mchog/ de med sangs rgyas mi 'gyur bar// mkhyen pa'i ye shes dbang bskur ni// de ltar sa yi yon

tan brtags// tshon rtsi ri mo sna tshogs pa// ri mo mkhan gyis byas pa las// gzhan nas 'byung ba ma yin bzhin// rang gi sems kyis byas pa yis// ting nge 'dzin gyi rang snang la// gzhan gyi snang bar 'byung ba
dka'// byung yang dper na rmi lam du// ngo mtshar can gyi mchod rten la// mas gyis rim pas 'dzegs pa yis// gdugs kyi steng du bslebs tsa na// gnyid sad bden med 'gyur ba bzhin// gnas skabs
lam gyi rtags tsam yin// mthar thug don la yod med 'dra// lam der sngags kyis ma zhugs pas// de yi ting 'dzin ma sbyangs don// sa bcu'i rtags rnams ma byung yang// lam gyi bgrod pa khyad par
med// byung yang sngags kyi lam stegs tsam// rim skyed pa yi chos lugs yin// sngags kyi lam ni bla ma la// brten cing mos pa tshogs kyi lam// bka' bzhin bsgrub pas byin rlabs zhugs// nyams len shes

pa sbyor ba lam// snang srid spros bral lha yi sku// bskyed rim bsgom pa mthong ba'i lam// ba spu gcig gi steng du yang// lha sku 'bum phrag bskyed nus pa// yon tan brgya phrag mang po'i mchog/ rang gi sems kyi

rnam 'phrul yin// pha rol phyin la de med de// sngags kyi lam la 'byung ba yin// rdzogs rim shes pa bsgom pa lam// dbang rdzogs mthar thug phyag rgya che// tshe gcig 'di la mngon sum du// cig car rtogs
pa sngags kyi lam// don gcig lam la mi mthun pa// shel sgong dag pa gzhi ma yin/ kha dog gang bstan der 'gyur yang// shel gyi don la 'gyur med bzhin// gnas skabs lam snang mi mthun
yang// mthar thug gdod nas ma skyes pa// chos dbyings ye shes snying po ni// lhun grub don du dbyer med gcig/ theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas// gsang sngags bla na med pa'i chos// sangs rgyas thog
ma tha ma med// dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa// ye shes mig gcig dri ma med// mkhyen pa'i ye shes zhing khams mthong// ma btsal lhun grub e ma ho// theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa byang

chub lam gyi rgyud chen po nam mkha' dang mnyam pa las// 'jug pa'i lam theg pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// byang chub sems kyi chos nyid de// lus kyi tshul gyis rnam par dag/ lus ni

rtsa yi dra bas te// gzugs dang kha dog rnam pa can// rtsa skyed lus kyang bskyed par byed// rtsa gud lus kyang nyams par byed// rtsa la rlung skyed 'phro 'du dang// dran pa g.yo zhing ldeg par byed// rlung las khams

skyed bde sdug dang// rtag dang mi rtag de yis byas// don dam kun rdzob gzugs can gyi// byang chub sems ni skyed par byed// nor bu bai DUr kha dog de// dkar ser khra bo la sogs pa// shun pa'i rkyen gyis

bsgyur ba bzhin// byang chub sems kyi chos nyid de// rigs drug so so'i lus kyis su// de dang de yi snang bar 'gyur// byang chub sems ni gcig nyid la// 'gro ba so so las la spyod// khyad par rdo rje'i lus
'di la// lus bde bas ni sems kyang bde// lus sdug pa la sems sdug cing// mo yi lus la sems kyang mo// de bzhin pho dang ma ning dang// rgan dang gzhon dang dar ma dang// spyod lam legs nyes lus

kyis bsgyur// lus kyi rnam pa 'gyur tsam na// sems ni de yi snang bar 'gyur// mi yi lus la brten nas su// dge sdig dam chos las spyod pas// 'di phyi gnyis kyi bde sdug dang// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa
'byung// mthar phyin pa yi 'bras bu yang// gnas skabs lus kyi byed pas bsgyur// lus kyang sems las byung ba ste// ngan 'gro'i gnas na bde med 'gyur// lus gnas lus kyi byed pa'o// lus ni me ltar
rkyen kha la/ kha zas sman dang 'dra bar rigs// chags sdang sdig dang 'dres pa yi// rgyags dang sred 'phongs phyi ma legs// lus ma gru yi blo bzhag ma// bcud len gyis ni lus bzungs bskyed// 'tshol
ba'i thabs kyis srog bstan pa'i// dbang po gsal phyir lus rtsa dgos// nyes pa'i rtsa ba khyim pa'i las// lus kyis bag med spyod pa dang// de yi ngag gi 'brel med gtam// don med yid kyi bsam mno

yi// sgo gsum spyod pa rab tu gdam// bag chags dri mas ma gos pa// 'dam skyes me tog lta bu'o// bag med spyod pa'i tshul spangs shing// gnas grogs gos dang spyod pa yi// bzang po'i rkyen gyis lus bsgyur
zhing// spyod lam rnam bzhi mdzes pa dang// ngag nas chos kyi gtam brjod pas// yid la de nyid ma yengs 'char// lha ltar bskur ba'i yon tan de// tsan dan dri'am tshos bzhin du// bag chags goms pa
lus spyod kyis// sems kyi snang ba de bzhin bstan// bu chu rigs bye lta bu'o// lus kyi spyod pa sems bskyed pa// phyi yi phyag 'tshal skor ba bsogs// sems kyi sgrib pa 'dag par byed// nang du
mnyam pa gsum gcun pas// sems kyi rtog pa dbang du sdud// gsang ba lus la bde spar ba// sems la rtogs pa'i ye shes 'char// thams cad lus gnas 'ba' zhig ste// don dam sems kyi bde ba
de// lus la brten pa rtogs pa'i phyir// don dam kun rdzob gzugs can brjod// byang chub sems ni lus la gnas// lus gnas lus las ma skyes pas// sems ni so dang rus pa min// de bzhin rtsa dang chu

rgyus dang// pags pa sha dang nang khrol dang// khrag dang chu ser zhag dang tshil// snabs dang ngar snabs dri ma gcin// klad pa skra dang ba spu dang// gzugs dang kha dog sems min pas// lus ni sems min
gsob dang zog/ chang khu ston pa'i sbang ma bzhin// mi rtag 'jig pas sems min pa// lus ni kun rdzob gzhan snang tsam// rang snang sems la lus ma mchis// mdangs sum rmis pa'i rmi lam bzhin// lus ni
gar yang ma dmigs so// lus de sems kyi rang lus de// gal te lus de sems min na// sems de lus kyi phyir gnas sam// gnas na phyi nang phyogs rigs gang// yang dag par ni ma mthong na// sems de
lus kyi nang gnas sam// che chung ring thung dbyibs ni gang// der ni yang dag ma mthong na// sems de phyi nang gang na gnas// gang du yang ni ma mthong na// gnyis ka med par mi dmigs pas// dper na
sgra dang pi wang bzhin// lus las logs na sems med de// sems dang lus gnyis zung 'jug yin// shi ba'i ro la sems ma mchis// sems la shi ba'i ro ma mchis// skye shi sems kyi 'phel 'grib
yin// sems las byung ba'i rnam shes drug/ mig dang rna ba sna lce lus// yid gzugs sgra dri ro reg chos// gnyis su ma yin gnyis su med// so so ma yin tha mi dad// dbyer med don la lhan cig
skyes// gcig pu dran pas kun dran zhing// gcig pu 'gags pas kun 'gags pas// skye 'gag gnyis med gcig pa nyid// de bzhin nyid du ngas bstan to// de bzhin nyid kyi sems nyid de// gcig dang mi
gcig spros dang bral// dngos po ma yin mtshan ma med// stong pa ma yin cir yang gsal// 'gag pa ma yin rgyun du yod// skyes pa ma yin 'phel ba med// gang du mi gnas mnyam pa nyid// don dam pa yi byang
chub sems// nam mkha' bzhin du kun la khyab// brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po kun// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa kun// kun byed rgyal po sems yin no// sems kyi rang bzhin byang chub sems// mi
'gyur g.yung drung chos kyi sku// ma g.yos par ni kun ston pa// thog ma'i ston pa'i bcom ldan 'das// kun gyi yab mes khyed la bstod// theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa byang chub lam gyi
rgyud chen nam mkha' dang mnyam pa las// don dam byang chub kyi gnas lugs lus sems kyi brda la brten pa bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// tha mal gnas pa'i 'gro ba rnams// srid pa'i bde sdug
shes pa la// las kyi dgag sgrub ma shes pas// dug gsum mi dge shugs kyis 'phel// ngan song gnas na mu mtha' med// dge ba phra mo tsam gyis kyang// bde 'gro thob pa'i rgyur 'gyur na// byang chub thob
pa'i don ched du// bsod nams tshogs chen cis mi sog/ de bas rgyu rkyen gnyis 'dzom dus// bsod nams dge ba'i tshogs mchog spel// de yi yon tan ches mang ngo// sangs rgyas 'gro la thugs brtse'i
phyir// dngos dang gzugs brnyan sku gdung dang// ring bsrel mchod rten mchod pas mnyes// sangs rgyas chos dang 'phags pa'i tshogs// rgyal sras rnams ni byon gyur nas// gang gi mchod pa'i bsod nams
la// dge ba'i tshul gyis bzhes par 'gyur// de tshe chu thigs tsam mchod pas// de yi bsod nams dpag tu med// mang du btang ba smos ci dgos// mi 'dzad pa yi gter chen de// zhing gi dam pa yon tan
zhing// rgyal ba'i rten la mchod pa yin// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung 'dzin pa'i// mkhan po slob dpon dge 'dun tshogs// sku gsung thugs kyi rten mchog dang// sku gdung ring bsrel mchod rten
sogs// bdag nyid chen po'i bla ma dang// mchod pa'i zhing du gyur pa rnams// pho brang gdan dang bcas par bskyed// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga ni// rtse gcig yid kyis dmigs nas ni// bdag nyid sgo
gsum gus pa yis// thal mo sbyar zhing 'di skad gsol// chos kyi dbyings rnams ma lus gang// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras bcas la// bdag gi lus ni de snyed sprul// sgo gsum gus pas phyag 'tshal
lo// sangs rgyas chos dang 'phags pa'i tshogs// byang chub sems kyi gzhir gyur pa'i// mchod rten kun la phyag 'tshal lo// mkhan po de bzhin slob dpon dang// brtul zhugs bzang dang mchog gyur pa// bla
ma la yang bdag phyag 'tshal// zhes brjod yan lag smad lnga yis// btud phyag 'tshal zhing sangs rgyas rnams// re re'i zhabs rdul spyi bo yis// gtugs par bsam zhing mgos phyag 'tshal// gang dag gus
pas phyag 'tshal lo// lus kyi sgrib sbyang zug rngu sel// mi khom brgyad spong dal ba rnyed/ kha dog gzugs ni phun sum tshogs// mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa thob// sangs rgyas mjal zhing dgyes pa
dang// phyug cing nor ni che ba dang// rigs 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang// rin chen bdun dang bcas pa yi// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po thob// rgyal srid gnas nas sangs rgyas la// yang dang

yang du bsti stang byed// 'di nas 'phos te lhun po'i rtse// lha yi dbang po brgya byin 'gyur// bdud kyis brdzi bar mi nus pa'i// bsod nams ldan zhing dpal dang ldan// rgyal ba'i sras su de 'gyur ro// su zhig
byang chub sems bskyed nas// 'jig rten mgon gyi mchod rten la// gus pas skor ba byed pa na// bsngags pas bskal ba bye ba yang// phan yon brjod pas zad mi nus// rgyal bas dbyings nas byin gyis
rlob// dngos grub de yi mtshan ma thog/ rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de yi sras// thugs rje mnga' ba khyed rnams kyi// bdag ni gus pas 'bangs su mchi// thugs rje chen pos gzung du gsol// ces pas mchod
rten gang yin pa// dngos su zhabs rdul spyi bos blangs// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs yon 'phrin las kyi// byin rlabs bdag la 'jug par bsam// lan cig thob pa'i yon tan
kyang// rgyal bas bu sdug 'dra bar dgongs// bskal pa mang po'i sdig pa bsnyil// dngos grub yon tan dpag tu med// su gang dgon pa'i sa phyogs su// sems bskyed dam pa'i don bsams nas// gom
bdun por nas dus byas kyang// ngan song mi ltung bde 'gro thob// lus kyi dge ba lus la thob// sems kyi yon tan bsam mi khyab// dkon mchog rin chen mchod rten la// me tog 'phreng ba phul ba dang/
khang bzangs yid 'ongs byas pa na/ kha dog mdzes shing blta na sdug khang bzangs mdzes pa'i nang du ni// lha yi bu mo'i tshogs bskor zhing// sum cu rtsa gsum dbang po 'thob// lha yi dga' ba sna

tshogs spyod// lha yi 'jig rten shi 'phos nas// mi snang longs spyod ldan par 'gyur// de ru bsti stang mchod byas nas// thar pa'i lam la mgon bcas mnyes// sa phyogs gtsang zhing chag chag dang// dri zhim
spos byugs sus phul ba// nad med bsod nams ldan pa yi// skye bo mang dga' yid du 'ong// rgyal po thob nas rgyal mchog bskur// gser gyi mdog can dri zhim ldan// gser gyi bye ma bkram pa

dang// baiDUr+Ya yi rdzing bu dang// rin chen gzhal byas gos dang rgyan// lha min phun sum tshogs pa dang// zag med tshul khrims mchog tu 'gyur// mar me snang gsal sgron me phul// rab rib dri ma bsal ba
na// sdig bral dge bas lha rnams dang// klu dang mi'am ci la sogs// 'jig rten dag na gang mkhas pa// dge zhing mgu nas mchod pa dang// lha dang mi yi rigs mchog dang// gang skyes bsod nams gzi
brjid che// g.yog 'khor mi phyed rgyal po thob// rdzogs sangs rgyas la mchod par 'gyur// chu gtsang yid 'ong phul ba na/ khrus byas dri ma phyis pa yis// lus ngan mi 'gyur gtsang ma'i gnas// skye
bo kun gyis mchod 'os pa'i// 'di nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar// de yi dpal de zad mi nus// dug dang me dang mtshon dang ni// dgra bo'i 'jigs pas de mi tshugs// ring por mi thogs don ldan 'gyur/ kha

zas yid 'ong bshos gtsang dang// btung ba'i rnam pa ji snyed pa// rgyal dbang dag la mchod byas pas// des ni bkres shing dbul ba spang// 'jig rten bla ma bkur sti byad// rgyal srid thob nas stong gsum
rgyas// de yi yul gnas sems can gang// longs spyod ldan zhing yid 'ong ldan// de kun sangs rgyas chos la 'khod// chos kyi 'khor lo yang yang bskul// mchod rten sel snyan rol mo dang// dbyangs dang
bstod pas mnyes byed pa// kun tu sgra snyan dpon du 'gyur// bsod nams blo gros mchod 'os pa// des ni kun gyi dbugs 'byin byed// g.yog 'khor yid 'ong dbyangs dang ldan// bsam pa ji bzhin kun
dga' skyed// skye bo'i tshogs kyis blta 'os 'gyur// mtho ris 'jig rten lha dbang dang// mi 'gyur na'ang rgyal po thob// de la sems can yongs dga' byed// na bza' dri zhim yid 'ong dang// gos mchog
srab 'jam mchod rten dkris// btsas ma thag tu gos 'thob cing// lha yi gos kyis rab tu mdzes// gzugs mdzes kha dog stobs dang ldan// de yi lus ni shin tu bde// skyabs med rnams kyi mgon du

'gyur// mtshungs pa med pa'i lus thob nas// lta bas mi ngom rgyal por 'gyur// byang chub dam pa spyod par byed// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang// bla bre 'phreng ba phul ba yis/ khyad 'phags gzugs ni
gser dang 'dra// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis spras// 'jig rten lha mir bcas pa yis// bsti stang mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur// longs spyod ldan zhing grags mi nyams// tshul khrims ldan zhing nags 'dab

'ong// mngon shes 'thob cing 'gro rnams skyob// mya ngan 'das la yongs mi ring// byang chub spyod pas rgyal ba mchod// gser dngul rin chen bai DUr+Ya// bum pa bzang ldan nor gyi mchog/ rta dang glang po khyu
mchog dang// rtsi bcud sman dang yo byad kyi// rgyal ba'i mchod rten mnyes byed pa// bcom ldan chos la mchod byed pa'i// phun sum tshogs la kun dang ldan// don ni mtho rigs bdag por 'gyur// tshul

khrims sbyin gnas kun gyis bkur// nad med tshe yi dbang phyug dang// mdzes shing lus rnams sdug par 'gyur// sa phyogs yid 'ong khang bzang dang// nags tshal ljon shing skyed tshal dang// rdzing bu yid 'ong
ri bo mdzes// mgon po rigs mchog mchod byas pas// kun tu dga' ba'i sa phyogs su// sa la dbang bskur rgyal po dang// tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang dang ni// tshul khrims skyon med thob par
'gyur// 'gro rnams sdug cing byams pa dang// mang pos mchod 'os blta 'os la// de la gnod sems med par 'gyur// chung ma bran dang g.yog 'khor dang// rang gis lus kyi dbang thang rnams// rkang gnyis
gtso la mchod byas dang// lha mo rnams kyis mchod pa dang// rgyal po rnams kyi bkur ba yi// lha dang mi yi dbang por 'gyur// lus kyang rdzu 'phrul stobs dang ldan// stobs bcu mnga' ba'i ded dpon
'gyur// kun gyis phyag dang mchod pa'i gnas// mtshungs med gser mdog 'dra ba 'thob// rgyal ba'i mchod rten rigs rnams la// me tog brnyings pa phyags pa dang// dri ma bsal zhing nyams pa
bcos// gang dag mdzes par sus byas pa// ngan song lam ngan thams cad gcod// bar chad bdud kyis glags mi lta// tshul khrims yon tan gtsang gnas thob// nad rnams ma lus rnam par spong// mdzes
shing rnam dag las su 'gyur// shes rab rgya chen spyod lam mkhas// de bzhin gshegs dang nye ba thob// ji snyed dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams// 'gro mgon thugs rje'i spyan gyis gzigs// de yi mthu yis 'gro ba
kun// byang chub thob par gyur cig pa'i// smon lam btsan pa de bzhin thob// gang dag ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe// khams gsum sems can srog ston zhing// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun mchod pas// nga yi mchod
rten rgud pa las// dmigs te mkha' la me tog gcig/ dor na de yi bsod nams ni// dpag par mi nus de yi rgyus// mya ngan 'das la reg par 'gyur// dngos su 'byor ba lta ci smos// phyogs bcu nam

mkha' mtha' klas nas// me tog bdug spos mar me dang/ chu gtsang yid 'ong byug pa dang// sman dang rtsi bcud rin chen 'bru// rin chen ri bo nyams dga' ba// ljongs dang yul 'khor grong khyer dang// grong

rdal pho brang gzhal med khang// nags tshal ljon shing lo 'bras dang// me tog dri ngad mar me lo// dbyangs snyan sil snyan rol mo dang// bza' bca' btung ba ro mchog ldan// gzugs dang sgra dang reg bya'i

tshogs// rin chen sna bdun gter gyi rdzas// lha yi bu dang 'khor rnams dang// rgyal po dag dang de yi 'khor// mchod par 'os pas rgyan rnams dang// mtsho dang rdzing bu pad+mas brgyan// 'dab chags skad snyan
yid 'ong dang// phun tshogs longs spyod ji snyed kun// yongs su bzung dang gzung med pas// bdag gi blo yis blangs nas su// mdzes gtsang yid 'ong mchod pa'i sprin// nam mkha' mnyam par khyab pa
yi// thub pa sras dang bcas la 'bul// mchod gnas thugs rje can rnams kyis// 'gro la brtser dgongs de dag bzhes// de yis 'gro kun don 'gyur zhing// bdag nyid 'gro ba'i ded dpon
'gyur// rgyal sras sa lam rdzogs 'dod pas// mchod pa'i las ni ci nus brtsam// mchod pa kun gyi gtso bor ni// bla ma'i mchod pa yang dag bya// de mnyes rgyal ba kun mnyes pas// kun mkhyen yon tan

myur du thob// snying rje sems can don gyi phyir// mchod pa'i zhing du bsngo byas la// sdug 'phongs rnams ni pha mar dmigs// 'chi ba'i srog bton tshe ring thob// nad la sman byin nad med dang// dbul la sbyin
pa longs spyod dang// 'jigs pa skyabs pas stobs dang ni// bzod pa bka' blangs gzugs bzang dang// sdug la byams pas rigs mtho dang// bde ba dga' bas gzi brjid che// chos la btsud pas shes
rab thob// kun la gnod med phan btags pas// kun bdag yid du 'ong ba ni// bde 'gro yon tan brgyad ldan thob// byang chub sems kyi 'brel gzhag na// gang la phan btags don ldan 'gyur// 'jigs
pa'i lam sgrol gru zam dang// rgya lam 'chos pa'i 'gron gnyer gyis// theg chen don la stobs ldan 'gyur// sa yi lam la mchod rten bya// yi dwags rnams la chu sbyin gtang// 'byung po rnams la gtor ma

sbyin// tho rangs langs te khrus kyang bya// sems can don du kha ton bklag/ 'gro la phan zhing rang sgrib 'dag/ rkyen dbang las kyi stobs kyis su// sdig pa'i las ni gang yod pa// dper na rlan can shing la
ni// me ni 'bar bar mi nus bzhin// sdig pas sdug bsngal thams cad skyed// bde ba thams cad 'phrog par byed// dge ba'i yon tan gang yod pa// rgyud la sdig ldan bskyed mi nus// de phyir sdig pas mi

gos par// rgyud la dri ma rab tu sbyang// tshor dang ma tshor dbang gis su// bcas dang rang bzhin ma tho ba// rang gzhan kun la mi gtsang ba'i// dri mas sbags pa'i zas bzhin du// sdig pa'i las ngan ci byas
pa// mkhas pa dug zos pas kyang 'gyod// slar zhing nyes pa sbyangs pa ni// phyogs bcu kun na bzhugs pa yi// thams cad mkhyen gzigs 'khor bcas la// thal mo sbyar te gsol ba ni// thog med gyur nas
da lta'i bar// gang gi tshe rabs thams cad du// bdag gis ma 'tshal sdig bgyis pa// bgyid du brtsal dang yi rang sbyar// gti mug 'khrul pa'i dbang gis su// nongs pa'i las rnams ci bgyis pa// bsam
pa thag pas mgon la bshags// khyad par bdag gi nyes chen po// dkon mchog gsum dang pha ma dang// bla ma'am ni gzhan gyur la// lus ngag yid gsum sgo nas su// nyon mongs stobs kyis mi bzad
pa'i// nyes pa du ma byung ba rnams// mgon pa'i spyan sngar mthol lo bshags// phyin chad sdig pa mi bgyi 'tshal// thugs rje chen pos gzung du gsol// bdag gi sdig pa ma byang bar// srog gi
bar chad gyur pa na// bka' chad mi mdzad rnam smin lam// myur ba'i tshul gyis skyab tu gsol// sdig byang sems la dri med pa'i// 'dam gyi shel bzhin dag par 'gyur// dri ma med pa'i sems rtogs

nas// 'di ni 'gyod tshangs mchog yin no// gang phyir bdag gi sdig spyad pa// rnam par smin pa bdag myong ba'i// gshed ma'i ral gri gdeng 'dra ba'i// gshin rje'i pho nyas 'jigs pa yis// bzung nas rab tu
nyam thag la// gang gis skyob par mi nus pa'i// 'jigs chen sdig pa'i lam 'phrang la// kun kyang yi mug sdug bsngal skye// 'jig rten mgon po ma gtogs pa// 'di yi dus na sus mi phan// de bas rgyal
sras bla ma mgon// gang gis reg pa don ldan pa'i// stobs chen 'jigs pa kun sel ba// de ring nyid nas skyabs su mchi// khyed kyi thugs rje'i 'od zer gyis// nam du yang ni mi gtang 'tshal// bdag gi
lus 'di khyed 'bul gyis// bzhes te sdig can bdag la skyobs// bdag la re sa gzhan ma mchis// thugs rje che mgon khyod mkhyen no// zhes gsol yid kyis bstod byas pas// 'jigs pa ma lus kun
las thar// thar pa'i zhing du bde bar 'khrid// skyabs kyi dam pa skyabs su 'gro// phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i mchog/ 'jig rten gsum na dkon pas te// bde 'gro thar pa'i rten dang gling// dper na 'jigs

pa'i g.yang sa ru// shes bzhin dran pas mi 'gro bzhin// sdig pa'i las ni nam du yang// gnyen po'i brten la mi bya ste// rang gi srog dang bsdos byas la// thugs rje can rnams dpang por gsol// khyed kyi
bka' las mi 'da' ste// 'das na rang nyid 'tshig par 'gyur// mi gang nad kyis 'jigs pa dag/ sman pa'i ngag bzhin bya dgos na// sdig pa'i rnam smin 'jigs pa la// bla ma'i bka' bzhin ci ma
dgos// 'di nas bzung ste nam du yang// srog la bab kyang mi bgyid do// bdag gi ngag dang lus sems kyi// bshags bsdam yang dang yang du bya// khrus dang ldan pa'i snod dag la// dri ma'i gnod pas mi
gos bzhin// gtsang ma'i rgyud la sdig mi 'go// sdig med yon tan 'phral la skye// sprin med nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// dge ba'i don kun gsal bar 'gyur// sdig pa myur du ma bshags na// bdag gi

'du byed rkyen dbang gis// tshe yi 'du byed gyur pa na// phyi ma gshed du 'gro dgos pas// sdig pa'i rnam smin mi byang ste// rdul phran bsags pa ri rab bzhin// slar zhing je che je 'phel song// sdig pa'i phung po
ri rab tsam// chung ngu gcig la brten nas 'byung// de bas myur du 'phral la sbyong// phyin chad rnam smin mi 'gos bya// dag pa'i byang chub sems skyes na// sdig pa kun las nges pa grol// rang
snang ma dag rnam smin la// grol bar mi 'gyur gnyen po brten// sman la dug gis mi tshugs so// sdig med sdig pa dag pa'i rtags// nyams dga' lus sems bde ba dang// ma rmongs gdangs gsal rig
pa thon// gang gnas sa ru me tog 'khrung/ khrus byas rgyan btags mkha' la 'phur// bshal skyugs gcer bu gyen la 'dzegs// dkon mchog mchod rten gtsang gnas mthong// nyi ma zla ba shar ba rmis// dad
pa dge ba'i phyogs la skye// dam pa mthong na yid du 'ong// bag dang ldan par 'gyur ba yin// bdag gi sngon chad dge ba yis// ngan 'gro las grol bde 'gro thob// rgyal ba'i sras dang dus 'dir
mjal// byang chub snying po rang la rnyed// 'gro la phan pa bya ru gyur// 'di nyid dge ba'i mthu stobs la// sngon gyi dge ba chud ma gsan// da yang mi bzad 'phel phyir du// dge ba ci nus bdag gis

bsags// sngon chad sangs rgyas sku drin yin// da ni 'gro la ci phan bya// bdag gi lus dang srog kyang btang// song ba don can nyid du 'gyur// longs spyod rdzas rnams smos ci 'tshal// sang tsam 'chi'am sus

shes na// de ring nyid la brtun te bya// dge la phyi bshol byed pa na// sdig la mngon par dga' ba yin// de bas myur du 'bad pa yin// spro ba'i sems kyi nyams su blangs// sems can ngan song sdug bsngal
las// grol nas gnas skabs bde ba yis// dge ba chung ngu tsam la yang// bdag ni rjes su yi rang zhing// dngos po'i rdzas dang yo byad dang// byang chub sems dang ting 'dzin dang// lag len stobs dang
'dun pa yi// byang chub rgyur gyur dge ba ni// 'jig rten khams na gang yod la// bdag ni dpag med rjes yi rang// lus can 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las// blo log nges par thar pa yi// dgra bcom rang

rgyal yon tan la// bdag ni rjes su yi rang ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med dang// rgyal sras bar gnas yon tan gyis// 'gro kun byang chub dgongs mdzad pa'i// dam pa rgyun mi 'chad pa la// rjes su yi

rang mngon par bstod// de dang de 'dra ji srid la// kun nas rjes su yi rang ngo// byang chub sems dpa' rab ldan la// khyim na gnas kyang yon tan 'phel// so so'i skye bo'i dge ba la// yi rang thar pa cha
mthun thob// nyan thos rang rgyal dge ba thob// byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba la// yi rang sangs rgyas yon tan thob// de yang sems dge'i stobs las byung// stobs med thad ka'i cha mthun thob// stong
gsum nyungs 'brus bkang nas su// gzung bar nus pa'i tshad gzung rung// rjes su yi rang dge ba ni// tshad gzungs bsgrang bar nus ma yin// sems can kun gyi dge ba rnams// rjes su yi
rang skad cig gis// re re zhing du thob pa la// rgyal ba'i yon tan brjod mi lang// rjes su yi rang dge ba las// nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems// sangs rgyas sems can kun mnyes pas// de yi bsod
nams ches mang ngo// yi rang ba yi dge ba la// bdud dang bdud kyi rigs rnams kyis// glags skabs rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// gang dag yi rang mi byed pa// da ni bdud kyis zin par nges// dge ba mi 'phel
log par mdzad// sems can de ni bde med 'gyur// nga yi chos la phrag dog med// rjes su yi rang dag pas thob// gang gis yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas la// bdud dang mi mthun skyon rnams 'joms mdzad
pa'i// mthong thos dran reg 'gro rnams bde la 'god// phyogs bcu'i mgon rnams dbyangs kyi yan lag bstod// bstod dbyangs snyan pa'i mchod sprin des// nges par kun las 'byung 'gyur nas// rgyal
ba thams cad mnyes 'gyur te// sems can kun la phan par shog/ phyogs rnams kun na bzhugs pa yi// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems// thugs rje che mnga' khyed rnams la// thal mo sbyar te gsol
ba 'debs// bdag la nus pa ma mchis kyang// thugs rje brtse bar dgongs su gsol// rgyal dang gang dag de yi sras// chos 'khor bskor bar mi mdzad pa// de nas bzung ste ji srid bar// sems can sdug
bsngal mun 'thoms la// chos kyi sgron me spar du gsol// nyon mongs gcong nad zin pa la// chos kyi bdud rtsi dbab tu gsol// sdug bsngal bde bas 'phongs pa la// chos kyi dgos 'dod stsal du
gsol// sdug bsngal mgon med gyur pa la// skyob pa chos 'khor skor du gsol// chos kyi don du gang bskur ba// tshangs pa chen po ji bzhin du// rgyal ba thams cad mnyes pa yi// 'gro ba kun gyi ded dpon
'gyur// thams cad mkhyen pa ston pa po// tha dad 'gro ba drang don du// de nyid slob dpon gzugs du byon// sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan la// bde gshegs snying po kun khyab pa'i// gang gi lus ngag yid
gsum gyis// dngos kyi 'du shes bskyed byas nas// gsol ba ci btab 'bras bu dang// thugs yid gcig tu 'dres pa dang// don gyis gcig rgyud 'phos pa yis// rgyal ba'i gdung ni rgyun mi 'chad// dngos
dang dngos med 'gro ba 'dren// 'phrin las mi zad rgyun mi 'chad// 'jam dpal ji ltar mkhyen pa dang// kun tu bzang po de rang bzhin// mos gus gang yod rgyal ba mnyes// gsol ba gang btab de
don thob// nga yi rang bzhin chos kyi sku// ma g.yos thabs kyi drang don du// gzugs sku dngos dang gzugs brnyan tshul// ri mo tsam gcig mthong bas kyang// sangs rgyas zhal mthong mtshungs pa

ste// gang la bar chad mi tshugs shing// sa phyogs der ni bde legs 'gyur// nga yi sku gsung thugs kyi rten// ring bsrel mchod rten su bzhengs pa// dngos grub dam pa gcig dang ldan// nyams pa gsos shing
dge 'dun la// rim gro gang byas rgyal po thob// sangs rgyas rnams la bkur sti byed// dge ba'i bshes gnyen mgon bcas 'gyur// me dang chu dang rlung dag gis// bskal pa 'jig par rten 'di
rnams// bsod nams spel phyir bzhugs su gsol// 'gro kun yid mos gang yin bde// sems can nyon mongs le lo dbang// ma dad log par mthong bas bsgribs// rgyal ba mya ngan 'da' bzhed la// thal
mo sbyar te gsol ba ni// ma rig mdongs pa'i 'gro rnams don// rtag tu mi 'da' bzhugs su gsol// sems can kun gyi don du ni// mchod pa'i las ni ci nus bgyi// de yis bdag kyang 'gro ba'i
don// rgyal ba mnyes pa'i dpal du shog/ de ltar dge ba stobs che ba// smon lam mthu yis don 'grub phyir// dge ba 'di dang dge gzhan gyis// bdag gi rdzu 'phrul stobs thob nas// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i
'gro ba kun// so so'i sdug bsngal ma lus pa// 'joms byed yan pa nyid du shog/ bdag ni mthong thos dran reg kun// yid la gang dang gang 'dod pa// mi bzad phun sum tshogs pa yi// bsam pa yid bzhin

grub gyur cig/ bdag la mi dad gnod gyur pa'i// phyin ci log gi 'gro ba yang// rang gi 'dod pa'i don tshim nas// byang chub lam la 'khod gyur cig/ bdag nyid ma mthong ma dran pa'i// 'gro ba rang rang so
so yi// gang lag gang 'dod der ston pa'i// thams cad bde la 'god byed shog/ bdag gi bsam pa skad cig res// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal kun grol nas// chos kyi dbyings kyi bde ba la// sems can ma
lus sangs rgyas shog/ bdag gi smon lam mthu btsan pas// 'khor ba mi gnas mya ngan 'das// thams cad chos kyi dbyings su sgrol// de yis smon pa nyid du 'grub// bde legs kun gyi rgyur gyur pa// dge
ba 'dis mtshon dus gcig gi// rang bzhin kun gyi dge ba ni// chung ngu 'bring dang mchog gyur pa'i// bsod nams mthu de bsngo ba la// zhing gi dam pa mchog gyur cing// gang gi phul ba don che ba// dkon
mchog gcig la mchod pa bsngo// ched du nam mkha'i mthas klas pa'i// ma rgan 'gro ba kun gyi don// rang gi don phyir chags zhen med// gzhan rnams kun la yongs khyab pa'i// the tsom bral ba'i spro sems
kyis// ser sna med pa'i ched du bsngo// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa yi// mi 'dzad 'bras bu bla na med// kun gyi mthong phyir rab tu bsngo// gang gi dge ba'i rgyu bsags pa// ma dran pa'am ma
shes na// sems kyi dge ba ma mchis pas// zad dang log pa chud zos 'gyur// rgyu la brten pa 'bras bu ni// sems kyi dge ba stobs che bas// ji ltar dngos po de 'bras 'byung// bsngo ba dmigs med yongs
la bsngo// 'khor gsum yongs dag 'dzin pa med// ma bcos shes pa bsngo ba yin// dmigs gtan mtshan mar sngo byed pa// byang chub dam pa des mi thob// dmigs med yongs khyab bsngo ba'i don// thog ma

bar dang mthar dge ba// byang chub thob phyir bsngo bar brjod// ngan rtog dri ma med pa yi// gus pa'i sems dang rab ldan pas// dkon mchog rin chen bla med gsum// mchog tu gyur pa'i bla ma la// skad cig
sangs rgyas yid byed pa// de yi drung na thub pa bzhugs// rgyal ba'i sras su de 'gyur bas// bsod nams che mang dpag tu med// 'khor ba 'di nas thar pa la// bskal pa mang po'i sgrib pa bsnyil// yon tan
ye shes mchog la myur// rang 'dod dri ma bral ba yi// ltung ba'i sems dang rab ldan pa'i// snying rje'i mchi ma thigs gcig gis// nam mkha'i mtha' klas gyur pa yi// sems can kun la sems bsgom

pa'i// kun gyi snying la sa bon thebs// de yi bsod nams tshad du med// gzugs sku 'gro don kun la khyab// snang ba sgyu ma'i rang bzhin la// snang grags gzugs kyi dngos po rnams// lha yi sku ru su shes
pa// chos sku gzugs sku der shar bas// sems can sangs rgyas zhal der mjal// gnyis med rtogs na de bzhin gshegs// phyag rgya chen po'i lha sku ni// mang por bsgoms dang gcig tu 'dra// bsod nams
tshogs rdzogs ye shes 'thob/ kha zas kun la mchod sbyin bya// bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyar yang// bsod nams yon tan brjod mi nus// the tshom thams cad rnam par sel// sgrib pa kun las nges par

grol// chu bo rgya mtsho kun las brgal// chos kun rnam par khong du chud// bsod nams phung po rnam par 'phel// ye shes phung po rnam par thob// sems can rnams ni rnam sbyong ba'i// mgon po sems can kun
don du// de yi yon tan dpag par dka'// tshogs bsags pas kyang tshogs mi thob// tshogs ma bsags pas tshogs mi thob// de bas tshogs kun gong du spel// 'phel bas mi bzod rgyud mi 'chad// theg pa
chen po'i mngon par rtog pa byang chub lam gyi rgyud mchog nam mkha' dang mnyam pa las// bsod nams tshogs bsags pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// bsod nams tshogs ni bsags byas te// dmigs
pas mtshan ma bcas pa la// ye shes tshogs ni thob byas te// dmigs med mtshan ma grol ba'o// dge sdig gnyis kyis spang blang la// rgyu 'bras 'dod pa tha mal te// rgyu 'bras gnyis la zhen pa
yis// stong par shes pa ye shes yin// gzung ba'i yul ni mi 'dod la// 'dzin sems mi dmigs theg dman yin// gzung 'dzin gnyis su mi rtogs pa'i// snang bar shes pa ye shes yin// snang ba sems su
'dod pa ni// chos kyis bdag 'dzin shes bya ste// shes dang shes bya'i yul 'das pas// rang bzhin rtogs pa ye shes tshogs// rnam par mi rtog bdag med chos// yang dag nyid la yang dag lta'o// yang dag

mthong na rnam grol yin// sems can kun gyi bde sdug de// dge sdig gnyis kyi rgyu 'bras la// rgyu 'bras gnyis la ma chog pa'i// bden med rtogs pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi sgrib pa dag pa ni// nyan thos

rang rgyal ye shes tshogs// 'khor bar mi ldog yon tan thob// dug gsum 'khor ba'i rtsa lag de// gdod nas ma skyes stong pa nyid// ma 'gags ngo bo rnam pa ni// rten 'brel shar ba'i rang bzhin la// gzung

'dzin gnyis dang bral ba yi// sems su rtogs pa'i chos nyid la// nyon mongs sgrib pa med pa de// byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes tshogs// phung po lnga ni rigs lnga la// 'byung ba lnga ni bskyed pa'i yum// nyon

mongs lnga ni ye shes lnga// snang tshad byang chub sems su rtogs// theg glan phyir mi ldog pa'i chos// bden pa'i yon tan gong du thob// sems dang sems byung skyed byed pa'i// kun gzhi ma bcos rang grol
la// 'khor ba med pa'i myang 'das ni// stong pa mi dmigs mngon sum du// bsod nams tshogs las byung ba yi// rgyu 'bras ma 'gags bden par 'grub// ma shes blo'i yul du ni// kun rdzob bden pa mngon
sum pa// sems can rnams kyi rgyud la gsal// rig cing rtogs pa'i dus nyid na// don dam blo'i yul las 'das// mya ngan 'das pa mngon sum du// bcos ma ma yin gnas lugs la// rang rig ye shes
dngos su gsal// 'di la gsal cha ci yang med// gzhag par bya ba cung zad med// gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid de// rang 'byung ye shes sangs rgyas kyi// yon tan tshogs ni rdzogs par 'gyur// ye shes ye
shes khyad par las// ye shes ldan pa yod min shes// tshogs gnyis bsod nams bsags pa las// 'bras bu kun rdzob bden pa ru// thabs mkhas gzugs kyi sku ru byung// 'gro rnams bden pa'i don la
'khod// de yi ye shes tshogs gnyis la// 'bras bu don dam bden pa ru// shes rab ye shes chos kyi sku// thams cad ma bcos lhun grub tu// rang grol ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ dag pa gzhan gyis rnam grol
min// rang gis rang nyid shes te byos// 'di ni byin brlabs rim pa yis// gzhi nas lam du mthar thug pa// byas pa med par rang shar du// so sor rang rig spyod yul du// kun mkhyen ye shes
de lta bu// gdod nas lhun grub 'gyur med kyang// sprin bral nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// tshogs gnyis las byung rdzogs sangs rgyas// gzhan nas ma 'tshol rang la ltos// rang byung ye shes tshogs kyi

mchog/ mi 'gyur kun 'gro khyab pa po// khyab bdag ye shes lnga dang ldan// dbyer med thig le gcig tu shes// sdong po gcig shes yal ga ni// sna tshogs tshul gcig shes pa bzhin// chos kyi dbyings la rtogs
pa yi// tshogs dang tshogs min 'khor 'das kyi// rnam pa sna tshogs du ma rnams// mtshan nyid ma 'gags so so yang// gdod nas gnas lugs spros dang bral// rang bzhin gcig tu shes pa ni// ye shes
tshogs zhes tshig tu bstan// don gyis gnas lugs rnam dag dpal// dpal ldan 'byor pa kun byed do// 'jig rten pa yi 'byor pa yis// chung yang sdig pa zil gyis gnon// nyan thos rang rgyal 'byor pa
yis// dman yang 'jig rten zil gyis gnon// byang chub sems kyi 'byor ba yis// theg dman zhi bde zil gyis gnon// sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'byor ba yis// srin bu me khyer sgron me dang// skar ma zla ba'i
'od zer kun// nyi ma'i 'od kyis mnan pa bzhin// theg pa thams cad zil gnon cing// rang gi 'od kyis khyab par byed// 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med// theg chen ye shes gcig gi ngang// 'gyur ba med

pa rdo rje'i gdan// thams cad mkhyen pa der sangs rgyas// theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa byang chub lam gyi rgyud chen nam mkha' dang mnyam pa las// ye shes kyi tshogs skyed pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig
pa'o//// srid dang zhi bar gnas pa'i chos// thams cad sems kyi gzugs brnyan te// shes dang shes bya'i dkyil 'khor la// dag dang ma dag gnyis su bstan// bdag srid pa yi gnas 'di na// rnam
shes sna tshogs gzugs don can// mi shes shes pa sna tshogs ni// dper na spre'u mdud pa bzhin// 'khor ba yin te grol mi 'gyur// dag pa shes rab thabs ldan rnams// sngags shes btson las thar pa
bzhin// shes bya'i chos kyi rang bzhin rnams// shes pa'i 'khor ba las grol te// mya ngan 'das pa shes rab yin// thabs med shes rab bral bas na// theg pa dman dang 'khor bar ltung// grol dang ma grol
lam zhugs pa'i// theg pa'i khyad par shes rab bstan// srid gcig sems kyi glong 'di na// gnas lugs shes bya'i babs las su// phyi nang snod bcud kha dog dbyibs// che chung ring thung gzugs can
rnams// dang po rgyud las lhun grub pa'i// ma bcos pa yi bzo ru shes// de nyid bcos na 'jig par rig/ yod la yod du spel ba dang// med la med du stong pa dang// stong pa nyid la dngos por
skyed// dngos po nyid las stong par stong// bde la sdug dang sdug la bde// yin la min dang min la yin// gcig las ma skyes mang 'dus gcig/ bdag dang gzhan du rtog pa dang// shes dang ma shes rnam
'gyur sogs// dus de'i rkyen des byas pa yis// rgyu med sems kyi bzo ru shes// rkyen de dag ni 'jig par rig/ rgyu dang rkyen gnyis 'dzom pa las// dbyibs dang kha dog gzugs brnyan kun// rgyu'i dpe
yis mtshon nas su// legs nyes lag gis byas pa'i bzo// mkhas pas nan chags yin par shes// gzugs dang bral na 'jig par rig/ des ltar bzo'i gnas rnams la// rgyu'i rgyu las dpe byas
shing// rkyen gyis bzo'i rnam pa bsgyur// lag gis bzo la mkhas par sbyangs// gang yin don la ma rmongs pa'i// bzo'i rig pa gtan la dbab// gnas lugs gshis kyi rang sgra de// bye brag 'byung ba'i rang

brtsal du// sa la lci ba brjid kyi sgra// chu las 'dar ba rlan gyi sgra// me las 'chog pa drod kyi sgra// rlung la g.yo ba shugs kyi sgra// nam mkha' dbugs kyi stong pa'i sgra// rang bzhin nyid du gnas pa la// 'byung

ba chen po sgra che ba// rkyen gyis stobs kyis sna tshogs sgrog/ de'ang 'byung ba gzhan rkyen dang// rang gi sgra skad thun mong 'byung// sgra don gnyis po gcig tu shes// sgra don log pa 'byung mi srid// srid par gnas

pa'i 'gro ba rnams/ khams drug 'dus pa'i rang gzugs ni// las dang nyon mongs nyer len gyis// rigs drug so so'i lus la ni// de dang de'i sgra skad rnams// 'byung ba'i cha dang sbyar bas 'byung// sgra des
don rnams thad kar go/ rang sgra mi shes sems can med// sgra don rtogs na 'phags pa yin// ma rig pa yis de mi rtogs// shes rig cha dang ldan pa yis// don rnams tshig gis rtogs pa'i phyir// rigs drug

so so'i sgra skad rnams// tshig gis don kun rig pa la// bsgyur byed tshig gi sgra brjod pas// so dang mchu dang gre ba rkan// lce'i bsgyur byed tshogs pa las// sgra dang tshig tu gsal ba yin// de yis don kun

rig pas na// sgra tshad rig pa'i shes rab kyis// sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog/ shes bya gcig la kun spyod kyang// sgra mi shes pas don mi rtogs// de phyir sgra la brten pa'i tshig/ tshig la brten nas don

'byung bas// sgra tshig don la mkhas par bslab// gnas rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin// sgra med tshig la spro ba kun// don med mun pa'i dbyug bskor de// thog tu phebs pa shin tu dka'// 'dod pa khams kyi lus
can rnams// nyon mongs las kyi rkyen dbang gis// nad rigs gso bya mang yod rnams// mdor bsdus rnam pa gsum yin te// brgyad khri bzhi stong nyon mongs rnams// rtsa ba dug gsum las gyur
pa'i// sems kyis nad kun rnam par skyed// khams gsum gnas pa'i zug rngu la// rang gi gnyen por rang nyid che// 'dod chags 'dod chags nyid kyis sel// de bzhin zhe sdang zhe sdang 'joms// gti mug
mang po tshogs pa yis// rten 'brel thabs la mkhas pas sel// nad do cog gi sgra che rnams// bdag med rtogs pa'i sman mchog gis// zug rngu 'byin cing bla na med// bde ba chen por 'tshe ba'i
gnas// chags sdang las skyes 'byung lus la// nyon mongs rgyu skyed 'bras bu nad// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad skyed pas// rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pas te// 'jug pa 'dang ba gso ba'i thabs// 'jugs pa

sha rgyas lpags la gram// rtsa la 'khyug dang rus pa zhen// don la babs dang snod du ltung// smin rtags zer zug 'gying can dang// ldang lugs rnam pa gsum la ni// rlung gi gyen la bad kan 'thur// mkhris

pa thad kar ldang ba la// gso thabs bsil drod sman dang spyad// mkhas pa nad med lus zungs skyed// rnam rtog rkyen las gyur pa'i nad// sgra yi nad dang gdon gyi nad// rnam par rtog pa yid kyi nad// rnam
rtog nad la rnam rtog gi/ log non zlog pa gdam ngag yin// gso thabs de yi dmigs pa po// rnam par rtog med ngang gis grol// sman pa che mchog gtso bo ni// gso ba'i gnas rnams kun gyi mchog/
drang srong che dgus mchod cing bstod// gso dpyad yan lag kun tu 'phros// 'gro kun nad la thar par 'gyur// thog mar srid pa sems kyi mkha'// dmyal ba srid pa'i bar 'di ru// mthing dkar ser dmar
ljang 'od las// 'byung ba chen po lnga byung ste// 'dus byas las grub 'jig rten 'di// 'byung ba rang gdangs stobs che'i dus// bskal pa dang po rlung gis skyed// dngos med dbyibs su chu yis 'chags//
bar du sa yis dngos por gnas// tha mar me yis dngos po 'jig/ skabs su rlung gis stongs par byed// de bzhin phyi nang gzhan gsum cig/ 'byung ba gcig gis gcig skyen ba'i// snyoms dang ma snyoms

'phel zad las// yar dang mar gyis 'phel 'grib rnams// bar gyi bskal chung nyi shu bzhi// 'byung chung rtog pa'i 'phel 'grib yin// 'byung ba chen po bzhi las med// bzhi po nam mkha'i ngang du gcig/ nam

mkha' sems kyi rtog pa yin// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor la// 'jig rten khams kyi phyogs brtsi ba// dang po chu la chags pa'i rtags// shar phyogs chu la lho phyogs sa// nub phyogs me la byang phyogs
rlung// phyogs mtshams go 'byed nam mkha' ste// dbyer med 'dres nas rtsi mi dgos// so so'i phyogs dang kha dog dang// dbyibs dang sgra zin la rtag pa// snod bcud phyi nang legs nyes
bstan// dkar po chu la dbyibs ni zlum// ser po sa la gru bzhi ste// dmar po gru gsum me'i rigs// rlung ni ljang khu zla kham pa// nam mkha' mthing gsal dbyibs dang bral// 'dres dang ma 'dres dus kyi

skyen// chu sgra sa byed sa sgra rlung// rlung sgra mkha' la me yis tshig/ me sgra chu la sa yis gnod// grogs po de las bzlog pa ste// gcig gis gcig smad sgra zin la// gcig gis gcig bskyed grogs yin te// cha
snyoms zo la btang snyoms gnas// de'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ni// 'jig rten bstan bzhag rig pa'i gnas// lo gcig zla ba bcu gnyis la// dus kyi bye brag bstan pa ni// dbyar gsum zla ba chu'i dus// rtsi
bcud thams cad skyed par byed// ston gsum zla ba sa'i dus// rtsi bcud thams cad skyed par byed// dgun gsum zla ba me'i dus// rtsi bcud thams cad skems par byed// dpyid gsum zla ba rlung gi dus// rtsi

bcud thams cad stong par byed// de bzhin nang gi sems can gyi// lus dang longs spyod de yis shes// de ltar 'byung ba ma snyoms na// sgra yis rkyen pas nyes pa la// grogs kyi yon tan rang la mnyam// phyi
rol pa dang nang dag gi/ 'jig rten bstan chos rig pa dang// de yis brtag thabs kun shes 'gyur// khyad par 'byung bzhi'i lus 'di la// dang por chus skyed sa bstan pa'i// lus skyed rdzogs par dar ba

yin// de nas me nyams rgas pa dang// tha ma rlung gis nad skyed nas// 'chi ba tshe 'dir stongs par byed// de ni nang gi 'byung chen gyi// bskal pa chags 'jig stongs gnas yin// skabs su 'byung ba sgra zin
gyis// bde sdug mtho dman legs nyes kun// legs par brtsis la bstan chos bya// mkhas pa skyon med yon tan la// bstan pa thob phyir bstan bcos zhes// 'jig rten mkhyen pa rig pa'i gnas// shes bya

sna tshogs rig pa la// chos dang chos min ngo bo gnyis// shan 'byed dngul gyi me long la// ma rig ma rig bskyed pa dang// phyin ci log gi shes rab kyis// yang dag log par khrid pa rnams// chos min 'khor

ba'i bya ba yin// shes rab shes rab bskyed nas su// yang dag lam la 'jug pa rnams// chos nyid don gyi bya ba yin// mkhas pa 'di nyid shes par bya// shes bya'i bud shing skam po la// yang dag shes rab me
'bar bas// nyon mongs bsreg pa'i ye shes kyis// don la rnal 'byor 'jug par bya// 'jug pa pha rol phyin mchog ldan// sa bcu'i lam gnas mthar phyin pa'i// kun don yon tan gsum thob bya'i// theg
pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa byang chub lam gyi rgyud chen nam mkha' dang mnyam pa las/ shes bya'i chos thams cad gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// gnas lugs bden

pa dbyer med la// stong pa'i rang bzhin ma 'gags pas// snang ba sna tshogs ci shar yang// rang shar ma gtogs kun rdzob la// gnang ba'i mtshan nyid ma nges pa// stong pa nyid du rang grol la// spros bral rig
pa'i don dam la// snang dang stong pa gnyis su bstan// gnyis med zung 'jug dbu ma'i don// mtha' dang bral ba'i ye shes yin// gnas lugs rang rtsal ma 'gags pas// sa chu me rlung nam mkha'i

ngang// 'byung ba chen po lnga po yang// phyi rol byed lo gzhan na med// dran rtog nyid la snang ba ste// snang tsam nyid la dngos po med// dran rtog dben par gyur tsam na// mtshan ma cir yang dmigs pa

med// gnyid log dus kyi 'byung ba lnga// gnyid sad dus na mtshan mas stong// rdul gyi cha tsam grub pa med// med bzhin rmi lam snang ba tsam// gnyid sad dus kyi 'byung ba lnga// rmi lam du na rang bzhin
stong// bden par ma grub rmi lam tsam// snang dang stong pa mi rtag tsam// so so ma yin dbyer med gcig/ gnyid log gnyid sad gnyis su med// gnas lugs gcig la rtog pa yin// rtog pas dben na stong

pa ste// stong pa nyid de snang ba'o// snang ba sems la 'byung ba'i phyir// mig gi yul na gzugs sna tshogs// snang yang ngo bo nyid kyis stong// ngo bo mig gi rnam shes ni// rnam pa gzugs la shes pas stong// snang
stong zung 'jug gdod ma nas// me long gzugs brnyan bzhin du gnas// gzugs med mthong ba po yang med// gzugs mthong bas ni ngo bo nyid// dbyer med gcig tu spros dang bral// de bzhin rna ba'i sgra

rnams ni// sgra snyan bzhin du thos pas stong// sna'i dri ni du ba bzhin// tshor ba'i snang ba ngo bos stong// lce'i ro ni sgyu ma yin// zas bzhin myong ba tsam gyis stong// lus kyis reg bya nam mkha' bzhin// reg pa

tsam gyis de snang stong// yid kyis chos rnams thams cad kun// bde sdug legs nyes sna tshogs kyang// rmi lam bzhin du dran pas stong// ngo bo dran stong dus mnyam na// stong pa nyid du bsgom mi dgos// ngo bo

nyid kyis stong pa ste// gzugs ni gzugs kyi ngo bos stong// sgra dang dri ro reg bya chos// rang rang ngo bos stong pa yin// de bzhin der 'dzin sgo dang yul// rnam par shes pa drug po rnams// de dang gnyis med

ngo bos stong// rnam par shes pa'i gzung 'dzin gcig/ gnyis med ngo bo nyid stong la// snang ba'i rtogs pa 'gog mi dgos// dngos por ma grub sgyu ma bzhin// sgyu ma dngos med stong pa'i gzugs// de la skrag
pa 'khrul pa yin// snang ba med pa'i stong pa nyid// chad par lta ba'i 'khrul kham can// stong pa med pa'i snang ba can// rtag par lta ba'i gzung 'dzin can// log pa'i lam du shor ba yin// snang

dus stong la stong dus snang// snang stong chu zla lta bu ru// skad cig tsam yang dbyer med la// gsal dang stong par 'dod pa kun// gnyis med gnyis 'dzin 'khrul pa'i blo// yon po'i lam du shor ba yis// yang

dag sa la des mi bgrod// zung 'jug rab tu mi gnas la// stong pa nyid ces btags pa la// dmus long rnams kyis nam mkha' la// stong pa nyid du sbar tshod byed// de bzhin stong nyid mtha' bral la// rmongs

pa rnams ni phyogs 'dzin byed// snang ba stong pa'i rang 'od la// blun po rnams ni mtshan mar 'dzin// snang stong gnyis med zung 'jug la// byang chub sems zhes rab tu brjod// ngo bo spros bral mtha' las
'das// blo 'das yid byed bral ba'i don// gnas lugs byang chub sems 'di la// ma rig rang gi kun rtog gis// snang stong chos rnams ming btags tsam// ming btags rtogs tshogs rang rang gis// ltos

pa'i chos kyi snang stong gnyis// snang ba dngos po mtshan mar 'dzin// stong pa dmigs med mtshan med du// so sor gzung ba 'khrul pa'i blos// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i sems nyid la// brtags pa tsam las don
la gcig/ 'khor ba'i snang bas myang 'das stong// myang 'das snang bas 'khor ba stong// gnyis med snang bas gnyis 'dzin stong// gnyis 'dzin snang bas gnyis med stong// de bzhin bde bas sdug bsngal

stong// sdug bsngal snang bas bde ba stong// nyon mongs snang bas ye shes stong// ye shes snang bas nyon mongs stong// kun rdzob snang bas don dam stong// don dam snang bas kun rdzob stong// dngos po'i snang

bas dngos med stong// dngos med snang bas dngos po stong// mi dge'i snang bas dge ba stong// bsgrub bya'i snang bas spang bya stong// spang bya'i snang bas bsgrub bya stong// mtshan ma'i snang bas mtshan med

stong// mi dmigs snang bas mtshan med stong// min pa'i snang bas yin pa stong// yin pa'i snang bas min pa stong// bdag 'dzin snang bas gzhan nyid stong// gzhan gyi snang bas rang nyid stong// yod pa'i snang
bas med pa stong// med pa'i snang bas yod pa stong// bden pa'i snang bas bden med stong// bden med snang bas bden pa stong// sems can snang bas sangs rgyas stong// sangs rgyas snang bas sems can
stong// de ltar skyon yon legs nyes tshogs// ltos pas so sor rnam par dbye// gnyen pos brtags kyang snang stong gnyis// skad cig tsam yang dbyer med gcig/ thams cad spros bral lhan cig la// gnyis
su 'jig pa 'khrul pa'i chos// mang po dag gis sdug bsngal bas// zad med 'phel med 'khor bar 'khyams// zung 'jug chos rnams mngon 'gyur na// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das su grol// gnyis

su med pa'i longs spyod yin// gdod nas yin te blo bur min// rang byung don la bcos ma bral// snang dang stong par mi rtag pa'i// mtshan bcas mtshan med rtog pa kun// lus ngag yid kyi snang ba ste// lus kyi

rtogs pa dngos snang gsal// yid kyi rtog pa dran snang shar// ngag gis snang bas brjod pa'i tshig/ phyi nang thams cad de las bskyed// de dang de'i snang ba kun// rtsa ba sems nyid gcig la thug/ sems la

dngos po ma mchis pas// lus ngag yid gsum rang bzhin stong// sems stong tsam na lus kyang stong// stong pa byang na ma yin pas// sems de lus ngag yid du snang// snang ba'i der 'dzin zhi ba la// stong pa
zhes su brjod pa min// sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// snang bar ming du brtags pa la// sangs rgyas rnams kyis mkhyen pa 'byung// 'khor ba pa'i nyon mongs te// rang bzhin shes na ye shes dngos// ma
rig pa la sems su gzung// rig pa'i dus na chos nyid don// skye 'gag med pa'i chos sku la// stong pa nyid ni bla dgas so// ma dag sems nyid 'khor ba la// dag pa'i sems nyid mya ngan 'das// gnyis su
med pa'i gnas lugs la// snang dang stong pa la sogs pa'i// mang du bshad kyang spros pa tsam// yang dag don lag gcig las med// gcig po de yang spros dang bral// de bzhin de nyid ma rtogs pa// gzhan
gyis bcos rgyu ci yang med// 'od gsal lhun grub 'gyur med yin// dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la// sprin gyis chod dang ma chod pa'i// gsal dang mi gsal 'byung ba bzhin// ma rtogs sa pa'i khyad tsam

las// don la gsal 'grib rgyun chad med// rig pa rang gsal rdo rje 'chang// sra zhing snying po khong stong med// kun la khyab pas mtha' dang bral// dbu ma la yang mi gnas so// thams cad mkhyen pa'i rig pa
yin// 'dus ma byas la chos skur brtags// mkhyen pa'i brtse bas gzugs sku byung// bsam gyis mi khyab brjod las 'das// gnas lugs ngang du rang sar zhog/ theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtog pa byang chub
lam gyi rgyud chen nam mkha' dang mnyam pa las bden pa gnyis med snang stong zung 'jug tu bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// rgyu ni so so'i skye bo nas// 'bras bu sangs rgyas sa la ni// bgrod par

byed pa'i byang chub lam// ngo bo ting 'dzin ye shes yin/ khyad par can gyi yon tan rnams// rgyud la thob pa'i rten byed pa// sa zhes gong nas gong du ni// bgrod pa'i spyir na lam yin no// lam mchog 'di las
su zhugs pa// dang po'i las can skye bo rnams// dkon mchog gsum gyi rang bzhin la// gus pas brten cing tshogs gnyis bsags// dka' thub chos la rten cing spyad// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin

sdug bsngal gyis// lus ni mi gtsang phung po la// mi rtag dran pa nye bar bzhag/ tshor ba phyi nang bde sdug rnams// mi rtag btang snyoms stong par bsgom// gzung ba'i yul dang 'dzin pa'i sems// gnyis ka

gcig rkyen gcig la skyes// sems de rang bzhin med par bsgom// chos rnams sngar yang ma skyes shing// phyis kyang skye bar mi 'gyur ba'o// skye med stong par shes par bya// yang dag spong ba bzhi po ni// sdig pa

sngar skyes las spong zhing// phyis ni sdig pa bskyed mi bya// dge ba sngar skyes spel bya zhing// ma skyes dge ba bskyed par bya// mos 'dun brtsol ba'i brtson 'grus kyis// mi dge chos kyis dben pas na// mnyam

gzhag 'dod chags bral bas na// dga' bde ting 'dzin la gnas pa// 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul rkang pas te// de la rab tu spros byed pa// dang ba'i rdzu 'phrul rkang pa yin// de la rtog cing spyod byed pa// spyod pa'i

rdzu 'phrul rkang pa la// de'i don rnams yid la sems// sems kyi rdzu 'phrul rkang pas te// 'gro 'ong med pa'i rgyun de la// sems ni rtse gcig gnas pa yis// bsam gtan bzhi'i 'du shes la// rab tu sbyangs

pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang// mngon shes phra mo thob par 'gyur// las kyis mngon shes rigs drug gis// sems can rnam pa phra mo yod// lha'i mig la sogs pa lnga// cha mthun tsam re mnyam bzhag dus// 'phags pa
dgra bcom rnams la 'char// rgyun chad med par sangs rgyas la'o// tshogs lam bzhi gsum bcu gnyis so// tha ma 'bring mchog chen po la// rim pa bzhin du 'du 'dzi spangs// dben pa'i stobs las skye ba

yin// mos spyod tshogs gnyis bsags pa de// chos nyid don la sbyor ba'i lam// nges 'byed yan lag rnam bzhi ste// drod ni me'i snga ltas bzhin// chos nyid rtogs pa'i snga ltas su// bzung yul rang bzhin med

pa yi// sgyu ma rmi lam lta bur rtogs// de nyid rang bzhin med pa yi// chos kun dgag sgrub blangs dor bral/ yonatan 'phel ba rtse mo ste// 'di dus dbang pos gang snang ba// skye ba med par mngon du shes// de

la gzhan gyis mi phyed pa'i// bstan pa'i nges shes chen po skye// de ni dad pa'i dbang po yin// de la rab tu spro sems kyis// srog gi phyir yang ma chags par// dka' ba sna tshogs spyod pa'i mthus// brtson
'grus dbang po dub par med// spyod lam rnam bzhi dran shes kyis// tshul ma yin pa kun spangs shing// sems la lta ba dran pa'i dbang// gang la dmigs pa'i chos de la// lus sems rtse gcig gnas byed
pa// dag byed ting 'dzin dbang po yin// rtse gcig spyod pa'i chos de la// so sor rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis// brtags pas gzhi rtsa med mthong ba// shes rab dbang po thob pa ste// chos rnams

skye 'gag med pa yi// mtshan ma bral ba'i don la ni// blo la mi skrag mi sdang bar// mos pa thob pa bzod pa yin// 'di nas ngan song mi ltung zhing// dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyun mi 'chad// nyi ma 'char ba'i snga ltas
su// nam mkha' mtha' nas sangs pa bzhin// rnam par rtog med ting 'dzin la// chos rnams thams cad gcig tu 'gyur// rnam rtog ma lus thams cad 'gags// rtogs pa med pa'i ting 'dzin de// 'jig
rten chos las mchog gyur pas// de nyid don la rtags spyad na// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i chos// skad cig gis ni bye brag phyed// mthong lam don la des sbyor bas// sbyor lam don zhes theg chen

dang// nyan rang gnyis dang thun mong ste// nyan thos sa brgyad rang rgyal dgu// 'ga' zhig theg chen cha mthun yang// 'di nyid la ni thob pa ste// zhi gnas dang ni lhag mthong yang// 'di nas gcig tu 'dres
par 'gyur// nyan rang byang sems de bzhin gshegs// ting 'dzin thams cad 'di gnyis 'dus// zhi lhag gnyis po kun gyi don// las rnams bgrod pa'i srog shing yin// phung po khams dang skye mched
sogs// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i chos rnams kun// ma lus chos nyid spros dang bral// de bzhin nyid kyi don la ni// rang gis rig pas mngon sum du// mthong phyir mthong ba'i lam zhes bya// mnyam bzhag chos

nyid don las su// rjes thob sgyu ma lta bu yi// 'khor ba'i chos la mi skrag cing// rang rig chos nyid don mthong bas// dga' ba skye phyir dang po'i sa// don la nyon mongs ma gos pas// gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i

sa// chos rnams rang shar yon tan gyis// shes rab rgyas pa 'od byed pa// phyogs med yon tan cher rgyas pas// sa ni bzhi pa 'od 'phros pa// thog med du nas bag chags rnams// sbyang ka sbyong bas sa lnga
pa// chos rnams thams cad rang gi sems// mngon du gyur pa drug pa ste// 'khor ba'i bag chags spangs pas su// bdun pa ring du song ba'o// 'di rnams 'khor ba'i nyon mongs kyi// cha ni phra med ma dag
sa// 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos shing// sems can don kun bsgrub pa'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// gong nas gong du bskyed pa yis// spyod pa la zhugs sems dpa' yin// chos nyid don
mthong skyes mchog gis// zag bcas zag med la sogs pa// mnyam pa nyid shes bsgom pa'i lam// shes bzhin bag chags sbyangs pa yis// dang po nas ni bcu pa'i bar// nam zla dros pa'i chab rom
bzhin// nyon mongs rims kyis je phra song// bsgom lam rnam par mi rtog pa'i// chos nyid rang sar bzhag pa yis// mnyam rjes gnyis med gcig tu 'gyur// bag chags gnyis snang dbyings
su yal// phyir mi ldog pa'i sems dpa' ste// chos nyid don la skad cig kyang// rkyen gyis mi g.yo sa brgyad pa// shes bya kun la ma rmongs pas// dgu pa legs pa'i blo gros sa// zla ba yar gyi ngo bzhin

du// sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan rnams// rgyud la sprin bzhin 'khrigs pa yis// sa bcu chos kyi sprin zhes pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbang thob ste// skye ba gcig gis thogs pa yi// byang chub sems zhes ming
du btags// sa bcu'i yon tan mthar phyin lam// mi mthun phyogs kun rnam par dag/ dag pa'i ye shes dbang bcu'i don// thub dbang stobs bcu sangs rgyas sa// mkhyen pa'i thugs rje'i 'od zer
gyis// kun gyi don byed bcu gcig pa// kun tu 'od kyi sa chen po// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// gzugs sku 'khor ba'i skyon gyis su// ma gos bcu gnyis pad+ma can// chos sku mya ngan 'das pa'i

skyon// zhi bas ma gos tshogs chen po// gnyis med thams cad mkhyen pa la// sdug bsngal sgrib pa kun med pas// bcu bzhi bde ba chen po'i sa// yang dag don la 'gyur med pas// rdo rje 'dzin pa sangs rgyas
pa'o// lam gyi chos rnams thams cad kun// blang bya'i don ni ting nge 'dzin// zhi gnas sems ni rtse gcig pa// lhag mthong so sor rtog pa yis// shes rab chos kun rtogs pa la// nyan rang rnam rtog mgo
non tsam// mi rtog rtse gcig zhi gnas la// mi rtag stong pa bdag med du// so sor rtog shes lhag mthong yin// byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kun// rnam par mi rtog zhi gnas la// rtog tshogs gnas
lugs gcig tu ni// shes pa lhag mthong ye shes te// rnam par rtog dang mi rtog pa// mnyam rjes med pa zhi gnas la// ma 'gag gsal ba lhag mthong ni// mthar phyin lam gyi ting 'dzin yin// ting nge 'dzin

ni gcig nyid la// shes rab stobs kyi khyad par gyis// bu ga khang pa phyi rol gyi// nam mkha' mthong dang mtshungs pa ste// de nyid grol na gnyis su med// mnyam pa nyid la 'khor 'das med// ma rtogs dus na

kun gzhi zhes// rtogs pa'i dus na chos kyi sku// thob par byed pa'i don la ni// rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin// ming du brtags pa'i chos su zad// dang po'i las can tshogs lam nas// mthong lam bar ni chos
nyid kyi// don ma rtogs pas mos spyod pa// mthong lam nas ni bdun pa'i bar// chos nyid don la spyod pa'i sa// spyod pa la ni zhugs pa'i sa// brgyad pa nas ni nyon mongs dag/ 'khor bar mi ldog pa
yis// bcu pa spangs thob yon tan kun// mthar phyin mi slob sangs rgyas sa// ting nge 'dzin gyi rang snang la// dus kyi skabs dang sbyar ba yin// tshogs sbyor gnyis pa'i lam tsam las// sa'i yon

tan mi rdzogs te// mthong lam thob nas sa bcu bar// pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs par byed// dang po sbyin pa gtso bas te// chos la dmigs pa'i snying rje yis// dge bas bsdu phyir brtson par byed// gnyis pa
tshul khrims mi mthun pa'i// mi dge spang zhing dge ba la// stobs chen tshul bzhin spyad par bya// gsum pa bzod pa chos kyi phyir// don gnyer sangs rgyas rim 'gro byed// brtson 'grus zag bcas zag med
kyi// gnas 'gyur shes pas blang dor byed// bsam gtan rig pa'i gnas rnams la// sgrib sbyangs log 'dren tshar yang bcad// shes rab chos kun thams cad kyis// don rnams khong du chud par
byed// thabs kyis sku dang zhing khams la// kun rdzob don dam 'jug par byed// stobs kyis phun sum tshogs pa yis// yon tan kun la go bar byed// smon lam sems can yid rnams kun// gang ltar bdun

pa de bzhin thob// sa bcu ye shes chen po yis// dbang bskur thams cad mkhyen pa ru// yon tan thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur// tshogs sbyor lam gyi dus 'di ru// spang bya nyon mongs gnyen po spong// sa thob

nas ni nyon mongs dang// nye ba'i nyon mongs nyi shu sogs// rtsa ba bsrung nas 'byin par byed// brgyad pa nas su nyon mongs dag/ chos kyi bdag 'dzin shes bya yi// 'dzin pa 'phra mo'i zhen pa de// sa bcu pa la

ma lus dag/ sprin bral nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// sgrib pa mdud la nges par grol// sa thob gyur ma thag de ru// nyon mongs dug dang mtshon mi tshugs// srid pa'i chu dang mes mi tshig/ bag tsha ngan 'gro'i

'jigs pa bral// skad cig 'dun pa btang ba tsam// ting 'dzin brgya la snyoms 'jug dang// sangs rgyas brgya mthong byin brlabs thob// 'jig rten zhing khams brgya g.yo dang// sangs rgyas zhing khams brgyar

'gro dang// sems can brgya la tshos ston dang// 'jig rten khams brgya snang byed dang// bskal pa brgya gnas skye ba dran// phyi ma'i bskal brgyar 'jug pa dang// lung brgya yongs su ston byed dang// chos kyi sgo

mo brgya 'byed dang// sprul pa brgya phrag ston pa'o// yon tan brgya phrag bcu gnyis po// byang chub sems kyi 'dod 'dun la// ting nge 'dzin gyis byas pa yin// rtsol ba med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis// de 'dra'i
rnam sprul bsam las 'das// rig pa sems kyi cho 'phrul yin// de bzhin sa bcu'i bar du ni// ting 'dzin yon tan gong nas gong// stobs cher gyur pa'i gnyis pa la// stong phrag bcu gnyis gsum pa
la// khri phrag 'bum dang bye ba dang// sa ya phrag bcu phrag brgya dang// stong phrag khri phrag 'bum la sogs// bcu gcig grangs med brjod las 'das// sngon gyi smon lam mthu yis su// sems
dpa' de dag re re la// lus dang rdzu 'phrul stobs dang ni// 'od dang mngon shes sbyangs la sogs// bskal par brjod kyang bsgrangs mi nus// lhag bsam rnam par dag pa ni// de dag thams cad shugs la
'byung// tshogs lam yon tan mthar phyin pas// mnyam par gzhag pa'i dus nyid du// bde gsal mi rtog ting 'dzin la// g.yo ba med cing dngas pa ni// gsal ba me long lta bur 'gyur// gnas lugs don
ni ma mthong bas// da rung bcos ma'i ting 'dzin te// ma yengs gnas pa'i yon tan du// spyan mnga' chags pa med pa yi// yang dag don mthun mngon shes lnga// gnas skabs lam dang mthar thug tu// dpag

tshad gcig nas stong gsum bar// zhing khams mthong ba sha yi spyan// mnyam bzhag dang ni rmi lam du// zhing khams mthong dang lung ston dang// rnam pa sna tshogs rtags rnams 'byung// byung yang mi rtag 'gyur ba

yin// sbyor lam dus su ting 'dzin gyis// sgo ni brgya stong du ma mthong// snang ba rmi lam sgyu mar rtogs// zag bcas zag med la sogs pa'i// cha mthun mngon shes 'phra mo dang// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten ji
snyed pa'i// 'chi 'pho shes pa lha'i spyan// nyan thos rang rgyal ting 'dzin la// goms pas de'i yon tan thob// chos rnams kun gyi don mthong bas// shes rab spyan te mthong lam yin// sa bcu'i yon tan

mthar phyin pa// gang zag 'phags pa'i ting 'dzin la// spangs thob shes pa chos nyid spyan// bsgom lam dus na thob pa yin// nyon mongs spangs pas zag pa med// ting nge 'dzin la rang dbang bsgyur// shes

bya'i sgrib byang gzung 'dzin dag/ rang rig don la gsal 'grib med// spangs thob yon tan phun sum tshogs// rtsal sbyong rgyu mthun rgyal rigs thob// thams cad mkhyen pa sangs rgyas spyan// mthar phyin lam

la rdzogs nas thob// shes bcu rnam dag 'bras bu don/ khams gsum nyon mongs spangs pa yi// rang dang spyi yi mtshan nyid kyis// chos nyid don shes chos shes la// nyon mongs ma spangs rang grol du// rjes su
shes pa mthong ba'i lam// pha rol gzhan gyis sems shes pa// sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes thugs// sems can bsam pa shes pa yin// kun rdzob shes pa rjes thob kyis// zag bcas shes pa'i rtog pa
rnams// zag med mnyam nyid shes pa'o// sdug bsngal shes par 'khor ba yi// sdug bsngal rgyu mtshan shes pa'o// kun 'byung shes pas las dang ni// nyon mongs rang bzhin shes pa'o// 'gog pa shes pas mi
skye ba'i// chos la gang yang spangs su med// mi mthun phyogs dang sdug bsngal bral// lam shes lam lnga'i mtshan nyid rnams// bye brag shes pa bsgoms pa'i lam// zad pa shes pa bag nyal
gyi// sgrib pa zad par shes pa'o// mi skyo shes pa lhun grub kyi// don la 'gyur med shes pa'o// de rnams mthar phyin lam yin te// lam gyi ye shes 'bras bus bstan// don gyi ye shes thams cad
mkhyen// 'bras bu sku lnga ye shes lnga// gsum mam cig dang gcig tu ni// lhun grub sa la rdzogs par 'gyur// theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtog pa byang chub lam gyi rgyud chen nam mkha' dang mnyam pa
las// byang chub sems dpa'i lam bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// chos nyid bdag med rang rig pa// phyogs su ma lhung kun khyab pa// bdag tu 'dzin pa'i rtag pa de// sems ni yin nam ma yin
zhes// yin na rtag pa ma yin te// sems ni ma dmigs pa yi phyir// dmigs pa med kyang brtags nas ni// rtag par grub pa'i dam bcas nyams// gal te bdag ste dbang phyug gis// byed pa gzhan du 'dod

pa na// dbang phyug mchod dang mi mchod 'grub// mchod 'dod gtsang dang mi gtsang dang// gtsang la 'dod na rang nyid ni// mi gtsang rdzas kyi phung po yis// dbang phyug nyams pa'i skyon du 'gyur// de yis ma

bskyed mchod pa med// mi gtsang mchod kyang 'grub byed na// sems can kun la dbang phyug 'grub// khyod kyis grub mtha'i dgos pa gtor// dbang phyug mi gtsang phung por 'gyur// ci phyir mi gtsang mchod pa'i
don// mchod pa med kyang gzhan byed na// dmyal bar gnas pas dbang phyug grub// ci ste mchod pa mi dgos phyir// de ni khyod kyi 'dod pa ni// dbang phyug 'grub pa don med 'gyur// dmyal ba dmyal bar
gnas gyur pas// dgos na snga ma'i dam bca' 'gal// sems can kun la bdag yod na// sems can skye shi med par 'gyur// bdag ni rtag pa nyid kyi phyir// sems can 'chi yang bdag rtag na// bdag de
sems can min pa'i skyon// sems can skye shi yid rang bzhin// bdag la shi mi med pa yis// gcig pa nyid kyis dam bca' sogs// de phyir khyod kyis bdag rtag pa// brtag pa ma yin nyams pa la// grub

par khas len 'khrul pa'i blo// bdag med don la 'jug par rig/ bdag la ming la don la med// mo gsham bu'i mtshan nyid bzhin// mi rtag chos de brda'i stong// gzhi rtsa bral ba'i chos nyid de// stong pa nyid

la bdag ma grub// ma grub bzhin du snang ba ni// dper na sna tshogs sgyu ma bzhin// rkyen rnams tshogs pa'i rten 'brel gyis// kun rdzob 'khrul pa'i snang ba tsam// yang dag don la 'khrul pa med// cir yang ma
grub cir yang gsal// gsal stong ngo bo nyid kyis bdag/ bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan// mu stegs rigs ngan 'jom par byed// chad par lta ba'i rgyang 'phen pa// rgyu yod 'bras bu med pa

dang// rgyu 'bras gnyis ka mi 'dod dang// rgyu yod 'bras bu mi 'dod na// khyod kyis byas pa don med 'gyur// rgyu yod 'bras bu med pa'i phyir// 'dod na khyod kyi srog 'di nyid// skyes nas 'chi bdag med dam

ci// med na sngon du ma shi bas// da yang mi 'chi sdod pa gang// yod na sngar gyi don dang 'gal// rgyu yod 'bras bu ma grub nyams// sa bon myu gu 'bras bu bzhin// rgyu 'bras rten cing 'brel 'byung gi/ gnas
lugs don gcig ma rtogs na// srid pa'i skye sgo su yis khegs// las kyi rnam smin gang gis bzlog/ las la rnam smin med gyur na// lus la mtshon phug nad mi 'byung// las la 'bras bu med phyir ro// de

nyid las su mi 'dod na// na tsha nyid kyang ma grub ste// lus la las ni med pa'i don// gal te nad ni grub pa na// 'bras bu med pa'i dam bca' nyams// mtshon gyi zug rngu byung bas gsal// mtshon la sdig pa
med pas na// sdig byed mkhan po gang nas grub// ma grub 'dod pas don grub na// lus la na tsha ma mchis so// yang na ro yang na bar rigs// ro dang khyod kyang mtshungs pas so// ro'i khas len bral ba

na// mkhan po ma grub khyod kyi skyon// rnam smin mkhan po sems las byung// sems dge na ni chos kyang dge/ sems mi dge na chos mi dge/ rnam smin rgyu 'bras dngos su gsal// rgyu 'bras snga phyi ma grub
na// phyi ma med pa 'dir yang med// 'di yod gyur na slad ma yod// med na med par su yis shes// gnas skabs 'di yi shes pa tsam// 'di shes gzhan yang shes gyur te// mi shes gnas skabs su'i
byed// mun pa'i klong na gnas skabs med// yod na mun pa'i klong ma yin// sems la snga dang phyi ma med// yod na med pa'i dam bca' nyams// med na snga ma'i bsgrub bya 'gal// med na med par sus mi
shes// yod pa med par gang gis bsgrub// sgrub byed mkhan po ma grub na// bdag gi ba dang log par 'gyur// grub na phyi ma med dang 'gal// byed pa gzhan nas byung ba na// khyod kyis shes pa'i don dang
'gal// gzhan byung rang gis go ba na// bdag min zer ba nyes par 'gyur// gnyis ka ma yin gnyis 'dod na// mngon sum khyod kyis don rnams klag/ yod bzhin med par las spyad pas// glen pa dug la

za ba bzhin// rgyu 'bras rnam smin mi bslu ba'i// sdug bsngal 'bras bu myong bar 'chi// yod la med mthong log pa'i chos// long bas me thab 'phyong ba 'dra// rgyu 'bras mi 'dod gyong re che// rnam par smin la
bros sa med// med la yod 'dzin log pa'i chos// sgyu ma'i ltad mos bslus par mchis// mi rtag sdug bsngal ya re che// yod med rtog spyod rtog ge ba// mun pa'i lam la 'ol tshod byed// sdug

bsngal g.yang la lhung bar mchi// bdag med don cig ma rtogs na// bdag 'dzin 'di kas phung du bcug/ rgya mtsho'i dkyil du rdzings kyis bsgyur// srog dang bral ba'i nad pa la// sman pa'i dgos ched stor ba
bzhin// lta ba log pa'i rnam smin la// thabs gzhan dag gis mi phan pas// lta log gang zag sun phyung la// yang dag lam la gzhug par bya// yang dag ma nor bden pa'i lam// byang chub sems kyi rig pa
'di// rtag pa ma yin mtshan ma bral// chad pa ma yin rig cing gsal// rtag chad mtha' bral gzhi med 'di// kun rdzob sgyu ma bzhin du 'char// sna tshogs rgyu 'bras rten 'brel bden// don dam sgyu mkhan
bzhin du gnas// gzung 'dzin bral bas gnas lugs bden// gnyis su med pa'i brtan pa 'di// phyogs su ma lhung kun tu gsal// ma nor lam 'di sus shes pa// 'khor ba 'di ni mya ngan 'das// nam
yang langs pa'i mun pa bzhin// 'khrul pa mi gnas sdug bsngal grol// bde chen 'od gsal rig pa 'di// rgyal sras de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis// dgongs pa bla na med pa'i don// rtogs par 'dod na ji

bzhin zhog/ ma yengs byas na mngon du 'gyur// rang gis lta ba'i tshul 'dzin pas// shes rab dman pa'i grub mtha' ni// nyan thos sde pa rnam gnyis kyis// phyi rol bzung ba'i yul 'di nyid// rdul phran cha

gnyis 'byar ba yi// rdul gcig bsgrangs pa'i phung po la// snod bcud thams cad skyed pa yi// 'khor ba 'di ni spang 'dod cing// thar pa sgrub par 'dod pa gang// de ni rang nyid yin dang min// 'khor ba rang
nyid yin pa ni// lus yod grib ma mi spong bzhin// 'khor ba spangs pas yongs mi 'gyur// rang nyid min na spang mi dgos// 'od dang mun pa mnyam mi gnas// 'khor ba kun rdzob blo yin na// kun rdzob don
dam gcig mi gcig/ gcig na don dam 'khrul pa yis// 'khor bas 'khor ba gang la yod// mun pas mun pa mi sel bzhin// gal te tha dad gyur pa na// kun rdzob gang du grol bar 'gyur// don dam nyid
dang 'brel med na// sems can thar pa ci la thob// kun rdzob sems can min na ni// 'phags pa kun rdzob min ma srid// gal te yin na thar lam gyi// dgos pa dor bas don med 'gyur// don dam nyid ni
gcig mi gcig/ gcig na don dam 'gyur mi 'gyur// 'gyur na don dam bden pa min// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das mi 'gyur// mi 'gyur don dam 'phags pa yi// chos nyid bden pa yin pa na// sems can
'bad pa med par grol// min na don dam dgos med thal// yang dag ma yin kun rtog phyir// khyod kyis spang bya nyon mongs chos// nyon mongs nyon mongs sems dkrugs pas// mi shes 'khor

ba'i 'dam du bying// byas pa don med sdug bsngal rgyu// 'gog pa'i chos kyis sangs mi rgya// 'o na gang ltar yin zhe na// 'khor ba rang snang yin gyur kyang// ma rig 'khrul pas kun rdzob byung// las kyi rkyen

gyis ngan rtogs shar// zhen na sdug bsngal rang bzhin la// rang snang yin pas mi thar phyin// dri mas dri ma 'khrud pa bzhin// rang snang rang snang sgyur ba la// 'khor ba'i chos la zhen log bsgom// mi dge spang
zhing tshul khrims srungs// goms par gyur na chags pa med// zhen chags bral na sdug bsngal grol// rang snang mi rtag sdug bsngal la// stong pa bdag med bde bsgoms pa// bdag tu 'dzin pa'i nyon mongs
grol// 'dzin pa'i sems yin ma shes kyang// bzung ba'i yul de 'gog pa yin// bsam gtan la ni gnas pa yin// 'khor ba'i rang snang med pa na// de nyid spang yang mi dgos na// spangs kyang 'khor ba

'gog mi 'gyur// ma 'gog 'khor ba rang kha yin// rang dang 'khor ba phan tshun du// pha ri tshu ri gnas mi 'gyur// 'khor tshe 'khor ba'i yul dang ni// rang snang gnyis po gnyis su med// 'gog tshe 'gog pa'i

snang ba dang// rang snang gnyis su ngas ma mthong// snang ba bdag med kun khyab la// bdag tu 'dzin pa'i 'khor ba ste// bdag med phyogs cha theg dman la// phyogs med rtog pa theg chen no// 'khor ba spangs
pa'i bde 'bras ni// rang las thob bam gzhan las byung// rang las byung na bdag med don// 'phags pa'i don dam bden pa de// khyod kyi ting 'dzin gang yin pa// gzhi nas yod dam lam du bskyed// 'bras
bu gang gis thob par 'gyur// gzhi nas yod na sems can rnams// thams cad 'phags pa'i rang bzhin la// bsgrub par bya ba ci la dgos// lam du skyed na rgyu med pa'i// 'bras bu gang nas 'byung bar

'gyur// byung na kun rdzob don dam gang// kun rdzob 'khor ba'i rang snang la// don dam bskyed bya bral ba ste// dmigs med gzugs de su yis mthong// kun rdzob lam du bskyed pa na// mi khom brgyad kyang yon

tan skye// kun rdzob snang ba yod pa'i phyir// sdug bsngal sdug bsngal spyod mi dgos// rgyu med lam las byung ba'i phyir// gzhi la ma rten rgyu med pa'i// 'bras bu thob byed gang 'dod pa// rgyu med 'khor ba ci la
spang// lam med byang chub gang gis sgrub// 'bras bu lam gyis mi skyed phyir// sems can 'bad pa med par grol// yang na 'bad pa don med 'gyur// ting 'dzin bsgom pa don med thal// yod na bsgom pa ci
la dgos// med na bsgom rgyu gang nas byung// yod med gnyis la rtog spyod na// rtog ge 'khor ba'i rtsod gzhi yin// byang chub sa la rtsod gzhi bral// gzhan byung sems can las dang
ni// 'phags pa'i thugs rje gang la bskyed// las la byung na lam ci dgos// 'phags pa'i thugs rjes skyed pa na// de tsam sems can gcig kyang med// rang la byung na gzhan byung 'gags// gsum ka dgos

na rgyu rkyen de// 'dus byas 'jig rten chos su 'gro// 'phags pa'i chos nyid 'dus ma byas// rtogs par 'dod pa'i lam chen po// kun la khyab pa'i chos nyid de// rang la gnas pa'i don phyi ru// rgyu rkyen ldan
pa'i dal 'byor te// log 'khrul zhen pa'i yul rnams spang// zhen med lam gyi dge ba la// gzhan rkyen 'phags pa'i rjes 'jug cing// rang rkyen ma yengs ting 'dzin gyi// rten 'brel tshogs pa'i rang snang

ste// rang sems yin pa'i rtags nyid du// ting 'dzin bstan pa gang thob pa// de dang de'i 'bras bu ni// rang las 'byung ste gzhan las min// yin kyang bu ga'i nam mkha' bzhin// rang gi ting nge 'dzin tsam
la// gzhan gyi don de ma rtogs pas// da rung 'khor ba'i 'dam na gnas// bde chen skam sar thon 'dod na// byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor du// bdag med chos la yang dag spyod// theg pa mchog la blo

gros skyed// ma rig las byung rten 'brel gyis// 'khor ba zo chu'i khyud mo la// zlog ste rang rgyal don 'dod pa// ma rig 'gog pa'i ting 'dzin de// sbyang gzhi gnyen po gcig mi gcig/ snga ma ltar na ma rig
pas// ma rig pas ni sems mi 'gyur// sems ni sems can gdod ma nas// 'khrul pa ci yi phyi ru byung// gnyen po lhan cig gnas pa las// phyi ma ltar na ma rig pa'i// 'joms byed logs na 'dod pa
de// 'gro la sems rgyud gnyis med pas// ma rig spangs pas rigs pa cig/ byed pa gzhan na ma mchis so// byung na thugs med skyon du 'gyur// ma rig pa dang gnyen po gnyis// tha dad gnyis med don la
sgribs// mun pa'i nang du mig 'gags bzhin// sgrib pa'i steng du sgrib pa bsnan// sgrib gnyis thar pa'i gegs yin pas// de'i mun pa gang gis sel// thugs rje ldan pa'i 'od zer gyis// sel lam gzhan

gyis snang mi nus// sgron me mun pa chung sel yang// nyi ma'i 'od la sgron me mun// nyan thos rang rgyal ye shes kyang// byang chub sems dpa'i sgrib pa yin// de phyir theg chen nam mkha'i don// shes rab blo
yis spyad par bya// ma rig rang snang 'khrul pa ste// 'khrul pa sna tshogs rang rig tu// bla ma'i drin gyis rtogs pa yis// dper na dmus long mig phye bzhin// skye med sems kyis don rtogs pas// 'gags
med rig pa kun tu gsal// ma rig sgrib pa rang sar dag/ gzung 'dzin bral bas byang chub sems// bde ba chen po'i sa la spyod// dang po'i byang chub sems de ni// bdag gzhan sems
can thams cad la// yod dam phyogs ris gnas she na// 'o ma la ni mar khyab bzhin// phyogs ris med par kun la khyab// gal te phyogs cha gyur pa na// rgyu med 'bras bu mi 'byung ba// kun la sems skyed

don med 'gyur// 'o na mi khom gnas rnams na// rgyur gyur ma yin gang gis rkyen// dper na 'o ma mar gyi rgyu// snod dang srubs shing bskyed nas 'byung// ma bskyed mar mi 'byung ba bzhin// dal 'byor ma thob
mi khom gnas// nam zhig thob tshe sems bskyed 'gyur// sems can sangs rgyas snying po can// kun la khyab pas gzhi ru brtags// bskyed du yod pas sa bon la// ma rig pas ni 'phra mos te// bsgrang du yod
pas lam zhes bya// 'bras bu 'byung phyir rgyu yin no// gang zhig byang chub sems bskyed pa// nus pa yod dam med nas bskyed// yod na sems bskyed mi dgos te// me la me bskyed mi dgos bzhin// med na

bskyed kyang don mi 'byung// sprang pos rgyal por bskyed byas kyang// de'i bya ba mi 'grub bo// dper na gzhon nu mi chen gyis// nus pa med kyang 'dun yod pas// nam zhig cher gyur grub pa bzhin// dang po'i
las can gang zag la// nus pa med kyang smon pa yis// dus tshod sems bskyed kun don 'grub// nus pa yod nas ma bskyed na// gter gyi nor bzhin mi phan pas// stobs dang nus pa gang yod kyis// 'jug
pa sems bskyed gang byas la// de'i don rnams 'grub par 'gyur// sems bskyed gzhan gyis don 'grub pa// 'brel pa med dam yod nas 'grub// med na chu'i me'i don// mi 'grub bzhin du 'brel med
pas// sems gnyis gcig tu mi 'dres pas// sems bskyed gzhan gyis don mi 'grub// yod na de dang de byung ngam// bdag nyid gcig pa'i 'brel ba yod// snga ma ltar na khyod gzhan nam// gzhan ni khyod la
byung ba yin// kun rdzob de dang der 'byung gis// rang gzhan gnyis ka rten 'brel yin// don dam bdag med gcig pa yi// rtog pa sna tshogs mtha' yas kyang// sems can thams cad sems gcig
pas// sems bskyed mkhan dang sems bskyed yul// gnyis med byang chub sems bskyed pas// sems bskyed bzhin du kun don 'grub// bdag grol tsam na gzhan yang grol// bdag nyid ji 'dra sems can
kun// de 'dra chos kun gnas lugs gcig/ tha dad so sor 'gro gyur na// byang chub sems kyi dgos pa stor// gnas skabs tsam gyis phan byed pa// las kyis bsdas pa'i 'gro ba la// pha ma bu tsha sems
gcig pas// 'brel pa yod kyang so sor 'gro// byang chub sems la 'du 'bral med// thams cad rang rig byang chub nyid// rang nyid bcings na kun yang bcings// rang dang gzhan nyid gcig

pa'i phyir// gzhan nyid bcings na rang yang bcings// gzhan dang rang nyid gcig pa'i phyir// gcig la 'char lugs tha dad pa// sgo lnga dbang po so sor gsal// der byung snang ba sna tshogs te// don ni sems
la 'das pa med// yal 'dab mang yang sdong po'i ngos// gzhan du 'gyur ba med bzhin du// bdag gzhan don gnyis 'grub pa'i sa// byang chub sems kyi 'bras bu de// bdag nyid mngon par sangs rgyas
tshe// 'khrul pa'i sems can snang 'gyur na// sangs rgyas gnyis snang rtogs can 'gyur// sems can 'khrul snang ma mchis na// thams cad mkhyen pa'i dgos pa stor// rang la sku gnyis snang gyur ni// gnyis

med chos sku don la bsgribs// chos skus kun la ma khyab na// sangs rgyas yon tan ma mchis te// ye shes med na nyon mongs dngos// bag la nyal ba yod ma srid// yod na de'i rgyu mtshan shod// byang chub sems
kyi gnas lugs ni// thog med dus nas ma rig pas// nyon mongs rang gsal sna tshogs 'di// 'khor ba kun rdzob bden par shar// rang gis gnyen por rang nyid kyi// lta sgom spyod pa'i sems bskyed
kyi// 'khor ba rang snang sems su rtogs// rjes shes rmi lam sgyu ma tsam// mnyam par bzhag pa 'od gsal dang// byang chub sems dpa' mnyam rjes la// 'khor 'das gnyis snang sgyu ma tsam// nam yin

langs pa'i mun pa 'dra// mnyam rjes med pa chos kyi sku// mun sangs nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra// bu tsa'i dus kyi snang ba de// che mir gyur nas med gyur kyang// bu tsa'i byed spyod mtshan nyid shes// shes kyang bu

tsar mi ldog bzhin// sangs rgyas 'khor bar mi snang yang// 'khor ba'i dus kyi mtshan nyid shes// shes kyang shes bya'i sgrib pa med// sangs rgyas 'khor bar mi ldog ste// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin mya ngan
'das// sangs rgyas min pa'i sems can med// sems can thams cad sangs rgyas pas// gnyis med chos sku khyab brdal la// nyon mongs rang bzhin ye shes su// bag la ma nyams mngon sum du// 'gag
med ye shes phyogs med gsal// rig pa rang gsal rdo rje 'di// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa yi// thams cad mkhyen pa rnams gnyis po// dbyer med gcig pa sku gcig ste// de las spros na thams cad

mkhyen// sems can mos pa ji lta ba// sangs rgyas sku yang de dang mnyam// sangs rgyas 'gro don gang mdzad pa// gdul bya de dang mtshungs pa 'byung// chu zla mkha' zla de bzhin no// byang chub sems kyi 'bras bu
yin// gzhi lam 'bras gsum rang yin pas// rang 'byung ye shes ming du 'bod// sems can thams cad rang yin pas// byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes// thams cad mkhyen pa'i sangs
rgyas yin// sems can rang snang ma yin na// sangs rgyas gcig gi thugs rjes kyang// gdod nas sems can gcig kyang med// thams cad thad ka'i rang snang yin// sangs rgyas re la gdul bya re// gdul bya
re la sangs rgyas re// gnyis su med par mnyam pa nyid// 'khor ba dong sprugs ma yin pa// lhag ma gcig kyang mi 'ong ngo// ji srid sems de yod kyi bar// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis ka yod// sems kyi
gzung 'dzin grol tsam na// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med do// gnyis med chos sku kun tu bzang// ngan pa bya ba rdul tsam med// bzang po ji bzhin sa dag la// kun nas kun tu bzang thob shog/ theg

chen po yis mngon par rtogs// byang chub lam gyi rgyud chen nam mkha' dang mnyam pa las// rtsod pa gzhi med du grol bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// snang zhing
srid pa'i chos rnams kun// sems la ma 'dus chos gzhan med// sems nyid kun gyi rtsa ba ste// ma rig pa de 'khor ba'i gzhi// rig pa'i sems de myang 'das gzhi// 'bras bu thams cad skyed par byed// kun

la khyab pas mkha' lta bu// dper na dpag bsam sdong po la// yal ga lo 'dab me tog dang// 'bras bu shun pa dri bsung ni// lo re zla re zhag re zhing// 'byung ste 'gro ba'i 'dod bsgrubs kyang// shing ni slar
zhing cher 'phel nas// rtsal rdzogs myu gur mi bzlog par// sdong pos 'dod dgu 'byung ba bzhin// byang chub sems kyi chos nyid 'di// ma rtogs 'gro ba sems can gyis// rang snang rtog pa ji bzhin

sgrub// rtog 'dod sems kyi ting 'dzin gyis// rang rang blo dang gang 'tshams pa'i// theg pa rim pa sna tshogs pa'i// der 'dod de'i don rnams grub// theg pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyang// gang zag 'dod pa tha dad
la// thabs kyis drang phyir bstan pa las// blo chen shes rab ldan pa las// de rnams thams cad don gcig par// byang chub sems kyi yon tan gyi// gnas skabs dus kyi 'bras bu yin// sems las ma byung
yon tan med// thams cad sems kyi cho 'phrul la// thad ka'i spyod yul 'bras bu ni// phyogs med rgyun du rang sar 'byung// blo chung theg dman phyogs rigs can// rang snang med pa gzhan mi rtogs// rtogs
na theg pa gcig tu 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' chen po'o// rang rang 'dod pa'i blo bzhin du// dgos 'dod rgyun mi 'chad spyad kyang// 'dzad pa med pa'i byang chub sems// thams cad dbyer med chos
