dbyings ngang// stobs dang yon tan cher skyes nas// bdag gzhan don gnyis 'grub pa yin// rig pa kun mkhyen ye shes su// rtsal rdzogs bde ba chen po de// phyir mi ldog pa rdo rje'i
sku// thams cad kun mkhyen kun don grub// sangs rgyas sems can don byed kyang// sangs rgyas 'khor bar ldog pa min// thugs rje'i 'od kyi nyi ma bzhin// sems can snang ngor sangs rgyas byon// sangs
rgyas gshegs bzhud mi mnga' 'o// chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos par// kun dang skad cig 'du 'bral med// dmus long rang lus mi mthong bzhin// ma rig pa la rig pa dka'// rigs pa rang byung sgron me
'di// mun pa kun sel 'od chen po// 'od gsal thams cad mkhyen pa yin// zhes bka' stsal to// theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa byang chub lam gyi rgyud chen nam mkha' dang mnyam pa las// byang chub

sems kyi 'bras bu dpe dang bcas pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// rgya mtsho lta bu'i sde snod kyi// snying po yid bzhin nor 'dra ba'i// byang chub sems kyi rgyud chen 'di// spyan ras gzigs dbang 'gro

'dul ba'i// byams pa mgon po khyod la gtad// khyod kyis rgyud chen 'gro ba'i don// dpag bsam shing chen rgyas bzhin spyod// ma 'ongs dus na khyod kyi rigs// byang chub sems kyi rgyud 'dzin cing// su gang
nga'i dgongs pa 'grol// rgyal bas byin brlabs thugs dbang sras// bde chen lam las phyir mi ldog/ byang chub dam pa mngon du byed// blo gros ldan pa gang zhig gis// shes rab spyan gyis rtogs par
'gyur// mos sam 'dzin pas tshig re yi// don la 'jug pa'i rigs kyi bu// 'khor ba bsnyil bas don chen 'di// legs par zung la yid la chongs// nga'i bstan pa gnas kyi bar// rgyud mchog 'gro ba'i don

byed 'gyur// de nas dga' ldan gnas su 'gro// lha dang mi rnams grol bar byed// gang zhig nga min nga'i chos// tshul 'dra spyod pas rtsod par 'gyur// bdud kyis byin rlabs glags ltas te// byang chub sems
rgyud brdzi mi nus// slar zhing rgyud 'dzin don cher 'gyur// 'di nyid bcang ba'i rigs kyi bu// sa phyogs gang gnas rgyal ba rnams// byin brlobs sems can gang 'brel ba// theg chen sa la rim gyis
'gro// mi dang mi min rigs tshogs rnams// 'di nyid thos pas don ldan te// bdud kyis glags skabs mi rnyed cing// ngan song gnas grol thar pa thob// gang gis gtsug tu bcangs pa de// bla med byang chub
phyir mi ring// 'di don rtogs pa'i rigs kyi bu// 'khor bar gnas kyang mya ngan 'das// yon tan kun gyi mdzod 'dzin pa'i// rgyal bar 'gyur gyis e ma ho// zhes bka' stsal pa dang// de 'khor thams cad
yi rangs te// ston pa'i gsung la mngon par bstod// byang chub sems kyi snying po don// rgyal ba'i dgongs pa bla med 'di// gang gis bcangs pa'i rigs kyi bu// rgyal ba rnams dang dbyer med
pa'i// yon tan dam pa thob par shog/ de nyid mthong ngam thos pas kyang// log rtog bdud kyi tshogs zhi nas// mos pas lam la 'khod par shog/ de'i ming ngam kha dog gam// rus pa dag gis rjes kyi

yang// 'gro ba'i 'dod pa tshim par shog/ de nyid gnas pa'i sa phyogs su// theg pa chen po'i chos spyod cing// sna tshogs dga' ba nyid du shog/ 'di spyod myur du sangs rgyas shing// de dang mnyam par gdul bya
kun// myur du 'khor ba dong sprugs shog/ bdag cag rnams kyang de'i dus// 'phrin las 'grub pa'i grogs byed cing// gnyis su med pa'i dpal du shog/ gnyis med 'byor pa dam pa yis// mgon po'i zhing
khams bde chen du// sku gsum sa la 'khod par shog/ theg pa chen po'am mngon par rtogs pa byang chub lam gyi rgyud chen nam mkha' dang mnyam pa las/ rjes su gtad cing yi rang ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun

pa'o//// theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtog pa byang chub lam gyi rgyud chen nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so//// o rgyan gyi mkhan po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang// lo tsA ba lcog ro klu'i

rgyal mtshan gyis// rdo rje gdan gyi gtsug lag khang chen por bsgyur ba'o// phyis chos rgyal khri srong lde btsan gyis// bsam yas dbu rtse rigs gsum gyi yang stengs su zhus nas// u rgyan gyis rang 'gyur du
mdzad nas gsungs pa'o// sa ma ya rgya rgya rgya//// e ma sangs rgyas bstan pa rin chen gyi// sde snod nam mkha' lta ba'i bcud// byang chub lam gyi rgyud chen 'di// stong gsum gzhan na ma mchis

pa'i// rgyal ba'i bka' lung bdag la gtad// bdag nyid pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis// 'dzam gling gzhan du ma spel bar// phyi rab lnga brgya'i tha ma la// chos rnams tshig tu tha snyad dus// rgyud mchog 'di yis phan
gdags phyir// yi ger bkod nas gter du sbas// o rgyan rigs 'dzin thugs kyi sras// las can cig dang phrad par shog/ gter srungs mkha' 'gro dam can gyis// thub par srungs cig sa ma yA/ sbas rgya/

gter rgya/ e ma ho/ bdag 'dra rin chen gling pa la// o rgyan pad+ma'i thugs rje yis// bka' lung rje'i phyag nas byung// zab mo thugs kyi dgongs gter bton// nyams len rgya gar yul du byas// sgrub rtags
o rgyan yul du bstan// 'gro don bod kyi yul du byas// dga' ldan gnas su dgongs pa rdzogs// bde ba can du don gnyis rdzogs// gter chos zab mo rgya mtsho nas// khyad mchog byang chub lam rgyud
'di// o rgyan thugs kyi dgongs gter nas// lcag po 'brug la gdan drangs nas// bla ma'i bka' bzhin shog ser nas// zhal bshus bka' shog dag la ni// me pho khyi'i lo la mnan// 'di
dus ngo mtshar can gyi rtags// bsam gyis mi khyab brjod las 'das// yin kyang Da ki'i bka' rgyas btab// gter nas gdan drangs zhal bshus pa'i// yi ge 'di nyid mthong thos dran// yid la mos byed dpe
mtshon nas// mkha' mnyam 'gro kun ma lus pa// rgyud 'di dgongs pa lon nas su// myur du sangs rgyas thob par shog/ maM g+ha la wa tu/ rgya rgya rgya////

o rgyan gyi skad du/ bod skad du/ byin gyis brlabs pa'i// yi ge klad du smos pa'o// e ma ho/ rgya gar skad du/ pha la a nuta tar gu h+ya ta na tra mahA bi ma la hri daM yA nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'bras bu
gsang ba bla na med pa'i rgyud chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs lnga'i ngo bo dkyil

'khor thams cad kyi bdag nyid chen po kun tu snang ba'i rdo rje snying po nyid 'og min gyi zhing khams snang stong 'od kyi gzhal yas khang/ gdul bya'i bsam pa ji ltar 'dod pa dang mthun pa'i pho brang kun tu mdzes
shing/ rgya dang tshad las 'das pa phyi nang kun tu gsal ba'i nang na/ rig pa rang byung gi 'khor tshogs zhi ba dang/ khro bo dang/ khro mo rnams dang thabs cig tu/ dus gsum 'du 'bral med par bzhugs

so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las kyi snying po ye shes kyi 'od zer/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can thams cad til la mar gyis khyab pa bzhin du/

byin gyis brlabs nas khyab par mdzad de chos kyi nyid rang sgra 'di ltar byung// nam mkha'i mtha' klas gyur pa ru// til la mar ni ji bzhin du// bde gshegs snying pos 'gro kun khyab// snod min sems can
gang yang med// thams cad gnas lugs gcig gi ngang// zhes byung ngo// der bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can re re la yang/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi
khyab pas so so'i don mdzad pa med pa'i mdzad pa/ gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud bstan pa las/ ma rig gtum po'i rigs can rnams// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje de// rtogs shing go bar ma gyur
pas// rang rang mun pas rang nyid bsgribs// rang byung ye shes rang la gtor// ma rig pa la mu mtha' med// rang gi las kyis bde sdug spyod/ kha chus 'thums pa'i srin bu bzhin// rang gis rang 'thums
mkha' dang mnyam// de la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po'i 'od zer gyis// gdul dka' ba'i 'gro ba rnams kyi don du// gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje chos zhu ba por mngon par sprul
te// rgyal ba'i chos dbyings pho brang na// sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin du// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'chang// gnyis med gyur kyang ma rig pas// las kyi srid pa mun 'thoms pas// nam mkha' lta
bu'i thugs rje'i// snying po nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis// mun bsal rang snang rig pa la// sku gsung thugs kyi 'bras bu yis// snying po'i don rgyud bshad du gsol// ces gsol pa dang// de nas bcom ldan 'das

kyis ye shes sgyu ma'i sku ru bstan cing// nges med tshangs pa'i gsung rgyun mi 'chad par// ci yang mi gsung ba'i tshul gyis zhal bzhes pa// legs so dpal ldan rdo rje chos// 'khor 'das gnyis la khyab pa
yi// rgyud mchog gsang ba snying po 'di// ma rig las dang nyon mongs la// yengs pas 'khor ba rang sdug spyod// ma yengs sangs rgyas kun gyi lam// rtse gcig gus pas su nyan pa// nga yis legs par bshad

par bya'o// som nyi ma mchis nyams su long// zhes bka' stsal to// 'bras bu gsang ba bla na med pa'i rgyud chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas gsang ba'i bdag
po yis// bcom ldan 'das la slar gsol pa// kye kye thams cad mkhyen pa'i bcom ldan 'das// kun la khyab pa'i rdo rje sems// dngos su gsal yang ma rig pas// sgrib gsal snying po'i rgyud mchog
'di// gus pas nyan phyir legs par gsungs// zhes gsol pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thog mar sngags kyi chos la bdud med par bya ba'i ched du/ bdud 'joms byed kyi sngags 'di gsungs

so// hUM phaT/ mA ra ya/ mA ra ya/ ka ra ya/ ka ra ya/ gardza ya/ gardza ya/ tardza ya/ tardza ya/ gr-i h+na gr-i h+na/ pa ya pa ya b+ha d+ha b+ha d+ha/ spo ta spo ta/ dza la dza la swA hA/ zhes bzlas pas/ bdud ni thar pa'i bar chad
de// bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i seng ge sgras// bdud kyi dpung rnams brlag par bya// gsang sngags chos la bdud med pas// myur du 'bras bu thob par byed// bdud kyi rang 'byung ye shes grol// bdud med
snying po'i chos 'di la// 'gro kun sangs rgyas snying po can// de nyid ma rig 'khrul pas bsgribs// de nyid dag pa sangs rgyas nyid// dag pa rang byung ye shes yin// rang byung ye shes gnas lugs
gsum// dngos po'i gnas lugs lam dang ni// 'bras bu bskyed pa'i rim pa la// ji bzhin nyid kyis gnas lugs de// kun gzhi rnam shes gzung 'dzin rgyud// phyi nang snod bcud gnyis su chags// chags
pa las grol lam gyi rgyud// rnam par smin pa'i lus la ni// rdo rje rtsa'i gnas lugs chags// rlung gis de'i rtsal skyed cing// thig le skyon yon thams cad byed// de yis skyed pas 'bras bu'i
rgyun// 'khor 'das lhan cig skyes pa 'di// rmi lam dbang gis rtogs byas nas// grol lam thabs la mkhas pa yis// zhen bral bskyed pa'i rim pa dang// de nyid mngon gyur rdzogs rim don// rig
pa thabs kyi che bas myur// yid bzhin nor bu'i dgos 'dod bzhin// sku dang ye shes longs spyod pa// rigs 'dzin sa la mi bzlog pa'i// gtad rgya lung dang bcas pa 'dir// snying po'i don rnams ma lus
rdzogs// gang zhig 'di'i dgongs 'grel ba/ mdor bstan rgyas bshad tshul gyis bshad// ces bka' stsal to// 'bras bu gsang ba bla na med pa'i rgyud chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po las/ mdo byang khog
dbubs bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// gsang ba'i bdag pos yang gsol ba// 'khor 'das thams cad bskyed pa'i gzhi// rang bzhin gshis kyi gnas lugs de// mngon shes mkhyen pas bshad
du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ e ma ho/ phyag na rdo rje stobs po che/ khyod kyis zhus pa'i don de nyid/ bstan du med de rtogs su yod// nga yis bshad kyis legs par zung// 'khor 'das

ma lus skyed pa'i gzhi// ci yang ma grub chos kyi dbyings// kun la khyab cing yangs pa'i klong// skye ba med cing 'gag pa med// phyogs rigs med cing mtha' dang bral// thog mtha' 'gro 'ong snga phyi med/ kha dog
dbyibs med gzung 'dzin 'das// rgyun chad gsal 'grib med pa 'di// ye shes nam mkha'i dbyings lta bu// kun la khyab pa'i chos nyid kyi// rig pa rang rtsal dngos med 'di// skye med ngang las skye ba

yis// sna tshogs cho 'phrul ci yang ston// 'gag med ngang las 'gag pa'i tshul// mtshan ma mi dmigs dbyings su grol// dus med ngang las dus gsum gyi// snga phyi 'gro 'ong thams cad bsgrangs// rang bzhin
med las kha dog dbyibs// gzugs dang mtshan ma cir yang gsal// phyogs rigs med las bdag dang gzhan// bzang ngan legs nyes sna tshogs 'char// grub pa med las mngon sum du// snang srid 'khor
'das thams cad grub// bcos pa med pas rang 'byung du// thams cad rtsol med shugs las 'byung// bzung du mtshan ma'i dngos po med// yengs su gnas lugs gsal 'grib med// sgrub tu rang las

gzhan ma grub// spang du rang gzhan gnyis mi phyed// 'gag tu 'od gsal rgyun chad med// skye ru snang ba spros dang bral// mtha' bral nyag gcig thig le 'di// thams cad chos kyi dbyings su sdud// thams cad
ma lus bskyed pa'i gzhi// sa gzhi bzhin du g.yo ba med// thams cad ma lus bgrod pa'i lam// nam mkha' bzhin du thug pa med// thams cad ma lus sgrub pa'i don// nor bu bzhin du 'dzad pa
med// thams cad ma lus gcig pa'i rgyud// chu bo bzhin du rgyun chad med// thams cad ma lus snang byed pas// nyi zla bzhin du gsal 'grib med// thams cad gnas lugs don la gcig/ spros dang bral
ba'i chos nyid de// de la mkhan po su yang med// gdod nas rang bzhin lhun grub yin// rang bzhin gnas lugs 'od gsal de// skye ba med pas stong pa yin// 'gag pa med pas dngos po yin// gnyis su
med pas gnas lugs yin// ma rig 'khrul pas 'khor ba yin// rig cing rtogs pas myang 'das yin// gnyis su med pas chos nyid yin// gzung 'dzin skyes pas nyon mongs yin// rang bzhin shes na ye
shes yin// gnyis su med pas 'od gsal yin// bag la nyal na mun pa yin// thol gyis skyes na rtogs pa yin// gnyis su med pa snang ba yin// yin dang ma yin gnyis su med// gnas lugs ma bcos

brjod pa bral// gnas lugs rang rtsal rgyu rkyen gyis// rten cinga'abrel ba rang byung ni// dper na ljon pa'i sa bon de// myu gu bskyed de myu gu min// myu gus sdong skyed sdong po min// sdong po nyid kyang sa bon
min// de rnams ljon pa'i don du gcig/ de bzhin gnas lugs gcig las su// gzhi yi lam bskyed lam ma yin// lam gyi mthar phyin 'bras bu ste// 'bras bu lam dang gzhi ma yin// de rnams gzhan du
gyur pa min// gnas lugs gcig la spyod pa yis// 'khor ba'i dus na myang 'das min// mya ngan 'das pa 'khor ba min// 'khor 'das thams cad gnyis su med// snang ba'i dus na stong pa min// stong pa'i
dus na snang ba min// gdod nas snang stong gnyis su med// nyon mongs pa la ye shes med// ye shes pa la nyon mongs med// nyon mongs ye shes gnyis su med// sems can 'khrul pa sangs rgyas min// sangs
rgyas sems can 'khrul mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su med// gnyis med gnyis snang la sogs pa// gnas lugs ma 'gags cir yang snang// dper na za 'ug snam bu bzhin// chos kyi dbyings
su thams cad gcig/ snang srid rnam pa sna tshogs kyang// don gcig nyid la spyod pa la// dper na bu ram mngar ba'o// dbyibs dang kha dog gang byas kyang// mngar ba'i ro la 'gyur med bzhin// gnas
lugs ngo bo 'gyur ba med// 'gyur med don rtogs rang rig pa// 'gyur ba med pa'i rdo rje gdan// de'i steng du sangs rgyas 'byung// 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur lhun rdzogs pas// gsang chen rab bdal gzugs
can bdag/ 'khor 'das dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang// mi 'gyur kun 'gro khyab pa po// gnas lugs rnam pa mang bshad kyang// mdor bsdus gnas lugs rnam pa gsum// skye med gzhi'i gnas
lugs la// ma bcos 'gyur ba med pa de// dper na gser gyi kha dog 'dra// 'gag med lam gyi gnas lugs de// sna tshogs snang ba ro gcig ste// dper na shel gyi gzugs brnyan 'dra// gnyis med 'bras
bu'i gnas lugs te// thams cad gcig las byung ba ste// dper na nam mkha'i dbyings dang 'dra// gnas lugs mtshon pa'i yul 'das kyang// mtshon byed dpe yis ma bstan na// yang dag de don mi rtogs

pas// brda don tshig gis mtshon pa tsam// don la mtshon bya mtshon byed 'das// ngo bo nyid kyis mtha' dang bral// 'bras bu gsang ba bla na med pa'i rgyud chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po las/ gzhi chos nyid
gshis kyi gnas lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// thog ma med pa'i chos nyid de// skye ba med pa'i ngang nyid las// dper na nam mkha' rang rtsal las// dus mnyam 'byung ba skyes pa
bzhin// 'gag pa med pa'i sems nyid du// phyogs med kun tu gsal ba la// der 'dzin yod la bzung yul med// 'khor 'das gang du ma grub pa'i// rang ngo ma shes bag la nyal// kun gzhi ma rig sems

zhes bya// kun gzhi chos nyid rgya mtsho las// snying po rang rtsal rig pa de// yul du rtog pa'i rlung bkod nas// rnam shes sna tshogs rba rlabs 'phros// gzung 'dzin gnyis su snang bar 'gyur// rgya mtsho dang ni rba

rlabs gnyis// tha dad med bzhin rnam shes dang// sems nyid gnyis su med gyur kyang// rang du ma rig gzhan du 'khrul// dper na dar gyi srin bu de// rang gi kha chus 'thums pa bzhin// ma rig 'khrul pa'i
gzung 'dzin te// sus kyang ma bcings rang gis bcings// bcing bar bya ba yod min te// nga dang bdag tu bzung ba yi// kun gyis mkha' la mdud pa bor// don gyi bcings med grol med de// ye nas chos
nyid dbyings su gnas// ma 'gags pa yis ci yang 'gyur// gzung 'dzin gnyis kyis rang rtog gis// bdag dang gzhan du so so ru// chags sdang khams drug nyon mongs drug/ gzugs med gzugs khams
'dod khams kyi// rnam rtog las kyi 'khrul pa shar// sems ni kun gyi sa bon te// rang gi rgyu rkyen las tshogs pas// 'bras bu khams gsum rigs drug na// gnas dang longs spyod lus la sogs// bde sdug

rnam pa sna tshogs myong// rang gi las la spyod pa yin// rnam rtog 'phel 'grib skye 'gag can// 'dzad med zo chu'i khyud bzhin 'khor// rig pa mngon du ma gyur na// rang sems 'khrul pa'i mun rum la// nyon
mongs sna tshogs sems dkrugs shing// zad med 'phel ba med pa ru// byis pa gyi nar 'khyams par 'gyur// sems nyid cig gi gnas lugs la// mig btsir zla ba gnyis mthong
bzhin// gnyis med don la gnyis su 'khrul// 'khrul ba'i gzung 'dzin a 'thas pas// rang snang log pas gzhan du mthong// dper na mtho mi thag pa sbrul// mthong bas dngangs skrag brgyal ba bzhin// rang

gis rang la phyin ci log/ sdug bsngal sna tshogs dngangs skrag myong// dper na sgyu mas bslus pa bzhin// byed pa gzhan na ma mchis par// rang dang gzhan gyi rtog pa la// bde sdug rnam pa sna tshogs myong// sna
tshogs gzugs can yid la skyes// nga ru 'dzin pa'i yid las su// gzhan na yod pa ma yin pas// sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kun// bden med sgyu ma bzhin du ltos// gzung 'dzin gnyis kyi rtog pa'i
yul// sna tshogs snang ba gang shar la// chags sdang rtog pa ma zhugs pa'i// sems nyid 'od gsal me long la// der 'dzin med par bzhag pa ni// rab kyis skad cig sems grol 'gyur// sems kyi rnam rtog
gang skyes la// sems kyis sems la ltas pas su// rang bzhin med par shes pa yis// shes rab pha rol phyin pa yin// lam de nyid la spyod pas grol// rtog pa sna tshogs tha dad la// gcig 'gag tsam na
gcig skye bas// dngos 'dzin snang ba zhi dka' ste// mang po btul gyis mi lang bas// mang po gnyen por gcig btang zhing// gcig po grol bar dka' ba la// gcig gi gnyen por mang po btang// rab
kyis gang skyes rtog pa la// rang rang gnyen po stobs che ste// dug gsum gnyen por dug gsum btang// dug gsum rang sar grol bar 'gyur// 'bring gis gnyen po bzlog bsgom gtang// snga ma'i rtog pa
grol ba mchog/ gang gang de'i gnyen po yis// rims kyis brda brda bsnyags bsnyags nas// rtog pa choms pa zhi ba'i chos// rtogs par gyur na thams cad kun// dper na sbrul gyi mdud pa bzhin// bcings
grol thams cad rang nyid las// gud nas med pas rnam par dag/ rnam rtog 'khrul pa mang yod kyang// mdor bsdus zhen dang ma zhen gnyis// mngon zhen sems kyi rtog pa la// yun rings dus nas 'dod

zhen kun// nam zla dros pa'i chab rom bzhin// rims kyis dngos 'dzin grol ba la// blo bur thol skyes rtog pa de// rgya mtsho'i chu dang chu rlabs bzhin// skad cig rang shar rang grol te// rnam par rtog pa gang
shar yang// gcig shar tsam na gcig nyid 'gags// mi grol rnam rtog gang yang med// tha mal rtog pa rang kha yang// gcig gi gnyen po gcig gis byed// rnam rtog thams cad rgyun du med// mun pa'i lam
la sgron me bzhin// rnam rtog 'phel 'grib skye 'gag can// rnam rtog las ni rnam rtog dag/ rnam rtog las ni rnam rtog skyes// rnam rtog sems kyi byed pa yin// srid zhi sems kyi rtog pa'o// skye
ba med las skyes pa yis// 'gag pa med pa'i sems nyid 'di// skyes tsam nyid na skye med pa// gnas lugs mtshan nyid ma nges pas// sna tshogs snang ba cir yang shar// shar ba thams cad rang yin

yang// dper na smyon pa rang nyid kyis// rang ngo ma shes gzhan du 'khrul// rang la chags dang spyod pa bzhin// ma shes ma rig 'khrul pa yang// ma rig pa la ma rig pa'i// rtog tshogs 'khor ba 'khor lugs

de// gang shar snang ba mngon sum du// chos rnams thams cad bden pa la// rang bzhin ma shes kun rdzob yin// kun rdzob phyi nang gsang gsum ste// phyi ni snod kyi 'jig rten 'di// 'byung ba lnga las grub pa

yang// kun rdzob sems kyi snang ba ste// kun rdzob mi rtag 'jig pa yin// sems kyi gzung 'dzin gnas kyi bar// 'byung ba lnga yang gang bzung rtag/ gang du yang ni 'jig pa med// sems kyi gzung 'dzin zhig
tsam na// 'byung ba lnga yang zhig las te// 'byung ba lnga po rang gi sems// de las skyes tshad thams cad sems// sems med pa las 'byung ba med// sems ni sa ru byung ba ste// lci ba ru ni gnas pas

te// sems 'phos lus las sa med pas// ro ni chu'i steng du lding// chu ni sems las byung bas na// lus nyid brlan du gnas pa yin// gal te chu nyid gzhan du na// shi ba'i ro la khrag mi 'byung// rnam shes
me ru byung bas na// lus la drod du 'bar bar nges// shi ba'i lus la drod mi 'byung// rnam shes rlung gi lus dag la// 'byung 'jug dbugs kyi g.yo bar byed// ye shes 'phos pa'i lus la ni// dbugs med

pas ni sa rdo bzhin// rnam par shes pa nam mkha' ste// mdangs dang kha dog rnams 'byed do// shi ba'i ro la mdangs med cing// go 'byed srog ni ma mchis pas// 'byung ba phyi nang thams cad kun// sems la

lhan cig skyes pa yin// nang du khams drug rigs drug sogs// g.yo ba bcud kyi sems can du// gzung dang 'dzin pa phung po lnga// dbang po lnga dang yul lnga dang// rnam shes nyon mongs lnga la sogs// thams
cad sems kyi rang snang yin// sems las ma gtogs phyi rol na// rdul tsam skad cig grub pa med// rang sems yin pas rmi lam du// thams cad sems la snang bar 'char// bar du bdag gzhan gnyis snang

gi/ rgyu rkyen rten 'brel las byung ba'i// blo bur rnam rtog gang skyes pa'i// snang ba skye 'gag 'phel 'grib can// bde sdug rnam pa sna tshogs kun// 'khrul snang ye shes rtog pa yin// gang tshe gang snang sems kyi
gzugs/ kha dog dbyibs dang che chung sogs// dus tshod gnas skabs de bzhin yin// ma rig 'khor ba rang sems la// 'khor ba ma yin gzhan du 'dod// phyi rol rtag chad sems yin

la// nyan thos rang rgyal 'khor ba spong// byang chub sems dpa' lam gyis sbyang// sngags kyis bsgyur dang shes byed pa'i// so so ma yin tha dad pa'i// theg pa sna tshogs ting 'dzin sems// sems ma yin pa'i

chos med pa'i// rgya mtsho'i chu la skyogs gang tsam// bcus pas de'i don byed bzhin// theg pa rim pa'i chos rnams la// rang dang mthun pa'i bden pa ni// thad kar 'byung ba sems yin no// dmus long tshogs
kyis glang ltas pas// glang gcig tha dad mthong ba bzhin// sems nyid gcig gi gnas lugs la// gang zag blo rigs tha dad pas// theg pa sna tshogs tha dad bkrol// yod ni gcig las med pa la// byung
ni theg pa dgu ru byung// 'chad pa theg pa gsum du bshad// bstan ni rnam pa gnyis su bstan// 'dus pa theg pa chen por 'dus// yin pa thams cad sems yin te// khyab pa snod bcud kun la khyab// gnas
pa chos nyid dbyings la gnas// gsal ba rang rig thad kar gsal// byas pa snang srid thams cad byas// grub pa gang yang grub pa med// snang ba gang yang ma 'gags snang// bstan du mtshan ma'i dngos po
med// mthong du dmigs pa'i yul las 'das// brjod du don dam spros dang bral// spros dang bral ba'i sems nyid las// 'khor ba myang 'das nga yi sems// kun rdzob don dam nga yi sems// nyon mongs ye
shes nga yi sems// sems can sangs rgyas nga yi sems// bde sdug dge sdig nga yi sems// snang dang mi snang nga yi sems// legs nyes skyon yon nga yi sems// bdag gzhan gnyis snang nga yi sems// 'khrul
grol gnyis po nga yi sems// mdor na gzung 'dzin nga yi sems// nga la ma gtogs gzhan med pas// ston pa gsum yang nga yin no// bstan pa gsum yang nga yin no// gang zag gsum yang nga yin
no// thams cad mkhyen pa nga yin no// snang srid 'khor 'das thams cad kyi// chos dang chos nyid dbyer med pa'i// lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin te// sems nyid nga'i gnas lugs yin// sdong po sman pa

shes pa na// yan lag sman du shes pa bzhin// nga'i rang bzhin gcig rig ni// chos rnams thams cad rig 'gyur bas// de phyir byar med rtsol bral ngang// ma bcos lhun grub ngang du zhog/ chos nyid 'gyur ba
med pa las// 'gyur bzlog rnam pa sna tshogs dang// mi 'gyur lhun gyis grub pa dang// gnyis 'dzin gnyis su med ston pa// kun byed rgyal po sems yin te// dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po yis// bden dang
rdzun pa la sogs pa'i// sgyu ma sna tshogs ston pa bzhin// thams cad sgyu ma'i sems nyid kyi// ye shes gcig gi cho 'phrul yin// sems can sangs rgyas sprul pa yin// sangs rgyas sems can

sprul pa yin// gnyis ka sgyu ma'i sprul pa yin// sgyu ma sems kyi sprul pa yin// sems nyid chos nyid sprul pa yin// chos nyid thams cad mkhyen pa yin// thams cad sems kyi rang bzhin te// sems nyid 'od
gsal chen po la// rin chen gling gi sa rdo bzhin// nam yang 'gyur ldog gsal 'grib med// sems nyid rtogs na ye shes te// sangs rgyas gzhan nas btsal du med// ma btsal bzhag pas lhun gyis

grub// blo'i rtog pa rang sar grol// bsgom du med pa'i chos nyid yin// ma shes rtog pa sna tshogs la// spang blang dgag sgrub 'khor bar 'khyams// 'khor 'das rig dang ma rig khyad// skad cig dus kyi khyad
las med// de bas rig pa gnad du bsnun// rang la gnas pa'i ye shes de// rang gis rang nyid shes par bya'o// ma rig rang khar spyod pa yis// gnyis 'dzin thams cad 'khor bas te// rang bzhin shes pa'i
ting 'dzin la// gnyis med rtogs pa mya ngan 'das// 'dus byas chos kun kun rdzob la// 'dus ma byas pa don dam ste// srid pa 'khor ba'i chos rnams la// rnam par rtog byed chos yin la// rnam par mi rtog

chos nyid des// gzung 'dzin gnyis kyi yul la na// rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs su// snang spyod shes pa rnam shes la// de rnams thams cad rtog med kyi// skye 'gag med pa'i shes rab kyis// rang bzhin shes pa
ye shes yin// sems ni kun gyi mkhan po la// sems byung ma rig rtog tshogs te// sems dang sems byung gnyis su med// sems la sems ni ma mchis pas// sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal te// mtsho dang
chu'i rlabs bzhin la// gnyis su 'dzin pa 'khrul pa'i blo// gnyis med rtogs na ye shes yin// theg pa thams cad mthar thug gi/ don gyi ye shes gcig 'dod kyang// ye shes ye shes khyad par che// ye shes
ldan pas don kun shes// tshogs gnyis tshogs chen bsags las byung// mdor na thams cad sems yin te// rin chen sems las ma gtogs pa'i// sangs rgyas med cing sems can med// de bas chos

rnams thams cad kun// rang gi sems su rtogs par gyis// 'bras bu gsang ba bla na med pa'i rgyud chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po las// kun rtog sems kyi byung tshul gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// kun gzhi

chos nyid stong pa'i mkha'// rang snang rig pa 'od du shar// de nyid gzung 'dzin ma rig 'khrul// khams drug phyi nang snod bcud chags// rig pa'i rtsal de srid pa'i rlabs// g.yos pa'i drod las rlangs byung
nas// srid pa'i zil pa chu ru 'khyil// lbu ba'i rdul phran sprin bzhin 'khrigs// zhen pa'i rang gzugs sra ba yi// sa chags kha dog 'od lnga yis// 'thas pa'i gzugs brnyan rin chen lnga// rtog

pa lnga'am brgyad las su// ri bo ri bran rgya mtsho dang// gling bzhi gling phran mu khyud bcas// chags 'jig stongs gnas bcas pa ru// bskal pa bskal phran rims kyis su// rtog pa'i rlung gis rab bskyed

nas// 'ja' tshon 'od kyi tshul du chags// snang zhing bsten pas snod yin la// 'dus byas yin pas 'jig rten zhes// thun mong spyi yi snang ba yin/ khyad par gang zag dang snang la// rnam par mi rtog mkha' yin
la// rtog pa skad cig dran byed des// 'byung ba so sor gsal ba la// phyogs gcig snang ba cig car du// snod kyi 'jig rten chags pa yin// der snang grol ba 'jig pa ste// skye 'gag mi rtag 'jig rten
zhes// 'dus byas chos kyi mtshan nyid yin// kun gzhi yid byed gzung 'dzin gyi// rnam par shes pa yid kyi lus// gzugs su med pa'i rnam pa can// bar do dang ni gzugs med khams// sems can rnams
la rtog pa yin// rnam shes dran pa'i gzung 'dzin la// gzugs dang kha dog snang ba kun// chags zhen 'dzin pa cher skyes pas// de dang de'i lus snang ba// gzugs la chags pas gzugs khams byung// dran
byed gzugs kyi bag chags la// zhen pas rnam par smin pa'i lus// rgyu rkyen rten 'brel tshogs pa las// dus gsum bskyed nas 'dod khams kyi// gzugs dang rtog pa tha dad pa// sems can gcig gi lus

la yang// 'ga' zhig gis ni skyabs su mthong// 'ga' zhig zas dang grogs su lta// 'ga' zhig yul dang gnas su mthong// gcig las nges med sna tshogs byung// sems can blo rigs mi gcig pas// la la'i bde ba la
la'i sdug/ la la'i sdug bsngal la la'i bde// de bzhin du ni nyin dang mtshan// dgra dang gnyen dang 'phel 'grib dang// zas dang dug dang skye dang 'gag/ legs nyes skyon yon sna tshogs
pa// go zlog mi gcig sna tshogs dang// thun mong 'dod yon zhen pa ni// 'dod khams lus can sems can byung// khams gsum 'di dag sems gcig kyang// gzung 'dzin ma gcig so sor byung// gzugs
med 'dzin pa'i sems la chags// gti mug shas che btang snyoms gnas// rnam shes rtog pa gzhi la med// rtog pa de 'gag shi ba yin// gzugs khams spyi'i yul la chags/ kha dog gzugs la zhen pa
yis// chags sdang gnyis las 'dod shas che// bsam gtan dga' bde'i gnas la yengs// 'jug tu sdang sems cher skyes nas// 'chi 'pho ltung ba'i sdug bsngal myong// 'dod khams 'dod yon phyi nang
la// dug lnga'i snang ba rgyas pa yi// tshor ba'i sdug bsngal shin tu che// rnam rtog rags pa ye shes rags// las kyi 'bras bu myur ba yin// rten pa lus la rten byed sems// rnam shes srog gi rten

yod phyir// rnam par smin pa'i lus zhes bya/ khams la gnas pa'i sems can la// rmi lam dang ni sgyu ma bzhin// bden par ma grub bden pa'i tshul// rkyen rnams tshogs pa'i 'khrul 'khor la// skye ba mi zad

rgyun du spyod// chos nyid dran na gnyid sad 'dra// skad cig 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sangs// 'gron po pha yul bsleb pa bzhin// rang gi sa la dogs med du// mi 'gyur ri rab 'dra bar spyod// phyi nang snod
bcud snang srid la// 'dzin pa'i sems dang gzung ba'i yul// nyi ma dang ni 'od bzhin du// sems kyi rtogs pas lhan cig skyes// snod bcud gnyis po so so ru// snod med sems can gnas pa dang// bcud
med snod ni stong pa gnyis// sems kyi rtog pa ma bral na// skad cig tsam yang 'gyur ba med// 'dus byas phyi nang snod bcud 'di// sra zhing mkhregs yang snying po med// skad cig rkyen gyis 'jig par

nus// sems nyid 'od gsal chen po 'di// sus kyang mi shigs rdo rje'i brag/ 'bras bu gsang ba bla na med pa'i rgyud chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po las// srid pa snod bcud chags lugs kyi le'u ste lnga
pa'o//// ma rig kun gzhi rnam rtog de// yid byed nyon mongs rnam shes kyis// gzugs med rnams la snang mun dang// gzugs khams 'od kyi lus dang ni// 'dod khams snga ma'i bag chags kyi// rmi lam

lta bu'i dran pa de// yid kyi lus yin snga ma 'dis// phyi ma'i nying 'tshams sbyor ba yis// bar dor yid kyi lus zhes bya// 'bras bu las dang rkyen gyis bsgyur// bar snang rlangs dang 'dra ba ste// rnam shes
'khyams po las kyi rlung// thogs med kun tshangs dbang po ldan// rdzu 'phrul lha mig stobs dang ldan// 'dod pa'i dbang gis skye ba len// chags sdang gnyis kyis yid g.yos nas// re dogs gnyis kyis yid
skrag cing// rgyud lnga'i rgyu mthun lam du zhugs// skyabs dang rten 'tshol mngal dang gnas// 'dod pa'i yul mthong der zhugs pas// las mthun rkyen 'dzom bag chags 'gags// dri za yid kyi rtog pa de/
khab len rdo yis lcags sdud bzhin// pha ma gnyis kyi khu khrag de// skad cig las kyi rlung gis bsdus// snyigs ma spyir zags dngas ma gsum// gcig tu 'dres pas dran med gyur// gti mug mun pa'i snang ba

las// skye ba med pa'i rang mdangs shar// 'od lnga'i gong bu 'byung ba lnga'i/ khams kyi rang bzhin rnam shes ni// nam mkha'i go 'byed rlung gis skyed// chu yis sdud cing me yis smin// sa yis sra zhing gzugs su
grub// 'dod chags las skyed rlung gi lus// zhag bdun chu bzhin mer mer po// zhe sdang las gyur mkhris pa'i lus// zhag bdun ltar ltar zho bzhin chags// gti mug las skyes bad kan

lus// zhag bdun gor gor mar bzhin 'gyur// zhag bdun rnam shes dug gsum skyed// lte ba'i rtsa mdud gru gsum chags// srog shing a ba d+hU ti las// 'byung lnga'i 'khor lo lte ba chags// zhag bdun 'khrang

'gyur nya lta bu// zhag res nyis 'gyur rtsa chags pas// zla ba gnyis na 'khor lo lnga'i// rtsa 'dab chags pas yan lag 'bur// 'go 'dod rus sbal rnam pa can// nang dang rus dang phyi ru sha// pha ma'i dngas

ma'i stobs las tshugs// rang gi rnam shes dran pa tshor// dbang po lnga'i rtsa rnams chags// lus po stod che smad 'phrar 'gyur// khyab 'jug sbrul gyi rnam pa can// pho mo rdo rje dril bu ltar// chags pas phag pa'i

rnam pa can// zla ba lnga na dbang po tshangs// rus tshigs srog shing thams cad tshugs// rtsa dang chu rgyus kun tu 'brel// sha'i lhu tshangs pags pa skyed// don lnga snod drug phyi nang 'brel// mgo bo che bas seng ge

bzhin// phyi nang rlung gis 'gul bar nus// zla drug sra dang ba spu skyes// gzugs la tshangs ma'i rnam pa can// pho mo'i rigs rnams 'dod par 'gyur// bu yi lte ba ma yi snying// rtsa 'brel ma yi zas zos

pas// dngas ma snying khrag rtsa la zhugs// bu'i lus zungs bskyed pa yis// sha rgyas mi thung rnam pa can// snga phyi gnyis ka'i rtog pa 'char// las kyi chags sdang skyod tsam na// ma'i mngal nas sdug bsngal

myong// skabs su bde ba'i bsam gtan gnas// zla ba brgyad na phyi nang gi// skye mched thams cad rdzogs pa'i yi// rtog pa g.yos pas mi gzugs so// zla ba dgu na phyi yul gyis// gzung 'dzin dbang po'i sgo

rnams bye// mig bye rna ba 'byar ba phye// sna bye lce skyed lus kyi ni// reg bya 'dzin pas bsgyur bar byed// pho mo ma'i g.yas g.yon nas// zla ba ngo bcu bsgyur byed kyi// rlung gis bsgyur nas 'phen byed rlung// phyi

ru 'gul zhing skye bar byed// tshor ba 'jur dmig rtsar dang mtshungs// shes bzhin ldan la sgyu ma bzhin// mngal gnas chos dbyings bde chen du// skye med ngang las skye ba yis// rang bzhin sprul pa'i dge slong

ste// 'khor ba'i chos dang bral ba'i las// pha ma mkhan po slob dpon nyid// mngal gyi phru ma'i chos gos la// spyi bor thar mo sbyar ba'i phyag/ rims bzhin bskyed pa'i khrims kyis gnas// sngags kyi bzlas pa
a dang haM// gcer bu skra dang kha spu sreg/ gang la chags med gnas nas 'byung// 'di dag rkyen gyis sems can rnams// sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med// zla ba bcu na sa bcu nyid// sems can sa bcu'i
dbang phyug go/ thog ma nyid nas lhun grub pas// skye ba sprul pa'i sku yin no// skyes nas zla gsum lo gcig na// rtsa ni stong phrag brgyad cu rdzogs// srin bu'i rigs ni brgyad khri dang// rang lus

'dom gang gru bzhi la// rlung tshad bcu drug lo la rdzogs// nyer lnga thig le so lnga na// rig pa lus kyi rtsal rnams rdzogs// shi ba stong pa chos sku gsum// bar do longs spyod rdzogs sku'i lus// mngal nas skye ba

sprul pa'i sku// rdo rje lus kyi rang bzhin la// sku gsum po ni rnam par gnas// lha dang lha min sgra mi snyan// bsod nams mthu yis bde la zhen// lam la 'jug pa'i gnyen po dman// ngan song mi khom gnas
rnams ni// mi dges mthu yis sdug bsngal myong// byang chub lam la 'jug mi shes// gling gnyis dman pa'i lus rnams la// bsod nams dman pas btsal ma tshang// byang chub lam gyi rten mi rung// tshul

khrims sdom pa skye mi 'gyur// rtsa rlung thig le rdzogs pa yis// mngal nas rdo rje'i lus 'di la// rten pa rtse gcig byang chub 'grub// mi mdzad khams kyi 'dzam gling du// sangs rgyas thams cad mi gzugs

kyis// rdo rje 'chang du sangs rgyas te// gdul bya blo dman rnams kyis don// khyim spangs rab byung tshul du 'byon// rab byung sdig pa'i chos dang bral// bdud rnams thams cad 'pham par byed// yon tan kun

gyi rten du 'gyur// 'phags pa rnams kyis yongs su bzungs// mkhas pa rnams kyis bsngags pa'i// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam chen po// rdo rje theg pa'i gzhi rten mchog/ rdo rje'i lus las 'byung ba yin// 'bras

bu gsang ba bla na med pa'i rgyud chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po las/ rnam smin lus kyi grub tshul gyi le'u ste drug pa'o//// sems kyi bcings grol lus kyi gnad// lus gnas rtsa yi gnas lugs te// rtsa yi
gnas lugs ma shes na// 'dod khams gzhan dang khyad par med// dkar dmar khams dang 'du byed yid// tshogs pa gcig pa'i rnam smin lus// dug gsum sku gsum skyed pa yis// thog mar srid pa las

kyi rlung// lte bar rtsa mdud gru gsum chags// de nas lus dang rtsa rnams bskyed// rtsa mdud 'khor lo'i dbus su ni// d+hU ti srog rtsa srog shing ltar// yan man skyed nas 'khor lo lnga// zangs dung sba ba gdugs

rtsibs bzhin// de yi snying po dngas ma'i rtsa// dbu ma chos nyid don gyi rtsa// skye ba med pa'i lam chen po// yar sna spyi gtsug haM la zug/ mar sna gsang ba'i gnas su zug/ spyi gtsug rtsa 'dab sum cu gnyis// ro

'dus bcu drug snying khar brgyad// lte bar drug cu rtsa bzhi drangs// bde skyong nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'khor// rtsa rnams de las bskyed pa yis// dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pas te// de dkyil snying khar 'dus pa
yis// snying zhes rnam shes srog gi rten// sha yi dngas ma dbu ma'i rtsa// drod kyi dngas ma a thung me// thig le dngas ma bde chen haM// rlung gi dngas ma srog gi rlung// yid kyi dngas ma kun gzhi

sems// dngas ma lnga 'dus ra pa na// snying po ye shes don gyi lha// thog ma'i sangs rgyas spyi mes bzhugs// de'i 'od kyis stong gsum gang// dbu ma lnga ldan zhes bya ba// 'byung ba bzhi'i dngas ma las// d+hu ti

phyogs bzhir dus mnyam du// mdun rtsa kha dog dkar po na// yar lta hUM la mar lta du// sa bon dbyibs su rtsa gnas yod// kun gzhi rnam shes de nas rgyu// g.yas rtsa kha dog ser po na// yar lta traM la mar lta

spre// nyon mongs can yid de na rgyu// rgyab rtsa kha dog dmar po na// yar lta hri la mar lta N-i?// yid kyi rnam shes de nas rgyu// g.yon rtsa kha dog ljang khu na// yar lta ha la mar lta tri// sgo lnga'i rnam shes de

nas rgyu// rtsa bzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin la// dbus rtsa kha dog dkar gsal nang// skye med don gyi rgyal po ni// oM dang ma yi sa bon gnas// bag la nyal gyi rnam shes rgyu// rtsa lnga rdo rje rtse lnga bzhin// gnas pa rdo

rje'i lus zhes bya// rdo rje lus kyi gnas lnga na// rig pa sems kyi gnad lnga yod// snyoms 'jug dus su spyi gtsug gnad// rmi lam dus su mgrin pa gnad// gnyid kyi dus su snying kha na// tha mal dus su lte ba

na// rtsol ba'i dus su gsang gnas na// rtsa de rnams las gyes pa yi// pho rtsa ka li dpa' bo g.yas// mo rtsa a li dpa' mo g.yon// gnyis med lhan skyes he ru ka/ de rnams 'dus pa'i gtso bo gsum// g.yas

pa thabs kyi ro ma dang// g.yon pa shes rab rkyang ma gnyis// yar sna sna bug klad pa'i dkyil// 'khyogs nas 'khor lo lnga la rgyu// mar sna lte bar mar la gug/ dbu mar rtsa gsum lnga 'dus pas// gtum mo me

yi rtsa mdud grub// de las drod rnams thams cad bskyed// g.yas rtsa 'khor ba g.yon pa na// mya ngan 'das pa'i rtsa yin no// rtsa yi gtso bo de gsum las// snying khar dngas snyigs lnga bye nas// dngas ma mthong

byed shel sbug can// sgra gcan ro 'dzin tshor ba dang// reg pa ltas byed ces bya lnga// mig dang rna ba sna lce dang// lus kyi pags pa rnams la zug/ sgo lnga lus kyi snang ba 'char// mar la snyigs ma'i rtsa lnga

nas// ro ma nyi ma rkyang ma zla// rgyab nas dri chen mdun nas chu// dbus nas kun lnga'i thig le 'bab// 'dus pa dbu ma'i mar sna nas// thig le 'bab pa skyes pa ring// bu med dung can glang can ma// ri dwags
pad can sdong can rigs// ro rkyang gnyis po gzung 'dzin rtsa// dbu ma gzung 'dzin rnam par spangs// lam gyi nyams len de gsum ste// rgyal po dbang du 'dus pa na// 'bangs rnams cham la phebs pa
bzhin// rtsa gsum dbang bsdus rtsa gzhan rnams// shugs kyis lam du slong ba yin// rtsa yi ming ni gnas pa dang// byed pa'i las la brtags pa ste// dbu ma rtsa rnams kun bskyed pas// srog rtsa
dpag bsam shing chen de// gang du ma 'gags shes sbug can// kun la khyab pas kun d+har ma// skye med ston pas d+hu ti la// yar sna khams skyed sgra gcan de// mar sna khams 'dus dung can zer// lnga yi

gzugs kyis rdo rje'i rtsa// ro ma thabs kyi nyi ma 'dzin// snyigs ma phal cher 'dzag par byed// rkyang ma shes rab zla ba 'dzin// dngas ma phal cher 'dzag pa yin// spyi gtsug bde chen chu yi rtsa// rtsa 'dab so

gnyis kha mar lta// de la ming can rtsa brgyad gnas// mi phyed ma ni 'tshogs mar gnas// phra gzugs ma ni spyi bor 'khyil// rtsa ba ma ni sna ba g.yas// g.yon pa ma ni rna ba g.yon// them bu ma ni sna ba g.yon na

gnas// rus sbal ma ni mdzod spu la// bsgom pa ma ni mig sprin la// dbang po ma ni srog rtsa la'o// mgrin pa longs spyod pa'i rtsa// rtsa 'dab bcu drug 'dril mar gnas// de yi ming can rtsa brgyad la// skyongs

ma mchan khung 'phar rtsa'o// rtsa 'jug nu ma'i rtsa gnyis so// ma mo lte ba'i dkyil na gnas// mtshon ma sna yi rtse na yod// bsil sbyin dkan dang mchu yi rtsa// tsha ba ol gong mdud pa'i rtsa// rtse'u ma ni snying la

zug/ mchu ma sdoms kyi rtsa yin no// snying kha chos 'khor nam mkha'i rtsa// rtsa 'dab brgyad po so sor gyes// gzhol ma brang gi gzhung la gnas// dngas mas rgangs pa'i 'grel ba'i rtsa// shin tu gzugs can

mtshan ma'i rtsa/ khyim ma 'og sgo gsum khar 'brel// gsum skor mig gi 'bras bu'i rtsa// 'dod ma rna ba gnyis kyi rtsa// skyod ma sna gnyis zug pa'i rtsa// brdul ma lce la zug pa'i rtsa// lte ba sprul 'khor me yi

rtsa// rtsa 'dab 'dzings pa drug cu bzhi// bdud 'dul ma ni ba spu'i rtsa// phyin ma 'og sgo gnyis kyi rtsa// yid bzangs pus mo'i snyan gong rtsa// rgyu sbyin brla yi rtsa bo che// sbyor bral ma ni byin par gnas// bsdug

gu rkang lag sor mo'i rtsa// grub ma rkang pa'i bol gnyis las// 'tsheb ma rkang 'theb spu 'dzin rtsa// gsang gnas bde skyod rlung gi rtsa// rtsa 'dab nyer brgyad spyi bor 'brel// mdzes ma gsang gnas sgo gsum

rtsa// la ma mtshan ma'i g.yas na zug/ ya na mtshan ma'i g.yon na zug/ ra sa dbus na gnas pa'i rtsa// a ba rtsa yis phyir la 'bud// 'dza bo nang du sdud pa'i rtsa// dkar nag gnas su sdom par byed// lam

chen tshor ba'i khams bskyed pa'i// 'phar rtsa chen po bzhi yin no// rtsa rnams sum cu rtsa bzhi'i gnas// rlung khams dpa' bo dpa' mo ste// phung po sangs rgyas mnga' bdag yin// snying dkyil rtsa yi rgyal po
ni// ri 'ong mig ces bya ba yod// yar 'khyogs rba rlabs gnyis dang 'brel// mchan khung gnyis nas mkhal mar 'brel// yar 'khyogs snying gi dkar nag 'tshams// g.yer ma'i kha bzhin
'byed 'dzum can// phyi mnan phyi yi rtog pa 'gags// nang 'chus nang gi rtog pa 'gags// sems can rnams la kha thur lta// snang ba gti mug rnam par 'grib// bsgoms pa'i yon tan 'phred la byed// 'khor
'das gnyis snang sgyu mar 'chang// sangs rgyas rnams la kha yar lta// ye shes snang ba 'char bar gnas// bum pa can gyi gyen la 'degs// rtsa bdud yi ge'i 'khrul 'khor 'jig/ bum pa'i yon tan rtsal

rdzogs nas// rang snang sku dang zhing khams dang// gzhan snang dpe dang 'od zer mthong// gnad du ma song log 'chus kyis// 'khrul snang skyon ni sna tshogs 'byung// spyi bo tshangs bug rnam then rtsa// rtog pa

'gag par byed pa yod// mgrin par a nu tA ra'i rtsa// phyi nang dbugs kyi skad 'byin yod// lte bar gtum mo me khab rtsa// 'khros pas drod du 'bar ba yod// 'og sgo 'khor ba 'phel byed rtsa// srid pa 'dzin

par byed pa yin// ma tshang ma ning za ma 'gro// gzhan yang skyon can rtsa brgyad po// zhar ma bong ma dong ma dang// 'dzings ma 'chus ma 'dar ma'i rtsa// nyal mo mi khom ma'i rigs// skyon can mi khom lus yin

pas// rdo rje theg pa'i sten mi rung// dbu ma rdo rje'i rtsa sna la// yar dgu mar dgu ro rkyang gnyis// 'khor lo lnga yi rtsa 'dab la// byang sems 'beb pa sum cu gnyis// ming med brgya dang bcu gnyis yod// nang

gi rtsa lnga gdon rtsa brgyad// 'phar rtsa phyi nang bcu drug ste// rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa bzhi// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi grangs kyi rtsa// bag la nyal ba drug cu gcig/ rlung khrig chu ser rgyu ba rtsa// sum brgya nyi shu la

sogs la// ro rkyang phra kyi rigs las byung// stong phrag lnga bcu dbu ma'i rigs// stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnas pas// mdor bsdus grangs can brgya khri'o// grangs med rtsa la brjod las 'das// ring ba 'dom

gang mtho do nas// thung ba spu'i rtse mo tsam// lus ni rtsa yi dra bar 'brel// rlung dang khrag dang thig les gang// rtsa rlung thig le gang 'khyil ba// rnam snang gangs chen mtsho min no// rtsa rnams yar 'phel lus

bskyed la// bar du mnyam pas zo la sdod// tha ma rtsa bskams gud pa yin// nus pa zad pa 'chi ba ste// lus kyi rten 'di rtsa las byung// rtsa rlung grol na thar pa thob// 'bras bu gsang ba bla na med pa'i rgyud chen
po dri ma med pa'i snying po las/ lam gnas pa rtsa'i gnas lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// rlung gi gnas lugs ma shes na// lus kyi rtsa mdud mi grol zhing// sems kyi gnas lugs mi rtogs
pas// 'gyu byed rtog pa rlung gi gnad// skye ba med pa'i chos nyid de// 'gag pa med pa'i ye shes rlung// snang srid snod bcud kun la khyab// khyab byed rlung gi rang rtsal de// srid pa chags byed

kun gzhi yi// mkha' la 'du byed yid g.yo rlung// 'du shes tshor ba g.yos pa las// rnam shes sgyu ma lta bu byung// de las rnam smin 'byung bzhi brten// las kyi rlung gi ming gzugs kyis// lte ba srid pa chags

pa'i dbus// rnam shes skye med srog gi rlung// a yi dbyibs su gnas nas su// rtsa rlung thig le thams cad skyed// de na rang bzhin gnas pa'i rlung// mngal gnas rlung ni dbu ma ru// shas che gnas pa rnam

rtog nyung// bsgyur byed rlung gi phyir skyes nas// ma dang bral te lte ba chad// nang rlung dron mo phyi ru shor// phyi rlung grang mo nang du zhugs// rkyen gyis las rlung zhes bya ste// phyi rol yul la rtog pa 'phros// 'jug
pa'i rlung gi tshur la bsdus// nang du 'dzin rtog sna tshogs byung// gzung 'dzin ma rig las kyi rlung// 'byung 'jug med par gnas pa la// gnyis med dbu ma'i rlung du brjod// dbu mar gnas pa srog gi

rlung// rlung rnams bskyed pa'i rtsa ba ste// de yis kun la khyab pa yis// bar snang stong pa'i rlung bo de// lung pa che chung ring thung nang// de dang mthun par rgyu ba bzhin// rtsa rnams sbom 'phra ring thung

dang// dbyibs dang mthun pa'i rlung gnas te// thams cad dbu ma'i rlung du gcig/ srog 'dzin lus kyi snying khar gnas// las su bdag 'dzin dran pa skyed// log na smyo 'bog 'chi bar byed/ khyab byed spyi bo'i
gtsug na gnas// las su tshigs 'gul 'gro rdeg byed// log na zha rengs skyog po 'ong// gyen du rgyu ba mgrin par gnas// skad dang zas kyi phul mdangs byed// log na stod kyi nad rnams skyaid// me dang
mnyam pa lte bar gnas// zas kyis lus gso dngas snyigs 'byed// log na pho mchin nad kun bskyed// thur du sel ba gsang bar gnas// las su 'og sgo 'byin sdom byed// log na smad kyi nad rnams
skyed// de rnams a u ri li yi// rnam par rtsa yi nang na gnas// dbu ma las skyes yan lag rlung// rgyu ma mchin pa glo la gnas// gzugs ni bzang ngan 'bring gsum ston// log na mig gi skyon rnams

'ong// glo ba sna yi dri ni rab 'bring ston// log na sna yi nad kun bskyed// rab tu rgyu ba lha sbyin gnas// lce la ro ni rab 'bring ston// log na kha yi nad rnams 'byung// yang dag rgyu ba gzhu la gnas// reg gi

bya ba rab 'bring ston// log na pags pa'i nad rnams ston// rnam shes 'byung lnga'i dngas ma ste// chu'i dag gzugs mthong a yi dbyibs// nam mkha'i sgra thob yi ge a// sa yis dri tshor yi ge I// me rlung ro
myong yi ge ar// chu rlung reg myong yi ge i// phyi ru sna byed rlung yin no// rlung bcu de dag phyogs gcig tu// lus la 'byung 'jug gnas gsum las// 'byung 'jug phyi nang g.yas g.yon

gyes// g.yas pa ro ma thabs kyi rlung// rtsub cing thung la phyi ru 'byung// pho rlung dpa' bo'i rang bzhin te// dbang du ma 'dus nyon mongs dang// sdug bsngal 'chi rkyen 'byung ba yin// g.yon pa rkyang ma shes rab

rlung// 'jam la ring ba nang du 'jug/ mo rlung dpa' mo'i rang bzhin te// bde dang dngos grub 'byung ba dang// nang du 'phel na 'chi med 'byung// g.yas pa 'phel na nyon mongs rgyu// g.yon pa 'phel ba ye
shes te// sems can rlung rnams phyir 'bud cing// byang chub sems dpa' nang du 'dzin// yon tan skye ba de yi gnad// gnyis mnyam rgyu ba ma ning ste// dbu mar gnas pas gzung 'dzin grol// bcom ldan rdo

rje'i skyil krung la// mnyam par 'jog pa de yi gnad// 'byung 'jug med pa phyi nang du// mnyam gnas dbu mar rlung tshud pas// rtog tshogs gnyis snang rang sar grol// ye shes snang bar lam me 'bar// phyi

nang rlung gsum rgyu ba ni// lo zla zhag dang dus tshod du// g.yas g.yon nyi zla'i 'pho ba ni// dbyar dgun zla stod zla smad dang// nyin mtshan snga dro phyi dro dang// srod dang tho rangs ro rkyang gnyis// re mos 'pho zhing

rgyu ba la// 'byung ba lnga yi rlung rgyu ste// chu rlung sna stengs sa rlung 'og/ me rlung g.yas rlung ni g.yon// nam mkha'i rlung ni dbus na rgyu// rna yi rka la brten pa rgyu// 'bru lnga'i rlung la brten nas su// phyi nang rten

'brel thams cad 'char// nad med dar ba'i lus dag la// rlung gi grangs ni zhag re la// nyi khri chig stong drug brgya rgyu'o// phra ba'i rlung ni grangs las 'das// rtsa re nang du rlung re grub/ khang pa'i nang gi du ba
bzhin// rtsa yi dbyibs dang kha dog tu// rlung gi dbyibs dang kha dog gnas// 'byung 'jug gnas gsum kun la yod/ khyad par phugs kyi sel kha bzhin// ro rkyang gnyis la dbugs kyi rgyu// 'byin 'jug las

kun de yis byed// skyon yon rtsa ba de nyid yin// rkyen gyis bsgyur ba sna tshogs 'byung// gnad du tshud pa gnas pa'i rlung// dbu ma chos nyid ngang du grol// mnyam pa'i rlung ni chos nyid la// rkyen gyi rtsa dang rlung
'khrugs pas// nyon mongs dug lnga rang kha shor// rgyud lnga'i las la 'gro rnams 'khor// ma rig las rlung ma dag na// 'khor ba'i gnas ngan mu mtha' med// rlung gsum dbu mar tshud pa na// dug gsum las
dang nyon mongs grol// gzung 'dzin gnyis kyis sked pa yi// rtsa mdud yi ge'i gzugs can zhig/ rigs drug sa bon de ru grol// ye nas rgyal ba'i sa bon du// yod la ye shes rlung du gyur// rgyal ba'i sku
gsung thugs kyi mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du grol// rlung zhes bya ba las kun byed// 'khor ba skye nas mya ngan 'das// rlung gi ye shes rang rtsal yin// ma rig pa las las kyi

rlung// gnas lugs ma shes 'khrul pa la// rang bzhin shes pas rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'bras bu gsang ba bla na med pa'i rgyud chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po las/ 'gyu byed rtog pa rlung gi gnas lugs bstan
pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// kun gzhi ma rig rnam shes kyi// g.yo byed yid dang pha ma yi// bde ba'i dngas ma dkar dmar gnyis// dbyer med 'dres pas srog gi rtsa// a bshad dbyibs can chags

pa'i nang// srog rlung a yi dbyibs su 'byung// byang chub sems kyi thig le de// 'od kyi gong bu bzhin du chags// de las skyod byed rlung gis 'phel// pha yi dngas ma rus pa'i rgyu// dbu ma'i yar sna thig le
'od// haM gi dbyibs can zla bar chags// ma yi dngas ma sha yi rgyu// 'od kyi thig le a yi dbyibs// mar sna nyi ma drod can chags// de gnyis cha snyoms nus pa dang// snying khar gnas pa'i ye shes
gsum// dbyer med gcig pas byang chub sems// g.yas g.yon ro rkyang gnyis kyi nang// A li kA li'i mdud pa can// thig le nyi zla'i 'od can gnas// dngas ma shel gyi snying po 'dra// de ltar dngas
ma'i thig le gsum// dkar dmar kun d+ha'i rang bzhin la// bde gsal mi rtog yon tan skye// snyigs ma rlung mkhris bad kan gsum// dug gsum thams cad skyed par byed// 'byung ba sems kyi dngas ma

lnga// 'khor lo lnga la yi ge'i dbyibs// yar lta rgyal ba'i sa bon la// mar lta rigs drug sa bon du// dngas snyigs gnyis kyi rnam par gnas// rtsa ni gar yod rlung gis khyab// rlung ni gar gnas thig le
ni// til dang til mar bzhin du khyab// rlung sems mkha' dang mnyam pa las// snying po gcig tu 'dus pa'i gnad// thig le zhes ni brjod pa yin// kun rdzob rgyu yi thig le rnams// sems can las kyi rlung

gi bskyed// gzung 'dzin gnyis kyi lam la shor// rgyud lnga'i rtsa la rigs drug gi/ sa bon thig le rnams g.yos nas// rlung sems ro rkyang gnyis po nas// phyir 'phros rigs drug snang ba 'char// nang dus rmi
lam rigs drug rmi// de yi bag chags bar do sad// rgyun du ma rig 'khrul 'khor la// zad med 'khyam pa de yi gnad// nyams na 'byung 'khrugs nad rnams dang// 'khrul rtog rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung// lam
gnas rnal 'byor pa yi dus// rlung sems ma bcos gnas lugs la// mnyam pa nyid du gnad bsnun pas// rlung sems thig le'i dngas snyigs 'byed// snyigs ma 'khor ba'i sa bon gyi// thig le yi ge'i
gzugs can grol// yar lta rgyal ba'i sa bon gyi// thig le 'phel bas phyi rol gyi// gnang ba chu zla'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// sku dang zhing khams snang bar

'char// rmi lam de'i bag chags 'char// der 'dzin shes pa dag tsa na// sku lnga ye shes lnga ldan 'gyur// chos dbyings ye shes snying po yi// lus ngag yid gsum dbyer med pa'i// don dam thig le spros dang

bral// sems nyid lhan cig skyes pa ste// gzhi ni chos sku'i ngo bos stong// lam ni longs sku'i rang bzhin gsal// 'bras bu sprul sku 'gag pa med// thams cad rang gi ngo bo nyid// bde ba chen po'i ye shes

te// thugs kyi rdo rje mngon du 'gyur// nyag gcig klong na thams cad gsal// 'gyur med 'dus ma byas pa'i sku// rnam par mi rtog lhun grub rdzogs// rdo rje lus la brten nas su// byang chub mngon du bya ba'i
phyir// 'dod cing srid pa'i blo spangs la// bcud len gyis ni lus zungs bskyed/ kha zas kun la sbyin sreg bya// rtsa gsum me'i lha'i zhal gsum nang// lag pa dgang gzar blug gzar gyis// dug gsum
bsreg rdzas dam rdzas 'bul// bdag nyid dkyil 'khor lha la mchod// pho bar rlung phul bad kan bzhu// mkhris pas mdog bsgyur me mnyam gyis// dngas snyigs phye nas snyigs ma rnams// pho bar lhung

nas thur sel 'phel// dngas ma mchin pa'i rtsa la zhugs// dang po bad kan de nas khrag/ sha tshil rus pa rkang mar dang// thig le bdun gyis lus stobs bskyed// skye ba bdun pa'i khams rgyas pas// de nyid
zos pas mkha' spyod 'gro// bde chen mkha' 'gro de yis 'grub// de nyid nyams su blang ba'i thabs// rang lus gnad kyi 'khrul 'khor bcun// dug gsum rtog pa mngon du gsal// steng 'og kha sbyar rlung cig
gi/ lte ba'i rdo rje me sbar la// dug lnga sreg pa'i ye shes 'bar// 'bar 'dzag 'od kyi thabs shes kyi// a haM yab yum snyoms 'jug pas// lhan skyes bde chen he ru ka/ phyi nang lha tshogs bdud rtsis

mnyes// byin rlabs me dpung phyogs bcur spros// snod bcud gzung 'dzin bag chags sbyangs// gtum mo me la dbang byas pas// rtsa grol rlung byang thig le 'phel// yon tan rtsal rdzogs 'bras bu thob// dang

po rlung gis drod skye zhing// sdug bsngal thams cad g.yo bar byed// thig le zhu bas bde ba 'char// rang bzhin med pa'i mi rtog pa// rnal 'byor blo la gsal bar 'gyur// yang zhing mdog bzang stobs dang
ldan// gzhan lus bud med bde ba can// tha mal ma yin gsang bdag la// dga' bzhi don gyi ngo sprod blangs// lhan cig skyes pa bde ba'i ro// gnyis med ye shes dbu mar blangs// chags dang chags bral
rnam spangs pa'i// 'dzag med tshul khrims gang 'dzin pa'i// bslab gsum yon tan rgyan gyis mdzes// yar ngo'i zla bzhin yon tan 'phel// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan pa'i// dpe byad 'od

kyis spras pa yi// rgyal sras sa lam myur bgrod 'di// thabs kyis mngon du byas pa yis// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// phyag rgya bzhi yi don ston pa// phyag rgya chen por don 'di 'dus// 'bras bu gsang ba bla na
med pa'i rgyud chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po las/ bkod pa byang chub sems kyi thig le'i gnas lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// snang srid 'khor 'das thams cad kun// ngo bo spros bral lhan cig

skyes// rdo rje'i gnas lugs gsum la ni// phyi nang gsang gsum snang ba kun// skad cig 'du 'bral med pa'i phyir// lhan cig skyes zhes brjod par bya// lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig pas// chos nyid mkha' la

sems kyi sprin// dbyings dang rig pa'i rang dngas las// byung ba'i rang snang 'byung ba lnga// snod bcud phyi nang rang 'byung ni// dper na tsan dan sdong po la// snying po shun pa lhan cig skyes// rnam pa tha dad don
gcig bzhin// snod kyis 'dzin rtog bstan pa yi// phyi yi 'byung ba lnga po yang// rnam shes gcig gis bsdus pa yin// phyi nang gnyis po lhan cig skyes// bcud med snod ni ma yod la// snod med bcud na ma
byung ni// snod bcud gnyis po tha dad du// skad cig tsam yang 'du 'bral med// dang por lhan cig sems las skyes// bar du rnam shes tshogs pa cig/ mthar ni so so 'gag pa med// dus gsum dus med

lhan cig skyes// sems can gang dag su yin la// de yi snang ba sna tshogs kyang// nor bu dang ni 'od bzhin du// ngo bo dbyer med lhan cig skyes// gnang dus snang ba lhan cig skyes// mkha' zla dang ni chu zla

bzhin// stong dus stong pa lhan cig skyes// nam mkha' dang ni stong pa bzhin// gnyis med gnyis med lhan cig skyes// chu dang rlan gnyis dbyer med bzhin// tshig la snga phyi brjod na yang// don la 'gro ldog
gcig las med// gnyis su gang nas mi rnyed pas// sna tshogs snang ba yod ma yin// lhan cig skyes pa'i snang ba ste// 'byung kun nam mkha'i khongs su 'dus// nam mkha' rnam par shes pa'i khams// rnam
shes sems kyi snang ba yin// thabs shes mkha' la sems g.yos pas// 'gro ba rlung du rab tu grags// bskyod pa las ni drod skye zhing// zhu ba gsher ba chu yi khams// sra ba yis ni gzugs su chags// bde
chen nam mkha'i khams nyid las// dang por snang ba'i lus su grub// de las dngos snang thams cad byung// dang por snang ba sems kyi lus// gser dang gser gyi kha dog bzhin// lus sems sna ba lhan cig
skyes// ngag ni sems kyi rang sgra yin// sgra rnams thams cad de las byung// sgra dang sems nyid lhan cig skyes// dran pa thams cad sems kyi yid// rtog pa thams cad de las byung// sgra
rnams thams cad de las byung// sgra dang sems nyid lhan cig skyes// dran pa thams cad sems kyi yid// rtog pa thams cad de las byung// rnam shes sems dang lhan cig skyes// lus ngag yid gsum tha dad
yin// gnyid dang rmi lam rmi mkhan bzhin// sems nyid cig gi snang ba ste// snang ba thams cad rang snang las// mig gis ma mthong gzugs med bzhin// phyi rol yul gyi snang ba med// lus dang sems kyang

de bzhin te// phyi dang nang gi snang ba med// snang ba thams cad lhan cig skyes// rig pa rang las byung ba yin// rig pa rang byung sgron me la// ma 'gags cir yang snang ba ste// snang tshang me long gzugs brnyan
bzhin// lhan cig skyes pa'i chos nyid la// de bzhin ma rig 'khrul pa yis// mig skyon can ni nam mkha' la// ci yang med par gzugs mthong bzhin// sems nyid mkha' la rnam rtog gis// rang snang ma yin

gzhan du ni// rnam pa sna tshogs snang ba la// kun rdzob 'khor ba zhes su btags// 'khor ba rang snang 'khor ba las// gzhan du gar yang 'khor rgyu med// gdod nas gzhi med rtsa bral yin// lhan cig skyes

pa'i rig pa yis// rtogs te mya ngan 'das pa'i zhing// bde gsal mi rtog ye shes la// sku dang zhing khams ye shes dang// gdul bya'i 'phrin las thams cad kun// snga phyi bye brag tha dad med// thams cad bde

ba lhan cig skyes// nyi ma 'od dang snang byed bzhin// ye shes snang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// sangs rgyas thog mtha' med pa kun// ye shes snang ba cig la spyod// ye shes mig cig dri ma med// gang du yang ni mi
rnyed de// bla ma'i byin rlabs stobs dang ni// rang gi bsod nams las shes bya// rang byung ye shes rang la 'tshol// rang sems rtogs na sangs rgyas yin// lam ni bgrod pa yong mi dgos// rtog pa gcig gi
sgron me yis// mun pa'i sgrib pa ma lus spongs// 'od gsal dang po'i sangs rgyas mthong// gnyis su med pa'i yon tan rdzogs// thams cad mkhyen pa'i bcom ldan 'das// chos kun lhan cig skyes pa
la// dper na me dang chu gnyis ni// dus gcig skye bar mi rigs te// skam dang gsher gnyis so so bzhin// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// sdug bsngal bde ba so so ste// lhan cig skye bar mi rigs
la// gal te 'khor ba myang 'das gnyis// gcig na gnyis su ga la 'ong// de ltar ma yin khyod nyon cig/ lhan cig skyes pa rnam pa gnyis// chos sku gcig gi byed pa la// kun rdzob don dam dbye ba ste// de
dang de yi gnang ba la// rang ngo ma shes kun rdzob ste// snang yang 'khrul par 'khor ba'i chos// mun pas rub pa'i yul bzhin du// rang snang yin yang mi rigs pas// 'khor ba rang dang lhan cig
skyes// so sor rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin shes tsa na// mun sangs nam langs nyi shar 'od// yul rnams thams cad gsal ba bzhin// don dam chos nyid bden pa la// rig pa'i ye

shes mngon sum du// bde ba chen por gsal 'grib med// ye shes rang dang lhan cig skyes// nyi ma gung la phebs tsa na// mun pa snang ba gnyis med bzhin// 'khor 'das gnyis med lhan cig skyes// phyag rgya

chen por rtogs tsam na// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i chos nyid la// smra bsam shes bya'i yul las 'das// thams cad cig ste khyad par che// 'bras bu gsang ba bla na med pa'i rgyud chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po
// snang ba thams cad lhan cig skyes par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// thams cad mnyam nyid lhan cig skyes// spros dang bral ba'i ye shes so// ma rig dri ma 'khrud pa dang// rig pa'i ye shes

gsal ba yi// rang gi yon tan thob pa'i don// a b+hiny+tsa'i sgra las drangs// gang gis sems can 'dul ba la// chos sku'i bstan pa kun la khyab// longs sku'i bstan pa dag pa'i zhing// sprul sku'i bstan pa sde
snod gsum// nyon mongs gnyen por chos kyi sgo// brgyad khri bzhi stong gsungs pa yang// 'dod chags 'dul phyir 'dul ba dang// zhe sdang 'dul phyir mdo sde dang// gti mug 'dul phyir mngon pa'i
chos// sems tsam dang ni dbu ma yis// mnyam gzhag dang ni rjes thob la// kun rdzob dang ni don dam zhes// rim pa bzhin du lam sbyangs nas// 'bras bu sku gsum thob byed pa// de dag rgyu yi theg pa
ste// lam las 'bras bu yong mi rtogs// lam du grangs med ngal bar 'gyur// mi slob pa la zhugs nas kyang// dug gsum lhan cig skyes pa yi// gnyen po rdo rje'i theg pa yin// bla med tshe 'dir 'bras

bu thob// blo dman rnams la bya ba'i rgyud/ khrus dang gtsang sbra gtso byas nas// don gyi lha drug bsgom pa yis// rigs gsum go 'phang thob pa'i rgyud// stong phrag gsum ni phyi yi rgyud// 'bring la spyod pa de

mtshungs shing// ting 'dzin rnal 'byor rgyud bzhin spyod// rigs lnga'i go 'phang thob byed pa// spyod pa'i rgyud la stong phrag gnyis// rab la ting 'dzin gtsor byas nas// sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis// rnam
snang go 'phang thob bya'i phyir// rnal 'byor rgyud la stong phrag drug/ sems dpa' mchog la rdo rje'i lus// dug gsum mi spang lam du byed// gsal stong bde stong rig stong gis// 'dod yon lnga la bde
bar spyod// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med kyis// phyag rgya chen po rtogs pa yis// rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud// stong phrag bcu ni mkhas pas gsungs// rgyud rnams kun gyi don bsdus

pa// rdo rje'i gnas gsum smin byed dbang// lus la rgyal ba'i sku rdo rje// ma rig ye shes bskyed pa'i lam// snang stong ye shes lha yi sku// bum pa'i dbang gi dang por bskur// chu yi dge bsnyen nyid du

'gyur// bcu gnyis sa yi 'bras bu thob// ngag la rgyul pa'i gsung rdo rje// smin byed grags stong sngags kyi bcud// rnam rtog nad sel bdud rtsi sman// gsang ba gsang ba'i dbang bskur bas// dge tshul nyid
du bcu gsum pa'i// 'khor lo tshogs chen yon tan thob// sems can rgyal ba'i thugs rdo rje// gzung 'dzin bag chags dag pa yis// bde stong ye shes chos nyid mkha'// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes
kyi// gsum pa shes rab ye shes bskur// 'dod chags dag pa dge slong mchog/ bcu bzhi bde ba chen po thob// sku gsung thugs dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// gnyis su med pa'i ngo sprod mchog/ bzhi pa tshig dbang

rin chen bskur// sgo gsum dag pa'i sku gsung thugs// phyag rgya chen por rab sbyor bas// bco lnga rdo rje 'chang thob cing// mnyam sbyor sdom pa'i mchog ldan pa'i// gnas brtan rgan po skye dgu'i bdag/ sum
cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba'i// sdug gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes// lugs mkhan mkhas pas blugs pa yi// gser gyi seng ge 'dam pa'i sbubs// 'dam pa ma bsal mi mngon bzhin// bde gshegs snying
pos khyab pa'i thugs// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje de// dbang gi sgrib pa ma bsal na// ye shes sngon dang mi rtogs pas// ma rig 'khrul pas 'khor bar 'khyams// thar lam bral bas bde ba 'gags// 'ga'
zhig theg chen lam zhugs kyang// rab rib mig ni sgrib pa la// mig mkhan mkhas pas ma bsal na// don med gzugs brnyan mang mthong yang// mngon sum snang bar mi nus bzhin// rang 'dod blo yi ting
'dzin gyis// mtshan ma rtag la zhen pa yi// sa lam yon tan mthong gyur kyang// rang rig mngon du ma gyur pas// bskal par lam du 'khrul pas bsgribs// 'khrul pa bsal na sngon sangs rgya// sa bcu la
gnas sems dpa' yang// rigs pa rdo rje dbyings su grol// bskal par lam du 'khrul pas bsgribs// bgrod par byed pa'i lam chen kun// skad cig nyid kyis rtogs lags kyis// rdo rje theg pa'i dkyil
'khor 'di// bla ma mnyes pas tshogs lam bgrod// byin rlabs zhugs pa sbyor lam de// dag snang 'byongs pas mthong lam 'char// dbang bskur thob pa sgom pa'i lam// bskyed rim mthar phyin tshe gcig
gis// rdzogs pa chen po'i 'bras bu thob// gang zhig dbang rnams ma thob cing// slob dpon mnyes par ma byas pa'i// nyan pa la sogs rtsom pa kun// dngos grub med cing yon tan
med// dpon slob gnyis ka nyams par 'gyur// thur du ltas te ngan song ltung// dbang med dug can snod can 'dra// snod bcud gnyis ka brlag par 'gyur// gang zhig rdul tshon mthong ba tsam// ma rig sgrib
pa'i tshogs rnams 'dag/ yon tan gnyis po thob byed na// dbang bskur thob pa smos ci dgos// rang gi rdo rje'i don mthong bas// dus gsum sangs rgyas zhal mthong yin// ma nyoms tshe gcig phyir mi
ldog/ skyon spangs ngan song myur du grogs// gang gi lus blangs stobs cher 'gyur// 'o ma mar gyi rgyu yin yang// ma bsrubs bar du mar mi 'byung// srubs pas mar du 'byung ba bzhin// sems can sangs

rgyas rgyu yin kyang// ma bsgoms bar du sangs mi rgya// bsgom pa'i sngon du 'gro ba la// dbang gi chos sgo ma phye na// bsgom mi shes te dmus long 'dra// bsgom par 'dod kyang don mi mthong// dbang med pa la

dngos grub med// bye ma btsir ba'i mar dang mtshungs// mkha' la khu tshur gyis brdeg gam// rmongs pa phub ma brdung ba 'dra// dbang thob thun mong mchog gnyis kyi// rang rig ye shes yon tan thob// rgyal po

rgyal rigs spyi bo nas// dbang bskur thob dang mtshungs pa'o// rang nyid mngon du ma byas pa'i// mtshan nyid mi ldan slob dpon gyis// cho ga la sogs byas gyur yang// slob ma gus pas ma blangs na// mchog
gi dbang ni mi thob ste// thun mong yon tan 'byung ba srid// sngags kyis lam du de mi 'gro// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bla ma yis// cho ga la sogs ma byas kyang// gang gis mos gus yod pa des// de yi yon

tan thob par 'gyur// mos gus gang yod rgyal ba mnyes// gsol ba gang btab de don thob// rgyal ba'i sras po phyir mi ldog/ mkhan po tshad dang mi ldan zhing// rdzas dang ting 'dzin cho ga 'khrul// len pa gus

pa med pa dang// dam la mi gnas phyin ci log/ bskur dang ma bskur rjes med mtshungs// bum chu'i shwa la bskur gyur kyang// de yi sgrib pa dag mi 'gyur// dbang rdzas ri tsam spangs gyur kyang// de la yon tan
rdul tsam med// zhabs med snod du chu blug 'dra// skal bar mi ldan dman pa'i rigs// dpon slob gnyis ka nyams par gyur// sngags pa mkhas shing don ldan pa'i// dkyil 'khor bdag po tshad ldan
pas// slob bu rgyud dag gang rten pa// brdal dang brtags ni bsten pa tsam// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// thugs rgyud ye shes rtog pa 'phos// rig pa tsam gyi rang dbang thob// 'di ni dbang
mchog rgyal po yin// dge sdig spang blang rang don byed// 'jig rten lha yi theg pa las// thar 'dod bden bzhi'i sgo nas su// nyan thos rnams dang rang sangs rgyas// thun mong skyabs 'gro nas

brtsams nas// so so thar pa rigs brgyad kyis// rang don tshul khrims bsrungs pa yis// slab pa'i gzhi rnams brtan byas la// bden pa gnyis kyi sgo nas su// rnal 'byor spyod pa dbu ma'i don// theg pa chen
po'i sgor zhugs nas// byang chub sems gnyis gzhan don spyod// bden pa dbyer med phyag bya yi// sngags kyi don la 'jug 'dod pa// rigs gsum la ni rnam par gzigs// rigs gsum 'chang ba gsang

sngags 'chang// ma rig sel phyir rig sngags ni// phyi pa pha rol phyin pa'i sngags// lam la ma yengs gzungs sngags te// nang gi rgyud la 'jug pa'i sngags// rang rig ye shes bde chen po// tshe 'di nyid

la thob byed pas// blo chung theg pa dman rnams dang// phyin ci log par lta ba yi// bdud la gsang phyir gsang sngags zhes// sde snod rgyud sde thams cad kun// gtan la phebs par byed pa yi// snying po ye shes

mchog gi don// ma nor chos la 'jug 'dod pa// bla ma med pa'i gong rol na// sangs rgyas bya ba byung sa med// thog ma'i sangs rgyas bla ma yin// bla ma rang byung sangs rgyas te// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus

pa'i sku// rdo rje 'chang gi ngo bo nyid// dkon mchog gsum gyi rang bzhin te// chos sku'i ngang na longs spyod rdzogs// sna tshogs gzugs kyis skur byon nas// gang la gang 'dul 'gro don mdzad/ khyad par lha
mi'i 'jig rten du// rdo rje 'dzin pa mi yi gzugs// tha mal gzugs 'dra'i slob dpon 'byon// gsang ba sngags las byung ba yi// bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog/ mchod 'os bstod 'os phyag gi
gnas// rtag tu rim gro bya ba'i 'os// phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i rab// zhi zhing dul mi cha byad can// mnyam pa nyid du sems bskyed pas// sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin// ye shes can gyis shes bya

rtogs// stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid can// sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i las la mkhas// gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba'i// gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can// de
nyid kun gyi slob dpon 'gyur// bla ma las ni ma byung ba'i// chos 'ga' yod pa ma yin pas// bla ma'i drung du sems thag chod// bla ma la gus med gyur na// bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur bas// de bas
gus pa thams cad kyis// bla ma'i sku gsung thugs mnyes bya// mos gus gang yod rgyal ba'i sras// gnyug ma'i lhan skyes ye shes 'char// bla ma sangs rgyas gang bsgrub pa// de nyid mos gus stobs kyis
'gyur// bla ma dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtso// bdag nyid chen po'i lha tshogs yin// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub kun// thams cad bla ma mchog las 'byung// dgos 'dod 'byung ba rin po
che// gang gis 'brel ba don dang ldan// bla ma'i sku'am 'dra 'bag la// mchod cing bstod pa'i bsod nams ni// tshad du med cing bgrang mi nus// sku mthong tsam gyis sdig pa 'dag/ gsung thos pas ni yon
tan skye// thugs mnyes pas ni gcig tu 'dres// gnyis med ye shes sangs rgyas na// bskal pa bye bar rnyed dka' ba// skad cig nyid la thob par 'gyur// thams cad bla ma mchog las byung// bla ma kun

mkhyen sangs rgyas yin// bla ma med pa'i lam mchog ni// sngon du ma byung phyis mi 'byung// skye ba 'dzin pa med pa yi// gru yis chab la rgal mi nus// de bzhin 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las// bla ma med na mthar
mi nus// gsang sngags 'bras bu myur ba dang// 'chug med sngon du 'gyur ba yang// lam mchog bla ma'i mos gus byung// de phyir gus pas 'jug par bya// slob dpon gsum la dge slong mchog/ 'bring ni dge

tshul nyid du brjod/ khyim na gnas pa tha ma ste// yang dag don ni ma rtogs pa'i// sa thob man chad khyim pas ni// rmongs pas rdo rje 'dzin mi yong// rtsod ldan dus kyi tha ma la// slob dpon skyon dang yon tan
'dres// dge la spyod byed yon tan dag/ shas cher gyur na rnam par bzung// log shes che na spang bar bya// skyon can slob dpon brten byas pas// nyes pa du mas spags par gyur// 'gro kun bde gshegs
snying po can// 'khor ba 'di la blo log nas// gang zhig dad pas 'jug byed na// rigs ni ma nges gang yang rung// rgyal rigs rje rigs dmangs rigs dang// gdol pa rigs ngan bud med dang// mtshams
med lnga sogs sdig can yang// chos 'di la ni zhugs gyur na// bskal pa'i mun nag chen po kun// skad cig sgron mes sel ba bzhin// las kyi sgrib pa kun dag nas// yon tan ye shes thob pa'i snod// ma
gyur gang yang med pa las/ khyad par 'jig rten chos dang bral// dad pa che zhing brtson 'grus ldan// dul zhing gus pas slob dpon khur// 'phral 'dzum khog yangs bsam pa bzang// dam tshig gtsang zhing

khrel dang ldan// shes rab ldan zhing snying rje che// nor dang srog la 'phangs med gtong// byang chub don gnyer slob bu la// chos kun dbang thob snod dang ldan// yon tan yid bzhin nor bus gang// sangs

rgyas ye shes rgyun mi 'chad// snod du mi rung skal chad ni// tshe 'di mi spong chags sdang che// dad pa chung la log lta che// gus med bla ma'i bka' mi bsgrub/ khrel med thabs kyis chos 'dod cing// rna bar thos
nas gzhan la sgrog/ lag na thob nas zong du che// don la mi bsgom tshig la re// dam tshig mi gtsang rdzun po che// dam med man ngag nang tshong byed// gzhogs ngoms byed cing rang che
'byin// chos thob slob dpon rgyang du bsring// 'brel ba med rdzus gzhan la 'dud// bzhed pa mtho ris thar pa bzhed// 'gro ba mnar med dmyal bar 'gro// de 'dra'i snod ngan skal med la// rgyal srid

gter yang chos ma sbyin// gang zhig gus med chos la dred// spyod pa bag med ting 'dzin g.yel// sngags pa chang gi myos gyur pa// de la gags ni mang po 'byung// 'dod la dga' zhing 'khrigs la sred// rgod
cing glu len 'dug mi tshugs// 'thab mo'i las brtson rnam par 'phrul// smod cing bka' bas 'chol bar byed// nyams pas ngu 'bod gnas su 'gro// gsang sngags snod min de la ni// mkha' 'gro khros pas
nad rnams mang// 'jigs pa'i mya ngan 'tshe ba 'ong// dngos grub bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu med// sdig can dmyal bar khrid par 'gyur// grogs po dag la grib kyis chod// bdud de nyid la 'dug de nyid// dug
la sman gyis sel ba ste// sman gyi nad la bya thabs med// dug la bdud rtsir sngags kyis bsgyur// sngags pa myos pa'i nyes pa ni// bdag nyid chen po lha bral bas// sangs rgyas kun gyis bcos thabs
med// sngags pa 'di dag spang ba ni// dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyis bshad// gsang sngags bsgrub pa'i gnas mchog ni// dur khrod gnas su dngos grub nye// bas mtha' dgon par ting 'dzin 'phel// rgyal
po'i pho brang bar chad med// gtsug lag khang skor 'gro don che// bzhi mdo rnams na yo byad tshogs// mchod rten gnas su kun gyis bkur// de ru phyi nang gsang gsum gyis// 'tshams kyi khang pa chen po

bya// srung ba rdo rje'i ra bas bskor// yang na mi med grong khyer ram// dur khrod ri yi bya skyibs tshogs// bza' ba khyer te de rnams su// tshogs kyi 'khor lo spyad par bya// yar ngo mar ngo'i dus bzangs

la// mkha' 'gro ma rnams dga' bya'i phyir// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub ni// rnal 'byor tshogs kyis 'thob par 'gyur// bza' min bza' min btung min la// rnam rtog nyid du mi bya ste// sngags pa ting
'dzin ldan pa yis// chang ni bdud rtsir btung byas te// sha ni mkhas pas sdig med bza'// sems can de'i dbang du 'gyur// sgrod dang sgrod min sngags pa yis// rnam rtog med pa'i chos nyid rol// zad med
bde ba'i mchod sprin la// rgyal ba thams cad mnyes pa yis// mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'du bar 'gyur// gang gi dngos grub len pa la// gsang ba'i skad kyis ma bsgrags nas// de ni dam tshig nyams par
'gyur// gsang sngags gsang bas 'grub pa'i phyir// dben pa'i gnas su 'khor lo bskor// dbang thob dam tshig ldan pa yi// bdag nyid he ru ka yis ni// ngag gi glu ni sngags su

bzlas// lus kyi spyod pa phyag rgya gar// glu gar dgyes pa'i mchod pa ni// rnal 'byor rtag tu brtson par bya// dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha tshogs kyi// lhag ma'i bdud rtsis kun tshim bya// 'byung po rnams la
gtor ma gtang// chags pa med par yongs su bsngo// rnal 'byor sems dge ldan pa de// dbang dang byin rlabs dngos grub kun// bsgrub pa nam dran dus na bzang// rgyun chad med pa bzang ba'i mchog khyad
par lo zla tshes grangs kun// yon tan 'phel 'dod bstod du bzang// smad du bsgrib pa zad 'dod bzang/ khyad par nyi ma rgas pa ni// mkha' 'gro thams cad 'tshogs pa yin// phyi rol de bzhin nang du

yang// lha rnams 'du bar 'gyur ba ste// byin rlabs dngos grub mtshan mo tshe// nam langs pa na lha yang dgyes// rnal 'byor lus sems bde nyams 'gag/ nyin mo phyi yi bya ba ni// khrus dang gtsang sbra la

sogs spyod// mtshan mo nang gi rnal 'byor bskyang// dngos grub myur du thob pa yin// dkyil 'khor rgyan dang phyag mtshan dang// bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod yon dang// dbang rdzas mkho ba'i yo byad rnams// ji

ltar bsgrub bzhin tshogs par bya// yo byad ma 'dzom bsgrub pa yi// dngos grub nyams shing bar chad 'byung// rdzas rnams tshogs pa dam tshig gnad// pha rol dbang du de mi 'gyur// sngags kyi dngos grub don

nyer 'grub// cho rigs bzang zhing khrel dang ldan// dad pa brtan cing ngang rgyud ring/ kha na ma tho'i spyod pa bral// brtson 'grus che zhing rtog pa mthun// 'jig rten 'khor ba'i chos brgyad bral// byang

chub thar pa chu bas skom// bde ba 'dod phyir sdug bsngal nus// chos dang yo byad rdzas dang ldan// dpa' brtul gdeng che rig pa ldan// bla ma khong gi snying bzhin 'dzin// grogs pos mig gi 'bras ltar brtse// dam tshig

srog dang sdos nas srung// blo tshe shes rab nam mkha' 'dra// bla ma gcig cing dam tshig gcig/ yang na rang gis dbang bskur ba'i// rdo rje'i bu dang bu mo'i rigs// 'khor ba'i chos la 'brel chad pa'i// byang
chub don du gnyer ba yi// mang po'i tshogs su spyod lam mkhas// gsang sngags spyod dus rnam rtog bral// gcig por 'dug na 'bral mi phod// bla ma thod bzhin bkur ba yis// chos bzhin spyod pa grogs kyi

mchog/ rang rgyud ngan la gzhan rgyud bsreg/ ngo tsha chung la log lta che// tshe 'di mi spong nor la sred// phrag dog che zhing spun la 'khu// bla ma kha gsag g.yo sgyus brten// chos spyod khe dang grags pa re// snying rus
chung la 'dod chags che// dgon par mi gnas grong la dga'// bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu tshe 'di 'dod// blo dman spyod pa skyed kha 'grim// dam tshig mi bsrung g.yo sgyu 'cha'// stobs chung nor med

na tsha mod// le lo the tshom g.yeng ba che// rgyud gyong tshod yod brnyas pa che// grogs po ngan pa thabs kyis spang// grogs ngan bdud kyi nang byan yin// dngos grub mi thob bar chad 'khyer// gnyis ka ri gzar chu
'bab bzhin// gcig gis gcig phul ngan song ltung// sangs rgyas bstan pa'i ru drar 'gyur// gsang sngags rigs pa'i lha yin pas// snang srid rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// phyag rgya chen po rab rtogs

pas// lha dang gnyis med gyur pa yin// rang snang lha yi dkyil 'khor du// dran pas byin rlabs gsal thebs pa// bsnyen pa sngon du song ba yin// lha dang rang gnyis dam tshig dang// ye shes gnyis kyi spro bsdu
yis// rtsa ba nye ba'i snying po la// grangs dang dus dang mtshan ma yi// rtags la thug par bzlas pa ni// gang zag tha ma'i bzlas pa yis// lha dang nyer bar gnyen pa yin// sems can thams cad rgyud
gcig cing// sangs rgyas dgongs pa gcig pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas gcig gi bsgoms bzlas la// yi ge gsum gyis mgo drangs pa'i// sangs rgyas kun gyi gnyen po ru// chu zla gcig ni dag gyur na// chu
zla thams cad dag pa bzhin// rang gis yi dam gang mos kyi// bsnyen pa rdzogs na 'phrin las kyis// gang byed bsnyen par bsgyur ba chog/ 'khor lo'i bdag po bzlas pa 'bum// gcig bzlas kun tu shes

par bya// dkyil 'khor can gyi de bzhin khri// las kyis bsgyur ba stong phrag re// thams cad brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bsnyen// lha dang gnyis med gyur tsam na// gsang sngags bsnyen pa rdzogs rtags yin// mchog ni
rang rig ye shes lha// thun mong dngos grub 'byung ba dang// sngon du lha dang ma bsnyen par// phyi nas dngos grub mi 'byung bas// gsang sngags zlas mchog sngon du gces// phyi nas bar chad mi 'byung
phyir// mkhas pas sa gzhi legs brtags la// dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg gang byed du// sa bdag rnams la sa bslangs la// skyon med 'dzin ma rnam par sbyangs// gang gi skyon dang 'tshams pa yi// stegs bu ma

brdal legs su+u na// hUM hUM bsnyen pa byas nas ni// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rab tu bsgom// phyogs skyong 'byung po'i gdon rnams la/ oM a hUM/ a kha ro mu khaM sarba d+harma Na na/ Ad+ya nud pan na twad swAhA/ zhes

pas spyi ru gtor ma gtang// bar chad med pa'i bka' bsgo bya// shing btsir me spar lha bskyed la// oM ag ne me dza la raM shan ting ku ru swAhA/ rdzas dbul sdig sgrib bag chags sbyangs// 'phrin las 'dod
gsol dmigs pas bsgyur// sbyin sreg las la su brtson pa// tshogs rdzogs sgrib dag bar chad sel// sbyin sreg me yi mchod pa 'dis// lha dgyes rab la dngos grub 'byung// 'phrin las bzhi

po 'grub pa 'di// gsang ba nang gi pU tsa 'o// gong gi slob ma dbang bskur ba// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i thabs la ni// rdul gcig steng nas nam mkha'i bar// che chung blo dang gang 'tsham par// snang srid snod
ni gzhal yas khang// srid pa bcud ni lha'i 'khor// bdag nyid 'khor lo'i bdag po ru// ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i dpal// rab kyis rtogs shing 'bring gis bsgom// tha mas ma rig rmongs pa la// mtshon

byed phyi nas dkyil 'khor bri// dkyil 'khor khang pa'i nang du ni// dkyil 'khor dam pa rab tu bzhengs// gang zag blo dang bstun pa yi// tshad ni sor bzhi mtho gang dang// gru bzhi 'dom gang rgyang grags
nas// dpag tshad la sogs gang 'thad bya// shes rab ldan pa'i bu pho mos// gsar pa legs par bkal ba yi// srad bu tshon gyis kha dog bsgyur// ye shes dgug bstim rgyal ba rnams// mkha' nas byin
brlabs thig btab pas// sa la dmigs la sel bar bya// de nas thabs dang shes rab kyis// srad bu lnga ldan chad med pas// sa la las kyis thig btab nas// gzhal yas khang gi rmang bting ngo// 'di la

lha rnams skyob par 'gyur// 'byung po rnams ni bya bar byed// rmongs pa rnams la bstan pa'i phyir// rdul tshon dam pa tshon la ni// rin chen sna lnga'i phye ma dang// yang na 'bru'am sa la ni/ kha dog lnga'am nyi shu

yis// bsgyur ba'i tshon ni dri med la// rgyal ba'i byin brlabs ye shes gzhug/ sma dang yo dang 'khyogs med par// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// gru bzhi sgo bzhi gzi brjid can// do shal do shal phyed
pa dang// 'phel ba mda' yab snam bu dang// ka ba brgyad la sogs pa yi// rta babs mu khyud chos 'khor gdugs// dkyil 'khor dbus 'gyur mtha' mi 'gyur// dbus su 'khor lo'i bdag pos

shes// pad+ma'i 'khor lo 'od zer dang// ling tshe dra mig sna tshogs 'byung// bla bre gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang// dar dpyangs tshon gyi dwa ba yis// rgyal po'i pho brang brgyan par bya// bgegs dang bzlog phyir me
long dang// mda' dang ral gri phur pa dang// me tog rin chen 'phreng ba dang// bdug pa mar me lha bshos dri// bum pa la sogs mdzes par brgyan// de la lha rnams mchod par 'gyur// bum pa lha yi grangs
dang mnyam// yang na gnyis la bsdus kyang rung// gcig ni las ky-i bum par bsham// slob ma 'jug pa'i phyogs su gzhag/ rnam par rgyal ba bgegs bskrad pa// rin chen sna lngas yongs su gang// mgrin
par gos kyis dkris nas su// 'bras bu can gyis legs par brgyan// sku'i phyag mtshan la sogs brgyan// dben pa'i gnas su maN+Dal steng// bum pa bzhag la ye shes pa// dgug bstim
mchod bstod bsnyen pa bya// dkyil 'khor gnas su dgod pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor bdag po bsgom// lha rnams so so gnas su gzhag/ mchod bstod bsnyen pas dkyil 'khor sgrub// gsol ba 'debs

cing dngos grub blang// lung bstan rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// bsnyen cing bsgrub mchod su brtson na// tshogs gnyis myur rdzogs byang chub thob// e ma ngo mtshar rmad po che// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor
du// tshogs bsags bag chags sbyangs pa dang// rnal 'byor chags nyams bskang ba'i phyir// 'ongs sgrol bskang bshags mchod par bya// gsol ba gdab cing dngos grub blangs// slob ma khrus bya bgegs
bskrad cing// gsar ba'i gos gyon rtags pa pas// sdom pa gsum la rim pa bslab// gsang sngags spyod pa'i dam tshig bshad// bla mas slob ma'i snying la ni// ye shes gzhug cing byin gyis brlabs// ma rig
