sgrib pa bsal don du// slob ma'i gdong ni gos kyis bcing// bla ma lha la gsol ba gdab// dper na rang gi byad bzhin te// ma mthong me long nang ltas gsal// de bzhin rang gi ye shes de// dkyil 'khor
mthong bas gsal ba'i phyir// slob ma dkyil 'khor nang du gzhug/ rdul tshon mthong ba tsam gyis ni// ma rig sgrib pa'i tshogs dag nas// rang gi ye shes snang ba thob// nga yi dkyil 'khor 'di mthong
nas// yon tan myur du rdzogs byed pas// dkyil 'khor 'di ni ma mthong bar// tshul 'di gzhan nas ma smra zhig/ dam med lha la sreg par 'gyur// 'di nas bzung nas dus kun tu// lha dang mi 'bral dam
chos cig/ de las 'gal na brlag par 'gyur// slob mas khas blangs dam bcas la// dam tshig ye shes mngon du 'gyur// gtsang ma'i gnas ni nyams dga' ba// dkyil 'khor nang du zhugs pa yis// yang

dag rdzogs pa der sangs rgyas// rang nyid lha ru ma gyur na// khrus dang gtsang sbra dri zhim lus// slob dpon dkyil 'khor nang du bzhugs// lha la lung ni blang bar bya// lha yi gnang ba thob pa dang// slob ma

yongs su smin par byed// rang rig ye shes lha sku ru// yod pa ma rig sgrib pa la// phyi nas brda yi dbang bskur ba// dper na bum pa'i lha sku de// phyi nang bum pa mthong ba tsam// nang na lha sku shes pa
bzhin// bum pa'i dbang ni bskur ba tsam// rang lus lha skur shes par 'gyur// de bzhin ngag la bdud rtsi dang// yid la phyag rgya gzugs brnyan dang// sems la mi rtog brda bstan pas// de dang de don
rtogs phyir du// phyi ni brda yi dbang du bstan// dper na glen pa 'khrul pa la// rang lus bstan pas mi shes te// me long bstan pas yid ches ltar// ma rig rtog can gang zag la// mngon sum
bstan pas mi rig ste// thabs la brten nas don rtogs phyir// brda yi dbang du bstan pa yin// dang por bum par dkyil 'khor bsgom// de yi dbang bskur bdag gis thob// tha mal sgrib pa dag nas

su// rang lus lha sku'i dkyil 'khor du// ting nge 'dzin gyis bsgom shes pa'i// gnyen po'i dbang ni thob pa yin// rdo rje slob dpon sku nyid la// dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs pa yin// lha mo klu mo mi yi
tshogs// sha rtsa sngo la yid 'ong ma// rdo rje rigs kyi bu mo yin// de bzhin dmar ser ljang ba'i mdog/ rin chen pad+ma las kyi rigs// dkar mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// rigs ma bzang mo rnams la
gzhugs// yang na ji ltar rig pa yis// bag rtsa bdag khu ba ldan// gsang thub bcu drug lon pa nyid// tshul khrims ldan pas sa brten la// phyag rgya'i gdong yang bcings pa yis// thabs kyi gdong yang de

bzhin la// brten pa de las gang byung ba'i// pad+ma'i 'byung gnas dkyil 'khor bsam// lha tshogs zhu ba'i byang chub sems// rdo rje lce yis bdud rtsi blang// lce stengs gsung gi lha tshogs bsgom// rtog tshogs

rang grol mngon sum du// bsgom mi dgos pa don gyi dbang// lha dang rang gnyis ro snyoms pa'i// rang rig ye shes nyid du 'gyur// bdag med shes rab spang du gtad// rang mnyam lha yi ting 'dzin de// phyag

rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// b+ha ga bde chen bskyed pa'i lha// gzhal yas khang gi nang nyid nas// thabs kyi rdo rje he ru ka/ gnyis med mnyam sbyor sgyu ma'i gzugs// rang gzhan cha yi rnam rtog gis// gzung

dang 'dzin pa rnams spangs pa'i// dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid mchog/ thabs dang shes rab shin tu 'dres// chags dang chags bral rnam spangs pa'i// rang rig lhan skyes ye shes lha// de nyid 'khor 'das
kun gyi srog/ thams cad kun la khyab pa yis// de nyid yul las rnam par 'das// skyes bu mngon rab dbang phyug go/ dang po rang nyid dga' ba tsam// tha mal 'dzin pa'i rtog pa dag/ gnyis pa gzhan nyid

mchog dga' tsam// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rtog pa dag/ dga' bral nyid de lhan cig tu// snang srid snod bcud snang ba kun// bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du// rang snang nyid la mngon sum du// rtog pa don gyi

dbang yin no// rang rig gzhan rig thams cad kun// snang tshad gzugs sku rgyal ba'i sku// sgra grags thams cad rgyal ba'i gsung// dran tshad rgyal ba'i thugs kyi ni// mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon sum du// rig
sbyir rig pa'i ye shes dbang// sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' la// bskur bas sangs rgyas nyid du ni// rtsal rdzogs phyir na rtsal gyi dbang// zhes ni rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi dbang// mthar thug
don gyi dbang yin no// thabs shes gnyis med ye shes rgyud// phyi nang dbyer med dkyil 'khor du// bdag kyang grol bar bya ba dang// slob ma yongs su smin bya'i phyir// dbang gi cho ga rnam par
bshad// dkyil 'khor gsum mam bzhi la brten// smin grol dbang gis cho ga yis// rab 'byam chos kyi de nyid don// rtogs phyir thams cad mkhyen dbang bskur// thabs shes ldan pa'i gang zag
gis// smin byed dbang la brten nas su// rig pa'i ye shes rtog par bya// thug pa rang 'byung kun tu bzang// bstan pa'i bdag po chos kyi sku// 'jam dbyangs khams rnams kun la khyab// gsang ba 'dus pa
kun byed rgyal// ye shes gsang ba'i dbyings na gsal// thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba 'dul// 'khor lo bde mchog bde bar gnas// dbang thob nas ni rtogs par 'gyur// sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin

las rdzogs// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir// dbang gis grol bar byed pa la// bye brag rnam pa lnga bshad de// phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor ro// slob ma smin byed slob dpon dbang/ khyad par mchog
gi dbang rnams bskur// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas der 'gyur ro// dam rdzas bdud rtsis nad kun spong// ye shes bdud rtsis nyon mongs 'joms// bdud rtsi dbang gis dngos grub blang// che mchog yon tan bla
na med// gang gis rigs 'dzin sgrub pa la// dbang gi byin rlabs 'jug pa yis// sgrol ma'i las kyi cho ga yis// dngos grub thob par gdon mi za// 'khor lo drug rdzogs dbang bskur yin// de nas rigs

kyi bu mchog des// rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus// bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/ rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul// dbang phyug 'dod yon lnga mchod na// rgyal ba thams cad mnyes pa yin// longs spyod

gzhan rnams smos ci dgos// nyes pa kun byang yon tan thob// dad brtson brtul zhugs ldan pa yi// bla ma'i bka' bzhin rjes su sgrub// snying rje chud ma zos pa yi// slob ma bsdu ba nyid du bya// sangs rgyas
bstan pa'i 'phrin las dbang// rdo rje slob dpon nyid kyis rdzogs// slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing// dbang rnams thob par ma byas na// gsang sngags sgor zhugs rnal 'byor la// 'bras bu med cing
brlag par 'gyur// bum pa dbu rgyan cod pan dang// 'phreng pa gos dang rgyal mtshan gdugs// phyag mtshan phyag rgya bza' btung dang// snying po la sogs dbang bskur na// dus 'di phan chad rgyal ba'i
sras// ngan song 'jigs pa med pa dang// tshe ring nad med phun sum tshogs// mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro/ byang chub sems bskyed byas nas

su// lha dang mi 'bral sdom pa ni/ khyod kyis srog chags bsad mi bya// ma byin pa yang mi bslang zhing// 'dod pas log par g.yem mi bya// rdzun du yang ni mi smra ste// nyes pa'i rtsa ba chang spang zhing// sems can

rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir// bya ba ma yin thams cad dor// dam pa rnams la rim gro bya// rnal 'byor ma rnams thabs kyi mchod// lus ngag yid kyi mi dge spang// dge ldan longs spyod tshogs la spyod// rang

snang rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor la// skyes pa bud med la sogs pa'i// sems can rnams kyi gzugs mi smad// thams cad lha dang lha mor lta// sku yi dam tshig rdo rje yin// brlang dang rtsub dang mi snyan pa'i// tshig

dag smra bar mi byed cing// grags tshad rgyal ba'i gsung du nyan// rdo rje gsung gi dam tshig yin// rnam rtog dra bas bcings pa yi// sems can rnams la skyabs pa dang// sems kyi rdo rje smad mi bya// thams cad

chos nyid rol pa la// rol pa'i ye shes chen po ni// thugs kyi dam tshig rdo rje ste// 'da' ka rdo rje gtan gyi gnyer// spyi dang khyad par 'phags pa yi// dam tshig slob dpon mi 'da' 'o// dkyil 'khor mu ran

skyong pa yi// las byed mkha' 'gro lhag ma'i mchod// 'byung po thams cad kun tshim bya// dbang thob dam tshig ldan pa rnams// phyag rgya lnga yis yang dag mchod// bro gar 'dul 'phro'i phyag rgya yis// mched

lcam thams cad dgyes par bya// glu tshig sgra yi phyag rgya yis// rgyal ba thams cad mnyes par bya// brgyan dang bsgo ba'i phyag rgya yis// skye 'gro thams cad mnyes par byed// bza' btung tshogs kyi phyag rgya
yis// mkha' 'gro thams cad mnyes par byed// A li kA li phyag rgya yis// dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyes par byed// dga' chen rol mo chen po yi// dgyes pa'i rim gro phun tshogs pa// spyod pa kun tu spyod
par bya'o// 'bras bu gsang ba bla na med pa'i rgyud chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po las// smin lam dbang gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// lhan cig skyes pa'i sems nyid la// bsgom med bsgoms pa po yang
med// lha med sngags kyang yod ma yin// spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin pas// lha dang sngags ni yang dag gnas// de nyid rtogs pa'i lam du ni// dngul rdo dngul du ma bzhu bar// btul yang bzo ni mi nyan
bzhin// dbang med bskyed rim bsgom pa kun// don gyi 'bras bu mi 'byung bas// gser dngul bzhu btul byed pa bzhin// dbang gis smin byas bskyed rim rung// 'bras bu gtan la 'bebs pa yin// gang
zhig lam la 'bad byas kyang// lha dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor la// 'bras bu myur du mi thob ste// rgyus med yul du 'gro ba bzhin// lam gyi gol sa shin tu mang// stong pa nyid la lta nyes
na// shes rab chung ldan phung bar 'gyur// snang srid rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor la// de nyid ma rig snod bcud 'khrul// dngos por zhen las 'khor bar 'khyams// rang bzhin 'gyur ba med pa yin// shes dang

mtshungs pa'i sems nyid la// bag chags skyon gyis mi gos kyang// rnam pa rkyen gyi 'gyur ba ste// 'khrul pa'i rkyen gyi 'khor bar snang// de las bzlog pa'i lam rnams kyis// 'bras bu 'gog pa'i bden par

snang// rgyu de'i 'bras bu gsang sngags kyis// lam gyi gzung 'dzin kun grol nas// snod bcud mngon zhen bzlog pa'i phyir// dang po blos byang bskyed rim bsgom// bar tu ting 'dzin lha ru 'char// mthar thug
bskyed du med pa yis// rang snang ye shes lha ru 'gyur// lha nyid sems la sems nyid lha// shel dang 'od gnyis gnyis med bzhin// lha dang sems gnyis gnyis su med// gnyis med rgyal ba'i dgongs pa
yin// yin kyang de nyid ma rig pas// med pa'i ngang las yod pa ru// kun rtags phyi'i bskyed rim bsgom// gzhan dbang rkyen des rang lus ni// lha yi sku ru gsal ba yin// de nyid rang rtsal sbyangs pa
yis// yongs grub rgyal ba'i sku ru 'gyur// de phyir bskyed rim dran pas gso// gsal bar 'phyongs pa mnyam bzhag yin// rang bzhin shes pas rjes shes yin// mi g.yo gnas pa zhi gnas yin// gnas

lugs shes pa lhag mthong ngo// dkyil 'khor dam pa sems kyi lta// stong pa'i rdo rje spyan cig ni// rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru snang// 'gyur ba med pa rdo rje sems// thams cad 'byung bas rin chen 'byung// ci yang
'char bas mtha' yas 'od// thams cad grub pas don yod grub// dper na chu shel snying po'i 'od// gcig la ma 'gags phyogs bcu gsal// de bzhin kun tu bzang po de// phyogs bcur khyab pas gang chen

mtsho// gzung 'dzin bral bas chos kyi sku// kun tu snang bas gzugs kyi sku// rnam par snang mdzad kun tu zhal// thams cad ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i// spros dang bral ba'i rang bzhin yin// kun gzhi'i rnam shes

cig nyid la// rang nyid ma dag sbyang gzhi las// dag pa'i sbyong byed sna tshogs kyis// shin tu rnam dag go rim bzhin// phung po lnga ni rigs lnga dngos// rigs lnga ye shes lnga yin te// kun mkhyen cig gis
bsdus pa'i phyir// 'byung ba lnga ni yum lnga la// rdo rje'i skye mched phyi nang rnams// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'khor 'das gnyis snang sgo bas te// gzung 'dzin gnyis snang yab yum
mkha'// gnyis med lhan skyes kun gyi bdag/ chos sku zhi ba'i ngang nyid las// sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir// gang gang gdul bya'i snang ba bzhin// mang po dang ni gcig dag tu// zhi

ba longs spyod rdzogs sku byung// nyon mongs lnga ni rang rgyal ba'i// shin tu gtsub cing gtum pa la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi sbyor ba yis// khro bo de bzhin gshegs kun bstan// phung
po khams rnams bdag nyid ltar// skyes pa bud med thams cad kyang/ kha dog rigs ni rnam pa lnga// dkar ser dmar ljang mthing nag pa// rigs lnga'i rtags las byung ba yis// rigs kyi yon tan thob par
'gyur// rigs ni rnam pa du ma las// 'gro ba du ma skye ba yang// sems nyid dam pa gcig gi rig/ mi'i rigs su brtag bya ste// dngos de nges par bsgoms pa yis// rang sems mthu yis sangs rgyas
'gyur// lha rnams thams cad gang bsgoms kyang// rigs gcig de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs// rigs lnga las ni ma 'das te// sku yi lha rnams de bzhin rigs// gsung gi lha rnams pad+ma'i rigs// thugs
kyi lha rnams rdo rje'i rigs// yon tan lha rnams rin chen rigs// 'phrin las lha rnams kar ma'i rigs// rigs ni lnga po de nyid las// rigs gsum rigs bzhi rigs lnga dang// brgya stong 'bum phrag bye ba
sogs// bgrang du med par bskyed pa nyid// de phy-ir 'di dag rang bzhin gcig/ sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// grangs med rigs las rigs can rnams// mchog tu dga' ba'i rigs las byung// de
bzhin nyid du lus cig gis// rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed kyi// zhing khams spros pas nam mkha' bzhin// dag pa nyid du ston par byed// de bzhin bdag gis lha sku yis// zhing khams thams cad khyab par
byed// bdag gi lus kyi chos kyi dbyings// de dang mnyam par rab tu shes// chos dbyings 'gyur ba med par rtogs// zhing khams rnam dag du ma dag/ zhing gcig tu ni ston par byed// stong gsum 'dzam bu'i

gling du gcig/ 'dzam gling snying po rdo rje'i gdan// mi mjed khams 'di me bdun dang// chu yis zhig kyang lha dang mis// rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gang// gzhi ni snying pos brgyan pa'i zhing// zhing ni rnam pa du

ma yis// zhing khams du mas ston par byed// skra yi rtse mo gcig tu yang// zhing khams du ma ston par byed// du ma skra yi rtse ru 'dus// skra yi rtse mos nam mkha' khengs// 'phra ba ba spu rdul phran tsam// che ba nam
mkha' mtha' dang mnyam// chos nyid gcig gi rol pa ste// lha rnams thams cad zhi ba'am// yang na khro bar bsgom par bya// ras ris dang ni lus ma gzugs// mang po dag gam gcig kyang rung// zhing khams
sna tshogs spro bsdu yi// sangs rgyas gar mkhan bsam mi khyab// dkyil 'khor rim pa mang na yang// 'di dag sems kyis rnam 'khrul yin// sems las ma rtog phyi rol na// byed pa gzhan gyi lha
med pas// tshangs pa sgrib bral sangs rgyas nyid// don la 'jug phyir khyab 'jug ces// thams cad sangs rgyas de nyid brjod// sangs rgyas ma yin sems can ni// gcig kyang yod pa ma yin no// 'o na yul ni

nyi shu bzhi// mkha' 'gro 'du bo'i gnas rnams ni// phyi rol yod pa ma yin nam// sum cu rtsa bzhi gang ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// yul zhes bya ba rtsa yin te// mkha' 'gro zhes ni rlung

sems la// gnyis su med pa zhing khams kyi// rig pa ye shes lha zhes brjod// spu ri ra ma mgo bo la// dza lan d+ha ra spyi bos te// u rgyan rna ba g.yas pa la// 'go ta ri ni rna ba g.yon// ra smi sa ra smin 'tshams

la// d+he ba ko ti mig gnyis la'o// nang du thig le dkar por gnas// phyi nang mkha' 'gro gnas pa'i phyir// gnas zhes lus la brjod pa yin// ma la wa ni phrag pa la// nang du dkar cha shas che bas// phyi

rol TA ki 'ga' re gnas// nye ba'i gnas zhes brjod pa yin// ka ma ru pa mchan khung dgod// o de nu ma gnyis la yod// rtsa nang bde ba longs spyod pas// phyi ru gra ki longs spyod cing// kri sha ku ni lte ba'i

dbus// ko sa la ni sna yi rtse// a bu ta ni rgyab tshigs la// ku lu ta ni 'ag+hin par gnas// nang du bde ba cha la spyod// phyi ru Da ki 'ga' re spyod// 'ga' re mi gnas nye ba'i zhing// ka ling ka ni kha la

dgod// lam pa ka ni mgrin pa'i dbus// tsa ri tra ni brang kha ste// b+hi tsa ni rkan phugs so// kan rtsi ka ni snying kha ste// rtsa nang thig le dngas snyigs 'dres// mkha' 'gro 'du bas mtshan d+ho 'o// ma la bu ri mtshan

rtse ste// ka li ka ni gri mongs la// rtsa nang thig le dngas ma nye// mkha' 'gro nyer song nye mtshan no// spre ta pu re mtshan ma ste// 'ag+h+ri ha de ba bshang lam yin// so'ur ta brla gnyis song// gser gling rje ngar

gnyis la yod// rang ma d+hu li lce la gnas// ba'i mchod sbyin sna gnyis na// rtsa yi nang du dngas ma 'du// phyi ru kra ki 'du ba'o// na ga ra ni sor mo ste/ kha ri byin pa gnyis la'o// nang du snyigs 'du phyi

rol tu// d+ha ki nye bas nye 'du 'o// sin d+hu rkang pa'i bol gnyis la// dngas ma'i bde ba phyir 'phros pas// d+ha ki rgyu byed dur khrod do// ku lu ta ni pus mor gnas// ra ma d+hu ru 'og sgo na// mu mu ni ni gzhung pa'i

'gram// rtsa nang khams ni gnas tsam las// bde ba mi skye gra ki rnams// rgyu ba tsam las mi gnas pas// nye bas dur khrod zhes brjod do// rang lus rgyas pa'i zhing khams la// dngos grub 'dod na 'di ru
bsgrub// phyi rol mtshon byed brda yi gnas// de ru byang chub 'grub mi 'gyur// rtog pas thun mong 'byung ba srid// brda don gnyis med sems kyi gzugs// rang rig ye shes mkha' 'gro la// phyi

nas dngos grub re ba kun// sprin med mkha' la char 'dod 'dra// de bas dngos grub rang la sgrubs// phung po sangs rgyas mnga' bdag yin// gang zag dbang po'i blo rigs la// thabs kyis 'dul phyir rgyud sde

bzhi// bskyed rim bye brag so sor bstan// kun kyang 'bras bu gcig tu 'dod// rtsol byas rtsol med thabs kyi khyad// dang po blo dman gang zag dang// mu stegs rtsod pa spangs pa'i phyir// bde gshegs yum ni
phyag rgya sbas// lha rnams thams cad phan tshun dgod// phyag rgya dang bcas rin chen rgyan// bdag nyid dam tshig sems dpa' ni// thams cad sems dpa'i tshul du bsgom// me tog bdug spos phyi nas

mchod// lha yang 'og min gnas nas 'dren// dngos grub dam pa lha la re// khrus dang gtsang sbra spyod pa can// phyi pa zhes su btags pa yin// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// lha yi sku ru shes pa

yis// dran pa tsam gyi ting 'dzin gyis// lha yi sku ru gsal gyur kyang// 'gro ba thabs kyis 'dul ba'i phyir// shes rab yum ni phyag mtshan nam// brda yi rtags tsam 'dzin pa yi// phyi ru mchod yon lnga 'dzin

cing// nang du 'dod yon lnga spyod de// dam tshig ye shes gnyis med bsgom// dngos grub bdag la sgrub pa ni// rigs 'dzin nang gi bskyed rim yin// snang stong ye shes chos dbyings mkha'// dam tshig ye shes

tshul mi 'dzin// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med brdar// yab yum gnyis med zung 'jug 'byung// lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba la// snang tshad lha yi skur bsgom zhing// dkar rtsi dmar rtsi sha chen sogs// rang

byung dam rdzas bdud rtsi la// longs spyod zag med bde ba mchod// dngos grub dam pa rang la thob// skal med rnams kyis ma rtogs phyir// gsang sngags lha zhes bstan pa yin// gsang sngags gsang zhes bya ba

ni// chos la skyon yod ma yin te// blo chung theg dman rnams la gsang// gsang sngags gsangs pas 'grub pa ste// rang 'byung rang la sgrub pa la// gzhan la bstan du ga la yod// de phyir gsang chen nges pa'i

bka'// bskyed dang rdzogs dang gnyis med pa'i// rang 'byung ye shes lhun grub tu// bdag gi lus gnas srog chags tshogs// bshang ba'i srin bu la sogs pa// ngo bo nyid kyis rnam dag pa'i// 'gro kun byang

chub snying po can// phung po sangs rgyas mnga' bdag ste// ma rig 'khrul na kun kyang 'khrul// rig cing rtogs na kun rig ste// kun rig rnam par snang mdzad lha// ri rab gser gyi logs la ni// bya nas bya yi
rang bzhin gser// de bzhin bdag nyid ci 'dra bar// de 'dra sems can thams cad kun// chos nyid ye nas lhun grub pa'i// bskyed du med pa'i ngang nyid du// bya byed yid chos rnam par

dag/ kun bzang yab yum lha tshogs ni// de bzhin nyid kyi bskyed rim yin// bsgom du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin// yengs su med pa'i chos nyid lta// sgrub tu med pa rang 'byung gi/ ye shes lha tshogs kun gyi
mchog/ mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang// sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can// khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag/ lhun grub 'gyur ba med phyir ro// rang rig ye shes lhun grub la// kun tu rtogs pa'i
gzugs brnyan gyis// rang snang gang mos dkyil 'khor lnga// so so'i rgyud bzhin mngon rtog bsgom// lha nyid gsal bar ma bsgoms na// tha mal mngon zhen mi ldog cing// bsod nams tshogs chen mi rdzogs

pas// ye shes tshogs ni mi thob ste// gzugs med srid pa'i lha ru skye// de bas sku mdog phyag mtshan dang// rgyan dang cha lugs gsal ba bsgom// gnas skabs phyi nang rten 'brel 'grig/ mthar phyin ye shes
tshogs la sbyor// gzugs sku mtshan dang dpe byad ldan// sku dang gdan khri zhing khams kyi// yon tan bskyed rim gsal bar bya// rgyan dang cha lugs gsal gyur kyang// lha ni rang rgyud par bsgoms

nas// gzung 'dzin 'khrul pa'i blo yin pas// lus grol sems ni ma grol bas// mkha' la rgyu ba la sogs pa'i// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i lha ru gol// de bas snang stong gnyis med kyi// rnam dag ye shes chos kyi
sku// gsal dag bde ba chen po yis// rang bzhin yon tan dran pas bsgom// lus med lus de lus kyi mchog/ ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs// sku gsung thugs yon 'phrin las rdzogs// rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas de las byung// sna tshogs gzhan la mi ltos par// rang rig thabs shes sbyor ba yis// sems can skye gnas rnam pa bzhi// rdzus skyes rig pa skad cig la// cho ga gsum ldan drod gsher la// mngal

skyes sgo nga byang chub lnga// stong pa byang chub chos nyid dang// nyi zla phyag mtshan sa bon rnams// zhu bas rang nyid lha rdzogs pas// 'khor ba grol phyir lha zhes brjod// bag chags dag pas mya ngan 'das// ye nas

lhun rdzogs ye shes sku// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po ru// rab kyis skad cig dran rdzogs bskyed// de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin// ye nas ma skyes stong pa'i ngang// kun la khyab pa'i byang chub sems// kun
tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin// rang byung sdig pa'i sa bon las// lha tshogs gsal bar bskyed pa 'bring// tha mal snod bcud sngon zhen sbyang// de nas dum bu cha shas las// cho gas rim bzhin gzhal yas
dang// gtso 'khor lha tshogs dum bur bskyed// mi dmigs las byung bskyed rim ste// bskyed pa dmigs med rdzogs rim yin// rim gnyid rnam par gnas pa ni// rdo rje 'chang gi chos yin

no// chos dbyings ye shes nam mkha' la// byang chub sems kyi 'od lnga 'phros// rgya chad phyogs lhung ma mchis pa'i// rin chen 'od gsal gzhal yas khang// phyi nang kun tu gsal ba yi// chu zla 'am 'ja' tshon
bzhin// dkar ser dmar ljang mthing ba'i 'od/ kha dog ma 'dres so sor gsal// mnyam pa nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ni// pad+ma 'khor lo lte ba las// mu khyud stegs bcas gru chad bzhi// bar khyams gru bzhi sgo

bzhi pa// sgo khyud phyi nang rta babs bzhi// 'dod yon rin chen dra ba dang// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya yi// phun sum tshogs pa'i sprin du 'khrigs// bsam gyis mi khyab yangs pa'i lam// mi 'jigs seng ge

stobs chen glang// rdzu 'phrul rta mchog rma bya dbang// thogs med nam mkha' lding gi khri// skyon gyis ma gos pad+ma'i gdan// thabs shes 'od gsal nyi zla'i steng// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad ni// sku
ni mdun rgyab phyogs ris med// zhal ni thal le bzhugs pa yin// chos nyid rol pa'i dkyil 'khor la// dkyil 'khor dbus 'gyur mtha' mi 'gyur// dbus su lha tshogs rang gi lha// gang mos rig pa'i sgyu

'phrul yin// sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pas// byang chub ci nas bdag thob 'gyur// gzhal yas khang la phyi nang med// phyogs ris med pas kun gyi zhing// rdul gcig steng na mkha' dang mnyam// rgyal ba rgya

mtsho ma lus kyang// zhi khro'i lha ru 'dus pa yin// de yang rgyal ba rigs lngar 'dus// rigs lngar ma 'dus lha gzhan med// lus sems khyab tshad thams cad la// phung po lnga ni rigs lnga yab/ khams lnga yum

lnga nyid du gnad// rang byung rang las bskyed pa yi// oM hUM traM hri aha// 'bru lnga ye shes sa bon las// dbus su rnam snang kun tu zhal// gti mug dag pa chos kyi dbyings// longs spyod ye shes 'khor lo

rnams// mnyam yang zhabs gnyis skyil krung bzhugs// de las shar phyogs mi bskyod pa// 'od ldan zhe sdang rnam dag pa'i// me long ye shes rdo rje rnams// rin chen gser 'od lho phyogs su// nga rgyal rnam dag
mnyam pa nyid// longs spyod rtags su rin chen 'dzin// nub phyogs mtha' yas dmar ba'i 'od// 'dod chags rang grol so sor rtogs// bde stong ye shes pad+ma rnams// byang du don grub mar gad mdog/ phrag

dog dag pa bya grub 'od// ye shes ldan pa'i rgya gram rnams// mtshan bzang 'od kyis spras pa yi// nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// rang rang sku las 'od 'phros
pas// gsang yum 'od kyi rig ma ni// aM baM laM raM yaM/ 'byung ba'i yi ge 'bru lnga las// dbyings phyug gsang ba'i yum lnga ni// so so 'am ni dgyes par 'khril// sku gsung thugs yon 'phrin las

lnga'o// 'od kyi rang sprul rigs kyi lha// dpag med mtha' yas mngon zhen bskyed// rdo rje mthong thos myong reg dang// mthong byed thos byed myong byed dang// reg byed thabs kyi sems dpa' brgyad// de bzhin
pad+ma mthong ba ma// mthong byed la sogs sems ma brgyad// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams dang// gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor dang// lA se mA le 'gar ti hri// phyag rgya mchod yon lnga sogs

kyi// rang las rang 'byung mchod pa'i lha// 'dzin pa chen po lcags kyu zhags// rdo rje lcags sgrog dril bu che// phyi nang kun tu 'joms byed pa'i// sna tshogs rin chen 'phreng ba'i lha// gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gzi
brjid ldan// gang la gang 'dul dkyil 'khor gyi// 'od zer 'phreng ba'i tshogs chen po// mtha' yas mu med brjod mi lang// zhing gi rdul snyed gsal bar 'gyur// zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos par// thabs

kyis gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir// sems can lus kyi rtsa nang na/ khro tshogs rig pa'i lha dgu gnas// drag po'i mngon par spyod 'khor bsgrol// mya ngan 'das pa'i don la sbyor// kun 'byung ye shes dkyil 'khor
gyis// dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas su// dregs pa 'joms byed gdan stengs su// sku gsum ldan phyir zhal gsum pa// dkar dmar sku mdog mthing nag dbus// shin tu rngam pa'i gdengs

zhal can// ban d+hu dmar po'i spyan dang ldan// phyag drug pha rol phyin drug ldan// rdo rje gri gug 'khor lo g.yas// dril bu ban d+ha bum pa mchog/ g.yon pa'i phyag na bsnams pa yis// zhabs gnyis rtag chad

bdud bzhi rdzi// dur khrod 'bar ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan// 'ag+hu ya gsang ba dbyings phyug sbyor// mthing nag gri khug thod khrag 'dzin// dpal chen sku la rdzogs pa'i lha// spyi bor ya man ta ka'i sku// pad+ma dbang
chen 'ag+h+rin par gnas// thugs khar rdo rje ki la ya// phyogs bcu'i bgegs rnams 'joms byed pa// rnam rgyal hUM dkar stobs po che// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dbyug sngon can// 'dod pa'i rgyal dang trai
log kya// dbyings phyug drags byed khro mo'i tshogs// so so'i gnas dang dgyes par 'khril// rdzu'aphrul dregs pa 'dul ba'i don// 'phra men ma tshogs drag po dang// mkha' 'gro ma mo'i tshogs rnams
kun// lhag pa'i ye shes rol pa yin// 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul can// nam mkha'i lus can thogs med pa'i// stong gsal rig pa'i ye shes lnga// rnam shes tshogs brgyad rdo rje sems// thabs shes
zung 'jug rang nyid dngos// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid kyi// gnyis su med pa'i rgyud rnams las// dkyil 'khor ming ni gtso bo ste// gtso bo dpal chen he ru ka/ he ni rgyu sogs stong pa
ste// ru ni tshogs dang bral ba las// ka ni gang du mi gnas pa'i// sgra gsum bdag nyid chen po de// mngon par rtogs pa gsal gyur na/ 'khor gyi ting 'dzin shug las 'ong// dkyil 'khor bdag po gtso bo

yin// gtso bor rdo rje 'dzin pa mchod// mnyam nyid mi g.yo'i ngang las su// rang shar 'od kyi lha tshogs la// don la gtso 'khor khyad med de// thun mong spyi yi gtso bo ste// bye brag dgos su gtso bo yin// rang

nyid yid la gang byed pa// de nyid lha yi gtso bo yin// gzhan ma rnams ni 'khor du 'gyur// 'khor lo sgyur ba stobs po che// rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs 'od dang ldan// sna tshogs tshul ldan don cig 'grub// gdod

nas lhun grub byang chub sems// 'gro kun ma rig rtogs bya'i phyir// snang ba spyi yul sprul pa'i sku// shAka thub rgyal sras 'phags pa'i tshogs// dbang phyug chen pos 'gro ba 'dul// gang gis de nyid don mthong
bas// nang gi 'dzin sems mi dmigs pa// kun bzang bde gshegs rigs lnga'i bdag/ thams cad mkhyen pa chos kyi sku// kun brtags gzhan rkyen ma yin pa// rang la yod phyir rtog par bya// oM mu ne mu ne

ma hA mu ne// bo de swa ta sarba sid swa rba hUM/ d+harma kA ya sarba sid d+hi swA rba hUM// thams cad rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor la// rang 'byung ye shes rang grol su// rgyal sras 'phags pa'i tshogs rnams la// rab 'byam ka'i
rjes gnang zhu// rang grol bzhin du gzhan la bstan// don gnyis 'grub pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung// gdul ka 'dul ba rnams kyi mchog/ 'jam dpal dpa' bos mkhyen pa// ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor

yin// ma bcos lus kyi dkyil 'khor na// gsang ba 'dus pa'i lha ru bzhugs// oM ba gi shwa ri muM/ mu la pa ti/ oM badzra ti rna/ dug kha tshe d+he/ pradz+nya dz+nyA na mUr ta ye/ dz+nya na ka ya ba gi shwa ra/ a ra ba tsa na/ ya te na

ma swA hA// oM badzra g+h+rig g+hu h+ya dz+nyA na swarba sid d+hi hUM hUM hUM// 'jam dpal mchog la brten nas su// shes rab spobs pa bskyed par bya// thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs// 'od dpag med kyi dkyil 'khor

du// bde ba mchog gi rang bzhin can// sgrub par 'dod na tshul bzhin rtogs// hri/ oM ma Ni pad+me hUM/ oM shri badzra he he ru ru kaM hUM phaT/ Da ki ni dza la saM b+ha ra hUM hUM/ oM hri ha ha hUM hUM phaT/ thugs rje'i 'phrin las

rnam gsum gyis// 'jig rten thams cad sgrol bar byed// thun mong mchog thob bde chen 'gro// phyag na rdo rje'i nus pa yis// phyi rol bar chad zlog par byed// dgyes pa rdo rjes dngos grub thob// gnyis med

ye shes he ru ka/ bdag med chos dang yang dag sbyor// phyi nang thabs kyi khyad par yin// oM badzra pa ni hUM phaT/ oM badzra ni laM b+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra hri ta ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra tsan d+ha rong na ni hUM phaT// oM

badzra ka ru na ca la le hUM phaT// oM d+he bi tsu badzra hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM badzra ka d+ha ri he badzra hUM phaT/ oM g+ho ri g+haM/ tso ri tsam/ b+he ta li baM/ 'ag+ha rma raM g+haM/ pu ka pi saM/ shab ri shaM/ tsan d+ha li baM/ sdoM b+hi ni a hUM/ gang gis

sgrub pa'i thabs brtsams pa// gtor mas las kun grub par byed// phyi nang chags med gtor ma ste// ji ltar rigs par bsgrub pos btang// nad dang nyon mongs 'dul ba'i phyir// khrog dang phye ma'i sbyor ba

la// yon tan bdud rtsi phyi nang gnyis// zhi dang khro bor bstan pa'o// oM ma hA sarba pan tsa a mri ta badzra tsit+ta sa ma ya hUM hUM hUM/ oM sarba pan tsa a mri ta ra sa ya na badzra g+hu ya sid ti hUM hUM/ oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/

man 'dzu shri ya man ta ka hUM/ pad+ma ta krid ha ya 'ag+h+ri ba hU lu hU lu hUM/ badzra ki li ki la sarba big nan baM hUM phaT/ sarba pan tsa a mri ta kun Da li hUM hri thA// skye bdun ril bu'i 'phrin las kyis// sman mchog ye shes
yon tan gyis// bdag gzhan don gnyis 'phrin las 'grub// rigs lnga chen mo gzungs kyi lha// las kyi lha mo sgrol mo ni// rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs kyis su// sngags rnams kun gyi don grub pa// dus

gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi yum// rtogs par 'dod na 'di nyid sgrub// oM ta re tu re tud ta re swA hA// ma ma swarba sid te swA hA// oM badzra b+ha ra hi na ma d+hu ma g+ha ye na ye swi d+hi hUM/ oM sarba b+hud d+ha Da ki ni ye hUM/ badzra

wa sna ye hUM/ badzra b+he ro tsa na ye hUM/ sgrol ma las kyi lha yin pas// thun mong mchog gi las mtha' 'grub// byin brlabs kun gyi rtsa ba ru// bla ma'i sgrub pa mchog tu zab// bla ma dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang// sangs

rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i sku// oM ma hA gu ru pad+ma thod 'phreng rtsal sid d+hi pa la hUM hUM hUM/ oM ma Ni pad+me hUM hri/ oM pad+ma ta kri ha ya gri ba hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM Da ki ni ye na ma d+ha ma g+ha ye sid+d+hi hUM/ oM ma hA ka la g+hu na

hri ta hUM/ tshe yi snying po 'di bzlas pas// dpag tu med pa'i yon tan thob// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'o// oM badzra 'ag+hu ru dz+nyA na swarba sid d+hi pha la hUM/ oM d+he ba a yu dz+nyA na sarba sid+hi hUM/ oM d+ha ki a yu dz+nyA na hUM/ rnam

'joms las kyi sgrib pa sel// bdud rtsi chu yis dri ma dri ma// rmi lam mtshan ngan thams cad zhi/ khro bo rol pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ rdo rje'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur// na ma tsan d+ha badzra kro ta ye/ hu lu hu lu/

tiSh+ti tiSh+ta/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ha na ha na/ a mri de hUM phaT/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don// gnas skabs spob pa mthar thug tu// dbyings phyug yum gyi ngang du grol// skye ba med pa a yi don// oM pi tsu pra dz+nya

b+ha ra ha ni dza la mi ti b+ha ra d+hi ni hi ri b+hi ra ta ni swAhA/ a a/ i I/ u U/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ e ai/ o au/ aM a/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+nya nya/ ta tha da d+ha na/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ wa

ya ra la sha Sha swAhA/ oM ye d+harma he du pra b+ha ba/ he dun te/ Shan tathA ga to// h+ya ba dad te shany+tsa yo ni ro d+ha ba e baM bA dI b+ha ba ma ya ma hA shra ma na ye/ mi g.yo zhes bya'i khro bo yis// rang gi dkyil 'khor 'od gang

nas// 'khor lo gsum gyis don kun byed// ka ru na yis gdon kun 'dul// oM badzra kro d+ha tsan d+ha ma hA ro sha na hUM phaT/ ka ru na tsa le tsa le hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT/ rdo rje'i gzhon nu'i rigs 'dzin gyis// phur pa'i

las kun grub par byed// drag sngags rgyal po 'di nyid bzlas// oM badzra kI li kA li kI lA ya sarba big+ha nan baM hUM phaT/ rn-i tri rbad thums/ da ra ya da ra ya/ ma ra ya ma ra ya/ 'khor lo mchog gi mgon po

ni// bsdul bya gang dang gang gi don// dus kyi 'khor lo che chung kun// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho 'dra ba bzhugs// bsam gyis mi khyab brjod las 'das// 'di ni gsang chen nges pa'i lung// ma rig skye shi'i 'khrul

pa'i yis// srid pa bar do'i sdug bsngal las// tshe 'das ro 'am ming byang la// rnam shes bkug ste khrus byas la// 'jigs pa'i 'phrang las grol ba yis// sbyong ba'i rgyal po 'di gsungs so// na mo b+ha ga ba te

sarba dur ka te/ pa ri sho d+ha ya/ ra tsa ya ta tha g+ha ta ya/ a ra ha te saM myag saM b+hud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni/ sarba pa paM b+hi sho d+ha ni shud d+he bi shud d+he/ sarba kar ma/ a pa ra na/ b+hi sho d+ha ni swAhA/ gnas spar
bla med 'bras thob 'gyur// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rab 'byam kun// phung po khams dang skye mched tshogs// bde gshegs snying po'i 'gro ba rnams// rigs lnga gzh-i'i dkyil 'khor nas// dbang du bskyed
rdzogs thams cad kun// rigs lnga lam gyi bskyed rdzogs bsgom// sku gsung thugs yon 'phrin las kun// rigs lnga 'bras bu'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// bdag nyid lha bsgom ma tshigs pa// sems dpa'
bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor dang// byin gyis brlabs pa 'og min nas// spyan 'dren ye shes dkyil 'khor yin// lha dang gnyis med shes pa ni// rang bzhin lhun grub dkyil 'khor yin// phyi ni kun btags
dkyil 'khor yin// nang ni ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor te// gsang ba yongs rdzogs lhun gyis grub// mtshon byed brda yi dkyil 'khor gyis// mtshon cha don gyi dkyil 'khor rig/ rig pa rang 'byung dkyil 'khor
gyis// ye shes sku mchog dkyil 'khor mchog/ rnam dag lha yi dkyil 'khor la// phun tshogs mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// byin rlabs dngos grub dkyil 'khor thim// dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa
ste// chos nyid la yang chos nyid rol// dkyil 'khor la yang dkyil 'khor thim// dkyil ni chos dbyings snying po ste// ye shes rgyal po rang yin no// 'khor ni 'od dang 'od zer tshul// phyogs
bcu'i mtha' yas mu med pas// maN+Dal zhes su brjod par bya'o// gang gis bzlas pas rgyal ba rnams// dper na skyes chen gang zhig la// che la myur ba'i sgras bos nas// thos nas myur du 'ong ba
bzhin// sangs rgyas rnams ni spyan 'dren pa// skad cig byon nas spyan gyis gzigs// thugs rgyud bskul na byin gyis brlob// ngag la nus pa'i yon tan gyis// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams 'du ba
dang// bgegs rnams ma lus bzlog pa dang// bdud dpung thams cad 'joms byed pa// gsang sngags bzlas pas nus pa 'byung// sngags med lha yi gzugs brnyan kun// bar snang 'ja' tshon ri mo
'dra// ngag gi mngon zhen mi bzlog cing// nus pa'i ye shes thob mi 'gyur// gsang sngags rgyal po don kun 'grub// gsang sngags chen po rigs gsum mchog/ phyi yi rig sngags mdo ltar bzlas// sems

can rnams kyi sgrib pa sbyangs// nang gi gzungs sngags sngags ltar bzlas// rang la tshogs gnyis spel bar byed// gsang ba gsang sngags bzlas pa ni// rdo rje gsum gyi bsnyen sgrub ste// bskyed rim sku yi ngang
nas bzlas// bzlas pa gsung gi ngang nas bzlas// rdzogs rim thugs kyi ngang nas bzlas// bdud la gsang phyir gsang sngags bzlas// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po
gtso// oM dang AHdang hUM dang gsum// thog mtha' bar ram gang yang rung// sngags rnams kun gyi srog la bzhugs// gsang sngags snying po dang po ltar// rang nyid lha bsgom thugs kha ru// sa bon las ni
sngags 'phreng skor/ kha dog 'phrin las 'dod don bsgyur// dkar ser dmar ljang yi ge'i 'od// mchod pa'i sprin dang bstod dbyangs su// yar 'phros rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs// mnyes nas dngos grub
bdag la snang// mar 'phros sems can sgrib pa sbyangs// thams cad lha dang lha mor 'gyur// bar du bdag gzhan gtso 'khor rnams// sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan ni// snang srid bde bas gang ba yi// gang
'dod dngos grub thob par bsam// tshogs bsags sgrib sbyangs bzlas pa yin// thugs kha'i sngags las sgra dang 'od// zhal nas 'brug sgra bzhin bzlas pas// 'od zer me dpung mtshon char 'phros// zhi bas
mi thul gdug pa can// stong gsum dgra bgegs bdud dpung rnams// ma rungs tshar bcad rdul du brlag/ bka' sdod bran khol byed par bsam// bar chod sel byed bzlas pa'i lugs// rang rig lha
yi thugs kha nas// gsang sngags rgyal po'i yig 'bru rnams// phyi ru 'byung ba'i rlung gi dus// gzung ba'i yul rtog dmigs med grol// nang du 'jug pa'i rlung gi sngags// 'dzin pa'i sems ni
rang bzhin grol// bar du gnas pa rlung gi sngags// gzung 'dzin med pa'i 'od gsal dang// ye shes rang gsal lhar shes pas// rdo rje rlung gi bzlas pas te// nyams rtogs ye shes 'bar bar
'gyur// bskyed rim sku yi bsnyen pa yin// sngags ni lha yi gzugs su gnas// bskyed pa tsam gyis yon tan 'thob// lha ni sngags kyi sgra ru grags// bzlas pa tsam gyis yon tan 'byung// lha dang sngags ni
gnyis su med// gnyis med don gyi bzlas pa ni// ting 'dzin gsal bar ma gyur kyang// sngags ni gsal bar bzlas pa yis// lha yis skyob cing byin gyis brlob// ngag gi sgrib pa dag pa yi// nus pa'i yon

tan skye ba ste// sngags nyid sngags su bzlas pa ni// snang grags phyag rgya chen po'i sku// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i sems la ltos// gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid ngang// sgra ni grags stong brag cha ltar// gtad med
ngang du bzlas pa ni// gsang sngags kun gyi bzlas pa'i mchog/ chos nyid thugs kyi bzlas pa yin// sgra grags thams cad rgyal ba'i gsung// tshig dang bral ba'i don la ltos// rigs pa'i rgyal po gsang

sngags rgyal// don chen yi ge dam pa yin// chu zla lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang// brag cha bzhin du sngags bzlas pas// nam mkha' lta bu'i chos nyid du// 'gag med rdo rje'i gsung thob nas// 'gro kun skad du chos

ston pa'i// tshangs pa'i gsung gi dbang phyug dang// grags chen snyan grags chen po pa// phyogs bcu kun tu grags par 'gyur// snang srid thams cad sems la rdzogs// sems ni rgyal ba'i sku ru snang// snang
ba thams cad rang snang yin// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i sems nyid la// ye shes lha yi yon tan rdzogs// sgra grags thams cad sems la tshang// sems ni rgyal ba'i gsung du grags// grags pa thams cad rang
sgra yin// tshig dang bral ba'i sems nyid la// tshangs pa gsung gi yon tan rdzogs// rtogs tshogs thams cad sems la 'dus// sems nyid rgyal ba'i thugs su gsal// shes bya thams cad rang shes
yin// gnyis 'dzin grol ba'i sems nyid la// mkhyen pa'i ye shes yon tan rdzogs// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems las byung// sems dang lha ni gnyis su med// gnyis med ngang la lcogs kyi zhog/ lta byed
rtogs pa rang sar grol// ltas pas mi mthong bzhag pas gsal// mnyam bzhag chos sku'i gnas lugs la// ma bsgrubs gnas pa sangs rgyas grub// grub pa med de cir mi dgongs// rang 'byung thams cad
mkhyen pa yin// 'di las lhag pa'i nges don med// phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di// thos bsam bsgom la rab sbyangs pa'i// shes rab dmigs ldan rnam dang zung// lus dang longs spyod

gtong la sbyin// de dang mi ldan sbyin mi bya// ting nge 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor la// rkang pa'i rjes ni dkyil 'khor te// lag pa bsgyur ba phyag rgya yin// sor mo nyed pa de bzhin la// phyi ru bskyed pa nyon mongs

sreg/ nang du ye shes sku lnga yi// thabs shes gnyis kyi rkang la mthil// phyag rgya dkyil 'khor gzhal yas khang// pad+ma'i nyi zla'i gdan dbus su// zla ba'i sor mo lnga po ni// oM hUM traM tri ha lnga las// rgyal ba yab

lnga'i ngo bo bskyed// nyi ma'i sor mo lnga po las// aM baM laM raM maM lnga las// yum lnga so sor bskyed par bya// rgyal ba thams cad mnyes pa'i phyir// nyi zla rtse sbyar 'bru brgyad sbas// sku yi lha tshogs zag med

'khril// bde ba chen po'i ngang du bskyed// hUM gi rtse sbyar 'bru drug sbas// thugs kyi lha mchog bde bar 'khril// hri yi rtse sbyar 'bru bzhi sbas// gsung gi lha tshogs dgyes par 'khril// traM gi rtse sbyar 'bru gnyis

sbas// yon tan lha tshogs dgyes par 'khril// lha yi rtse sbyar 'phrin las lha// dgyes par 'khril te zag med kyi// bde ba chen po'i lha bsgom la// phyag rgya lag gnyis bskor ba yis// 'od kyi 'khor gyi lha

tshogs bskyed// yab yum dgyes pa'i thugs kha nas// zla ba'i lha la nyi ma yis// sor mo lnga po phyi nang gi/ mchod pa'i lha mor gyur pa yis// mthe bong dang ni rtse sbyar zhing// mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mnyes par
bya// dngos grub dam pa bdag la blang// de bzhin zla bas nyi ma la// g.yas g.yon thabs shes phyag rgya bsgyur// sor mo bcu po bsdus pa la// sku gsung thugs yon 'phrin las kyi// gnyis med byang chub

sems kyi bcud// bdud rtsi chen por bzhu byas la// thabs shes nyi zla'i phyag rgya yis// gnas lngar dngos grub blang bar bya// 'dis ni dkyil 'khor kun mnyes shing// mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po yis// sku
gsung thugs kyi rdzogs pa che// yon tan 'phrin las thabs kyis 'grub// bsam gtan bzhi'i rtse mo can// bsam gtan yan lag kun gyi mchog/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba 'dus pa'i// dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha

tshogs la// me tog bdug spos mar me dri// bshos gtsang sil snyan rol mo'i tshogs// phyi yi mchod yon mdzes pa dang// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos// rang byung dam rdzas bdud rtsi sman// sha khrag gtor ma

dam rdzas tshogs// nang du dgyes shing tshim pa dang// sku gsung thugs kyi bde ba che// gnyis med sbyor ba'i byang chub sems// mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po yis// rang byung ye shes gsang sngags mchod// gnyis
med dgyes pas bdag grol 'gyur// sems kyi yid bzhin sprin gyi tshogs// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing rnams su// mnyen 'jam reg na bde ba yi// rin chen sna tshogs bzhi dang// mdzes

pas bris shing spras pa yi// kun 'byung rin chen phung po dang// rdzing bu yid 'ong bro mchog bsil// rin chen khang mdzes sna tshogs dang// ljon shing tshal dang me tog dang// snyan pa'i glu dbyangs rol mo

dang// dri mchog ngad ldan rol mo dang// na bza' gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang// ba dan bla bre dar dpyangs dang// dol shal dpung rgyan se mo do// mdzes pa'i khri stan brgyan bcas dang// lha dang lha mo rdul

snyed kyis// bro gar dgyes pa bsam 'das pa// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bskang nas// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa yi// mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po yis// rims kyi sa dang cig char du// bla ma dkon
mchog yi dam lha// bdag nyid chen po'i dkyil 'khor mchod// gnyis med dgyes pas tshim gyur la// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// snang srid snod bcud thams cad kun// ye nas rtsol med lhun grub

tu// kun la phyogs med khyab pa yi// rgyun chad phyogs lhung med pa ru// kun tu bshams pa'i mchod sprin 'di// rgyun mi 'chad du mchod shes pa// phun sum tshogs pa'i mchod pa ste// kun tu bzang po'i mchod
sprin yin// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rab 'byams rnams// ma lus dgyes par de yis 'gyur// thun mong phyi yi mchod pa ni// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad la// bskal pa mang por mchod byas pas// khyad
par nang gi mchod pa dang// gsang ba bla med mchod pa yis// rigs 'dzin nang gi lha tshogs la// skad cig mchod pa'i bsod nams kyi// brgya yi char yang mi phod de// mchod pa gzhan rnams sa bon
'dra// gsang sngags mchod pa 'bras bu mchog/ tshe 'di nyid la phyag rgya 'grub// mngon du bsod nams ma bsags pa// gsang sngags chos dang phrad mi 'gyur// gsang sngags mchod pa sus shes pa// bsod

nams las byung ye shes thob// gzhi dang lam gyi rgyud rnams kyi// gzhal yas khang dang lha tshogs kyi// dkyil 'khor dngos dang gzugs brnyan gyi// sku gdung ring bsrel mchod pa'i rten// sku gsung thugs kyi

rten rnams la// bgegs bsal khrus bya dri ma bkru// ye shes dgug bstim dngos su bskyed// dbang bskur mchod dang mnga' mchod dbul// rgyal ba kun gyis rab bsngags pa'i// oM ye d+harma he du pra b+hA bA/ he

dun te/ ShA na ta tha ga to// h+ya ba dad tai Shany+tsa yo ni rod+ha/ e baM bA dI/ ma hA shra ma Na ye swA hA/ zhes bzlas lha'i me tog gtor// rang rang 'dod pa'i gsol ba btab// sa phyogs byin phebs bkra shis
'gyur// rgyal ba mchod pas mnyes pa yis// 'gro ba rnams la phan don 'grub// thabs kyis 'gro don byed pa'i mchog/ bsod nams tshogs rdzogs yon tan 'thob// yang dag don rtogs rdo rje
'chang// rdo shing 'jim pa'i bdag nyid kyi// lha 'di rnams la skyabs mi re// kun byed rgyal po rang rig lha// gnyis med don la gsol ba thob// ye shes mchog ni thob par 'gyur// snod bcud gzhi yi sangs
rgyas la// sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan ni// mngon du ma gyur lam yin la// rdo rje'i don rtogs 'bras bu de// gser 'gyur nus pa'i rang bzhin gyis// lcags las zangs su 'gyur ba dang// zangs nyid gser
du gyur pa bzhin// so so thar pa 'khor ba nas// sems can 'phags pas rang don 'grub// byang chub sems kyis rang 'dod las// grol nas gzhan don byang chub thob// byang chub ye shes mngon sum

du// lus ni gzugs sku'i sangs rgyas dang// sems ni chos sku'i sangs rgyas su// gnyis med ye shes rdo rje'i sku// 'dus ma byas shing lhun grub tu// rdo rje'i sku ni kun la gnang// rdo rje'i gsung ni kun la

grags// rdo rje'i thugs ni thams cad mkhyen// rdo rje'i rdzu 'phrul thogs pa med// rdo rje'i 'phrin las don kun 'grub// rdo rje'i gdung sob 'gro ba'i mgon// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas 'gyur// 'bras
bu gsang ba bla na med pa'i rgyud chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po las// bskyed rim dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// sngags ni ma tra'i sgra las grangs// ma ni bde ba'i dngos grub

gter// tra ni sdug bsngal skyob par byed// de phyir sngags ni rab tu brjod// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje sems// snying po yi ge rang 'byung ba// oM AHhUM/ sku gsung thugs

kyi snying po'o// oM dzi na dzig/ hUM badzra d+h+rig/ swa rad na d+h+rigs/ oM a ro lig/ ha pra dz+nya d+h+rig/ laM te sha ra ti/ muM d+ha du sha ri/ maM mo ha ra ting/ pyaM ra ga ra ti/ taM badzra ra ta/ a ha hi ba ga ban/ ma hA ka ru ni ka tri sha

ho/ sa ma ya stoM/ dza hUM baM ho/ stis sta lhan/ pra ti pu ho/ oM a hUM swAhA/ hUM badzra kro d+ha ma hA su ka e ka dza ti hUM// si ti pha la hUM hUM/ oM sarba ta tha ga ta kA ya badzra hUM/ a sarba ta tha ga ta bA ga badzra hUM/ hUM sarba ta thA ga ta

tsit+ta hUM/ badzra kro d+ha hU~M ka ra/ g+har rdza g+har rdza hUM/ badzra kro d+ha bi dza ye/ b+hin d+ha bin d+ha hUM/ badzra kro d+ha ni la tan tra/ d+ha ha d+ha ha hUM/ badzra kro d+ha ya man ta ka/ da ha da ha hUM/ badzra kro d+ha ha ya g+hi ba/ hu lu hu lu hUM/ badzra kro

d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la/ ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM/ badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kun d+ha li/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha hUM/ badzra kro d+ha ma hA pa la/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM/ zhi khro don gyi gsang sngags yin/ oM sarba byid swAhA/ oM e ma ke ri ke ri/ sma ta b+ha li

b+ha la pa ni/ mi sa mun ta/ tsa rgya su ka ye/ b+his te sa b+ha g+hu seng ka ra b+has d+ha na ga na hi ri b+he ta na sa ri li/ saM b+hu ra ta mi ka tsa ra ta/ d+ha pa su rgya g+ha g+ha ta ra/ a ma sha na pa ra na/ b+h+ra hi tis g+hu ra

la/ ma sman sa ku li/ la ha ya/ g+hu ra g+hu ra/ pag pa ga la ra na lam/ a tha la ra la ta laM/ i ra ta laM/ sir sna sar sna b+has laM/ pha ge la/ sa swa ri rI li lI/ i I/ ma mA/ ra rA/ 'khor ba dong sprugs snying po

ste// phyogs bcu kun tu rab tu grags// gsang sngags don gyis dgongs pa ste// tshig dang bral ba'i snying po laM// tshig tu mi spel phyir mi sgrog/ rdo rje'i gsung la rgyun chad med// rtse gcig yid kyi bzlas pa

yis// nus rtsal yon tan myur du thob// log rtog bdud kyi tshogs rnams la// kun la sbas pas gsang ba yin// e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyis chos// gsang sngags snying po nges pa'i lung// 'bras bu gsang ba bla

na med pa'i rgyud chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po las/ snying po sngags kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// gsang sngags don gyi ngo bo ni// ngo bo skye ba med pa la// rnam pa lha yi sku ru shar// gnyis su med pas

rdzogs pa che// ye nas snang srid chos sku la// ma rig gzung 'dzin dag pa'i// snang ba thams cad lha skur rdzogs// lha sku spros med stong par rdzogs// snang stong gnyis med gnas lugs kyi// yon tan mthar
rdzogs rdzogs rim zhes// brjod med don la tshig tu brjod// tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste// brjod pa kun gyis rgyu yi mchog/ 'di ni rnam dag legs pa'i lam// chos rnams rtsa ba sems nyid yin// yongs
su dag dang ma dag sems// sangs rgyas sems yin zhing yang sems// sems nyid don de shes gyur na// skad cig nyid la kun mkhyen gyi// yon tan thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur// sems can sems yin
'khrul pa sems// 'gro don byung dang ma byung sems// spang bya sems yin spong byed sems// dag bya sems yin dag byed sems// skyon dang yon tan la sogs pa// sems las ma rtogs chos gzhan
med// sems de ji srid yod kyi bar// theg pa'i mtha' la thug pa med// sems de yongs su grol tsa na// thogs pa med cing 'gro 'ong med// sems 'khrul bar du thams cad 'khrul// sems nyid rig
na thams cad rig/ sems bcings bar du 'ching ba'i tshogs// de nyid grol na kun yang grol// gzhan gyis skyon yon la sogs pa// phyi yi yul du ma lta bar// nang du rang gi sems la ltos// rgyal bas chos
kun gsungs pa rnams// sems nyid rtogs pa'i thabs tsam las// gzhan du gsungs pa ma mchis so// rang gi sems nyid ma rtogs na// brgyad khri bzhi stong chos shes kyang// don med 'khrul pa'i chos 'khor
yin// sa bon gyur pa'i sems de nyid// chos rnams kun gyi rten yin pas// rims kyis yongs su sbyangs pa las// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de ru 'byung// 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur lhun rdzogs
yin// thams cad sems kyi cho 'phrul la// der 'dzin de yi gzugs brnyan te// rtag pa ma yin chad pa min// gcig tu ma nges gcig tu gnas// gnas lugs don la 'gyur med kyang// rnam pa ma 'gags

rnam par 'gyur// dper na rmi lam sgyu ma bzhin// phyi nang mngon sum snang ba kun// gcig dang ma nges dmigs pas bsgyur// lci ba'i sa rdo ri brag rnams// yaM las yangs pa'i rlung byung nas// dang por g.yos
nas bar du gtor// tha ma rang bzhin med pa ru// yang dang yang du bsam gtan na// lci ba mi dmigs yang bar 'gyur// rlung g.yos pa yis rdul chags dmigs// gtan par gyur nas rlung yang ba// de bzhin
me nyid chu bsgoms na// tsha ba mi dmigs bsil bar 'gyur// chu la me 'bar me dmigs na// chu bo'i rgyun yang 'bar ba'i me// 'byung ba bzhi yang mkha' dmigs na// gzhan rnams mi dmigs nam mkha'i
ngang// nam mkha' stong pa'i ngang las su// phyi nang snod bcud 'byung ba rnams// rims bzhin dmigs pas de ltar 'gyur// go bzlog rnam pa 'gyur ba la// gzhan ma rnams ni cis mi 'gyur// thams cad
dmigs pas bsgyur ba yin// dang po'i las can gzung 'dzin las// a 'thas zhen pa dgrol ba'i phyir// bzlog pa'i bsgom pa 'di nyid ni// sangs rgyas mu stegs kyis mi shes// dngos pos dngos po 'ching
'gyur te// dngos po nyid kyis rnam grol 'gyur// dngos dang dngos med yongs shes na// lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin rtogs// de phyir dmigs pa'i don la bslab// thams cad rang 'byung ye shes

kyi// snang ba thams cad rang snang la// stong pa nyid kyi rang stong ste// rang snang mngon zhen bzlog pa'i don// rang rig stong pa nyid la bslab// stong nyid spros bral mi dmigs pa'i// mtshan ma med pa'i chos yin

te// so so'i rtog pa re re'i ste// mi rtog pa ru mnyam bzhag pas// ci yang mi dmigs stong par 'char// stong nyid spros bral tha snyad 'gags// brjod du med pa'i chos nyid la// stong pas stong pa mi dmigs

shing// mi dmigs 'od gsal stong pa'i don// mtshan ma med pa'i chos la bslab// gzung 'dzin yul la zhen pa yi// phyogs su snang ba mtshan ma'i chos// phyogs zhen mi dmigs stong pa ste// stong dang mi stong
gnyis su med// rmi lam dang ni gnyid sad bzhin// yod dang med pa'i chos 'di gnyis// med pa'i chos yin yod med du// gang du mi dmigs gnyis med rtags// rtsal sbyang yi ge'i don la brlab/ khong nas
'byung ba skye ba med// a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog/ rang rig snying gi dkyil 'khor du// kun tu snang gi 'od 'phros 'dus// rang lus dngos med 'od du zhu// skye med stong pa'i lus su 'gyur// skye

ba med las skyes pa yi// lus med lus te lus kyi mchog/ lus kyi mtha' ni rtogs pa yis// ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs// snang ba bskyed rim lha yi sku// stong pa rdzogs rim chos kyi sku// gnyis 'dzin
bral ba'i ngang la bzhag/ skye med a yi 'phro 'du las// snod bcud dngos med 'od du zhu// 'od kyang mi dmigs stong par bsgom// stong pa'i nyid kyi 'od gsal de// dper na nyi zla 'od skor bzhin// 'od
gsal pho brang zhing khams na// sgrib med 'od kyi sku ru gsal// der 'dzin bral ba'i ngang la bzhag/ snang stong gnyis med rtogs par 'gyur// rig pa a yi 'phro 'du yis// dngos snang thams cad stong par

sbyang// stong pa'i snang ba dngos por sbyang// snang stong gnyis med gcig tu bsdu// gcig po mang po don la bslab// ting 'dzin ma bsgoms mi grol te// ting 'dzin the tshom gcod par 'gyur// thams cad sems

kyi ting 'dzin la// ting nge 'dzin la dbang bsgyur bya// sems kyi rdzu 'phrul dbang thob na// gang ltar byas pa de ltar 'gyur// mi 'gyur kun grol khyab pa po// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a las byung// don chen yi

ge dam pa yin// snang stong sgyu lus rdo rje'i sku// rdo rje rlung la lam sbyangs pas// drod dang bde ba'i yon tan ni// spyi gtsug gsang gnas gnyis kyi bar// d+hu ti khong stong gzhal yas khang// kun tu gsal ba'i lta
ba'i dbus// a las byung ba'i yum chen mo// gtum mo ye shes me 'bar ba'i/ khams lnga bsregs pa'i yum lngas skor// re re'i sku la me chen 'bar// stong phyogs spyi gtsug lte ba'i dbus// dkar gsal haM

las he ru ka/ thig le byang chub sems kyi yab// bde chen bdud rtsi rgyun bab pas// phung sogs grol ba'i yab lngas bskor// re re zhing nas byang sems 'phro// dang po 'byung ba rlung gi dus// 'og nas ma snun

steng du 'degs// gnyis pa rngub pa'i steng rlung gis// steng nas rngub ste 'og tu 'phrul// gsum pa gnas pa'i rlung gnyis ni/ kha sbyor dbu ma'i dkyil 'khor du// lte ba'i yum lnga 'od 'bar bas// dngos 'dzin
lus kyi bag chags bsregs// gsal stong me lce gyen la 'bar// spyi bo'i yab lnga drod kyis gzhu// byang chub sems kyi bdud rtsi bab// me dang byang sems 'dres pa las// yab yum zung 'jug bde drod

'bar// 'bar 'dzag lhan cig skyes pa'i sku// seng ge mjing bsnol zhes bya ba// rlung gnyis gcig tu dbang du bsdu// steng 'og kha sbyar 'khrul 'khor bcing// gzung 'dzin phyi yi snang ba kun// skad cig nyid
la 'joms par byed// 'dzin sems mi dmigs bde drod 'bar// srog rtsol rlung la 'byongs pa'i rtags// snang ba du ba smig sgyu dang// srin bu me khyer mar me 'char// srog dang rtsol ba mnyam

gnas shing// lus kyi gzung 'dzin dag tsam na// gtum mo gnad du tshud pa yin// drod ni phyi yi yon tan tsam// bde ba nang gi yon tan de// pho rlung thabs kyi rdo rje yis// rnam rtog sbal 'joms e ma ho// rtsa
gsum 'khor lo lnga dbus na// yab yum lnga rnams lhun sbyor bas// 'jug byed nyi zla'i lam nas su// thabs shes gnyis kyi rlung sbyar bas// mas kyi gtum mo me 'bar bas// yab kyi byang chub sems babs

te// spyi gtsug nas ni mgrin par bab// dang po lus kyi dga' ba bskyed// snying khar bab pas ngag dga' skye// lte bar yid kyi dga' ba ni// gnyis ka bral ba'i dga' ba skye// gsang gnas bde skyong gnas su
babs// bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can// yan lag med pa'i rtsis las 'das// bsam gtan bzhi yi rtse mo can// gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs pa yis// lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba 'char// bde dang stong pa

gnyis med pa'i// bde chen rgyal po rol pa ste// shes rab rlung la spel sbyangs pas// bde stong ye shes mthar phyin 'gyur// sbyor ba'i yan lag drug po yis// rlung sems dbang du bya ba ni// mtshan mo gsang
med khyim nag tu// shin tu mnyam bzhag sgrub pa po// lus ni bsam gtan yan lag lnga// spyan gnyis rdo rje gtsug tor bzlog/ steng 'og rlung gnyis bar du bcing// gzung 'dzin yul la mi 'phro bar// yod

par ma grub med pa yin// rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa med// sa rlung d+hU tir tshud pa'i rtags// du ba lta bu'i snang ba 'byung// chu rlung smig sgyu me la srin// rlung gis mar me lta bu ste// nam mkha' 'od gsal 'char
ba'i rtags// dbang po'i yul du du ma 'char// drod dang bde ba las la 'byung// nyi ma bla gab med pa'i gnas// sprin med nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du// lus gnad mngon zhen gyen la lta// ma yengs rtse gcig

bzhag byas pas// rtsa lnga'i nang du rlung brtan pas// me chen 'bar dang nyi ma dang// glog dang zla 'od sgra can ni// du nag dkyil 'khor snang ba 'byung// 'ja' tshon thig le'i snang ba dang// gzugs kyi rnam pa du

ma 'byung// nyin mtshan med par dbang po'i yul// stong gzugs sna tshogs nges med 'char// khyad par d+hu ti tshud pa'i rtags// thig le nag po nyung 'bru tsam// gsal la 'tsher ba je chung du// je 'phru kyu kyug
snang ba ni// rnal 'byor sems nyid 'od gsal zhugs// mig gi gzugs rnams so sor sdud// de bzhin sgo lnga'i yul lnga rnams// so sor sdud pa'i yan lag go/ so sor sdud pa'i don shes pas// snang
gzugs sems su thag bcad la// sna tshogs sems kyi dngos 'dzin de// zhen med 'jog pa spyod pa ste// lus sems gzhan du mi 'phro bar// dga' bde'i ngang du gnas par byed// bde stong zung
'jug kun khyab la// rnam par mi rtog mi g.yo ba// bsam gtan yan lag phun tshogs la// mngon shes lnga la sogs pa'i// rtags dang yon tan mthar thug pa// thig le'i dbus su sangs rgyas kyi// sku

gzugs gsal ba bstan pa dang// chos kun shes pa'i rtogs pa 'char// bar ma a ba d+hu ti'i nang// 'og sgo dri chen dri chu'i rlung// steng sgo nyi zla'i rlung gnyis te// rlung bzhi oM gyis d+hu tir dbub// hUM gis
dbyung la a yis gnas// lus dang yan lag 'khrul 'khor bya// lte ba'i dbus su rlung gnas pas// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs// 'byung ba lnga yi ngo bo nyid// sangs rgyas lnga yis byin
gyis brlabs// 'byung 'jug srog rtsol yan lag ni// dum pa can gyi sbyor ba'o// rtag tu 'dzin pa thur sel cing// bum pa can ni gsang bar bzung// bstan nas lte ba snying kha dang// mgrin par bum pa can
bsgom pas// 'bar dang 'dzag gnyis 'khor lo bzhi// dga' bzhi myong zhing bdud bzhi bcom// kun gzhi rnam shes srog gi rlung// byang chub sems kyi bde ba de// rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mo nas// yar la bzlog

cing mar la phebs// 'khor lo lnga ru longs spyod pas// nyon mongs dug lnga sku lnga thob// thig le rang dbang can du ni// 'dzin pa 'dzin pa'i yan lag yin// stong gzugs nam mkha'i sku la ni// rgyun du ma

yengs rjes dran gyi// gzhi yi dam tshig phyag rgya ni// gtum mo srog rtsol nyin mtshan du// thar pa 'dod phyir bum pa can// 'khor lo bzhi la rims bsgoms pas// chos kyi phyag rgya gzung 'dzin gyi// yul dang
bral ba'i gzugs brnyan rnams// rang gi lus la 'khor ba yi// 'od zer kun tu 'phro bar 'gyur// bsgoms pas khams mi 'dzag pa yi// las kyi mu tra'i 'khor lo lnga'i// ba ga ling ka rab bzhag nas// rdo

rje tho bas bsnun byas pas// rnam rtog 'dod chags kun bcom nas// bde stong ye shes phyag rgya che// spros dang bral ba'i chos nyid de// zla ba drug gis nges 'grub 'gyur// sku dang 'od zer bde chen de// rnam pa
kun ldan sems nyid de// rjes su dran pa'i yan lag yin// ting 'dzin bde chen rnal 'byor la// spyan lnga mngon shes drug 'byung ste// rten 'brel bcu gnyis dag pa yi// las kyi rlung rnams 'gags pas

su// sa ni bcu gnyis yon tan ldan// sgrib pa'i dri ma bral ba yis// sku dang 'od zer tshogs chen gyis// bde ba chen po'i rnam kun mkhyen// skad cig rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// rlung sems rtog pa rtse nang
nas// dbang po'i sgo rnams phyir gsal ba'i// nyin mo'i dus kyi snang ba rnams// chu zla me long gzugs brnyan bzhin// ji ltar snang yang rnam smin lus// bden par ma grub snang stong ste// bstod

smad dgag sgrub la sogs pa// 'jig rten chos brgyad snang ba kun// sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin la// rang ngo ma shes mi rtag la// ma dag 'khrul pa'i rgyu lus yin// rang ngo shes pa lha yi sku// 'ja' tshon lta bu'i

gzugs brnyan la// bstan pa thob pa'i snang ba kun// ting 'dzin dag pa'i rgyu lus yin// sgyu ma lus kyis rtsa nang du// rlung sems 'dus pa'i yi ge ni// a nu lta ras gnyis du 'gro// dbang po phyi rol rang sar

'gegs// nang gi dngos med rlung sems kyi// rmi lam cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'char// ji ltar shar yang bden rdzun bral// rjes med rang shar rang yal la// rgyun chad med cing cir yang 'char// shar ba thams
cad rang sar grol// rang snang 'khor 'das thams cad kun// gtad med rmi lam rang bzhin la// bden par bzung bas rdzun gyis slus// 'dus byas mi rtag de yi gnad// bden med rtogs na 'od gsal

te// 'dus ma byas pa'i chos nyid yin// bden med 'gag med snang ba la// rmi lam sgyu mar tha snyad btags// dngos po'i snang ba sgyu ma yin// sgyu ma'i chos la zhen rgyu med// zhen pa med na stong nyid de// dngos
med snang bas rmi lam yin// rmi lam yul la gzung du med// 'dzin pa med na 'od gsal yin// gnas lugs rtogs na sangs rgyas so// dngos dang dngos med snang ba kun// rmi lam sgyu ma'i rang bzhin

du// dngos por snang bas sgyu ma la// sgyu ma rdzun pas rmi lam ste// rmi lam rang bzhin shes pa na// bar do mngon du gyur pa ste// rnal ma'i chos la rab gnas nas// gang ltar byas kyang bde ba thob// skye 'gag
gnyis med so 'tshams der// rtog pa 'char ba bar do yin// ma rtogs gnas pa ting 'dzin la// gzung 'dzin bral na 'od gsal mchog/ ye shes sku nyid dus der thob// rlung sems 'gro ldog gcig pa
yis// 'og rlung bteg pas ngan song khegs// gzung 'dzin rtsa mdud zhig pa yi// steng sgo rnam par grol ba'i las// rlung sems steng du gdon par bya// 'khor ba'i bag chags dbyings su dag/ rang rig bde
chen gnas su grol// ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams la// dngos po med par gsal ba ni// dgag sgrub bral bas 'khrul pa dag/ dngos med stong pa'i chos rnams la// zhen pa med pas 'od gsal mchog/ rgyun

chad med pa'i chos nyid de// mtshan ma'i sgrib byed bral tsa na// rang gsal yul med rig pa la// rnam rtog rgyun de rtog med gsal// gsal stong ye shes 'od 'bar la// gnyid ni spang bar mi bya ste// dbang
po'i sgo ni mi dgag par// ma bcos rang bzhin lhug pa la// bsam gtan nyid ni dmigs mi bya// dmigs med mkha' ltar dag pa'i sems// skye 'gag med pa'i gnas lugs 'di// bsam
brjod bral ba'i ngang du bzhag/ rang bzhin gdod nas rnam dag pa// gsal la 'dzin med stong pa nyid// cir yang ma grub gzhi yis stong// cis kyang ma byas lam gyis stong// ci yang ma yin 'bras bus
stong// mtshan ma bral bas dmigs gtad stong// mtha' dang bral bas phyogs ris stong// lhun gyis grub pas bcos ma stong// rang 'byung yin pas rkyen rnams stong// rang gsal yin pas sgrib pa
stong// rang rig yin pas 'khrul pa ste// rang snang yin pas gzung 'dzin stong// stong pa nyid la med zhen bral// ci yang ma 'gags sa le ba// gzugs ni gzugs kyi ngo bo'i stong// dper na chu yi zla ba

bzhin// sgra dang dri ro reg bya chos// nam mkha' bzhin du ngo bo stong// stong nyid ma skyes chos kyi dbyings// zad pa med cing 'phel ba med// skye ba med pa 'gag pa med// gang ba med cing bri ba med// thob pa

med cing ma thob med// yod dang med pa gnyis su med// gnyis med mtha' bral stong pa nyid// spros dang bral ba'i chos nyid la// rang rang gzung 'dzin dag pa ni// stong pa nyid ces rgyal ba bzhed// ji srid

gzung 'dzin yod kyi bar// de srid dngos po mtshan ma yin// gzung 'dzin med pa'i snang ba de// stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yin// stong pa'i rang bzhin mi shes pas// mi rtog bsgoms pas rmongs pa phung// rnam

pa kun ldan stong pa nyid// rang bzhin dag pa'i chos sku yin// ngo bo spros bral lhan cig skyes// rnam pa kun ldan chos nyid la// phyag ni stong pa'i ye shes la// rgya ni gzung 'dzin mtshan ma bral// chen po 'khor

'das zung du 'jug/ gnyis med mtha' bral phyag rgya che// ye nas ma bcos chos kyi dbyings// kun la khyab pa snying po ste// ma rig dus na 'khor ba la// rig cing rtogs pa mya ngan 'das// gnyis med rtog pa
yang dag lam// de bzhin nyid kyi chos nyid la// rims kyis yongs su sbyangs pa yis// rnam dag 'gyur ba med pa'i don// lhun gyis grub pa ye shes mchog/ thams cad rang rig rang gsal du// sems su

rtogs pa chos yin la// bde gsal mi rtog rang bzhin la// mi 'da' dam tshig phyag rgya ste// thabs shes gnyis kyi rgyu rkyen gyis// gong du rtsal sbyangs lam gyi rgya// dbyer med kun la khyab pa yi// nga yi rang
bzhin 'di rig na// chos rnams thams cad rig 'gyur bas// bya byed rtsol grub kun la 'das// ma btsal lhun gyis grub par 'gyur// 'gyur med mi rtog ting 'dzin la// yengs med gnas pa'i rtse gcig
la// re dogs gzung 'dzin mkha' ltar dag/ sems kyi rang bzhin spros dang bral// gang du mi rtog mnyam pa nyid// sna tshogs ro gcig 'od gsal dang// spang blang mtshan ma'i chos bral

na// bsgom bya sgom byed gnyis med cing// slob cing sbyangs bgrod med pa yi// rang bzhin dag pa'i chos nyid la// mi slob pa ni yang dag don// rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub// thams cad ma lus rdzogs

pa che// rnam dag rang rig ye shes la// sangs rgyas sems can 'byung ba med// dri med zang thal chos kyi sku// phyi nang snod bcud 'khor 'das kun// ma rtogs blo la snang mod kyi// snang la rang bzhin med pa
yi// rang 'byung ye shes gdangs su shar// rang la rang snang snod bcud kun// sku dang zhing khams ye sangs rgyas// thams cad ma lus chos su gcig/ sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin// sangs rgyas
nyid kyis mi rnyed do// sangs rgyas ma rtogs sems can ni// thog ma med nas tha ma'i bar// gnas lugs gcig gi spyod yul te// kun gzhi byang chub sems kyi rtsal// sems las ma rtogs chos kun
med// sems su 'dzin pa 'khrul ba'i blo// blo las grol na gnyis su med// lhan cig skyes pa ye shes de// mtshon du yod pa ma yin te// ston ka'i zla ltar dri ma med// bde gsal stong pa'i bkrag mdangs
can// dri ma dri bral chos nyid dbyings// bde ba che las gzhan med pas// rnam pa kun ldan spros med bdag/ ji bzhin nyid las ma g.yos pas// rin chen gling gi snod bcud bzhin// kun tu bzang po'i rang
bzhin no// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dbyings// rtsol ba med par rdzogs sangs rgyas// rtsol bas rtsol ba'i nad du 'gro// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des mi 'grub// ma btsal bzhag pas don kun
'grub// 'di ni rgyal ba kun gyi gsung// 'bras bu gsang ba bla na med pa'i rgyud chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po las/ zab don rdzogs rim gyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul
gyis// 'gro ba'i don du bstan pa yang// theg pa dgu yis nges 'byung ba// theg pa gsum du legs bsdus nas// theg pa gcig gi 'bras bu ni// bla med theg pa thabs kyi mchog/ gzhi yi dus na bden gnyis

te// lam du thabs shes nyams blangs pas// 'bras bu gnyis ldan sangs rgyas de// tshe 'di nyid la ster byed pas// 'bras bu'i theg par ming du 'bod// 'jig rten lha mi'i theg pa yi// sdig spong dge bcu spyod

pa dang// nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa yis// spangs thob tshul khrims yon tan dang// theg chen byang chub sems dpa' yis// pha rol phyin pa'i sa lam rnams// sngags kyi lam du ma gyur med// rig pa'i ye shes
ma rtogs pa'i// dus gsum sangs rgyas ma mchis pas// theg pa'i mthar thug gsang sngags che// gsang sngags rgyal ba'i don kun 'grub// don gcig nyid la ma rmongs shing// thabs mang dka'
ba med pa ste// mi dge spangs pas ngan song grol// las sgrib dag pas bde 'gro thob// dge ba spel bas tshogs gnyis rdzogs// byang sems lam nyid mngon du byas// gnyis med rtogs pa'i skad cig
la// 'khor ba ma yengs rang sar grol// myang 'das ma bsgrubs lhun gyis grub// 'khor 'das rang grol gnyug ma'i ngang// zung 'jug bde ba chen po'i sku// gzhi bde lam bde 'bras bu bde// bde ba las ni

bde ba 'byung// bde ba'i 'byung gnas rdo rje 'chang// rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po ste// dpal ldan dgyes pa rdo rje mchog/ dbang po rnon pos dbang byas phyir// sngags kyi theg pa khyad par 'phags// srid gsum
ye nas sangs rgyas zhing// 'khor ba nyid ni mya ngan 'das// nyon mongs lnga ni ye shes la// 'dod yon lnga la bde bar spyod// rnam rtog nyid kyang chos kyi sku// gzugs rnams thams cad he ru ka/ 'jig

rten thams cad gzhal yas khang// skye 'gro kun yang rgyal ba'i sku// log rtog nyid kyang yang dag don// snang ba thams cad chos sku'i 'od// ma rig pa yang chos kyi dbyings// gang byas chos nyid rol pa'i

klong// ci bde bar ni brten pas 'grub// dka' thub sbyin sreg mchod sbyin dang// bsam gtan la yang dmigs mi bya// sngags bzlas cho ga'i rim pa kun// ma tshang ba dang chad gyur pa// tshad du bya ba gang yang
med// ma byas pa ni rgya cher 'gyur// so ma lhug pa rang dga' ru// ma bcos bzhag pas don kun 'grub// dper na skyes bu sngags mkhas pas// dug dang rgyal po'i chad pa las// thar par 'gyur gyis gzhan
gyis min// de bzhin nyon mongs las kyi dbang// nyin re bram ze gsod pa dang// mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang// chos 'di la zhugs gyur na// dka' ba med par grol bar 'gyur// theg pa gzhan gyis de

ltar min// de ni bla ma'i byin rlabs las// thabs gzhan rten pa rmongs pa yin// chos rnams mi shes ma rtogs kyang// dam pa mchog gi bla ma la// mos gus rim gro tshar byas na// bla med byang chub mchog gi

don// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// mun pa la ni mar me ltar// rang rig ye shes mngon gyur pas// yun ring dus su dka' spyad kyi// sdug bsngal tshor ba myong mi dgos// skad cig thams cad mngon par
rtog/ skad cig gcig gis bye brag phyed// skad cig gcig gis rdzogs sangs rgyas// ye shes sku re rang 'byung ba// rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub// lhun grub don de kun la khyab// mdun dang rgyab dang
phyogs bcu ru// rgyun chad med par gang snang yang// de de nyid las gzhan med kyang// ma rig 'khrul pa'i theg pa rnams// gnad dang mi ldan don ma rtogs// dper na ba bzhon 'o ma ni// lus
kun khyab kyang rwa 'jug nas// 'then yang 'o ma mi 'ong la// nu sor 'then na dka' med 'byung// de bzhin rang rig chos kyi sku// lus ngag yid gsum ma yengs par// rdo rje gsum gyi gnas lugs
kyi// thabs dang ldan pa'i gnad shes pas// sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan de// rjes dpag ma yin mngon sum du// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas 'gyur// de la 'di ltar lta ba nyid// phyogs med mtha'
bral kun tu gsal// ma dmigs bsam gtan sgom pa dang// shugs 'byung rang grol dgag sgrub dag/ mi 'da' dam tshig gtan gyi bdag/ nyin mo bcom ldan rdo rje can// mtshan mo shes rab pha rol

phyin// zung 'jug yangs pa phyag rgya che// don gyi dbu ma spros dang bral// 'di la yi bsam yod ma yod// bzang ngan mi smra gang yang med// ji ltar bdag nyid de ltar gzhan// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje

'chang// mnyam med dam pa rin po che// 'od gsal chen po'i ngang la bzhugs// mtha' brgyad skyon gyis ma gos pa'i// chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rtsi sman btab pa'i 'o ma de// klu rnams kun gyi sman

yin te// sbrul la byin na dug tu 'gyur// de bzhin gsang sngags theg chen 'di// skad cig nyon mongs 'joms pa yi// mkhas pa rnams kyi sman yin te// brda dang don la rmongs pa yi// byis pa 'dod pa'i sgra

don 'brang// tshul bzhin ma yin longs spyad pas// dug gis 'chi dang ltung bar 'gyur/ kha cig dug gi dbang gis 'tsho/ kha cig dug gi rkyen gyis 'chi// nga yi bstan pa snyigs ma la// tshong dus khyer ba'i 'o ma

bzhin// don ma rtogs pa'i tshig gis bslad// log rtog thur du ltung bar byed// de bas don gyi phu thag chod// thabs dang shes rab 'brel bar gyis// zung 'jug yangs pa shing rta'i srol// 'bras bu gsang ba

bla na med pa'i rgyud chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po las// rig pa 'dzin pa thabs kyi che ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// sems nyid ngo bo nyid kyi sku// 'dus ma byas shing lhun grub tu// sdod nas yin kyang

dper na ni// rgya mtsho mching nam klong dkyil na// klu yi bdag pos dbang byas pa'i// nor bu rin chen bai DUr+Ya/ kha dog 'od dang bcas pa yis// skye 'gro'i dbul ba sel gyur kyang// shugs bcas sbubs kyis

bsgribs pa na// nor bu rin chen sa rdo yin// chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// nga dang bdag tu bzung ba yis// rig pa'i ye shes snying po de// chos sku kun la khyab pa yi// gzugs sku 'gag pa med gyur
kyang// de nyid ma rig 'khrul pa yis// las dang nyon mongs rkyen dbang sems// 'khor ba'i sems can byung ba yin// sangs rgyas ma yin sems can ni// gang na yod pa ma yin pas// 'gro
kun sangs rgyas mnga' bdag go/ stobs dang ldan pa'i nus pa can// ded dpon mkhas pas lag tu blangs// sbubs dang dri ma gsal gyur nas/ kha dog rang 'od 'bar tsam na// nor bu rin thang med pa
ste// bla ma dam pa'i bdud rtsi yis// tshogs gnyis dge ba las byung mthus// ma rig sgrib pa'i tshogs dag nas// shes rab gsum la sbyangs pa yis// rang sems nam mkha' lta bu'i don// chos sku dri ma med

par rtogs// rims kyis pha rol phyin pa yi// sa bcu lam gyi rtags rnams kyang// 'di nyid rtogs pa'i yon tan yin// sngags kyi sku dang zhing khams yang// de nyid stobs dang rtsal las byung// rgyal po'i pho
brang blta na sdug/ rgyal mtshan rtse la phyar byas nas// gang gi gsol ba btab pa na// rang gi bsod nams las mthun pa'i// 'gro ba kun gyi dgos 'dod ni// 'bad pa med pa'i longs spyod 'byung// nor bu
rin chen 'gyur ba med// thogs med sbubs nas 'od yod kyang// rang gi shun pas bsgribs pa las// gzhan gyis nor bu sgribs mi nus// nor bu mun sel sgron me yin// rnyog ma sel bas dngas ma yin/ kha
dog gsal bas mdog mngon yin// nad rnams sel bas bdud rtsi yin// de nyid yon tan mthar phyin pas// chos sku mnyam rjes mi mnga' ba'i// rang rig ye shes mngon du 'gyur// kun la khyab pa'i thugs
rjes yis// gzugs sku'i 'phrin las thogs pa med// gang la gang 'dod 'gro don 'byung// btsal ba med par lhun gyis grub// sems nyid rtog na sangs rgyas kyang// rnam rtog blo bur 'khrul pas
bsgribs// 'khrul pa zhig na mngon sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa la// rnam par rtog pa rdul tsam med// rdo rje'i sku las ma g.yos bzhin// sems can khams dang 'phags pa'i lam// rgyal

ba'i sku la sogs pa yi// thams cad kun gyi don mdzad do// 'bras bu gsang ba bla na med pa'i rgyud chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po las/ sems nyid yid bzhin nor bu'i dpe don bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug
pa'o//// nges 'byung gsum po sgrod pa yid// rig pa 'dzin pa'i don rtogs nas// ting 'dzin las kyi 'phro 'thud de// gsang sngags rigs 'dzin sgrub pa po// mi tshe bdun las phyir mi 'gyed// rnam par

smin pa'i lus 'di la// 'byung bzhi dag pas sgyu ma'i lus// 'chi bdag 'jigs pa grol ba yi// tshe la dbang ba'i rigs 'dzin thob// skye ba gcig gis phyir mi thogs// rang sems phyag rgya chen po yi// rigs
'dzin sa la bden gnas nas// skye dang 'jug la dbang byed pa// phyag rgya chen po'i rigs 'dzin ni// tshe gcig sangs rgyas sa la 'gro// lhun gyis grub pa'i rigs 'dzin ni// rnam bcu dbang

ldan che ba po// ci tsam 'dod pa'i tshe la dbang// las su rung ba'i sems dbang thob// nam mkha' mdzod kyi yo byad dbang// gang ltar byed pa'i las la dbang// rang dbang can gyi skye ba dbang// rig pa rdzu
'phrul sna tshogs dbang// smon lam gang btab 'bras bu dang// theg pa kun gyi chos la dbang// gdul bya mos ston 'phrin las dbang// sku dang ye shes mchog la dbang// rigs 'dzin ye shes sgrub pa
po// rnal 'byor dbang phyug he ru ka/ 'bras bu gsang ba bla na med pa'i rgyud chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po las// rigs 'dzin thob pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// ma bcos lhun grub 'dus ma

byas// bsam brjod yul 'das sgros skur bral// chos sku nam mkha' lta bu ni// phyi nang phyogs rigs rgyun chad med// kun la khyab pa'i bde ba che// rang gsal nyi ma'i snying po bzhin// gsal 'grib med pa

chos kyi sku// rang snang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor de// sku dang zhing khams 'khor du gsal// gcig dang tha dad ma yin pa'i// zag med chos rnams ma lus la// g.yo ba med pa'i rten gyur pas// rang snang phun tshogs
chos kyi sku// kun mkhyen ye shes gcig gi ngang// gsal la 'dzin med sku yi dbang// brjod med mkhyen brtse thugs kyi dbang// thogs med ye shes rdzu 'phrul dbang// gang la gang 'dod yon tan

dbang// kun gyi don grub 'phrin las dbang// zhing khams bde chen 'od kyi dbang// kun la snang ba rten gyi dbang// g.yo ba med pa'i dbang phyug ni// chos sku'i yon tan longs spyod do// chos sku'i ngang
las thugs rje'i 'od// yid bzhin nor bu'i dgos 'dod bzhin// rtsol ba med par gzhan snang du// bsam gyis mi khyab 'od snang sku// shes bya'i sgrib pa la gnas pa'i// 'khor ba'i nyon mongs dag pa
yi// sems pa'i rigs kyi gdul bya la// longs sku mtshan dpes brgyan pa yi// zhing khams bsam gyis mi khyab 'byung// sku dang zhing dang 'khor gyi tshogs// bsam gyis mi khyab snang ba kun// bsod nams
bsags pa'i stobs las byung// chos sku'i mkhyen pa gcig la ni// longs sku'i chos rnams thams cad kun// me long lta bu'i ye shes te// thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa nyid// mtshan nyid ma 'dres so sor
rtogs// don gnyis gcig grub bya ba grub// kun gyi gnas lugs gcig gi ngang// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te// lam gyi dus su 'char ba yin// 'bras bu shes dang mi shes bral// 'dus ma byas shing lhun
grub yin// 'khor ba'i bag chags ma dag pa'i// nyon mongs can gyi gdul bya la// sngon gyi smon lam thugs rje dang// rang bzhin ngang ngam shugs las su// sprul pa sna tshogs 'byung ba

ste// 'jig rten khams na sangs rgyas zhing// rdul snyed bsam gyis mi khyab pas// gdul bya steng chung lta bu la// 'dul byed chu zla lta bu yin// gang la gang 'dul sna tshogs 'byung// tha dad min pa'i rnam par

gnas// rang bzhin bzo skyes byang chub sems// gdul bya gang gi blo 'tsham par// mya ngan 'das dang rtags ston pa'i// sna tshogs thabs kyi sprul pa mdzad// sku gsum thugs kyi gzugs brnyan dang// rang byung
bzo yi gnas rnams dang// rdzas dang longs spyod rten rnams kyis// 'gro la phan pa ji snyed pa// rang bzhin sangs rgyas sprul sku ste// thugs rje brdal ba'i 'phrin las yin// skyes pa bud med la sogs

pa// gang dang gang gis 'dul ba la// de dang de ru skye ba ston// skye ba sprul pa'i sku zhes bya// byang chub sems kyi sprul pa ni// chos nyid ngang las ma g.yos par// dga' ldan gnas nas 'pho ba dang// lhums
zhugs bltams dang gom pa bor// bzo gnas mkhas shing stobs dang ldan// btsun mo'i 'khor dang dgyes pa rol// nges 'byung dka' spyad byang chub mdzad// chos 'khor skor mdzad mya ngan 'das// tshul dang

la lar gang ston pa// sangs rgyas mya ngan yong mi 'da'// dam pa'i chos kyang mi nub ste// skye ba ma dag snang ba ru// sangs rgyas mya ngan 'da' tshul ston// don dam dbyings na 'gyur med bzhin// ji srid 'khor

ba gnas kyi bar// de srid sna tshogs don mdzad pa// byang chub sems kyi sprul sku'o// sprul pa'i sku la nges pa med// 'gro rnams rang rang rtog pa yin// sems kyi sprul par 'byung ba yin// sangs rgyas sprul pa
bstan pa med// kun dang 'bral med thugs rje de// gdod nas lhun grub 'gyur ba med// sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa ni// 'phrin las thogs med gcig gi don// kun la khyab pa'i rin po che// don

gnyis phun tshogs bdag nyid do// 'bras bu gsang ba bla na med pa'i rgyud chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po las// 'bras bu sku dang ye shes longs spyod pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// chos nyid gcig gi

gnas lugs la// 'brel dang ma tshangs med pa dang// breng chags pa dang rgyun ma chad// phun sum tshogs pa rgyud ces bya// rgyud kyi 'brel pa rnam gsum ste// kun gzhi chos dbyings stong pa'i rtsal// rnam par
shes pa gzhi'i rgyud// ma rig rig pa'i ye shes su// thabs dang shes rab zab mo yis// gnyis med rtogs pa lam gyi rgyu// gnas lugs 'od gsal phyag rgya che// rang rig ye shes mngon du gyur// rtsol sgrub
bral bas 'bras bu'i rgyud// gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu gsum// rgyud rnams kun gyi don bsdus pas// dbyer med snying po don gyi rgyud// thams cad ma lus kun tshang ba'i// nam mkha' lta bu'i
rgyud mchog yin// dus gsum dus bzhi sangs rgyas kyis// dgongs te byin gyis brlabs pa'i bka'// rjes su gnang zhing brda bstan dang// zhal nas gsungs shing snyan du brgyud// theg pa sna tshogs mtha'

yas las// brgyad khri bzhi stong grangs snyed chos// sde snod gsum dang rgyud sde bzhi// don kun tshangs pas spyi rgyud yin// rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ma lus rnams// kun gyis rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// rgyud dang lung

gi man ngag rnams// gab dang sbas dang gsang med par// tshig don 'khrul med gsal ba'i phyir// dri ma med pa'i rgyud ces bya// dam chos bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho nas// snying po yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyud// rdo rje
sems dpa'i snying khrag 'di// sangs rgyas bstan pa'i srog shing yin// 'di ma rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni// gcig kyang snga phyi bar gsum med// dus gsum bde gshegs dgongs pa'i bcud// de nyid rig byed

gsang ba'i sngags// ye shes rig pa mchog gi rgyud// snying po gsal ba zhes bya'o// dam chos kun gyi mthar thug pa// gsang sngags rgyal po kun gyi bcud// rgyud chen gsang ba'i snying po 'di// nam mkha'
mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// gsang ba'i bdag po khyed kyis bsdus/ khyod kyis mkha' dang mnyam pa'i don// skal ldan bu la gtad rgya gtod// gang gis 'brel pa don che yang// ji ltar chu ni rnyog
ma'i nang// zla ba'i gzugs brnyan mi gsal bzhin// sangs rgyas rnams ni byon gyur kyang// skal ba med pas de mi rtogs// dam chos bdud rtsi'i 'o ma 'di// snod ngan sbrul gdug lta bu yi// blo dman dad

brtson snying rje med// log rtog the tshom chos brgyad can// nga rgyal rgyud khengs mos gus chung// dam med rnams la rgyas btab bo// ma 'ongs rtsod pa dar ba'i dus// mi khoms brgyad kyi 'gro ba yang// nyam thag
snying rje'i dus nyid du// blo gros thabs ldan rig rtsal can// 'gro phan snying rje ldan pa yi// byang chub sems dpa'i rigs ldan 'byung// de yi dad ldan blo gros can// shes rab bsal zhing dad brtson
ldan// thabs chen ngang tshul bzang ba'i rigs// thar pa thob 'dod rnams la bstan// don rgyud gsang 'dus snying po 'di// rin chen gser gyis legs bris shing// sna tshogs dar gyi sbubs su gsal// gang
gis 'chang ngam mthong thos rung// mchod pa'i rten dang phyag byas gyur// tshe ring nad med gdon las grol// dpal dang bsod nams longs spyod 'phel// rig pa sku ru smin pa yis// 'da' khar mngon par
byang chub rtags// sku gdung ring bsrel 'ja' 'od dang// gsal dag nam mkha' dngas pa 'byung// 'di yod 'gro ba sangs rgyas yin// nyams blangs don rtogs smos ci dgos// zab mo rgyud kyi
snying po 'di// gang na yod pa'i sa phyogs su// mkha' 'gro ba'i doms sprin bzhin 'dus// skal ldan 'ga' yi spyod yul las// kun gyis mthong thos ma yin no// mi mjed khams kyi 'dzam bu'i gling// o rgyan

mtshos skyes par ma 'dzin// rgyud mchog 'gro ba'i don byed 'gyur// bde chen zhing du byang chub thob// rgyal ba mtha' yas 'od dpag med// thugs rje'i 'od la 'brel tshad 'khod// byang chub sems dpar kun

dang 'gro// 'di ni gsang chen nges pa'i lung// gsang sngags snying po'i rgyud 'di zung// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang sngags rigs 'dzin 'khor tshogs rnams// rang rig ye shes snying po
