mkha'i kha dog 'dra// chos sku lhun gyis 'grub pa dang// spros pa med par gcig pa dang// kun la khyab pa'i yan lag go/ longs sku mtshan dpe 'od kyi ngang// yab yum 'khor dang zhing khams la// bde bas

gang ba'i yan lag go/ sprul sku dmigs med kun khyab la// 'gag pa med pa'i snying rje 'di// rgyun chad med pa'i yan lag go/ ngo bo mnyam pa ris med la// dbye ba yon tan sgo nas phye// rgyal ba'i sku la dpag
med kyang// sems can blo yis bcad pa'i yul// chos sku kun la khyab pa la// 'di zhes nges pa'i mtshan ma med// gnas la nges med chos kyi dbyings// 'khor la nges med 'khor 'das rnams// chos la nges
med srid zhi kun// dus la nges med mnyam pa nyid// chos sku bsam gyis mi khyab pas// sangs rgyas rnams la snang ba'o// longs sku rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas la// gnas nges 'thug po bkod pa
dang// 'khor nges dag pa'i sa pa yis// byang chub sems dpa' rigs gsum dang// chos ni theg chen brda yis ston// dus ni sgrib gnyis dag dus der// 'khor gyi snang ba dag pa yis// longs sku skye 'gag

mi snang ngo// sprul pa'i sku ni ma nges te// ston pa gang la gang 'dul ba// rigs drug don du thub pa drug/ de'ang mdzad pa bcu gnyis tshul// gnas ni 'dzam gling bye phrag brgya// de yang ma nges sna tshogs
gnas// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das pa'i// 'khor ni rigs tshogs bsam mi khyab// chos kyang theg pa du ma ston// dus la nges med gsum du bsgrang// sems can snang ba ma dag pas// rgyal ba'i sku yang

der snang ston// ston pa mya ngan 'das tshul ston// dam pa'i chos kyang nub par 'gyur// 'on kyang sangs rgyas mi 'da' zhing// dam pa'i chos kyang nub mi 'gyur// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// sangs
rgyas mdzad pa gang yang ston// don dam dbyings las g.yos pa med// thub pa chos kyi sku can yin// gnas lugs stong pa chos kyi dbyings// yin par grub med rang rig 'di// rang snang 'char tshul ma 'gags

pas// snang srid chos sku'i zhing du shar// rang shar rang grol chos kyi sku// stong nyid spros dang bral ba yis// nam mkha' lta bu'i gshis de yin// de nyid ye shes rig pa'i sku// rtag pa ma yin mtshan ma
med// chad med 'od gsal stong pa'i sku// gsal la hrig chags phyi nang med// phyogs bcur ye shes spyan gyis gzigs// snang cha yod la 'dzin cha med// dus gsum bde gshegs chos kyi sku// nam mkha' lta

bu'i sku mnga' ba'i// thams cad rgyal ba'i sku rdo rje// bde chen 'od gsal dpal du 'bar// gsung ni tshig tu ma brjod par// don gyis gsung ni rgyun mi 'chad// thams cad rgyal ba'i gsung rdo rje// tshangs pa

gsung gis don kun 'grub// thugs ni sgrib gnyis mi mnga' bar// snang srid rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// rang snang 'od kyi zhing khams na// bde chen 'khor gyis tshogs

kyis bskor// zag med ngang las 'gyur med du// rang snang longs spyod ye shes ni// chos nyid ji lta thams cad mkhyen// gzhan snang gzugs sku'i ye shes ni// chos can ji snyed mkhyen pa de// rnam rtog mi mnga'

rtsol med 'byung// sku gsung thugs dang zhing khams 'khor// rang nyid min pa gzhan med pas// gnyis su ma mchis 'khor 'das kun// nor bu dri ma med pa bzhin// rang snang chos sku'i sangs rgyas yin// gang
dag nga la gzugs su mthong// sgra thos mtshan mar 'dzin pa kun// log par rtog pa zhugs pa ste// rmongs pa de dag nga mi mthong// nga ni rang 'byung chos kyi sku// 'dus ma byas shing lhun gyis
grub// mkhyen dang brtse ba'i bdag nyid can// chos nyid rig pa'i sku ru ltos// thams cad nga yi rang bzhin la// logs na lta rgyu ci yang med// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med du// thams cad bde gsal

chos kyi sku// gcig tu rtogs na nga mthong yin// nga las 'khor ba myang 'das med// 'khor ba myang 'das su yi chos// nga la bzang ngan gnyis su med// bzang ngan gnyis 'dzin su yi chos// nga la phyi nang phyogs

rigs med// phyi nang phyogs rigs su yi chos// nga la snga phyi 'pho 'gyur med// dus dang 'pho 'gyur su yi chos// nga la bdag dang gzhan du med// bdag gzhan 'dzin pa su yi chos// nga la gsal 'grib skye

'gag med// skye 'gag 'phel 'grib su yi chos// nga la che chung 'du 'bral med// 'du 'bral dus tshod su yi chos// nga la rig dang ma rig med// 'khrul grol gnyis po su yi chos// nga la rgyu rkyen 'bras bu
med// rgyu 'bras gnyen po su yi chos// thams cad rang las ma 'das par// rang gi rang nyid gnyis 'dzin bsgribs// ltad mo sna tshogs yul yod kyang// mig gcig bkab pas thams cad 'gag/ de
bzhin thams cad mkhyen pa yang// rang sems ma rig cig gis 'gags// ma rig ling thog bsal tsam na// ye shes mig gcig dri med de// thams cad gzigs shing thams cad mkhyen// de bzhin gshegs

la phyag 'tshal lo// dbyings gsal dri med chos kyi sku// brtan g.yo'i gzugs brnyan kha dog kun// rnam snang gang chen ye shes sku// sku+u la zhing khams thams cad snang// zhing khams thams cad skus khyab

pas// longs spyod rdzogs sku'i rang bzhin yin// rang rang nus pas gzhan don mdzad// sprul pa'i skur yang de nyid brjod// de las dag snang can rnams la// byang chub snying po'i zhing khams na// sems nyid sna
tshogs mdzes pa brgyan// chos dbyings 'od kyi ri bo la// ston pa rnam par snang mdzad la// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i skyes bu yis// byang chub sems dpa' bsam 'das bskor// sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal

ba'i// gsang sngags don gyi ngo bos te// rang gi ston pa la nyan cing// rang gi 'khor la chos dbyings kyis// de nyid kho na nges pa'i sgo// ye shes chen po ston par byed// sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa yin

zhing// mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba// rdo rje phung po'i ri bo la// rdo rje'i 'od zer rnam par brgyan// rnam par snang mdzad de nyid las// ston pa rdo rje mi bskyod pa// skyes bu sems dpa' rdo rje'i rigs// byang
sems bye ba mtha' yas bskor// sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba'i// gsang sngags ngo bo de nyid ni// nyan cing rang gi ston pa yi// ji bzhin nyid kyi sgo nas su// me long lta bu ye shes

ston// sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ldan zhing// dpal dang ldan pa zhes bya ba// rin chen gser 'od ri bo la// rin chen phung po rnam par bkod// ston pa rin chen 'byung ldan la// skyes bu rin chen rdo rje'i
rigs// byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas bskor// sems nyid rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i// gsang sngags don gyi ngo bo ste// nyan cing rang gi 'khor rnams la// ma bcos pa yi sgo nas su// mnyam nyid ye

shes gsal bar ston// sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi zhing// bde ba can zhes bya ba na// pad+ma 'od kyi ri bo la// pad+mo bkod pas mdzes par brgyan// ston pa snang ba mtha' yas la// skyes bu pad+ma rdo rje'i
rigs// byang chub sems dpa' dpag med bskor// sems nyid rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i// gsang sngags don gyi ngo bo de// nyan cing rang gi 'khor rnams la// ji lta ba'i sgo nas su// so sor rtogs pa'i ye

shes ston// sangs rgyas don yod grub pa'i zhing// rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba// rin chen sna tshogs ri bo la// in dra nI la'i dra bas brgyan// ston pa gdon mi za bar grub// skyes bu rdo rje las kyi rigs// byang
chub sems dpa' mtha' yas bskor// sems nyid rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i// gsang sngags don gyi ngo bo de// 'khor gyis nyan cing ston pa yi// nor pa med pa'i sgo nas su// bya grub ye shes ston par

byed// 'khor dang rang gi gdul bya rnams// rang rang gi ni ston pa la// rang gi chos su go ba yi// zhing khams de ru snang ba las// skye shi med par longs spyod pa'i// rang gzhan 'dod dgu'i sangs rgyas

ni// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che// chos sku'i ngo bo nyid longs spyod// thugs rje chen po 'jig rten gzugs// mi 'byed la sogs 'jig rten du// bcom ldan thub pa'i dbang po ni// chos kyi sku las ma

g.yos par// 'og min longs sku'i rol pa de// rtsol ba med par 'gro ba'i don// gang la gang 'dul der byon zhing// mos pa spyod pa'i lha mi la// byang chub lam la rgyud pa'i// tshogs bsags pa dang sgrib sbyang
tshul// skye ba mngon par skye ba dang// dga' ldan gnas nas 'pho ba dang// yum gyi lhum 'jug bltams pa dang// bzo gnas rig pa mkhas pa dang// rgyal srid btsun mo dgyes rol dang// nges 'byung dka'
ba spyad pa dang// byang chub snying por gshegs pa dang// bdud sde 'joms dang byang chub dang// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos 'khor bskor// mya ngan 'das par gshegs pa rnams// ma dag gnyis 'dzin zhing
rnams su// srid pa ji srid gnas par ston// de'ang gcig tu ma nges te// mi mjed 'di la ma 'phos par// 'jig rten 'di yang chags 'jig ston// la la dag la stong gnas ston// rgas dang na

dang 'chi med kyang// sems can snang bar skye shi ston// dam pa'i don la mi 'da' yang// srid gsum skyo ba bskyed pa'i phyir// ston pa mya ngan 'das tshul ston// la lar lhums zhugs bltams pa'i tshul// la
lar chos 'khor bskor la sogs// mdzad pa rnam pa sna tshogs ston// sdig las nges par bzlog pa'i phyir// bdud srin dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa ston// tshogs gnyis dge la 'jug pa'i don// lha dbang mi yi

dbang phyug ston// phyin ci log las blo zlog ste// nges pa'i lam la 'jug don du// bdud sde 'joms dang cho 'phrul ston// kun tu rgyal bar gyur nas kyang// da dung mchod pa'i 'du shes dang// thub pa byang chub

lam la spyod// dri ma med pa'i chu shel de/ kha dog rkyen gyis bsgyur ba bzhin// thub pa chos kyi sku can yang// gdul bya rang gi bsam pa dang// mthun 'jug de yi sku byon pas// sems can nam mkha' mnyam pa

las// sprul pa'i sku yang de dang mnyam// 'gro kun rtog pa tha dad la// sangs rgyas mdzad pa tha dad byung// mkha' la nyi ma gcig shar bas// chu snod grangs las 'das pa ru// nyi ma re re snang ba bzhin// chos

sku gcig gi mdzad pa yis// gzugs sku sems can re re'i mdun// sna tshogs sku re ston par byed// de bzhin gsung dang brda tshig yang// rang rang so so'i skad dag tu// dper na lha yi rnga sgra yi// lha rnams
kun gyis don go ltar// rang rang 'dod don gsung du go/ de bzhin thugs kyi dgongs pa yang// mkhyen pa'i ye shes gcig nyid la// so so rang rang theg pa'i don// 'jug pa de yi 'bras bu go/ sku
gsung thugs kyi mdzad pa rnams// sems can lus ngag yid gsum dang// rigs dang mthun pa'i thugs rje ni// gtsang dang mi gtsang ljan ljin la// nyi ma mnyam par shar ba bzhin// sems can tha ma 'bring
'gyur la// mnyam pa rigs med kun khyab kyang// ji ltar chu yi snod chag na// nyi ma'i gzugs ni mi snang bzhin// log sred can gyi rigs rnams la// sangs rgyas gzugs ni snang mi 'gyur// gnyis med
'brel yang so sor mthong// mos spyod 'dod pa sna tshogs la// sangs rgyas rnam par mi rtog pa// nam mkha' bzhin du g.yo med pa'i// mnyam pa nyid du bzhugs gyur kyang// sangs rgyas byon dang bzhud pa
dang// bzhugs dang bzhengs pa mnyes mi mnyes// rnam pa mi gcig du ma ni// zhal ni ston dang mi ston dang// mthong rgyu can dang mthong rgyu min// dngos su yod dang dngos med dang// gzhan ni ma bzhugs
bdag drung yod// 'di ru med cing gzhan na bzhugs// la la sangs rgyas rmi lam du// mthong zhing sad nas mi mthong dang// gnyis log mi mthong sad dus mthong// nye bar mi mthong rgyang du

mthong// rgyang du mthong zhing nye mi mthong// mnyam bzhag mthong yang yengs mi mthong// yengs pas mi mthong mnyam bzhag mthong// de bzhin sku gzugs kha dog rtags// so so rigs kyi rtog pa bzhin// sku yi
bkod pa sna tshogs snang// chos tshig gcig kyang ma gsungs kyang// sems can rnams ni 'di snyam ste// la la chos gsung mi brjod snyam// la lar gsungs pa mdzad par snang// la lar gsungs par 'gyur ro
snyam// la las zhal nas gsungs so snyam// la las yi ge byung ba dang// la las sgra dang dbyangs su thos// la las brda dang 'od las byung// la las nam mkha' dbyings nas byung// 'di rnams de bzhin
gshegs pa'i gsung// bdag cag rnams kyis thos so snyam// chos rnams ston pa bdag gis shes// go bo rtogs so rig go snyam// gsung dbyangs mtha' yas don gcig 'byung// mi rtog ye shes thugs la
ni// 'ga' zhig rtog pa yod do sems// 'ga' zhig rtog pa med par 'dod// 'ga' zhig ye med stong par 'dod// 'ga' zhig mngon par shes par 'dod// 'ga' zhig rtog bral sgyu mar 'dod// 'ga' zhig
nyan rang ye shes 'dod// 'ga' zhig byang chub sems dpar 'dod// 'ga' zhig sangs rgyas mkhyen pa ni// rtsol med lhun gyis grub par 'dod// 'ga' zhig rtsal rtog thugs rjer 'dod// 'dzam gling bye ba

phrag brgya na// shAka thub bye ba phrag brgya bzhugs// sku gsung thugs kyi mdzad pa ni// rgyal bas ci yang ma mdzad kyang// rang bzhin thugs rje'i nyi 'od kyis// sems can bsams pa tshim mdzad pa'i// gang la
gang 'dul zhing khams na// de dang de yi ston par bzhugs// sku yi 'dul ba dngos dang gzugs// mig gi mthong bas don thob bo// gsung gi yi ge dbyangs dang tshig/ rna bas thos pas don grub bo// thugs

kyis ting 'dzin 'dul byed pa// yid la dran pas 'bras bu thob// rang bzhin sprul pa mchog yin pas// byang chub lam la 'khod par 'gyur// gdul bya bung ba lta bu la// 'dul byed me tog lta bu yi// so so'i
'dod pa tshim byed pa'i// gang la gang 'dul der ston pa'i// la lar rab byung cha byad dang// skyes pa bud med mi yi gzugs// brgya byin srin po'i cha lugs dang// bdud dang dmag dpon rgyal po'i

rigs// bram ze gtsang gnas mu stegs dang// dud 'gro'i cha byad sna tshogs pa'i// skye ba'i sprul pa sna tshogs kyis// gnas skabs 'dod pa'i blo tshim nas// yang dag lam la dad byed 'gyur// 'dod pa'i yul
can 'gro ba la// med pa dag las yod byed pa'i// rgyur byed bzo yi gnas rnams dang// rang bzhin 'byung ba lnga rnams las// rdzas dang yo byad dngos po 'dod// phyi nang longs spyod 'dod yon

lnga// ma bcos rang sprul rang 'byung gis// rang rang thad ka'i don 'byung bas// thams cad sangs rgyas sprul pa ste// gang gis gang gi dan byed pa// don ldan sprul sku'i 'gro don ni// sems can kun gyi rgyud la

yod// ting 'dzin rig dang rgyud rig pa// de ni don gyi 'bras bu'o// 'khor bar snang ba gzugs kyi sku// yang dag snang ba chos kyi sku// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te// sngar 'das sangs rgyas de bzhin la// ma

'ongs 'byung ba de bzhin te// de ltar byung ba rdzogs sangs rgyas// dus gsum sangs rgyas ngo bo gcig/ de yi rang bzhin rang gi sems// lhun grub 'gyur med rtsal rdzogs pas// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes
pa ni// ma rig 'khrul pa'i rtog tshogs kyis// 'byung lus dngos po'i sdos bcas rnams// rang sar sangs nas ngo bo de// skur rgyas sku gsum 'du 'bral med// rang bzhin mkhyen pa'i ye shes su// rgyas pas
chos sku thams cad mkhyen// sku ni dngos po mtshan ma med// med pa ma yin stong gsal dbyings// 'gag med rig pa 'gyur med sku// smra brjod bral ba'i brjod bya don// bsam gyis mi khyab rgyun mi
'chad// 'khrul dang ca co la sogs pa'i// dran nyams rnam rtog 'du shes dang// ma rtogs btang snyoms mi mnga' zhing// rnam par mi rtog ye shes su// sgrib pa med par kun gsal du// thams cad mkhyen
pa'i thugs rje can// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i// bdud bzhi rang bcom sku gsum ldan// sku dang zhing khams ye shes tshogs// nor bu rin chen rang 'od mdog/ dbyer med bzhin du gnyis su
med// gnyis med chos sku'i gzugs sku de// chu nang nam mkha' zla shar bzhin// gdul bya kun las mnyam par ston// ston pas 'gro don byed pa ni// sgyu mkhan sgyu ma ston pa bzhin// rtog pa med par gzhan
la ston// mkhyen brtse dmigs med nus pa yis// nor bu rin chen dgos 'dod bzhin// rtsol ba med par 'gro rnams la// gang la gang 'dod dgos 'dod 'byung// rang bzhin dag dang smon lam gyis// gang
zhig rdzogs par sangs rgyas tshe// sems can 'du shes med phyi ru// ma rtogs 'khrul pa'i 'gro ba la// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od shar bas// pad tshal me tog kha bye ltar// rang gi bsod nams bde ba

'byung// sems can khams rnams chos nyid der// sangs rgyas thugs rje'i gter kha 'byed// yon tan mi zad rgya mtsho ru// 'gro rnams phun tshogs rang la spyod// ma rig shes sgrib sprin 'dra la// thugs rje'i
rlung gis rab gtor bas// 'gro kun rang 'byung ye shes rtogs// sems can skyabs med nus pa la// thugs rje'i pha mas bskyangs pa na// rang gis rtsal rdzogs gzhan don 'byung// sa bon gyur
pa'i 'gro ba la// thugs rje'i drod gsher bskyed pa yin// dge tshogs yon tan gong du 'phel// gnas skabs mthar thug 'bras bu smin// nyon mongs nad kyi sdug bsngal rnams// thugs rje bden pa'i bdud rtsi
sman// gang gis 'thungs pa bde bar grol// 'gro rnams las kyi byed bzhin de// thugs rje'i me long gzugs brnyan gsal// las kyi dri ma phyis pa yis// rang rig sku gsum zhal ngo mthong// thams cad
mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas de// 'khor 'das gnyis la dbyer med pas// nyi mas rang la mun med 'od// gzhan gyis mun pa sel ba bzhin// rang la 'khor ba'i bag chags med// thams cad rgyal ba'i zhing
khams la// srid par gnas pa'i 'gro rnams la// thugs rje'i sprul sku rgyun du 'byung// don gnyis thams cad mkhyen grub ste// gnas lugs gcig gi rang ngo yin// sangs rgyas thams cad sku gcig
mchog/ sku gcig thams cad mkhyen pa yin// de yi che ba'i yon tan ni// re re nas su brjod gyur na// nam mkha' ma zad par mi 'dzad// mdor bsdus sku gsung thugs la 'dus// sku ni nam mkha'i mtha'

dang mnyam// mtshan dpe 'od kyi rang bzhin la// bsam gyis mi khyab dpag mi nus// thams cad rgyal ba'i sku rdo rje// gsung ni skye med don gyi sgra// gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu yis// tshangs pa'i gsung ni

bsam mi khyab// thams cad rgyal ba'i gsung rdo rje// thugs kyis mkhyen brtse yul med du// rang snang chos nyid ji lta ba'i// gsal 'grib med pa'i ngang nas su// rang gzhan gnyis su med pa la/ khams gsum

'khor ba srid tshad kyis// rgyu rkyen 'bras bu'i tshogs rnams kyis// so sor ma 'dres tha mi dad// ji snyed mngon sum mkhyen pa yi// chos nyid ngang las ma g.yos bzhin// gsal dang bzlog dang sprul mkhyen
nas// sems can smin grol rgyun mdzad pas// de nyid bsam mi khyab pa'i don// byang chub sems dpa' ma rtogs na// nyan thos rang rgyal ci la rtogs// mu stegs byed kun log pa'i lam// cha tsam rtogs nas
yang dag gi/ lam sna zin pa bde 'gro bas// rigs dang cig char gong bzhin thob// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis po ni// rig dang ma rig khyad pa las// gnas lugs sku gsung lhan cig skyes// rtogs pa'i

ye shes thugs rje can// 'gro ba kun la 'bral med du// rtogs pa rgyun gyi thugs rje ni// chu dang rlan bzhin rgyun chad med// rang bzhin shugs kyi thugs rje ni// nyi ma'i 'od bzhin shugs la 'byung// yul dang
phrad pa'i thugs rje ni// 'gro ba bzang mo lta bu la// bskul zhing gsol btab thugs rje ni// yid bzhin nor bu'i dgos 'dod bzhin// rtog pa med pa'i sangs rgyas la// gdul byas gsol ba
btab pa yis// thugs rjes lhun grub yod pa 'byung// chos sku skye med rang gdang gis// gnyis med dag pa'i thugs rje gzhi// lam dus smon lam mthar phyin rgyus// 'dod mdun mos pa'i gdul bya

rnams// tshogs pa gcig tu gyur pa las// 'phrin las rtsol med lhun grub tu// rgyun mi 'chad par 'gro don du// sku gsung thugs kyi gdul bya 'dul// sku yi 'dul ba longs sku dang// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro

yi// zhi khro dkyil 'khor lha tshogs dang// byang sems rang rgyal nyan thos dang// lha mi so so'i skye bo ni// rgyal po bram ze ded dpon dang// shan pa smad 'tshong kun tu rgyu// stag dang ri bong glang chen
sogs// rigs drug so so'i gzugs can du// sems can tshul gyis don mdzad snang// ri mo lugs ma 'bur la sogs// sku gsung thugs kyi gzugs brnyan gyis// mchod rten las dang bya ba dang// 'byung ba

lnga dang phyi nang gi/ longs spyod 'bebs pa'i rdzas rnams kyis// rtog pa med par 'gro don 'byung// sangs rgyas sku yi 'phrin las yin// gsung gi 'dul ba chos nyid sgra// dbyangs dang tshig dang don gyi
gsung// sngags dang theg pa che chung gsung// tshig bshad lhug pa snyan ngag dang// lha mi dud 'gro la sogs pa'i// 'dod pa'i gtam sogs brjod 'das kyis// tshul gyi khyab par kun don 'byung// yi ge'i
gzugs dang rol mo'i sgra// 'byung ba so so'i rgyu rkyen gyis// bem po'i sgra yi don rnams 'byung// rdo rje gsung gi 'phrin las te// thugs kyi 'dul ba rang 'byung gis// ye shes nyams rtogs shes rab

dang// ting nge 'dzin dang spobs pa dang// dad mos snying rje skyo shas kyis// nges 'byung bsam pa legs po yi// rgyud la skyes pa'i tshul gyis 'byung// brda bstan rtags mthong bslab pa dang// gang gi yid byed
mthar phyin pas// sems can rnams kyi yid tshim dang// byang chub sa lam yon tan dang// rigs 'dzin nyams rtags brtul zhugs dang// sku gsum mngon gyur sangs rgyas pa// rgyal ba thugs kyi 'phrin las
yin// don dam kun rdzob 'khor 'das kyi// dge sdig rgyu 'bras bde sdug dang// 'khrul grol gzhi lam 'bras gsum rnams// ma 'dres tha dad ma yin par// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis// thams cad
kun gyi don 'grub pas// rnam mkhyen sangs rgyas 'phrin las la// thogs pa ma mchis rtsol sgrub bral// lhun grub 'gyur med kun tu bzang// thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud// 'bras bu dri med thams
cad mkhyen pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// thogs med dngos po'i chos nyid de// sprin med nam mkha'i dbyings bzhin du// stong gsal ci yang grub med la// rang mdangs 'gag pa med pa'i
'od// rang ngo ma shes sprin bzhin byung// de la gzung 'dzin gnyis snang skyes// bar snang bu yug tshub ma bzhin// nyon mongs sna tshogs sems dkrugs nas// ma rig 'khor bar 'khyams pa yin// sems can

sangs rgyas yin gyur kyang// rang ngo ma shes bu chung bzhin// rang bzhin gnyis ka mi rigs la// pha mas bskyangs pas sems rnyed bzhin// bla ma'i drin gyis rang sems rtogs// thabs shes tshogs gnyis yon

tan skyed// bu chung che mir rtsal rdzogs nas// rang dang gzhan gnyis skyong ba bzhin// chos nyid bden pa'i rang rtsal rdzogs// rig pa sku gsum lcer bur 'gyur// 'gyur med ye shes rang sa yin// chos sku dri
med rnam dag de// dper na nor bu rang gsal bzhin// rang snang bde bar rang longs spyod// nor bu 'od cher gzhan la phog/ gzhan gyi kha dog rkyen gyis 'gyur// de bzhin rang snang 'gag med kyis// thugs

rje gzhan dang 'bral med pa// sprul pa'i sku ni 'gro don 'byung// 'gro ba rang rang rtog pa dang// mthun pa'i chos sku sprul sku ru// sna tshogs der 'byon don mdzad kyang// dri med chos kyi dbyings dkyil na// skad
cig mi g.yo nam mkha' bzhin// kun la khyab pa'i sangs rgyas de// dper na rgyal bu rgyal rigs bzhin// gdod nas sangs rgyas yin gyur kyang// rgyal rigs rgyal po rkang 'khyams bzhin// sangs rgyas ma rig
sems can 'khrul// rgyal por ngo shes rgyal sar ston// rang rig rtogs pas rdzogs sangs rgyas// rgyal bu rgyal rigs dbang byed lta// sku gsum thams cad mkhyen pa yis// bdag gzhan don gnyis 'phrin
las mdzad// de nyid rtsol med lhun grub de// gser dang ser po gzugs dang gsum// dbye yang don la gser du gcig/ de bzhin ngo bo chos sku dang// rang bzhin bde chen longs spyod rdzogs// thugs rjes
sprul pa'i sku dang gsum// ming la so sor brtags gyur kyang// skad cig dbyer med lhan cig skyes// yang dag ye shes 'gyur med par// thams cad kun mkhyen lhun gyis grub// kun tu bzang po kun bdag
nyid// rnam par snang mdzad gang chen mtsho// thub pa chen po chos kyi rgyal// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de yi sras// thams cad mkhyen la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'jug bsdus dpe'i don gyi le'u ste dgu
pa'o//// gnas lugs 'od gsal chos kyi dbyings// ji bzhin rig pa sku gsum la// ma rig 'khrul pas gol ba ste// rang ngo ma shes sgrib pa yin// rang shes 'dod pa'i theg pa kun// 'og mas gong
ma'i yon tan de// ma mthong rtsod pa sgrib pa de// gong mas 'og ma'i theg pa yi// gnas lugs mi shes snan na gol// gol sgrib ma dag 'khor ba las// mya ngan 'das pa mi rtogs pas// rig pa
dri med gtan la phob// chos nyid rig pa khyab brdal yang// nga dang bdag tu bzung ba yis// bzung ba'i yul la 'dzin pa'i sems// gnyis 'dzin rtog pas sems can 'khrul// rang sems rtogs na 'khor

mtha' chod// 'khrul pa med na sangs rgyas yin// skye 'gag med pa'i chos nyid de// rtag chad phyogs char bzung ba yis// phyin ci log tu rang snang 'khrul// yang dag don la gol zhing sgrib// lta spyod nor pas
mnar med ltung// gnas lugs rtogs na 'jig rten 'das// snang ba sems kyi rang gzugs la// gzung yul spong ba'i 'dzin sems 'khrul// stong nyid bsgom pas 'od gsal bsgribs// nyon mongs spong
ba'i ye shes med// gzung 'dzin grol na theg chen yin// snang stong gnyis med ye shes la// gzung yul mi dmigs 'dzin sems dang// rnam rtog bkag pa'i mi rtog 'khrul// rang rig sems su ma mthong
bsgribs// gnyis med rtogs na ye shes 'char// rig pa phyogs med thang yan la/ khams gsum sems su 'dod pa 'khrul// sems dang sems byung gnyis med gsum// mtha' dang bral ba ma mthong
bsgribs// bden gnyis rtogs na gol sa chod// chos nyid rig pa mngon sum la// kun rdzob don dam mi dmigs pa'i// stong nyid bsgoms pa'i dbu ma 'khrul// sngon sum don gyi gnas lugs
bsgribs// thabs kyis zin na sngon sangs rgyas// don dam mtshan ma med pa la// mtshan bcas lha ru ltas pas 'khrul// dmigs med rang gsal ma mthong bsgribs// rang snang dag ni sku ru 'gyur// rig pa skye
med spros bral la// spros pa'i gzugs brnyan sna tshogs kun// bskyed rim bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor 'khrul// rang snang sku ru ma mthong bsgribs// gnyis ka'i lta spyod gol sgrib can// gnyis 'dzin bral ba'i

sems la ltos// ye shes rig pa ngo mtshar che// mi gnas zung 'jug chos sku la// thabs shes sbyor ba'i bskyed rim 'khrul// lhan skyes ye shes ma mthong bsgribs// ma bskyed rdzogs pa chen po de// rtogs par
'dod na ji bzhin zhog/ dbyings dang rig pa gnyis med la// bskyed rdzogs sgom pa'i rnal 'byor 'khrul// ma bcos lhun grub ma mthong bsgribs// rang 'byung ye shes ma rtogs gol// 'khor 'das ma lus

rdzogs pa che// rin chen gling na rdo med bzhin// thams cad sangs rgyas ma yin pa// gcig kyang yod par ngas ma mthong// gol sa gol rgyu'i sgrib pa yang// chos nyid ngang las ma 'das pas// chos sku'i rol pa
chen po yin// de nyid ma rtogs rdul tsam med// thams cad rang 'byung lhun grub la// bcos ma med pa'i ngang la zhog/ gnyis su med pa'i don la ltos// rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes spyod// rnam par
dag pa'i 'bras bu'o// gol sgrib mtha' gcod kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen pa yi// ji ltar mos pa tha dad la// 'khrid par bya ba'i thabs tsam du// theg pa dpag med bstan pa
yang// lam la 'khrid pa'i thabs su zad// rdo rje'i theg pa nges pa'i don// nam mkha' lta bur khyab pa la// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kun 'dus nas// bka' sgros snying po'i rgyud 'di gsungs// gsang ba'i
bdag po nyid la gtad// rgyud chen gsang ba yongs rdzogs 'di// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// gnyis su ma yin tha dad min// de bzhin nyid du nges pa'i don// theg pa ma lus 'dir 'dus shing// rgyal
ba'i dgongs pa 'dus pa'i bcud// yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'di// gang zhig nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor des// mun pa ma lus sel ba dang// snang gsal 'od kyis kun gsal bzhin// yang dag rgyud 'di sus

mthong ba// 'khrul dang ma 'khrul rnam rtog gi/ sgrib pa'i tshogs rnams rang sar dag/ dus gsum kun mkhyen ye shes ni// phyi dus ma yin da ltar du// mthong bas grol te mngon sangs rgyas// sems can rtog

pa tha dad la// rgyal ba'i gsung yang de bzhin te// tshig gi rgya mtsho mtha' yas kyang// tshig 'bru tha dad don gcig ste// tshig gcig rnam par rtogs na ni// de dag thams cad rtogs dang 'dra// rgyal ba'i gsung
dbyangs gcig las su// chos kyi sgo mo thams cad byung// de rnams 'di nyid don la 'dus// thos pas grol te byang chub thob// thos pa rang rig ye shes yin// dpag bsam shing gi yal ga de// gcig shes

sdong po kun shes bzhin// rgyu 'di'i don shes gang dran kun// dag pa ye shes bde chen gyis// dri med chos sku ma rtogs pa// gzhan med rang byung lhun grub la// sku gsum 'bras bu rtsol med 'byung// dran pas

'khor 'das kun don 'grub// ri rgyal lhun po'i rtse non na// ri bo ri phran gling kun non// de bzhin ye shes bla ma'i sa// rig pa sku gsum lhun grub kyis// rgyud 'di'i don dang su 'phrad pa// theg pa kun don
chos kyis don// sa lam ma lus dus gcig tu// bgrod mi dgos par kun tu non// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa gcig la// mang por bgrod kyang don gcig 'babs// chu bran rgya mtshor bsleb dang
mtshungs// rgyal po rang gi yul nas su// ma 'phags phyogs kun dbang bsgyur ltar// de bzhin sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// rgyud kyi dgongs pa nges don 'di// gdod nas sku gsum lhun grub kyis// sa lam
ma g.yos 'khor 'das yis// don kun mnyam pa nyid du byed// phyogs med rnam par rgyal ba yi// thams cad sangs rgyas mdzad pa yin// de phyir gsang ba'i rgyud chen 'di// mthong thos dran reg
'gro ba kun// dman pa'i lus la rgyal ba'i sku// dbang bskur dam pa sngon du 'gyur// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun sgros pas// 'di las lhag pa'i don ma rnyed// ma byung mi 'byung 'byung mi 'gyur// 'di yod
'gro ba sangs rgyas yin// ston pas chos 'di lung bstan pa// dper na nyi mas kun snang yang// dmus long mig gis mi mthong ba// mig ldan thams cad mthong 'gyur zhing// rgyud 'di 'jig rten kun khyab

kyang// blo dman rnams kyis ma rtogs pas// kun gyis rtogs phyir gsang ba'i rgyud// rdo rje snying po khyod kyis zung// nam mkha' lta bu'i chos nyid las// nyi ma'i snying po bzhin du bsdus// 'od kyis kun la khyab
pa yi// rtse gcig ma rig mun tshogs sel// dag pa'i ye shes 'od gsal ba// mngon par rtogs phyir dga' ldan dang// 'dzam gling o rgyan yul du dar// byas bcos chos nyid nyams pa'i dus/ khyag pa chu

'khyags yul du 'byung// tshe lo bcu pa'i bar du gnas// yi ge 'di yi phyi mo rnams// o rgyan mkha' 'gro'i gnas su 'dzin// lan cig dus kyi tha ma la// skal pa ldan pas mthong ba srid// nam mkha'i dbyings

la yal yang 'gro// rgyal sras phyi rabs rjes 'jug go/ dman pas rgyal ba'i don 'dod rnams// skal ba ldan pas las 'phro 'thud// byang chub don du gnyer ba yi// bla ma la gus snying rje che// dam tshig la
gnas shes rgyud dag/ shes rab rig rtsal ldan la gtad// mi shes rmongs pa phyin ci log/ skal med log lta'i sgrib pa bcings// bstan pa'i ru dra nyams pa'i rigs// chos skal chad la gsang rgyas

gdab// 'di ni gsang chen nges pa'i bka'// zhes ni ston pas bka' stsal pas// de 'khor rigs can rang gi tshogs// rjes su yi rang chos nyid dang// mtsho la kha ba babs pa bzhin// rang rang thad khar rang
babs su// dbyer med bde ba chen por grol// ston pa'i gsung la mngon par bstod// e ma thams cad mkhyen pa'i rje// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// sangs rgyas ma lus skyed pa'i sku// tshangs pa'i
gsung mchog seng ge sgra// ma lus kun mkhyen de bzhin thugs// che mchog yon tan kun gyi dpal// 'phrin las thogs med me long gsal// 'khor 'das theg kun gsal bar ston// zab dang rgya che kun gyi

bcud// rmad byung ngo mtshar snying po rgyud// sangs rgyas bstan pa'i spyi mes po// kun tu bzang po khyod la bstod// ces nges pa dam par bstod do// yongs su gtad pa rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig
pa'o//// de nas 'khor thams cad ci la yang mi dmigs pa'i ngang nas/ kun tu gsal bar bstan te/ khyad par lha'i 'jig rten du grags shing// o rgyan gnas nas kun smin cing grol

bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi snying po de kho na nyid nges pa/ ye shes mchog gi rgyud chen po/ gsang ba yongs rdzogs zhes bya ba rdzogs so//// o rgyan gyi pan Ti ta

chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis/ o rgyan dang/ rgya gar dbus kyi skad las/ rdo rje gdan du rang 'gyur mdzad/ de nas bod yul lha sa 'phrul snang gi gtsug lag khang du/ mnga' bdag rje blon gsum la don rgyud

gnang nas/ tshig brgyud don gyi dpe'i yi ge phyi mo// d+ha ki'i gnas nas blangs te bris nas/ phyi rabs don du gtsug lag khang de nyid du gter du sbas so// skal ldan las can cig dang phrad par shog cha/

m+laSh+lad+h+yadAtra/ tra/ ta ma da na gya/ sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ e ma chos dbyings nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor nas// rgyud sde skar tshogs rnams kyi mchog/ snying po nyi zla lta bu 'di// bdag 'dra pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis// phyi

rabs dus kyi lnga brgya la// mtshan nyid sde chos sngags sde dar dus su// tshig la dred cing don la rmongs pa yi// dar la ma smin grong bsnyen byed dus su// phan par bya phyir rgyal bas lung bstan nas// d+ha ki'i lag
nas dpe blangs gter du sbas// don gyi shes rab blo ldan snying rje can// chos sam rad na'i ming can las ldan dang// rgyal ba'i dgongs pa 'di nyid 'phrad par shog/ dpe rnying mi la ma bstan gter du

sbas// dam can tshogs kyis bka' 'di thub par srungs// gtad rgya/ Ta rgya rgak+Sha/ gter rgya/ rdA/ Da/ cha nya/ sbas rgya/ shah+ye/ thad/ gsang rgya/ d+ha la DaSha dbang rgya/ Ta nyA gwa Ta Sha tha Sha/ kha thaM/ Shatha/ e ma bdag
'dra rin chen gling pa yis// rgyal ba'i dgongs pa bla na med// rgyud sde'i mthar thug snying po'i don// o rgyan lung bstan gter nas bton// ma yig shog ser dngos la bshus// sems can don du dgongs pa
la// gzhan gyis rang 'dod ma yin pas// bla ma d+ha ki'i tshogs rnams kyis// bka' chad ma mdzad byin gyis rlobs// 'di nyid nyams len rigs 'dzin gyis// gtso byas mkha' mnyam 'gro ba kun// mkhyen
gnyis yon tan myur thob shog/ sa ma ya/ pa thA/ rgya rgya rgya/ g+hU h+ya/ shog ser tsha'o////

h+ya/ Ta nra rwa twa klu/ T-i Ta tha by-i/ rnA TA TA+o/ rgya gar skad du/ sarba b+he la tri d+harma d+ha du/ bod skad du/ rang byung gis chos tshig thams cad drang shar ba'i glegs bam/ bcom ldan 'das ka dag smra bsam

brjod tshig mtha' dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi dbyings dmigs gtad dang bral ba'i klong na/ mtshan ma yul gnyis dang bral ba'i gzhal yas bzo min kha dog dang bral ba'i gdan khri la/ zhal phyag
phyogs gzhan las 'das pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang pos/ thugs rje sna tshogs su 'phrod pa'i rang shes rig gi mdangs dgrod la/ 'khor 'das gnyis su mi phye phye ba mi mnga' ba'i dus su bka' stsal pa/ a a

a/ stong khyab gsal rig bzod pa med// snang khyab lhug pa thal le ba// ming med yul bral ma 'gag cing// go 'byed rang 'byung snang gsal phye// rang rtsal ma rig gzhi snang 'thas// stong ngo rang bzhin gsal
char zhen// thugs rje snang zhugs 'byung lngar 'thas/ khams gsum rigs drug dug gsum 'thungs// de grol kungs chen lta 'dod na// snang ba bkod pa'i phyi dbyings nang// sku gsum rdzogs ldan tshom 'od
zer// 'phra bsnyan gsal 'tsher dkyil 'khor rdzogs// shel 'ja' me long nya phyis gsum// dbang bzhi rdzogs pa'i dpe ru bzhag/ mun nag sgo gsum bya ba btang// a 'a sha sa ma ha bzlas// rdo rje gdengs

pa mi g.yo zhing// 'byung bzhi phyi nang rtog rtsa bcad// gdod ma bzhi la ngang bab na// g.yo med klong du drug cu bsnal// sems dang ye shes rtsa lam sgo// so sor dbye la gcig tu bsre// chos sku rang grol phyag

rgya'i// sgron ma rnam bzhi longs spyod cig/ snang bzhi gdeng bzhi sa zin nas/ khams gsum mig med ye rdzogs rgyas// snang dang stong dang dbyer med chos// 'khor 'das chos tshig der zad do// rang byung sho
log gnyis pa 'di// tshig dang yi ger ma byung ste// mkha' la 'ja' zer bzhin du 'khyil// bstan pa kun gyis thog ma'o// zhes gsungs dgongs pa'i rgyud// rin po ches bris te mgul du bcangs pa'i mi ni
dran sangs rgya ba'o// sngags kyi srungs mas bka' 'di srungs la/ skal ldan gyi bu la gtod cig/ s+ya s+ya s+ya/ h+ya ga Ta r+tha/ kaA ca 'a////
rgya gar skad du/ oM a hUM swAhA/ bod skad du/ sku lnga dbyer med rang shar gyi glegs bam/ bcom ldan 'das lnga ldan tshom bu'i zhing khams/ rig pa gzhon nu bum pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// chos sku
kun tu bzang po de nyid longs sku'i rnam par gsal te/ gnas thig le rnam par dag pa/ dmigs pa bcas gzugs ris las 'das pa/ rnam par snang mdzad rang bzhin gyis gsal bas/ 'khor 'das rim

pa rigs brgya zhi khro'i brjod las 'dod las 'das pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma ho/ rang la gnas pa'i 'od po che/ dbyings chen snang ba ngo mtshar che// rang la snang ba'i bkrag po che// yul drug

shar ba ngo mtshar che// rang las grol ba'i shes pa po// rgya gsum grol ba ngo mtshar che// dbang chen lnga po thob pa na// spo mthon rtse nas chu mig phye// lus la gnas zhing khams 'dren tshugs// ngag tu 'bru lnga mang

bzlas cing// phyi nang gsang gsum lha sgom cig/ bde stong gsal rig mi rtog pa// sku lnga'i rigs lnga rang grol te// sprul bas khams gsum dong sprug go/ lta sgom spyod 'bras lha tshogs kyi// 'phrin las bya ba
'dis rdzogs so// sho lo ka ni bzhi pa 'di// mkha' la yig 'bru'i tshul du shar// bstan pa kun gyis sras cig yin// skal ldan bu la 'di ston cig/ ces gsungs/ longs sku'i dgongs spyod sras cig gis/

rgyud ces bya ba rin chen bris te mgul du bcangs pas theg rje dran par sangs rgyas pa'o// sngags kyi srungs mas srungs cig/ sa ma ya/ gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ zab rgya/ h+ya la ka na ba mA/ rtsa r+t+ra\u0f85 rtaM Da TaM////
rgya gar skad du/ a a AM/ bod skad du/ stong pa'i sgra/ bcom ldan 'das kun snang 'dus ma byas la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad ces snang ba'i dus na kun khyab brdal ba chen po'i zhing khams su/

sprul pa'i sku nyid du shar te/ thabs shes gnyis su med pa'i khye'u chung rdo rje 'chang gis/ 'phrin las rnam pa bzhi'i 'khor lo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma/ ngo bo chos rnams ngang gis stong// lta ba
mtha' grol la zlos cig/ rin chen chos rnams ngang gis gsal// sgom pa thod rgal la zlos cig/ spyod pa thugs rje rang grol ngang// sku gsum rang gsal la zlos cig/ snang ba phyi ru bzo ma bcos// rig pa

nang du rtsis ma 'debs// snang rig bar na hrig ge ba// dbyings chen ngang na lam me ba// rkyen bral yul la khyug ge ba// ma bcos ma yangs la zlos cig/ tshogs drug dbang thob gzhan don byed// lus glong

ngag sdom sems mi 'phro// 'di nyid bstan pa'i thog ma'o// 'khor 'das gnyis med gdengs chos cig/ sho lo ka ni bzhi pa 'di// 'byung bzhi'i sgra ru rang byung bas// 'di dang su 'phrad gdod mar grol// lnga
ldan bla ma 'di ston cig/ sa ma ya/ sngags kyi srungs mas srungs cig gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ zab rgya/ dam rgya'o// rdo rje 'chang dang po'i dgongs pa bstan pa'i bu gcig po rdzogs so////

d+h+ya hwar nywa/ ha ma Ta rta/ rgya gar skad du/ sarba d+harma b+he/ bod skad du/ thams cad kyi gnad/ rang shar gyis lha bzhi snang brdal la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can gyi tshe lo dpag tu med pa'i dus na/

yul dga' ldan brtsegs par/ ston pa rdo rje sems dpar shar/ rdzus te skyes pa rnams 'dul ba'i phyir// 'khor sangs rgyas stong rtsa gnyis la// lcog ga dgu 'gyur gyi skad kyis rtsa ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs/ ka
dag spros med spros pa bral// gzhi snang chen por thag chod cig/ rang gsal ma 'dres ma 'gags snang// lam snang chen por thag chod cig/ rang grol lhun grub snyam brdal ngang// 'bras bu gdengs chen la

zlos cig/ gnas sa rtsi ta dung khang rtsa// lam ni shel sbugs dngas pa ste// sgo ni rgyang zhags chu sgron la// yul ni rkyen bral dang mtho'i dbyings// ngo bo 'phra snyan stong gsal 'khyugs/ kha dog ma nges sna tshogs
ris// byed pa sems can kun don byed// yod ni sems can kun la yod// mngon sum snang bas bar dor grol// gong 'phel snang bas 'chi khar grol// tshad phebs snang bas 'od lus thob// zad pas skad
cig rdzogs sangs rgyas// lus ni rdo rje lta bur dril// ngag ni hUM gis sgra gsum 'byin// sems ni rang rang ngo la stong// ma yengs gsum gyis gos gsum chod// bka' gtad rab 'byams dbang rdzogs

so// 'di shes sems dpa' rdo rje dang// gnyis med lhun snyam chen po'o// bstan pa kun gyi sras tshig dam pa/ rin po che'i khu bas bris te mgul du bcang ngo// thugs rje mthong grol ces bya ba'i// sngags kyi
srungs mas srungs cig/ sa ma ya/ gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ zab rgya//// traM/ Na k+Sha/ rgya gar skad du/ rba du sa t+har kaM bod skad du/ yang ti srog gzer/ bcom ldan 'das

bde chen stong snang rdzogs la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas tshe lo bye ba thub pa'i dus// mi mjed 'jig rten de ba der// drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen nga// sgong nga dag la skyes tshul brten// bcu drug gzhon tshul 'od mi

'khrug/ chags pas chags pa 'dul don du// 'khor du mkha' 'gro 'bum tsho lnga// gdung ba bcad phyir tshig 'di gsung// e ma/ rig pa glong chen nam mkha' 'dra// nyon mongs rtog pa rlung 'tshub 'dra// 'dul
byed dam chos nyi ma 'dra// slar yang mes tshig me yi bdugs// nyon mongs gnyen por nyon mongs bdan// pho la bcu drug mo la brgyad// thabs shes yab yum gdan rdzas bsags// dung chen ri mo pad+ma
rigs// glang sna rigs lnga longs sku 'grub// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang// las dang bder gshegs dpa' bo lnga// bde can sprul pa'i sku yang 'grub// bde la sems bzung stong la sbyang// phabs
bzung zlog dgram lus gnad bcang// drang ba go zlogs thig le 'phel// phyi nang gung sbyar snang sems 'dre// rlung gis yon tan thams cad 'grub// yi ges gzhan don dpag med byed// thig les pha rol
sems shes 'gyur// sngon du dam bzhi'i tri bzhi sbyang// gnad bzhis 'khor ba'i sems bsgral lo// 'bras bu sku gsum mngon du gyur// lnga'i 'khor ba dong sprug go/ dgu bcu gcig gis 'od kyi lus// chags
pa can rnams thob pa'o// gnad 'di sus shes 'khor 'das gyes// tshogs 'di rgyud kyis rtogs 'gyur grol// lnga ldan bu la 'di gtod las// skal med dman la ma bsgrag cig/ sgya mya ya/ sngags kyi srungs
mas bka' 'di srungs cig/ gter rgya/ sbas rgya'o// yang tig srog gzer gyi rgyud ces bya ba thugs rje cer grol yin no// swa swa tha swa////
r+ya swath+wa r+b+ya/ rgya gar skad du/ i baM kru ya/ bod skad du/ gser gyi 'bru gcig pa/ 'khor 'das mtha' grol klong du phyag 'tshal lo// sems can tshe lo 'bum gyi dus// ston pa 'jam dpal 'jig
skyobs nyid// drod dang gsher gyis gnas su bstan// chags pa logs can 'dul ba'i phyir// thabs kyi rgyud las skyed bskyed pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' 'brug sgrog drug/ rigs ldan 'khor brdal bka'
stsal ba// e ma/ dbang gsum gnad gsum gzer gdab pas// bsdod gsum tshad gsum yul gsum chod// zhing khams gsum la longs spyod pas// ngo sprod gsum gyis thag chod cig/ ces gsungs
so// 'khor ba dong sprugs gser gyi 'bru gcig pa zhes bya ba/ thugs rje dreg grol sa ma ya rgya rgya rgya/ sngags kyi bdag mos srungs cig/ gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ zab rgya/ tha rbA sA////
rgya gar skad du/ ma ma a k+She/ bod skad du/ rigs drug rang grol/ bcom ldan 'das sku gsum rang grol de la phyag 'tshal lo// tshe lo khri tsho brgyad pa'i dus// lus kyi 'od zer nyi zla 'byung// nyon

mongs pho mo dbang sgo dang// gzung 'dzin chags sdang rab tu 'thas// de 'dul gnyen por rdo rje 'chang// mngal du skye ba'i tshul yang bstan// khye'u chung rnam par rol pa zhes// 'khor du gnod sbyin srin por

bskor// stong phrag lnga pa 'di gsung// gra? pA/ e ma/ ma bcos zhogs dang kha dog yengs// ma yengs zhog la ngang dngas thon// rgyun du skyongs dang mnyam rjes gsal// snang stong sres dang don go chod// chos

sku'i ngo sprod rtsa gcig gis// chos sku'i zhing khams lta bar gyis// longs sku'i ngo sprod rtsa gcig gis// longs sku'i zhing khams spyod par gyis// sprul sku'i ngo sprod rtsa gcig gis// sprul sku'i zhing khams lta bar

gyis// skye gnas bar do gras thag chod// 'chi kha'i bar dor rang gsal thob// chos nyid bar dor mkhyen spyod rgyas// srid pa'i bar dor sprul zhing grol// lhun grub sbubs su bu d+ha'o// 'di ni 'byung lnga'i sgra ru

shar// a ti bstan pa'i thig le yin// rgyu yi rgyud kyis rang ngo 'phrod// thugs rje reg sangs rgyas pa'o// sngags kyi srungs mas srungs cig/ sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ zab rgya/ ra Ta gi sra/ 'thas

n+ya/ n+ya ra ny-i ca//// ShADanya/ rngA hA taM Sha/ rgya gar skad du/ bud+d+ha ka ra ya hu ma na ma/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhal chems dang po zhes bya ba/ drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen nyid la phyag
'tshal lo// tshe lo lnga khri thub pa'i dus// 'gro ba sems can thams cad ni// skye ba rnam bzhi dag las skyes// yul ni sum cu rtsa gsum zhes// dga' dang ldan pa'i yul de ru// gso bar byed pa sman gyi

tshal// 'tsho byed gzhon nu'i ldum ra der// longs sku rdo rje 'chang chen nga// rdo rje 'chang du sku sprul nas// sangs rgyas 'od srungs la sogs te// rab ni gnyis pa'i 'khor gyis bskor// 'bras bu gsum gyi zas

kyang zos// chos ni pha rol phyin pa ste// rgyas pa 'khru gang re re dang// 'bring ni stong phrag stong pa dang// nyi khri dang ni gnyis su gsung// tha ma shes rab khri ba dang// sngags kyi rgyud sde me lce 'phrengs// sgo nga'i sgra

la sogs pa dang// ye shes rgyan gyis bshad rgyud dang// thig le mchog rgyud kun gsal dang// gsang sngags rgyud sde mang du gsungs// lha dbang brgya byin khangs bzang gi/ lhoyi phyogs su de ltar bshad// lha

dbang brgya sbyin btsun mo bzhi// sum cu rtsa gsum sras dang bcas// nyon mongs zad par bya phyir 'ong// lo ni sum cu rtsa lnga lon// de nas 'da' ba'i tshul yang ston// stong phrag brgyad du ting 'dzin sgom// de
dus rigs 'dzin dga' rab rjes// 'tsho byed gzhon nu'i ldum rar rgyas// gdung ba'i shugs kyis mchi ma phyung// kye ma kye hud kye ma klung// ston pa sgron ma'i 'od nub nas// sems can mun pa

gang gis sel// de ltar smre sngags brgyal sangs nas// nam mkha'i dbyings su yar bltas pas// 'od zer 'ja' tshon 'khrug pa'i nang// ston pa drug pa rdo rje 'chang// phyag g.yas grub lo yar byung nas// rin
chen shel gyi za ma tog/ sen gang ba cig mar la bor// bdag gis lag g.yon yar brkyang bas// glegs bam lag mthil g.yon du babs// de nyid zhal phyes ltas pa'i// mthing gi shug gu mthing kha la// b+hai
dur zhun mas bris pa snang// mthong bas dga' rab rang rgyud grol// de yi zhal chems 'di ltar ro// kye ma kye ma rigs kyi bu// gsang sngags gsang ba'i gnad rnams kun// gcig tu dril la nyams su
long// lus ngag yid kyi sngon 'gro ni// mi rtag snying rjes byang sems bsgom// dben zhing nyams dga' gnas nyid brten// chos dang mthun pa'i mched grogs tshol/ khams kyi brtan po yo byad bsar// sku
gsum rten gyi mchod pa shis// lus ni ma bcos gang bder 'dug/ ngag ni 'chal pa'i lo byung yang// sems rtog snga phyi bar gsum chod// 'di ni zhen log drag po bsgom// dge med rgyud la yang yang
khol// lus ngag yid gsum rang sor glod// de nas don dam sems skyed ni// stong gsal snying rjes bdag med bsgom// lus 'di dmigs rgyus bskyed pa'i phyir// rigs drug sa bon nyid du gnas// rig pa

sku gsum dngos yin phyir// sku gsum yi ge gsum du gnas// ye shes rtsal sbyang ru shan dbye// dbye ba rnam pa gnyis yin te// thog mar tha mal pa yis lus// mdzod spu mgrin pa snying kha dang// lte ba gsang
gnas rkang mthil du// a dkar ti mthing nr-i ljang dang// bre ser sre dmar du nag sgom// sku gsung thugs la 'bru gsum ni// dkar dmar mthing la me 'bar bas// rigs drug sa bon sreg par bsgom// oM
AHhUM gsum la bdun 'bum bskyal// des ni ngan song rdog pas non// gnyis pa bdag gi rdor sems kyis// sku gsung thugs yig 'khor lo bsgom// gsum pa spyan 'dren mchod pa 'bul// bzhi pa kun rdzob

las rim bsgom// smon 'jug gnyis la 'bad par bya// tshogs gnyis rdzogs phyir maN+Dal phul// byin rlabs 'byung phyir gsol ba btab// lus sgrib byang phyir phyag bskor bya// ngag sgrib sbyang phyir yig brgya
bzlas// mdo dang bsngo ba smon lam btab// nyin mtshan chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// mgron rigs bzhi la longs spyod 'bul// de ltar sngon 'gro rdzogs byas nas// spros bcas la sogs dbang rnams
bskur// dbang srog dam tshig sku gsung thugs// ma khrel gsum gyi srungs mtshams bca'// mya ngan 'das pa'i sna sel yin// 'gro drug 'dren pa'i lcags kyu yin// thar pa bgrod pa'i lam skal

yin// 'khor ba sgrol ba'i gru chen yin// de skad ces ni rang shar ba// bstan pa kun gyi snying gzer yin// rdo rje 'chang gi 'das rjes mchog/ zhal chems dag tu bka' stsal lo// dpal sngags kyi srungs ma
nag mo khros mas srungs cig/ sa ma ya/ sku'i rgya/ gsung gi rgya/ thugs kyi rgya////
